story:
Pear OS 8 is a French distribution. It was created by David Tavares, Deux-Sèvres (79), France. The purpose of Pear OS is to create an operating system based on linux (ubuntu mini remix) and propose a simple but powerful interface.

Pear OS is free (thanks to your donations) and we hope you enjoy it.

It is operating out of the box, with a complete multimedia experienceand is extremely easy to use. Users are encouraged to send their comments to the project so that their ideas can be used to improve Pear OS. Based on Ubuntu (debian), it provides an impressive repository. It is safe and reliable. Pear OS requires very little maintenance.

A big thank you to everyone who helped me design this new version. Among the bug fixes, the creation of the design, a big thank you to the community of Pear OS. 


The project :

Take your "Pear OS 8" with you everywhere

The Tablet Edition Pear OS 8 is specially designed to work with Microsoft Surface tablet.

Two versions are available :

- Pear OS Tablet 8 Editon RT (ARM)
- Pear OS 8 Pro Tablet Edition (x64).



This is a big project I'm going to throw me and several developers over the world :

- Me : David Tavares (Creator of Pear OS), FR
- Steven Randall, US
- Mark Stanford, US
- Ulrik Stjernberg, DE
- Roberto Da Silva, PT

These versions will not be available before a long development cycle. Several changes in Pear OS 8 will be made ​​to adapt and be optimized for the touch screen to create a reliable and useful experience.

This is why I present this project on Indiegogo to find funding to continue this wonderful project.

The ARM version will be in a second time, also developed for compatibility with the Samsung Galaxy Tab, Note and Nexus 7 & 10.

You can visit my website for more information on Pear OS 8 system :

Main website : http://pearlinux.fr

Forum : http://pearlinux.org

Info website : http://pear-news.fr

Developer website : http://devcenter.pearlinux.fr

Pear OS is free (thanks to your donations) and we hope you enjoy it.
It is operating out of the box, with a complete multimedia experienceand is extremely easy to use. story:
Turn your TV into a Computer. It's the world's fastest PC stick. An engineering masterpiece that takes personal computing technology to an impossibly small size. Featuring the latest Intel® Cherry Trail Atom chipset for improved graphics performance, 4GB of ram and 64GB of storage. Faster Wi-Fi with upgraded 5ghz speeds versus older 2.4ghz and loaded with the new Windows 10 operating system.



Twice as Fast as the Competition

Performance first; faster graphics and less load time. Featuring the latest Intel® Cherry Trail Atom chipset (same CPU and powerful graphics processor as the Microsoft® Surface 3), this quad core chipset uses the latest 14 nanometer process for faster, smaller, mobile computing. 802.11ac Wi-Fi speeds



Wi-Fi Speed Comparison

Blazing fast Wi-Fi speeds up to 1000 mpbs. 802.11ac is the latest and greatest technology. Say goodbye to video buffering on NetFlix or YouTube.


Your TV is now a Computer

Everything your computer can do, this can do better. With the ComputerStick, productivity has no end.

  • Surf the web. Play HD videos. Do presentations on the big screen. 
  • Stop being limited by the size of your computer monitor.



Your Phone is now a TV Remote

No need to carry around a mouse or keyboard. Download the ComputerStick Mobile app and use the touchscreen of your mobile phone as a fully functioning mouse--the onscreen keyboard does it all. You can always use your favorite USB keyboard and mouse too if you'd like.



Works With Any TV

The ComputerStick can be connected to TVs of all sizes. From your 40" living room to your 110" projector--anything with an HDMI port. 

  • Maintain work productivity at home or in the office. 
  • Look at family pictures/videos. 
  • Shop on Amazon and so much more. 

It's a computer the entire family can use.




Just Plug It In

It's that easy. ComputerStick is powered by a Micro-USB port that simply plugs into an HDMI port on any monitor or TV.  

  • Step 1 - Plug it into any HDMI port 
  • Step 2 - Connect the power cable
  • Step 3 - Start enjoying your new TV Computer

Expand the possibilities of what your current smart TV can do. Give your home an entertainment system an upgrade. Streaming boxes only allow you to view movies and TV shows, but the ComputerStick brings together all the benefits of a TV and Computer. Nothing is more powerful and more portable than ComputerStick. See for yourself how the ComputerStick can help you do more: 



It's the Smartest TV money can buy. We pushed innovation to the limits.  It comes ready with all the functionalities of a computer that you'll need.

Version 1 - ComputerStick Ultra

  • Top of the line. Our fastest model.
  • 2.4ghz processor with Z8700 chipset. Intel quad-core Cherry Trail Atom™ chipset for graphics performance.
  • 4GB memory and 64GB storage.  Maximum performance.
  • Faster Wi-Fi. Features 5ghz upgraded Wi-Fi speeds vs 2.4ghz 
  • New Windows 10 operating system

Version 2 - ComputerStick Pro

  • Twice as fast as the competition. 
  • 1.84ghz processor with Z8300 chipset. Intel quad-core Cherry Trail Atom™ chipset for graphics performance.
  • 32GB storage and 2GB ram enough to store all your necessary files
  • Faster Wi-Fi. Features 5ghz upgraded Wi-Fi speeds vs 2.4ghz 
  • New Windows 10 operating system

Version 3 - ComputerStick

  • Intel® quad-core Bay Trail Atom™ processor that delivers fast performance. 1.33ghz processor with Z3735 chipset. 
  • 32GB storage and 2GB ram enough to store all your necessary files
  • New Windows 10 Operating System


Over 4 Million Available Apps

So many apps, so little time. Play games on Stream. Video chat on Skype. Send Gmail from Chrome View your family photos on Flickr. With ComputerStick you can do familiar things quickly and conveniently. 




A computer so small, it can literally fit in the palm of your hands. Take one on the go or keep one plugged into your TV. It takes up so little space, yet packs so much potential. 

  • Size - 4 inches x 2 inches x .25 inch
  • Weight - 5 ounces
  • Faster Wi-Fi - New and improved 5 ghz blazing fast Wi-Fi. Built-in Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n and Bluetooth 4.0 that can easily connect to the Internet and wireless devices.
  • USB and Micro SD - A standard USB port and MicroSD card slot, which can be used to connect to other devices and expand storage capacity. 

Unlimited Streaming Video

Stream YouTube, NetFlix or HULU.  Turn your TV into an endless entertainment center. You can even watch your family vacation pictures and videos.



Gaming on the Big Screen

There's no limit to the visual gaming experience ComputerStick delivers. Imagine playing MineCraft, World of Warcraft, Diablo, StarCraft, The Sims, or Guild Wars on the big screen. Host LAN parties at your house on the biggest computer screen possible.



Even works with Projectors

Earn your next promotion and deliver a standout presentation. No more messing with projector compatibility. Instead of carrying around a USB flash drive, you can now carry an entire computer in the palm of your hand. 



Place a Computer in Every Room

Computers should be everywhere.

  • In the Bedroom - Watch your favorite movies or stream Netflix
  • In the Family Room - Work on Microsoft Word report or Powerpoint presentation
  • In the Kitchen - Your favorite food recipes can now be seen on TV. Cook alongside Food Network
  • In the Bathroom - Watch makeup tutorials and read fashion blogs


Perks & Rewards

Be a part of the revolution and be one of the first to transform your existing TV into the Smartest TV money can buy.
  • Save up to $200 off the retail price.
  • Get IndieGoGo special perks and early contributor updates.



What's Inside?

Manufactured by one of the world's leading TV manufacturers and powered by Intel's innovation, ComputerStick is the computer of the future. It's loaded with the capacity of a computer and yet compact enough to fit in the palm of your hands. 


New Windows 10 OS License

We're one of three factories in the world that's granted the full Windows 10 authentic license. Accept no imitations or pirated software copycats. This also means you'll have lifetime access to software updates and support from the entire Microsoft Windows community.


$400K Stretch Goal - Wi-Fi Extender

Increase the ComputerStick range with an on-board antenna . Small in size, big on range. Once we hit our $400K stretch goal, we'll change the entire plastic housing to add this feature.


--


All logos, products, and company names mentioned in this campaign are trademarks of their respective owners and subject to their own copyright laws, Foreign or Domestic. In no way does this campaign claim ownership or responsibility for such items.

 

FAQ:

What's included with the ComputerStick?

All the accessories. HDMI extension cable for those hard to reach TV ports, power adapter, USB port extension cable, and Micro USB to USB port cable.

When do you expect to begin manufacturing and ship the product?

Manufacturing is scheduled to begin October and we expect to ship the product by December right before the holidays. Once Intel releases the final specs of their latest Cherry Trail CPU and processor, we will be able to confirm. Through the IndieGoGo campaign, backers will be able to lock in the savings now.

story:
Do you remember when things were simpler? When you could operate a device with just 2 simple dials? One to change volume and one to change channel, no more, no less. We have made it our mission to bring back that simplicity to todays over-complicated applications and we started with the remote control.

The remote control hasn’t really evolved since 1980. It is time for a revolution. Meet SPIN remote, the remote control of the future.




"SPIN enables ultimate comfort on your couch" - Newsweek

"SPIN remote is a lean, green, button-fightin' machine. Meet the last remote you'll ever need" - Atmel

"It's a fascinating concept, not least due to how it simplifies the sometimes complex remote control." - Gadget Review

"Simple enough, and sporting a clean design free of all those buttons you never use, this might be a hit for your home." - Daily Crowdfunder

The average household has 3 remote controls laying around in the living room, with about 40 buttons each. Do we really need 120 buttons to choose from when all we want to do is watch TV, play a movie or listen to the radio? The remote control has become too complex, we want to change this.

Do we really need yet another remote for every device we buy?

We strongly believe that technology should make our lives easier, not over-complicate it. With SPIN remote we want to bring back simplicity. We do this by bringing together what you really use and stripping away all that you don’t really need. A simple solution for a complex problem.

SPIN remote is the remote control revolutionized. A remote control shouldn’t have so many buttons, while you only use a handful. In fact, we believe that it shouldn’t have buttons at all. With SPIN remote you can do what comes naturally; turn rotation and touch into action.

The process for each prototype has been the same; Build it, test it, get feedback and improve.

SPIN remote connects your existing Infrared equipment to your smart home and it offers a tangible interface to your smart devices. Boundaries start to fade, as you can just as easily control your non-networked TV as you can dim your smart lights.

SPIN remote is the only remote you will ever need.

SPIN remote sends out infrared signals in every direction, so gone are the days when you had to point your remote control towards your equipment. Touching SPIN remote is enough to activate it and let the magic happen.

SPIN remote activates as soon as you touch it.

SPIN remote supports macros (or sequences), which means that you can for example turn on multiple devices at once.

SPIN remote not only transmits infrared signals, it can receive them as well. This feature is used to learn commands from your existing remote controls. Even though SPIN remote can talk with your smart devices via Bluetooth, it is primarily meant for your non-networked equipment and your not-so-smart HDTV.

SPIN remote can perform different functions depending on how it's held. For example to set the volume when held sideways.

SPIN remote can also talk with your smart devices. For example set it up to control your lights when held upside down.

SPIN remote is packed with sensors to detect motion, rotation, orientation and touch. These are used to determine the position it’s in and the action that’s performed. That’s how SPIN remote can seamlessly transform your actions into commands your equipment will understand.

And the best thing about all of this innovative technology: You don’t have to worry about it.

You can setup the touchpad for more advanced functions. For example to browse your TV guide or to control your Apple TV.

You can use the App to setup SPIN remote, after which you can even use your smartphone as a universal remote.

Your SPIN remote comes with a free App that will guide you through the setup process in just a few simple steps.

In its most simple form you just select the function you want to add (for example “volume up”), press the button on your old remote and you’re done! You can now use SPIN remote to control your volume, just as we’ve shown in our video (hold it sideways and rotate clockwise).



If you want more, you can always use the App to create your own presets, add new devices, configure the touchpad and combine function with rotation just the way you want.

Our main video showed you the basics, now let's talk about the more advanced features of SPIN remote.

Smart touchpad

Presets

Smart lighting

No matter how much time you spend on decorating your home, you always end up with those same plastic remotes laying on your coffee table. We want to change this.

We believe that your remote control should be personal.

It should fit in with what you already have and be different from the one everybody else has. That’s why we offer 5 different shells to choose from right from the start.

SPIN remote

The standard aluminum shell (as seen in the main video) that comes with the SPIN remote perk.

SPIN special

The polished aluminum shell with optional laser engraving that can be selected with the SPIN special perk.

The polished brass shell with optional laser engraving that can be selected with the SPIN special perk.

Escher Exclusive

An exclusive series of which only 250 will ever be made worldwide, with it you will be able to bring a true work of art into your living room.

Maurits Cornelis Escher (1898-1972) is one of the world's most famous graphic artists. His art is enjoyed by millions of people all over the world. We are proud to share that SPIN remote has been exclusively licensed by the official M.C. Escher Foundation to use Bird / Fish (No. 22).

All M.C. Escher works copyright © The M.C. Escher Company B.V. -Baarn-Holland. All rights reserved. www.mcescher.com

Colored shells

Colored shells are available in matt black, matt white, matt orange, matt blue and matt red. For every $14 you add to your current perk, you are allowed to choose one extra colored shell (so add $28 for two, $42 for three, etc.). Before shipping you will receive a survey in which you can fill in the additional shells you selected.

Our matt black prototype has been developed using a process called anodizing.

No more plastic remotes, imagine how great this would look on your coffee table.

If for example you select the SPIN remote perk ($92) with worldwide shipping ($17) and you want to have an additional matt black shell ($14) your total would be $123. You will now receive both the standard aluminum shell and an additional matt black one.

Dimensions: 1.61" top, 2.48" bottom, 1.38" height (41, 63, 35mm)

The more we spoke with friends, family and funders, the more ideas we got on how we could make SPIN remote even better. Even though most of these ideas are still being looked into, we are excited to share a few of them with you. Depending on your feedback, we might even turn some of them into stretch goals. Be sure to check back often, because we are planning to announce new ideas every week.

Find Me

Did you know that the average TV viewer spends about two weeks looking for lost remotes during their lifetime (article)? If you ask us, looking for a remote control should be a thing of the past.

That’s how the idea was born of having a ‘Find Me’ button in the App. Pressing it will cause SPIN remote to start sounding its buzzer and flashing its LEDs so you will have it back in no-time.

Status: We love this idea so much, that we decided to include this feature in our first release.

API / SDK

The feedback we got from funders and fellow developers was clear. You want to use SPIN remote exactly as you want it, so we will provide the tools to do so. We will develop an API / SDK that will allow you to control SPIN remote. You will be able to set its properties, send out Infrared commands and receive rotation and touch events.

Status: We already decided to turn this idea into reality. We did not plan to include the API / SDK in our initial release, but depending on your feedback it could end up being a stretch goal.

SPIN spider

Some of our funders shared that all of their A/V equipment is placed in a closed cabinet and that they have to open the cabinet doors every time they want to use their remotes (since Infrared doesn’t travel through them). While we can’t change the laws of physics, we can come up with a simple solution for them as well.

That’s how the idea was born to link together multiple SPIN remotes (via Bluetooth) and to develop an affordable add-on that will allow Infrared signals to travel past any blockades (cabinet shelves, other equipment). You could place 1 SPIN remote with your equipment and keep the doors closed while you use the other to control your equipment.

Status: We have determined that the idea is technically feasible and we have created a 3D impression of what the add-on could look like (below). Depending on your feedback, it could end up being a stretch goal.

The SPIN spider, a potential extender add-on for SPIN remote.

Our core team consists of 3 highly motivated professionals with the right skills to make SPIN remote a success. We are (from left to right) Ruud de Vaal (inventor and hardware specialist), Arjan van Bremen (product development and marketing) and Mathijs Vaessen (business development and operations). Between the three of us we have over 40 years of experience with prototyping, product development and project management.

“Years ago, when I first had the idea of a buttonless remote control, the technology to produce such a device just wasn’t commercially viable. With recent technological advancements and a group of talented people joining forces everything changed. The result is an amazing product that brings back simplicity to the living room.” said Ruud de Vaal, Co-Founder and inventor of SPIN remote.


The Freescale IoT truck in which SPIN remote was showcased.

Our portable demo board visualizes 2 of the most important features of SPIN remote: channel switching and volume control.

Note that the speed at which you can switch channels or set the volume will be the same as with your current remote. If you don’t want to surf all channels one by one just use the App to preload SPIN remote with a list of your favorites.

Risks and challenges

SPIN remote is a high tech product that requires innovative hardware and software to work together seamlessly. We have already done a lot of testing with our early prototypes to make sure that SPIN remote meets all of our requirements, but as with every project there may still be some challenges down the road.

As you might have seen in our perks list we find it very important that we incorporate feedback from you, our funders and end-users, into our final product. This means that the feedback we receive from our Beta testers might result in having to develop new features. Those features would have to be designed either in software or in hardware. To minimize the impact this has on our overall schedule we have already included a number of feedback loops to make sure that we can cover the most important feedback without having any delays.

When developing a product there is always the risk of not receiving the right components on time. Therefore we have chosen backup suppliers for each and every single component . If one would have a problem delivering or meeting our quality standards we can easily switch to another and minimize the overall impact on our schedule.

  • Shipping - Will SPIN remote ship internationally?
  • Shipping - How much will shipping/delivery cost?
  • Technical - Does SPIN remote work with my equipment?
  • Technical - With what smart devices does SPIN remote work?
  • Technical - Does SPIN remote work on any surface?
  • Technical - How long do the batteries last?
  • Technical - Why does SPIN remote have 6 Infrared LEDs, while my old remote has only one?
  • Technical - Will SPIN remote work with my Apple TV?
  • App - How do I get the SPIN remote App?
  • App - Are you planning to charge money for the App?
  • App - Will you create an App for BlackBerry and Windows Phone as well?

Shipping - Will SPIN remote ship internationally?

Yes. We want to bring SPIN remote to every living room across the globe!

Shipping - How much will shipping/delivery cost?

Shipping will cost $8 in The Netherlands and $17 for international funders.

Technical - Does SPIN remote work with my equipment?

Even though SPIN remote can talk with smart devices, it is primarily meant for your non-networked equipment and your not-so-smart HDTV (that use Infrared). If you are using an Infrared remote to control your equipment right now, then SPIN remote is able to learn from it and replace it.

Technical - With what smart devices does SPIN remote work?

When designing SPIN remote we paid extra attention to energy efficiency and connectivity, that's why it's equiped with a Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0 module (BLE for short). So to start off with SPIN remote can communicate with any device that contains a Bluetooth 4.0 type radio, often indicated as a BLE, Bluetooth Smart or Smart Ready device. When wanting to control Wi-Fi or Internet enabled devices, the App can function as a bridge. Meaning that it connects to both SPIN remote to receive rotation events (via Bluetooth) and your networked device (via Wi-Fi).

As you see, the possibilities are endless! With SPIN remote you can control your Infrared equipment, talk to your Bluetooth smart devices and use the App to get networked.

Technical - Does SPIN remote work on any surface?

Yes it does! As you've seen in the video, it even works in mid-air.

Technical - How long do the batteries last?

Although the battery life of any product strongly depends on its use, we are aiming for at least 6 months with normal use. As you can expect from us, we have made it very easy to replace the batteries (3x CR2032).

Technical - Why does SPIN remote have 6 Infrared LEDs, while my old remote has only one?

Your old remote has only one Infrared LED, which is mounted in the front. As a result you are forced to pick it up and point it towards your equipment. SPIN remote sends out Infrared signals in every direction, making pointing your remote a thing of the past.

Technical - Will SPIN remote work with my Apple TV?

Yes, and there are several ways to do so. Probably the easiest one is to learn the Infrared commands directly from your Apple Remote using the SPIN remote App. Another option is to add SPIN remote as a third-party remote control using the Apple TV itself (see the link below). Either way you have 6 functions to setup: up, down, left, right, select and menu.

The smart touchpad at the bottom of SPIN remote can be divided into 5 segments: a smaller button in the middle and 4 larger ones which each make up 1/4th of the remaining circle. You can setup each segment to perform a different function when pressed once or twice. What makes the touchpad so smart is that you don't ever have to figure out how you're holding it. Just think of it as a compass; your arrow up function will always be the key that's facing up (North), independent of how you're holding it (and thus just as you would expect).

For the Apple TV it would make sense to setup the arrow keys as you would expect and setup select and menu for either 1 or 2 taps on the center button.

http://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201856

App - How do I get the SPIN remote App?

You will be able to download it from the App Store (iOS) and the Play Store (Android) at the same time we start shipping SPIN remote.

App - Are you planning to charge money for the App?

No, the App will be free of charge.

App - Will you create an App for BlackBerry and Windows Phone as well?

We certainly didn't forget about our BlackBerry and Windows Phone users, but for our initial release we simply had to make a choice (iOS and Android). What we can tell you however is that if we are able to get more funding, supporting more mobile platforms is definitely one of the first things that we are going to do! Help spread the word and help increase compatibility!
story_txt:
Do you remember when things were simpler? When you could operate a device with just 2 simple dials? One to change volume and one to change channel, no more, no less. We have made it our mission to bring back that simplicity to todays over-complicated applications and we started with the remote control.
The remote control hasn’t really evolved since 1980. It is time for a revolution. Meet SPIN remote, the remote control of the future.




"SPIN enables ultimate comfort on your couch" - Newsweek
"SPIN remote is a lean, green, button-fightin' machine. Meet the last remote you'll ever need" - Atmel
"It's a fascinating concept, not least due to how it simplifies the sometimes complex remote control." - Gadget Review
"Simple enough, and sporting a clean design free of all those buttons you never use, this might be a hit for your home." - Daily Crowdfunder

The average household has 3 remote controls laying around in the living room, with about 40 buttons each. Do we really need 120 buttons to choose from when all we want to do is watch TV, play a movie or listen to the radio? The remote control has become too complex, we want to change this.

Do we really need yet another remote for every device we buy?
We strongly believe that technology should make our lives easier, not over-complicate it. With SPIN remote we want to bring back simplicity. We do this by bringing together what you really use and stripping away all that you don’t really need. A simple solution for a complex problem.

SPIN remote is the remote control revolutionized. A remote control shouldn’t have so many buttons, while you only use a handful. In fact, we believe that it shouldn’t have buttons at all. With SPIN remote you can do what comes naturally; turn rotation and touch into action.

The process for each prototype has been the same; Build it, test it, get feedback and improve.
SPIN remote connects your existing Infrared equipment to your smart home and it offers a tangible interface to your smart devices. Boundaries start to fade, as you can just as easily control your non-networked TV as you can dim your smart lights.

SPIN remote is the only remote you will ever need.

SPIN remote sends out infrared signals in every direction, so gone are the days when you had to point your remote control towards your equipment. Touching SPIN remote is enough to activate it and let the magic happen.

SPIN remote activates as soon as you touch it.

SPIN remote supports macros (or sequences), which means that you can for example turn on multiple devices at once.
SPIN remote not only transmits infrared signals, it can receive them as well. This feature is used to learn commands from your existing remote controls. Even though SPIN remote can talk with your smart devices via Bluetooth, it is primarily meant for your non-networked equipment and your not-so-smart HDTV.

SPIN remote can perform different functions depending on how it's held. For example to set the volume when held sideways.

SPIN remote can also talk with your smart devices. For example set it up to control your lights when held upside down.
SPIN remote is packed with sensors to detect motion, rotation, orientation and touch. These are used to determine the position it’s in and the action that’s performed. That’s how SPIN remote can seamlessly transform your actions into commands your equipment will understand.

And the best thing about all of this innovative technology: You don’t have to worry about it.

You can setup the touchpad for more advanced functions. For example to browse your TV guide or to control your Apple TV.

You can use the App to setup SPIN remote, after which you can even use your smartphone as a universal remote.

Your SPIN remote comes with a free App that will guide you through the setup process in just a few simple steps.

In its most simple form you just select the function you want to add (for example “volume up”), press the button on your old remote and you’re done! You can now use SPIN remote to control your volume, just as we’ve shown in our video (hold it sideways and rotate clockwise).


If you want more, you can always use the App to create your own presets, add new devices, configure the touchpad and combine function with rotation just the way you want.

Our main video showed you the basics, now let's talk about the more advanced features of SPIN remote.
Smart touchpad

Presets

Smart lighting


No matter how much time you spend on decorating your home, you always end up with those same plastic remotes laying on your coffee table. We want to change this.
We believe that your remote control should be personal.
It should fit in with what you already have and be different from the one everybody else has. That’s why we offer 5 different shells to choose from right from the start.

SPIN remote

The standard aluminum shell (as seen in the main video) that comes with the SPIN remote perk.
SPIN special

The polished aluminum shell with optional laser engraving that can be selected with the SPIN special perk.

The polished brass shell with optional laser engraving that can be selected with the SPIN special perk.
Escher Exclusive

An exclusive series of which only 250 will ever be made worldwide, with it you will be able to bring a true work of art into your living room.

Maurits Cornelis Escher (1898-1972) is one of the world's most famous graphic artists. His art is enjoyed by millions of people all over the world. We are proud to share that SPIN remote has been exclusively licensed by the official M.C. Escher Foundation to use Bird / Fish (No. 22).

All M.C. Escher works copyright © The M.C. Escher Company B.V. -Baarn-Holland. All rights reserved. www.mcescher.com
Colored shells
Colored shells are available in matt black, matt white, matt orange, matt blue and matt red. For every $14 you add to your current perk, you are allowed to choose one extra colored shell (so add $28 for two, $42 for three, etc.). Before shipping you will receive a survey in which you can fill in the additional shells you selected.

Our matt black prototype has been developed using a process called anodizing.

No more plastic remotes, imagine how great this would look on your coffee table.
If for example you select the SPIN remote perk ($92) with worldwide shipping ($17) and you want to have an additional matt black shell ($14) your total would be $123. You will now receive both the standard aluminum shell and an additional matt black one.


Dimensions: 1.61" top, 2.48" bottom, 1.38" height (41, 63, 35mm)

The more we spoke with friends, family and funders, the more ideas we got on how we could make SPIN remote even better. Even though most of these ideas are still being looked into, we are excited to share a few of them with you. Depending on your feedback, we might even turn some of them into stretch goals. Be sure to check back often, because we are planning to announce new ideas every week.
Find Me
Did you know that the average TV viewer spends about two weeks looking for lost remotes during their lifetime (article)? If you ask us, looking for a remote control should be a thing of the past.

That’s how the idea was born of having a ‘Find Me’ button in the App. Pressing it will cause SPIN remote to start sounding its buzzer and flashing its LEDs so you will have it back in no-time.

Status: We love this idea so much, that we decided to include this feature in our first release.
API / SDK
The feedback we got from funders and fellow developers was clear. You want to use SPIN remote exactly as you want it, so we will provide the tools to do so. We will develop an API / SDK that will allow you to control SPIN remote. You will be able to set its properties, send out Infrared commands and receive rotation and touch events.

Status: We already decided to turn this idea into reality. We did not plan to include the API / SDK in our initial release, but depending on your feedback it could end up being a stretch goal.
SPIN spider
Some of our funders shared that all of their A/V equipment is placed in a closed cabinet and that they have to open the cabinet doors every time they want to use their remotes (since Infrared doesn’t travel through them). While we can’t change the laws of physics, we can come up with a simple solution for them as well.

That’s how the idea was born to link together multiple SPIN remotes (via Bluetooth) and to develop an affordable add-on that will allow Infrared signals to travel past any blockades (cabinet shelves, other equipment). You could place 1 SPIN remote with your equipment and keep the doors closed while you use the other to control your equipment.

Status: We have determined that the idea is technically feasible and we have created a 3D impression of what the add-on could look like (below). Depending on your feedback, it could end up being a stretch goal.

The SPIN spider, a potential extender add-on for SPIN remote.


Our core team consists of 3 highly motivated professionals with the right skills to make SPIN remote a success. We are (from left to right) Ruud de Vaal (inventor and hardware specialist), Arjan van Bremen (product development and marketing) and Mathijs Vaessen (business development and operations). Between the three of us we have over 40 years of experience with prototyping, product development and project management.

“Years ago, when I first had the idea of a buttonless remote control, the technology to produce such a device just wasn’t commercially viable. With recent technological advancements and a group of talented people joining forces everything changed. The result is an amazing product that brings back simplicity to the living room.” said Ruud de Vaal, Co-Founder and inventor of SPIN remote.





The Freescale IoT truck in which SPIN remote was showcased.

Our portable demo board visualizes 2 of the most important features of SPIN remote: channel switching and volume control.

Note that the speed at which you can switch channels or set the volume will be the same as with your current remote. If you don’t want to surf all channels one by one just use the App to preload SPIN remote with a list of your favorites.


Risks and challenges
SPIN remote is a high tech product that requires innovative hardware and software to work together seamlessly. We have already done a lot of testing with our early prototypes to make sure that SPIN remote meets all of our requirements, but as with every project there may still be some challenges down the road.

As you might have seen in our perks list we find it very important that we incorporate feedback from you, our funders and end-users, into our final product. This means that the feedback we receive from our Beta testers might result in having to develop new features. Those features would have to be designed either in software or in hardware. To minimize the impact this has on our overall schedule we have already included a number of feedback loops to make sure that we can cover the most important feedback without having any delays.

When developing a product there is always the risk of not receiving the right components on time. Therefore we have chosen backup suppliers for each and every single component . If one would have a problem delivering or meeting our quality standards we can easily switch to another and minimize the overall impact on our schedule.


Shipping - Will SPIN remote ship internationally?
Shipping - How much will shipping/delivery cost?
Technical - Does SPIN remote work with my equipment?
Technical - With what smart devices does SPIN remote work?
Technical - Does SPIN remote work on any surface?
Technical - How long do the batteries last?
Technical - Why does SPIN remote have 6 Infrared LEDs, while my old remote has only one?
Technical - Will SPIN remote work with my Apple TV?
App - How do I get the SPIN remote App?
App - Are you planning to charge money for the App?
App - Will you create an App for BlackBerry and Windows Phone as well?


Shipping - Will SPIN remote ship internationally?
Yes. We want to bring SPIN remote to every living room across the globe!
Shipping - How much will shipping/delivery cost?
Shipping will cost $8 in The Netherlands and $17 for international funders.
Technical - Does SPIN remote work with my equipment?
Even though SPIN remote can talk with smart devices, it is primarily meant for your non-networked equipment and your not-so-smart HDTV (that use Infrared). If you are using an Infrared remote to control your equipment right now, then SPIN remote is able to learn from it and replace it.
Technical - With what smart devices does SPIN remote work?
When designing SPIN remote we paid extra attention to energy efficiency and connectivity, that's why it's equiped with a Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0 module (BLE for short). So to start off with SPIN remote can communicate with any device that contains a Bluetooth 4.0 type radio, often indicated as a BLE, Bluetooth Smart or Smart Ready device. When wanting to control Wi-Fi or Internet enabled devices, the App can function as a bridge. Meaning that it connects to both SPIN remote to receive rotation events (via Bluetooth) and your networked device (via Wi-Fi).

As you see, the possibilities are endless! With SPIN remote you can control your Infrared equipment, talk to your Bluetooth smart devices and use the App to get networked.
Technical - Does SPIN remote work on any surface?
Yes it does! As you've seen in the video, it even works in mid-air.
Technical - How long do the batteries last?
Although the battery life of any product strongly depends on its use, we are aiming for at least 6 months with normal use. As you can expect from us, we have made it very easy to replace the batteries (3x CR2032).
Technical - Why does SPIN remote have 6 Infrared LEDs, while my old remote has only one?
Your old remote has only one Infrared LED, which is mounted in the front. As a result you are forced to pick it up and point it towards your equipment. SPIN remote sends out Infrared signals in every direction, making pointing your remote a thing of the past.
Technical - Will SPIN remote work with my Apple TV?
Yes, and there are several ways to do so. Probably the easiest one is to learn the Infrared commands directly from your Apple Remote using the SPIN remote App. Another option is to add SPIN remote as a third-party remote control using the Apple TV itself (see the link below). Either way you have 6 functions to setup: up, down, left, right, select and menu.

The smart touchpad at the bottom of SPIN remote can be divided into 5 segments: a smaller button in the middle and 4 larger ones which each make up 1/4th of the remaining circle. You can setup each segment to perform a different function when pressed once or twice. What makes the touchpad so smart is that you don't ever have to figure out how you're holding it. Just think of it as a compass; your arrow up function will always be the key that's facing up (North), independent of how you're holding it (and thus just as you would expect).

For the Apple TV it would make sense to setup the arrow keys as you would expect and setup select and menu for either 1 or 2 taps on the center button.

http://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201856
App - How do I get the SPIN remote App?
You will be able to download it from the App Store (iOS) and the Play Store (Android) at the same time we start shipping SPIN remote.
App - Are you planning to charge money for the App?
No, the App will be free of charge.
App - Will you create an App for BlackBerry and Windows Phone as well?
We certainly didn't forget about our BlackBerry and Windows Phone users, but for our initial release we simply had to make a choice (iOS and Android). What we can tell you however is that if we are able to get more funding, supporting more mobile platforms is definitely one of the first things that we are going to do! Help spread the word and help increase compatibility!

story:
Zusammenfassung

rec-case sind aus alten Schallplatten recycelte iPhone Hüllen, die nicht nur cool aussehen, sondern Dein iPhone auch vor Kratzern und Stürzen schützen. Sie werden besonders nachhaltig produziert, da keine neuen Materialien verwendet werden und sie in Kooperation mit Behindertenwerkstätten in Deutschland gebaut werden sollen.

Damit die Produktion der Hüllen unseren Ansprüchen an Qualität und Design entspricht brauche ich Eure Hilfe um die Apparaturen, die ich bisher alle selber gebaut habe, in professionelle Werkzeuge verwandeln zu können ;)

 

Was Wir Brauchen          What we need is

Wir brauchen Eure Unterstützung, um:

-einen iPhone Dummy fräsen zu lassen

-die Werkzeuge zu verbessern

-die Homepage besser platzieren zu können

-einen Onlineshop einzurichten  

 

Your support to:

-create an iPhone dummy

-build production tools

-get a better placed homepage

-set up an onlineshop

Was Du Bekommst          What you get

Alle Perks werden versendet, bevor die Hüllen frei zum Verkauf stehen - SO seit Ihr garantiert die ERSTEN :) (bitte added 5€ für den Versand / please add 5€ for shipping)

Es gibt eine große Auswahl an möglichen Hüllen designs. Wir werden Euch immer über neue Farben und Muster informieren.

Sollte das Funding-Ziel nicht erreicht werden, werden wir das Geld in den Ausbau und die Verbreitung der Homepage investieren, um nach weiteren Sponsoren zu suchen und Werbung für unser Produkt zu machen.

 

Die Auswirkung

Wenn Ihr uns unterstützt, tragt Ihr entscheidend dazu bei, ein neues Produkt auf den Markt zu bringen, was nachhaltig aus Schallplatten recycelt wurde und so auf den Einsatz neuer Materialien verzichtet. Wir finden es klasse zu sehen, wie aus etwas altem mit Geschichte etwas neues entsteht, dass seine eigene Geschichte noch vor sich hat ;)

 

Du Kannst Auch Auf Andere Weisen Helfen

Bitte teilt unsere Idee sooft wie möglich, damit wir unseren Traum verwirklichen können und am Ende ein trendiges, neues, upgecyceltes Produkt für Euch bereit steht.

story:
DEVIL DOCK Chrome: weight 360g all-aluminum block made by CNC machine integrally, made specifically for the iPhone 5 design, different from the general mold products. The master of the CNC craft made Devil Dock as the world best High Quality.

 

 

 

 

 

 

DEVIL DOCK Chrome: 100% aluminum chrome alloy charging dock fits APPLE accessories, the design of the spindle is no additional board charging cable directly to CNC cutting aluminum block fixed in the main aluminum base , the main purpose so that you can own the original charging cable into. When you want to use the original lightning cable just come the spindle out of aluminum base with a tool, and install the original lightning cable 

 

 

 

DEVILDOCK surface treatment by professional anode treatment plant to the highest standards to do quality control, more scratch-resistant than the general Dock and anti-dirt, more beautiful.

 

 

 

DEVILDOCK Chrome can correspond installed case or bumper iPhone 5, when you use a different case or bumper, you can choose not to use the backplane or use the DEVILDOCK included backplane, you can feel at ease into the phone DEVILDOCK, also bring you different Case or Bumper convenience.

 

 

 

LOGO are manufactured in Taiwan six million level professional laser engraving machine, the brand DEVILCASE firmly engraved the laser typing in the aluminum alloy surface is different from the general engraving quality to the next level.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We made two colors one is Meteor Black the other is Topaz Silver

 

You will be surprised at out Devil Dock

It feels like silk

really smooth and high quality

 

Our motto is to make simple & premium design

We've done CNC craft since 1981
We have High-Technology about CNC craft

This is the masterpiece made by The Master of CNC Craft

 

The World Best Technology

 

We will make case & bumper for iPhone5 & Galaxy S4 too

If you help us we will make simple & premium design ACC

 

We will ship out as soon as this campaign is over

 

 

If you want to be distributor or wholesaler

 

please contact us

 

usadevilcase@gmail.com

story:
The Daily Stunner?

Zappower is one stop self-protection device for security personnel and commoners alike. With the increasing atrocities in the metro cities in India and abroad, we felt that women and common man should carry the safety devices with them to safeguard themselves from mugging and other attacks. But any additional device in the handbag or pocket is a burden and it is not meaningful to carry around if it is not used often. So we came up with the idea of making it a power bank for your smart phones and tablets that are always power hungry.

We have put in a lot of thought into making it the most useful companion not only for common man but for security guards, night watchmen and cops. Unlike firearms, batons that cause permanent damage and other physical means of fighting that inflict pain, Zappower ends the confrontation by temporarily disabling the assassins with a non-lethal powerful electric shock .

Check out Zappowr prototype demo!



These features make Zappowr unique

  • Powerful Stun Gun: Intimidates the attacker with electric sparks and sound from distance but if the sight and sound doesn't stop one, a strong jolt from Zappower certainly will! Power packed with 20,000V electric shock, it neutralizes the attacker in seconds inducing temporary paralysis for few minutes through muscular atrophy 
  • Battery Level Indicator: Unique LED power level indicator tells you if it is time to charge!
  • Portable Power Bank: Zappower charges mobile phones and other gadgets on-the-go! It is a reliable power backup with 4000mAh battery
  • Bright LED Flashlight: The LED flashlight provides a convenient source of light in the dark eliminating the need to carry bulky flashlights
  • Rechargeable Battery with USB: No need to buy/replace batteries for Zappower! With universal microUSB port, the built-in rechargeable Lion batteries can be charged using any mobile charger/laptop with greater ease.
  • Beauty & the Beast: With soft looks and comfortable grip Zappower is easy to hold but at the same time its sharp electrodes ruthlessly penetrate even through thick cloths. It sure has an element of surprise!
  • Simple design: Compact size (Current dimensions: 5.5" x 1.9" x1" and we are making it even smaller with the final version!) and low weight make it easier to carry around in one’s pocket!
  • Safety Switch (Updated!): To prevent accidental discharge, two levels of safety (with extra switch) is built for the stun gun to operate 
  • Great Support: We make our products in India to provide great support & warranty (1 year with replacement guarantee)

How does it compare with others?

What's the current status?

We have developed multiple prototypes and tested them thoroughly. What is shown in the video above is one of our first prototypes. We made lot of efforts to reduce the dimensions further to 5.5" x 1.9" x1" weighing less than 160 gms. We have already finalized the vendors for the components. Once we raise enough money for the mold, we can start the tooling process. We will post the updates regularly as they happen on how we are working to get you the best product (we are further trying to squeeze in our components to make the design even smaller...!)

Why this campaign & Where does the money go?

As explained earlier, we need to raise the target amount for bringing Zappowr into production



The amount raised in the campaign will be utilized for the following. 
  • Mold Design & Tooling costs
  • PCB and Electronic Components including Li-ion cells
  • Raw Plastic grains, colors
  • Man power, machinery, electricity for production & assembly
  • Casing and packaging
  • Indiegogo's 4% cut
  • (optional) 3D Printer (only with contributions from mugs & T-shirts)
  • and shipping
We are determined to get Zappowr out in the hands of people who need it the most. Your support and contributions help us come closer to realizing this dream. So even if we don't reach our goal we will make sure you get the first batch of Zappowr simply for extending your support and encouragement you have given us. To do this, We are planning to tie up with NGOs and security firms to make sure the production is possible.

Your contributions surely matter a lot to us...but it also makes difference to thousands of people out here in India to make them feel more secure. We are in talks with some NGOs to subsidize Zappowr to give it to underprivileged school going girls providing them with self-defense.  (Will update more about this here...)

Other Ways You Can Help

Any contribution you make makes a lot of difference to us. Your encouragement is the fuel that keeps us motivated to keep working better and keep innovating for creating a better world.

If you are unable to contribute, but are impressed with our endeavors... You can still help us by

  • Letting the word spread! - Just share our campaign on your favorite social media - Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn anywhere! - It might just reach the right people - through you!
  • Putting a good word with your friends - If you are happy with what we are trying to do just share it in the conversations with your friends
  • Giving us some relevant contacts - If you think some contact can help us in any way ... Just let us know... we will be happy to reach out!

We are ...

We, at MyTi are passionate about bringing out utility centric innovations (no matter how small) to make our lives more productive. The vision of the team is guided by the enthusiasm of Rohin, a researcher of his own right while Mohit brings in manufacturing expertise and brilliant design inspirations. We have a combined experience of 16 years in doing both professional and small level projects that came into production.


Through this campaign we are looking to start a journey of launching exciting products that are created at MyTi. Your contributions big or small help us achieve this goal and make more and more useful products for you.

FAQ

Are Stun guns and Tasers legal in India?

To the best of our knowledge, there are no clear laws in India regarding stun guns and other such devices. However, they are perfectly legal to carry around and can be used as self-defense. 

What are dimensions of the present version ?

The final version is of the typically sized equivalent to other power banks of the same power (4000mAh). The dimensions are almost 140mm x 48mm x 24mm (5.5" x 1.9" x 1") now which is also in comparison to the stun guns out there. We are still trying make it compact further. Will post the updates as they happen! We have put up the new video with the latest version. Check it out!

With the increasing atrocities in the metro cities in India and abroad, we felt that women and common man should carry the safety devices with them to safeguard themselves from mugging and other attacks. But any additional device in the handbag or pocket is a burden and it is not meaningful to carry around if it is not used often. So we came up with the idea of making it a power bank for your smart phones and tablets that are always power hungry.We have put in a lot of thought into making it the most useful companion not only for common man but for security guards, night watchmen and cops. Unlike firearms, batons that cause permanent damage and other physical means of fighting that inflict pain, Zappower ends the confrontation by temporarily disabling the assassins with a non-lethal powerful electric shock .
Check out Zappowr prototype demo!
These features make Zappowr unique

Powerful Stun Gun: Intimidates the attacker with electric sparks and sound from distance but if the sight and sound doesn't stop one, a strong jolt from Zappower certainly will! Power packed with 20,000V electric shock, it neutralizes the attacker in seconds inducing temporary paralysis for few minutes through muscular atrophy 

Battery Level Indicator: Unique LED power level indicator tells you if it is time to charge!

Portable Power Bank: Zappower charges mobile phones and other gadgets on-the-go! It is a reliable power backup with 4000mAh battery

Bright LED Flashlight: The LED flashlight provides a convenient source of light in the dark eliminating the need to carry bulky flashlights

Rechargeable Battery with USB: No need to buy/replace batteries for Zappower! With universal microUSB port, the built-in rechargeable Lion batteries can be charged using any mobile charger/laptop with greater ease.

Beauty & the Beast: With soft looks and comfortable grip Zappower is easy to hold but at the same time its sharp electrodes ruthlessly penetrate even through thick cloths. It sure has an element of surprise!

Simple design: Compact size (Current dimensions: 5.5" x 1.9" x1" and we are making it even smaller with the final version!) and low weight make it easier to carry around in one’s pocket!

Safety Switch (Updated!): To prevent accidental discharge, two levels of safety (with extra switch) is built for the stun gun to operate 

Great Support: We make our products in India to provide great support & warranty (1 year with replacement guarantee)


How does it compare with others?


What's the current status?
We have developed multiple prototypes 
and tested them thoroughly. What is shown in the video above is one of our first prototypes. We made lot of efforts to reduce the dimensions further to 5.5" x 1.9" x1" weighing less than 160 gms. We have already finalized the vendors for 
the components. Once we raise enough money for the mold, we can start the tooling process. We will post the updates regularly as they happen on how we are working to get you the best product (we are further trying to squeeze in our components to make the design even smaller...!)


Why this campaign & Where does the money go?

As explained earlier, we need to raise the target amount for bringing Zappowr into productionThe amount raised in the campaign will be utilized for the following. 


Mold Design & Tooling costs

PCB and Electronic Components including Li-ion cells
Raw Plastic grains, colors
Man power, machinery, electricity for production & assembly
Casing and packaging
Indiegogo's 4% cut
(optional) 3D Printer (only with contributions from mugs & T-shirts)
and shipping
We are determined to get Zappowr out in the hands of people who need it the most. Your support and contributions help us come closer to realizing this dream. So even if we don't reach our goal we will make sure you get the first batch of Zappowr simply for extending your support and encouragement you have given us. To do this, We are planning to tie up with NGOs and security firms to make sure the production is possible.Your contributions surely matter a lot to us...but it also makes difference to thousands of people out here in India to make them feel more secure. We are in talks with some NGOs to subsidize Zappowr to give it to underprivileged school going girls providing them with self-defense.  (Will update more about this here...)


Other Ways You Can Help
 Any contribution you make makes a lot of difference to us. Your encouragement is the fuel that keeps us motivated to keep working better and keep innovating for creating a better world. 
If you are unable to contribute, but are impressed with our endeavors... You can still help us by 

Letting the word spread! - Just share our campaign on your favorite social media - Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn anywhere! - It might just reach the right people - through you!


Putting a good word with your friends - If you are happy with what we are trying to do just share it in the conversations with your friends 
 
Giving us some relevant contacts - If you think some contact can help us in any way ... Just let us know... we will be happy to reach out! 


We are ...We, at MyTi are passionate about bringing out utility centric innovations (no matter how small) to make our lives more productive. The vision of the team is guided by the enthusiasm of Rohin, a researcher of his own right while Mohit brings in manufacturing expertise and brilliant design inspirations. We have a combined experience of 16 years in doing both professional and small level projects that came into production.


Through this campaign we are looking to start a journey of launching exciting products that are created at MyTi. Your contributions big or small help us achieve this goal and make more and more useful products for you.

 FAQAre Stun guns and Tasers legal in India?To the best of our knowledge, there are no clear laws in India regarding stun guns and other such devices. However, they are perfectly legal to carry around and can be used as self-defense.  What are dimensions of the present version ?The final version is of the typically sized equivalent to other power banks of the same power (4000mAh). The dimensions are almost 140mm x 48mm x 24mm (5.5" x 1.9" x 1") now which is also in comparison to the stun guns out there. We are still trying make it compact further. Will post the updates as they happen! We have put up the new video with the latest version. Check it out!

story:
Hello There!!

    Hi, i am Sulivan  and my brother Guillermo,  we are from Venezuela but we live in Madrid-Spain since few years ago and this is our first Indiegogo project, we hope that you like. :D

     We bet that your smartphone has probably run out of juice at an inopportune moment at least once in your life. Maybe you forgot your cable, charger at home or at work and you just don’t have access to another Lightning connector. 

     That’s where uCharger comes in, this convenient little device actually lets you charge your iPhone or iPad with any Smartphone cable.

     We are proud to present to you uCharger.

    The Micro Usb to lightning adapter that lets you charge your iPhone or iPad with any chargers of another Smartphone providers!




    Don't worry if you forgot the long cable, additional batteries  or charge the big battery phone cases, you just need uCharger and search another universal chargers.




     uCharger  It's a very simple product and very useful,  we believe that everybody with iPhone or iPad should own one in their keychain.
                                
     We created uCharger in different colors to choose. The perfect detail for gift to a friend or family.




Who talks about us.


The analysis.

     As you know, everybody have a Mobile Phone and therefore everybody have a charger too. The iPhone have just a 12.7 % of the market and another 87.3 %  to the another  smart phone providers but, they still use micro usb to charge their devices.

     You can check this interactive map where you can see the OS market share by country.

     How many friend you have with another Smartphone like (Blackberry, Samsung, Nokia, LG, HTC, etc), alot, right?...   The numbers speak for themselves, the possibility that you use this product is very high. Just you need one uCharger in your keychain and for sure you will use it by itself.


     Take it with you always.




The process.

     We did a lot of design to finally have the tiny, beautiful and useful uCharger.


     We hope you like it :D


Timeline of the production. 


Your help.

     We are really happy with this project, and we hope that you like it, but now we need your help to bring uCharger into your pocket.

     With your support you will get your uCharger at the best price possible for us! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends and family.

     Every price includes shipping! 

*Reminder: if we don't reach our goal you will be automatically get a full refund.

     "This is our first indiegogo project, and i think that we launched wrong the project with a flexible campaign, we think that the people don't thrusth in a flexible campaign because they think if the project don't get the goal the money not be refunded.  We will launch the nexts projects with a fixed campaign to get more confidence of the backers!"

     IF WE DON'T GET THE GOAL, WE WILL REFOUND THE MONEY BACK.


NEW REWARDS ( RESELLER OFFER!! 500 Units)

You will receive 500 uCharger. (3.8 $/Pcs) keyring and packaging included!

 **We will contact with you at the end of the campaign to know the color that you want, Free international shipping included!!

Estimated delivery: Junio 2015


Another way to help us!

    If you like our project but you can't contribute, you can help us sharing the project  with the buttons under the video.  

Please, spread the word in your social network.! share with your friends and family.

Thank you very much for share! 


Similar products?

   Is true that the Micro Usb to lightning converter it was invented but the way to take it with you in a simple and beautiful design is our idea and we designed uCharger with the hope that everypeople with iPhone most have one. 


Questions?

If you have any question, please feel free to contact with us in info@uCharger.co and we will answer as soon as possible!

story:
This is my store on Etsy.com

This is me with the fanny pack at my first stationery booth in Brooklyn with a pink mustache.

It's been a couple of years since then and my little business has been growing!  The Memo Bandit has been featured at The National Stationery Show 2012 and one of my creations was listed on Refinery 29 under the Best of Etsy in New York (picture).

I'm here on Indieagogo because I do a lot of my designing and production from home.  Particularly when I'm creating prototypes for new designs or selling them from a little booth in Brooklyn.

I bought Mavis because my designs evolved from this -

(which does this when you hold it up to the light)

to what this card looks like now -

and does this when you hold it up to the light -

This is what happened to a lot of my cards - more illustrations, more type, and more printer ink.

All of my cards require some sort of interaction - my theory is that when spend a little time with each card, either to fill something out or put something together, you're putting love into that card.  In a sense, you're putting a little piece of you into that envelope.

People who have purchased these cards have put them in their baby books, heard back from long lost friends, to even having a mother tell her son how much she loves him, something that would never be said out loud in their culture.

Which brings me back to Mavis.  She needs your help!  Without her ability to produce these little gifts, these little creations will have a hard time continuing to grow and evolve.

I just gave her a brand new black toner (the K in the CMYK), but she's running out of the Cyan, Magenta and Yellow.  Each of these high volume toners cost over 200 dollars with tax and shipping.

One of the challenges for being a one person show are all the hats that one must wear.  I create stationery because it's my life.  It's the reason why I moved to New York City and got a degree in Graphic Design. 

Any additional funding towards feeding Mavis will used for wholesale supplies, such as line sheets, samples, postage, and shipping supplies.  The samples are so key because my cards are so interactive, buyers need to actually play with the cards to be able to appreciate their awesome-ness. 


Which is why when you donate - you definitely will be getting one of these nifty guys sent to you in appreciation.

 Thanks so much for listening/reading!

 

(video credits - Thanks to Manu and freemusicarchive.org for “Happy Ending” by Podington Bear)

story:
WOWSTICK upgrade plan

We will upgrade WOWSTICK from Micro-USB to Type-C.

This upgrade will also bring performance improvements due to better battery management design and new chips. Once the test is complete, we will update the supporter's specifications immediately. 

A new step from the world's leading electric screwdriver brand. We bring the convenience and usability of traditional desktop tools and offer a stylish design in a compact package.

                                                                                                                                                                                           

What is WOWSTICK?

  • Includes 56 bits, making it a truly versatile desktop tool
  • The perfect tool to sit neatly on the table
  • Clean and beautiful equipment, integrated into daily life
  • Desktop gadget toy
  • The perfect gift for anyone

We know that you will like WOWSTICK, we are very confident in the quality of our products, we provide each supporter with a one-year WOWCARE warranty.

     

Become a supporter of this project and choose rewards. You will basically book one of our new packages. You will receive a discount from a special supporter and you will receive your information before you get it in the store. You can also view the rewards and add-ons section and be the first to watch the kickstarter official unbox video. 

We want to design something that seems logical on the desktop. When you see it, you think "Well, then it belongs." This pen-shaped design perfectly solves this problem. It can match almost any desktop.

 

- The most used tools in everyday life -

We really hope that WOWSTICK is a versatile desktop tool that can help you make almost any choice when you need it, from repairing gadgets to changing straps, from DIY to even unpacking. The patented detachable design is compatible with up to 56 positions and is suitable for different applications. What's more, WOWSTICK is the world's smallest precision electric screwdriver with USB charging to make your work easier!

Wowstick is designed in German design and aluminum alloy, with a screwless design. This revolutionary desktop tool not only looks great, but also features flawless functionality. Thanks to modern engineering and timeless design, Wowstick will surprise you.

The world's smallest functional 56-bit electric screwdriver. This new generation of desktop tools features a modern design that is slim and has the best features.

Wowstick patented design, hybrid. This is the most creative feature of Wowstick, which works very much like a hybrid car. In the electric mode, gently press the button and turn the Wowstick mini back and forth to tighten the screws. In addition, you can use the same technique to loosen the larger screws. Dual power features make your job easier.

The Wowstick is equipped with three shadowless LED lights. We use the same LED technology that surgeons use to create unshaded light, so you never miss a thing.

Ultra-high-precision flexible circuits and high-energy lithium batteries ensure uninterrupted operation for 6 hours.

With a diameter of only 16 mm, the Wowstick is the world's most compact electric screwdriver.

Wowstick is stylish, durable and fun. Weighing only 50 grams, it weighs very lightly.

0.15 / 3 Nm and 200 RPM, is the perfect combination of small tool repair, DIY and so on. 

- Since WOWSTICK is always on your desk, why not make it more interesting?

Although the original concept of WOWSTICK was to create a stylish, versatile tool for the desktop, we found other uses. Most notably, our employees are addicted to rotating WOWSTICK to help them focus. Give it a try and see your possibilities!

STANDMAC, Inc. It is a group of designers, engineers and innovators who are looking for new ways to make everyday life easier. The tools and products we create enable people to work with a simple wrench or screwdriver. We want to drive the tools forward and bring the next generation of useful tools.

contact us-  wowstick@standmac.com
