story:
We are going to be very upfront about the objectives of this project:

  1. The ibattz Wanderlust Travel Adapter is already in production and it was designed by a Tier One OEM manufacturer that has supplied travel adapters and chargers to many top brands. The technology in these products come from standard reference design and vendors simply pick and choose features to include base on availability and cost.
  2. Compared to other similar products on Kickstarter, Indiegogo, or Amazon.com, our travel adapter is the latest design and we have decided to include every features.  And it is the lowest cost!
  3.  ibattz Wanderlust Travel Adapter charges up to 5 devices simultaneously via the AC outlet, 3 USB Type A ports and 1 USB Type C port (USB PD and QC3.0 support).  It has 30W PD-C and 42W total power, and comes with all sorts of protections, ground pin, child safety and resettable fuse.  With the incredible price that we are offering, this is the BEST and lowest cost high end travel adapter on the market.
  4. Leave your Type-C laptop charger at home.  ibattz Wanderlust can charge Apple Macbook, Windows PC, tablets and many other Type-C devices. 

Why do we need your help?  

To lower our production cost by increasing our order quantity, and to be honest, we just want to have pre-orders to improve our cash flow.  

We (under Sonic Unity) have successfully completed 5 crowdfunding projects on Indiegogo and you can trust us that we will deliver a high quality product on time. 

Features

  • Push button resetting fuse
  • Child proof socket
  • Grounded system
  • Over-current, over-temperature, over-voltage & short circuit protections
  • USB PD and QC3.0
  • EU/UK/US/AU compatibility (more than 150 countries)
  • 42W 4 x USB output (1 type C and 3 type A)
  • Dimension: 120x75x36mm
  • Weight: 202g
  • Input: 100-240V
  • Output: 42W total; 3xUSB Outputs (12W max per output); Type-C Max Output=30W

Compare to Zendure Passport Go (and others) on Indiegogo, ibattz Wanderlust Travel Adapter comes with more features, more power and cost less. 

Don't use cheap and low quality travel adapters and chargers

I travel once a month and carry a travel adapter and laptop type C charger. Since I never trust and use the 5V charger that comes with the cheap travel adapter, I ended up carrying two more USB chargers. Safety is always a concern but until now, there has been no travel adapter with ground pin. The resettable fuse means that when there is a short, the fuse switch cut off the AC instead of a fuse burned out.  You reset the fuse by pushing a button on the adapter.
story_txt:
We are going to be very upfront about the objectives of this project:
The ibattz Wanderlust Travel Adapter is already in production and it was designed by a Tier One OEM manufacturer that has supplied travel adapters and chargers to many top brands. The technology in these products come from standard reference design and vendors simply pick and choose features to include base on availability and cost.

Compared to other similar products on Kickstarter, Indiegogo, or Amazon.com, our travel adapter is the latest design and we have decided to include every features.  And it is the lowest cost!

 ibattz Wanderlust Travel Adapter charges up to 5 devices simultaneously via the AC outlet, 3 USB Type A ports and 1 USB Type C port (USB PD and QC3.0 support).  It has 30W PD-C and 42W total power, and comes with all sorts of protections, ground pin, child safety and resettable fuse.  With the incredible price that we are offering, this is the BEST and lowest cost high end travel adapter on the market.
Leave your Type-C laptop charger at home.  ibattz Wanderlust can charge Apple Macbook, Windows PC, tablets and many other Type-C devices. 
Why do we need your help?  To lower our production cost by increasing our order quantity, and to be honest, we just want to have pre-orders to improve our cash flow.  We (under Sonic Unity) have successfully completed 5 crowdfunding projects on Indiegogo and you can trust us that we will deliver a high quality product on time. Features
Push button resetting fuse
Child proof socket
Grounded system
Over-current, over-temperature, over-voltage & short circuit protections
USB PD and QC3.0
EU/UK/US/AU compatibility (more than 150 countries)
42W 4 x USB output (1 type C and 3 type A)
Dimension: 120x75x36mm
Weight: 202g
Input: 100-240V
Output: 42W total; 3xUSB Outputs (12W max per output); Type-C Max Output=30W
Compare to Zendure Passport Go (and others) on Indiegogo, ibattz Wanderlust Travel Adapter comes with more features, more power and cost less. Don't use cheap and low quality travel adapters and chargersI travel once a month and carry a travel adapter and laptop type C charger. Since I never trust and use the 5V charger that comes with the cheap travel adapter, I ended up carrying two more USB chargers. Safety is always a concern but until now, there has been no travel adapter with ground pin. The resettable fuse means that when there is a short, the fuse switch cut off the AC instead of a fuse burned out.  You reset the fuse by pushing a button on the adapter.

story:
Introducing Pi Case, world's smartest battery case ever. It combines full day power and all your remote controls into a thin & light package.

 

 

 

 

Pi Case is not your ordinary battery case. It employs a number of technologies to deliver power to your iPhone in a smart way, and make your life a little easier.

With an ordinary battery case, you need to long press a button to charge your iPhone. With Pi Case, Battery AI knows when your phone battery is low and starts charging automatically. No button press needed. No more dead phones.

With an ordinary battery case, you need to press a button to check the case's battery level . With Pi Case, all you have to do is to flip it over. The accelerometer detects your motion and lights up the LED indicator.

 

Pi Case turns your iPhone into a universal remote.

Control up to 3 most used devices, with the Quick Button on Pi Case’s back.  You can config which devices to control inside the App, or even config the button action to turn on the flashlight, take a picture, invoke the voice assistant, etc.

With a simple and elegant user interface, the Pi Home app stores all your infrared devices and organize them into rooms.

Or, use your own voice to turn on the light, adjust the temperature, change the TV channel, etc. 

Setup is the biggest issue with all universal remotes. With Pi Case, you can take a picture of your existing remote, and we will identify your remote model in our online database, making the setup process really easy.

 

 

Pi Case supports over 200,000 models of televisions, air conditioners, audio/video and other devices. And we’re in the process of adding support for wifi/bluetootch devices.

 

 

Pi Case adds back the audio jack using the Bluetooth technology. The CSR chip streams high quality AAC music to your iPhone, and powers down itself as soon as the headphone is unplugged to save power.

If you use other battery cases with your iPhone 7, you can only use a wireless headphone. With Pi Case, you can keep using your favorite headphones, no adapter or extender required. Unlike other non-MFi cases, you can also make phone calls and use the headphone's built-in remote.

Want to listen to music but your iPhone's battery is low, not a problem!

 

Only 1% of the applications can pass the test by Apple (using the same standard Apple tests its own product) and get the MFi-Certificate. MFi standards for premium quality and safety.

 

 

All Pi Cases are embedded with a steel plate that allows for magnetic mounts to make things easier for you. To express our sincere thanks to early backers, you will get this magnetic wall mount for FREE!

Using the same steel plate technology, Pi Case’s car mount helps turn your iPhone into a stand. You can easily see the map on the screen and follow directions.

Magnetic data cable allows you to connect your phone quickly and easily, in the car or in the dark. No more flipping your cables back and forth to find the right side.

 

 

 

Order today and get the coolest battery phone case at an early bird price of $59, with a free magnetic wall mount!


 

Pi Case is equipped with McNair's premium grade 2400 mAh lithium-ion battery, providing  26 hours of talk time, 22 hours of internet use, 24 hours of video playback and  120 hours of audio playback. 

The power delivery is both quick and safe, made possible by Apple's lightning connector,  specialized power management IC, and McNair's 7 layers of battery protection technologies, certified by Apple's MFi program.

Pi Case’s body is composed of advanced ABS-PC material. The lip is raised 1mmaround the screen, offering increased protection for the screen from drops and other unfortunate incidents. During the MFi testing, we conduct the drop test with iPhone inside Pi Case at 1 meter (3.2 feet) onto a hard surface like pavement, for 30 times (covering 6 faces and 4 corners, 3 times each).

 

 

The retail price for Pi Case will be $99. Get your Pi Case today at a Time-Limited Offer of $59， with a FREE wall mount!

 

 

Piware aims to bring the best innovative product to the consumers, by integrating hardware, embedded software, app, cloud computing and AI algorithms together into a complete system. Our goal is to make all things connected and smart. 

Piware is founded by a team from California. CEO, Mike Chen received his Ph.D. degree from UCLA, served as a Software Director for a Nasdaq company in San Jose, and is a serial entrepreneur. COO, Sarah Shi majored in business and economics from UCLA, had 10 years experience in real estate investment and management in the bay area. Piware’s core team members had over 40 years engineering experience in software and hardware from Marvell, Magma, Motorola, Nortel Networks, Siemens.

Pi Case is our second product.  Our first product is Pi Remote, which goes into the audio jack and turns your phone into a universal remote.  Pi remotes are now sold online on Alibaba and JD.com in China for more than 50K units.  Pi Remote App has accumulated over 600K users. Pi Remote product lays down a solid foundation for the Pi Case campaign. 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide.VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship in September 2017. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary.We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now.you’ll get to own one of the very first Pi Case ever.Plus get exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Share Pi Case and hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

 

THE PRODUCT

What is it? Pi Case is the world’s smartest battery case with universal remote for your iPhone 7, 6s and 6. With battery AI, Pi Case will charge your phone automatically. Pi Case adds back the audio jack using the Bluetooth technology. The CSR chip ensures seamless and robust connection with your iPhone, Pi Case is a phone case that can unlock the true potential of your phone – to control every device in your line of sight. The only phone case which has passed MFi-certification on Indiegogo.
Who created it? We're a team of 20 who come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re engineers, designers, sourcers and manufacturing experts.
Why should we use it? If you're someone who wants all the benefits of a protective case while helping you control all devices and adaptable to every scenario, you’ll definitely want this.
How much does it cost? Our early backers can get a Pi Case and wall mount for as low as $59, 40% off the retail price of $99.
Where can we buy it? Right here on Indiegogo! Pre-order yours today and be one of the lucky first to get your hands on the world’s best iPhone case before we source it to the general public.
What do we get when we order? One Pi Case of your choice plus a free wall mount.
Why are you crowdfunding? We love crowdfunding! For our small business, it’s an amazing platform for allowing us to meet minimum order quantities from our manufacturer, while also making sure that we’re making a product people love through the close connection we have with our backers.

 

Features

Which phones does it work with?​ Pi Case fits for the iPhone 7, 6s and 6.
What colors do you offer?​ We’re currently offering the case in black and blue, though we’re planning on expanding colors.
How does the case protect my phone? Each case has built-in shock absorption, powerful raised lip screen protection, and top-of-the-line drop protection.
Does this case add a lot of bulk to my phone? Not at all! Our cases are made with incredible protective technology that only adds 14.3 mm thickness  and 80 g weight to your iPhone. Compared with Apple and Mophie's battery cases, Pi case is averaged 15% thinner and 20% lighter.
Is the case grippy? We have gone through multiple refining processes to ensure that our cases are smooth and have sufficient grip on the sides.
What additional features are available?​ Each case has small rare earth magnetic plates inside, allowing you to add on our accessories, including the wall mount and car mount. What’s more, we offer magnetic charging cable for a quickly and seamlessly charging experience.  We'll be unveiling more accessories later in our journey!
Will there be updates to the product in the future? We're continuing to expand the line of cases to other phone models and we'll be launching additional accessories.
Can I still access my charging port?​

There’s a charging port on Pi Case for you to charge your phone and Pi Case.
Where is it manufactured?

Foxconn, Shenzhen, China. 

 

Regulations & Safety

What are these magnets? The magnets in our range of accessories provide the optimal balance between strength and attraction. Pi Case accessories have embedded industrial-strength rare earth magnets that provide a strong, secure fit to the case without causing damage to phones or credit cards.
Will the magnets mess with my phone or credit cards?

The magnets we use in our accessories have been through intensive testing and will not affect your phone, cellular data, credit cards, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, Apple Pay or compass.

 

Shipping

When does shipping begin? Shipping for all outstanding cases is on track to commence September 2017.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? All orders are expected to be delivered by September 2017.
Where does it ship? We’ll be shipping our iPhone cases worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country. 
How much is shipping? Please see reward details for all locations and shipping rates. Local taxes not included. 
What if I'm interested in a partnership?​ Please contact crowdfund@thepicase.com and include in your email the regions you would like to distribute to.
Do I have to pay VAT or GST?

If you are living outside of the United States, you may have to pay VAT or GST.
What are the risks and challenges of getting the device today? There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. All of the numbers are real, and the backers are real. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the way. Now, we just want your help to scale the production process and get all units ready to ship. If there is anything you need to change or update, just reach out to us!

 

Customer Service

Is there a warranty? All of our cases come with a 1-Year Warranty that covers manufacturing defects in the case. This does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout its lifetime, or any type of user damage. We cannot guarantee the protection of your iPhone despite this case, as no case is fully indestructible!
How do I order an extra case?​ We have great deals on combo packs and you can alternatively pre-order again for another case. Please contact us if you need any assistance with this. We are guaranteed to reply within 24 hours.
What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign? See detailed guide here. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching the help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they have shipped.
What is your return / exchange policy?​ If you received your product and you aren't completely satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days. Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, see the detailed guide here.
How do I choose more than one reward?

There is a perk allowing you buy two Pi Cases at one time.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you’ll automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information
If I have other questions, who should I contact?

We guarantee reply within 24 hours.
Press & Investment — crowdfund@thepicase.com

story:
We’re making a QUICK charger that’s wire free. It can charge and hold your iPhone 6/6s in just one simple action, making life more convenient.

SonicPower works as a firm holder to your phone while driving.

At the same time, it quick charge the phone. Make calls, listen to music and navigate without fumbling with your phone's power cord or worrying about your battery life.

SonicPower makes wire-free charging both on the road and at home.

The case doesn’t only charge your phone.

It keeps your phone stylish and protected.

Just enjoy a happy and satisfying charging experience with SonicPower!

The conductive wireless charging is fulfilled by Pin Contact.

 

When the charging works, the current goes from the car charger to the mount’s Pin. The Pin contacts the gilded electrode on the case and transfer the current forward. The current finally pass through the case to the Lightning connector. 

Convenient Charging: Place the phone on the mount and it begins to charge. It can be rotated in 360 degrees and adjusted to any display angle at will.

Effective Charging: The gilded electrode and Pin are durable and corrosion resistant. The Pin Contact ensures a persistent and effective charging.

Strong Magnetic Connection: There is a magnet circuit inside the mount. The magnitude of the magnetism is elaborately designed and adjusted. The phone stays firm attached even on bumpy roads.

 

Quick Charging: On product charging speed test, SonicPower fully charges iPhone in less than 2 hours. 50% faster than Qi wireless charger in the market, which normally takes 4 hours.

Charging Speed Test: when the navigation and other APPs are working, it takes iPhone 6 1h 56m 59s from 0 to 100% charged.

Safe Charging: Charging safety is of primary importance to us. Therefore we have worked on every aspect to ensure its safety.  For the charging case, the Lightning connector is certified by Apple MFI, which can from the source avoid any unexpected problems that uncertified component brings. It also embeds circuit chip to control the current in a safe range and a smart chip that reads how much power the phone needs.

For the charging mount, the electronic components work together to avoid short-delay and transient current, ensuring the pin won’t short out in any case. The gilded Pin can defend against the natural corrosion effects of water, sweat and dust, which maintains a safe connection from its durable components.

All the embedded electronic components and material we selected are to make the charging process safe, reliable and stable.
The case offers not only a comfortable grip but also a reliable protection. It’s made of quality polycarbonate, which has a high stability that’s perfect for protecting the phone.
The widened flexible rubber on the top makes the case easy to attach and detach.


The case won't affect the Headphone Jack and Speaker's use.

Except the charging function, the case performs good in its daily use. Lightweight(1.4oz) but sturdy, it stylishly keeps the phone protected.

 

Want to sync your phone? There’s no need to take off the case. We provided two micro USB cables for 3 and 6 feet in the kit. You can use directly the Micro USB to charge and sync the phone.

We now provide two colors for you to choose：Gloss black and Silvery white.

For the convenience of at home or the office, we provide a desktop mount and an adapter so you can charge your phone wire free anywhere!

Two steps to earn a SonicPower Car Kit for FREE!

Then we credit you like this:

Check more on https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sonicpower-f...

SonicPower was an idea that we had in the back of our minds for a long time – to develop a convenient charging mount in car.

Then we brainstormed and made dozens of concept sketches and devoted continuously to look for the reliable technique that can fulfill our concept model. During this process, the concept was improved step by step and we made a technical goal.

We went through dozens of prototypes to see what worked, found out what people liked and tested the user experience in the real world. 

We did tests on different features to ensure the product performs as what we expected.

We also have strict quality requirement on appearance. To integrate art with technique better, we improved the mold technique and the surface treatment several times.

 

 

For any enquiries you are welcome to write us a message or leave a comment.

A huge thank you to everyone who has supported us throughout our SonicPower journey so far! We feel so lucky to have so many wonderful family and friends who have offered their time, words of wisdom and skills to help make SonicPower what it is. We couldn't have done this without you!

Risks and challenges

DESTEK is an experienced high-tech gadget producer and retailer. 
In the early stage of R & D, we have selected suppliers very carefully and from then on maintained a close cooperation to provide products of high quality. 
At present, we have completed work on product conceptual design, prototyping, structure, mold design, testing and adjusting the electronic components. The product appeared in the video and images is the sample from our first testing mold. The mold has been adjusted repeatedly and is almost ready for mass production. 
During the R & D process, though we have already solved a lot of problems, maintained good cooperation from our suppliers and fully prepared for the production and shipping, there are still potential risks as follows: 
We have made improvements on the appearance technique, which may bring challenge to the following production and assembly. There may be unexpected circumstances that result in a delay. In this case, we will try our best to solve the problem and ensure a timely delivery date.

We’re making a QUICK charger that’s wire free. It can charge and hold your iPhone 6/6s in just one simple action, making life more convenient.SonicPower works as a firm holder to your phone while driving.At the same time, it quick charge the phone. Make calls, listen to music and navigate without fumbling with your phone's power cord or worrying about your battery life.SonicPower makes wire-free charging both on the road and at home.The case doesn’t only charge your phone.It keeps your phone stylish and protected.Just enjoy a happy and satisfying charging experience with SonicPower!The conductive wireless charging is fulfilled by Pin Contact. When the charging works, the current goes from the car charger to the mount’s Pin. The Pin contacts the gilded electrode on the case and transfer the current forward. The current finally pass through the case to the Lightning connector. Convenient Charging: Place the phone on the mount and it begins to charge. It can be rotated in 360 degrees and adjusted to any display angle at will.Effective Charging: The gilded electrode and Pin are durable and corrosion resistant. The Pin Contact ensures a persistent and effective charging.Strong Magnetic Connection: There is a magnet circuit inside the mount. The magnitude of the magnetism is elaborately designed and adjusted. The phone stays firm attached even on bumpy roads. Quick Charging: On product charging speed test, SonicPower fully charges iPhone in less than 2 hours. 50% faster than Qi wireless charger in the market, which normally takes 4 hours.Charging Speed Test: when the navigation and other APPs are working, it takes iPhone 6 1h 56m 59s from 0 to 100% charged.Safe Charging: Charging safety is of primary importance to us. Therefore we have worked on every aspect to ensure its safety.  For the charging case, the Lightning connector is certified by Apple MFI, which can from the source avoid any unexpected problems that uncertified component brings. It also embeds circuit chip to control the current in a safe range and a smart chip that reads how much power the phone needs.
For the charging mount, the electronic components work together to avoid short-delay and transient current, ensuring the pin won’t short out in any case. The gilded Pin can defend against the natural corrosion effects of water, sweat and dust, which maintains a safe connection from its durable components.

All the embedded electronic components and material we selected are to make the charging process safe, reliable and stable.
The case offers not only a comfortable grip but also a reliable protection. It’s made of quality polycarbonate, which has a high stability that’s perfect for protecting the phone.
The widened flexible rubber on the top makes the case easy to attach and detach.
The case won't affect the Headphone Jack and Speaker's use.

Except the charging function, the case performs good in its daily use. Lightweight(1.4oz) but sturdy, it stylishly keeps the phone protected.
 
Want to sync your phone? There’s no need to take off the case. We provided two micro USB cables for 3 and 6 feet in the kit. You can use directly the Micro USB to charge and sync the phone.
We now provide two colors for you to choose：Gloss black and Silvery white.For the convenience of at home or the office, we provide a desktop mount and an adapter so you can charge your phone wire free anywhere!Two steps to earn a SonicPower Car Kit for FREE!Then we credit you like this:Check more on https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sonicpower-f...SonicPower was an idea that we had in the back of our minds for a long time – to develop a convenient charging mount in car.Then we brainstormed and made dozens of concept sketches and devoted continuously to look for the reliable technique that can fulfill our concept model. During this process, the concept was improved step by step and we made a technical goal.We went through dozens of prototypes to see what worked, found out what people liked and tested the user experience in the real world. We did tests on different features to ensure the product performs as what we expected.We also have strict quality requirement on appearance. To integrate art with technique better, we improved the mold technique and the surface treatment several times.  For any enquiries you are welcome to write us a message or leave a comment.A huge thank you to everyone who has supported us throughout our SonicPower journey so far! We feel so lucky to have so many wonderful family and friends who have offered their time, words of wisdom and skills to help make SonicPower what it is. We couldn't have done this without you!Risks and challengesDESTEK is an experienced high-tech gadget producer and retailer. In the early stage of R & D, we have selected suppliers very carefully and from then on maintained a close cooperation to provide products of high quality. At present, we have completed work on product conceptual design, prototyping, structure, mold design, testing and adjusting the electronic components. The product appeared in the video and images is the sample from our first testing mold. The mold has been adjusted repeatedly and is almost ready for mass production. During the R & D process, though we have already solved a lot of problems, maintained good cooperation from our suppliers and fully prepared for the production and shipping, there are still potential risks as follows: We have made improvements on the appearance technique, which may bring challenge to the following production and assembly. There may be unexpected circumstances that result in a delay. In this case, we will try our best to solve the problem and ensure a timely delivery date.

story:
"RETIRE THE WIRES" and change the WAY you listen to Audio!!

 


Key Features:

(Live footage of Android Interface and Video Playback)

-Included with internal apps (e-Book reader, FM Radio, etc)

- Built-in Pedometer to track exercise & steps

- Audio-In Aux. Jack for those who still want the "Wired" option

- Transfer files USB

- Built In GPS

- Download your Favorite Apps via Google Play Market

- Stream Music Wireless via Bluetooth/Wi-Fi

- 2 built in Internal Microphones for Phone Calls and Skype Conversations

- 8GB Internal Memory (Multiple Storage Levels Coming Soon)

Battery (expected)

  • Play time 8 hours
  • Standby time 200 hours
  • Charging time less than 1 hour
  • Charging: USB 
  • Type: Lithium Battery  
**Your pledge will help us deliver a friendly and discrete assistant that will enhance real life experiences. Buying devices that would equal the functions of The Smart Listening Device will set you back at least 600$.



WHY WE NEED HELP FROM INDIEGOGO:

Since we have successfully proven our concept through multiple test trials we need help from IndieGoGo to create our final "Injection mold" design, and really bring our product to life with our own original style! Our Industrial Team has designed a Headset design that is truly unique! Not only do we have Technology Advancements, but a beautiful look as well!


**MEHGAN JAMES: BAD GIRL COLLECTION PACKAGE - $250**




THE STORY (December 2012)

We started this idea as college students and teamed up with the Prairie View A&M School of Engineering program to create our concept. We first started off with some brief sketches and ideas of how we envisioned the Smart Listening Device looking.

 LET THE TEST TRIALS BEGIN! - Now that we sketched a few ideas, it was time to put the concept to test and see if the technology really worked! First we sourced a mini Android media player from our oversea connections and completely dissected it. It already came installed with the new Android 4.0 system, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, GPS, Mobile capabilities, and the ability to download mobile apps via Google Play! Then we sourced a fashionable "Premium" wired headset (V-Moda Crossfade), cut the cables off, and integrated the Bluetooth Android Media player.

PROTOTYPE #1 (August 2013):

It took us weeks of experimental test & procedures, but we finally got the job done!!

CAMPAIGN PERKS:

It is the world’s 1st full-size Smart headset that comes with an Android internal operating system allowing users to download their favorite media files directly to their Headset, and hold conversations via Bluetooth/Wi-Fi. story:
Save our windows!

In 2010 Denise Akert donated six handmade stained glass windows to the John Trigg Ester Library for use in the Ida Lane Clausen gazebo.

During the spring of 2012 vandals shot out five of the windows with BB guns.

Replacement windows have been created, but we do not want to install them without the proper safeguards to prevent this from happening again.

What We Need

Clear lexan covering both sides of the window will allow the beautiful windows to be enjoyed while providing protection.

The old windows need to be removed, new frames built, the windows installed, and the lexan affixed to the outside. The parts and labor remaining cost $1,000. The replacement stained glass has already been purchased and completed.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are handy with construction and are interested in helping with this project please let us know. Contact info@esterlibrary.org.

The John Trigg Ester Library welcomes all new members. To renew or establish your membership visit our website www.esterlibrary.org or visit our library at 3618 Main Street Ester and fill out a membership form. The suggested membership fee is $10 per year, but additional contributions are greatly appreciated.

For more information on how you can help and be a part of the library visit our website.

Stay up to date with all our latest events and activities by joining our Facebook community.

story:
Short Summary

As an avid reader who has a rather large collection of ebooks, I have often found it annoying to have to dig out a USB cable just to put a new book on my Kindle device. For over a year I searched for a good server-based solution that would enable me to send books to the Kindle, but came up empty. It was then that I decided to simply create my own. The Personal Ebook Library is a multi-functional database-driven website which allows the user to upload their book collection to their own server, complete with cover images and book details. By setting up an account on the website, the user can add any number of email addresses (kindle device, normal email, even other devices that have the ability to receive mail.) WIth a click of a button the book can be sent directly to the device, email account, or downloaded to the computer.

At the moment PEL version 1 is minimalistic but functional. The new version will be much better (read: not ugly, more secure, and worthy of public release), have many added features, with the end goal to make the software available for others who wish to have their own all-in-one ebook library.

This is where you, dear contributors, come in. In order to have the time to complete PEL 2.0, I must lighten my workload, which means I lose income. I must also pay for caffeine (what good is a coder without caffeine?) and normal daily expenses. The contributions will be used to support my small team so that we can spend the time developing the software and getting it ready for release.

What We Need & What You Get

As previously stated, the funding will provide basic income for the coders while PEL 2.0 is in development. We don't live in mansions, and we don't drive gas-guzzling fancy schmancy cars, so our needs are minimal.

Contributors to this project will be entitled to a variety of perks, of course. Everything from progress reports via email, to a personalized copy upon release, with many perks in between. Of course, our eternal gratitude and appreciated comes with all perks. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Let your friends know about Personal eBook Library. Share the love!

What Will Be Required to Run the Software?


PEL 2.0 is a database-driven php website with lots of functionality. As such it needs a webserver running Apache, PHP and Mysql, or webhosting running those packages. Plans are in the works to offer preinstalled devices, but are currently being tested for feasability.

*Note: The software will not contain any eBooks, due to copyright restrictions. The user will be responsible for supplying their own eBook collection.

story:
About this One-E-Way Project

Using wireless headphones doesn't mean you should expect loss of sound quality. Here's what makes WayEdgi™ an exceptional wireless headphone :

  • AirPlay™ equipped WayEdgi™ leverages Wi-Fi to stream audio content.  Unlike Bluetooth, the use of direct connect Wi-Fi (no router needed) means the audio is not compressed when sent over the air (Bluetooth compresses the audio).
  • Use of direct connect Wi-Fi (no router needed) ensures that the sound you hear over the air is CD quality, or better.
  • WayEdgi™ is a low latency device, so no sound is delayed while gaming and lip-audio synchronization occurs during movie watching.

WayEdgi™ was designed with fashion and comfort in mind. This is fitting for the world’s first patented AirPlay™ headphones.

Connect in seconds using AirPlay™

Connecting WayEdgi™  is just a few clicks and a touch of the AirPlay™ icon. WayEdgi™ connects with most any iOS device, including iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Apple TV or MacBook. It connects in a way that is simple and ready to go out of the box.

 

Technical Specs

Below is the proposed technical specification of WayEdgi™. Note that these are subject to change by new input and guidelines received from both the Apple MFi (Made for iPhone, iPad, …etc) program and the backer community. We will be updating the community as we continue to scale up manufacturing for the product, and will conduct polls throughout the process to give the backer community what you want.

 

WayEdgi™

-Direct Connect Wi-Fi Capability

-Uncompressed Audio

-Playtime up to 10 hours

-Rechargeable battery

-Latency of approximately 30milliseconds or less

-Dedicated call button

-Volume controls

 

WayEdgi™ is prototyped, and we need your help to scale up development and manufacturing so we can bring it to market

A prototype has been created. We are also experimenting with various features, fits, materials and more to give you the best quality when we deliver the product.

We come from technical product design and engineering backgrounds and have been creating electronic devices for over two decades. We're also working with experts who have manufactured headphones for the biggest consumer brands out there, so we know how to bring these types of devices to market

We need your help to make WayEdgi™ a reality for everyone who needs high definition wireless headphones with long battery life. By supporting us, you will be part of our journey from the legacy wireless audio devices to the world’s first AirPlay™ headphone production. Your voice will be heard, and we will implement changes, stretch goals and more with your help.

Your contribution will be used to:

  • Finalize product design
  • Fund mechanical tooling of the product 
  • Compliance testing – FCC, UL, CE.
  • Order components
  • Pay for production, manufacturing & shipping costs of the first production run of WayEdgi™

We thank you for every action you take to make WayEdgi™ a reality. Help us out by sharing our project on social media or email. We greatly appreciate your involvement.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

  • Is the battery rechargeable?

Yes! WayEdgi™ has a built-in rechargeable battery

 

  • Do I need to have a home router or be near a hotspot (such as a Starbuck’s Wi-Fi hotspot) to use WayEdgi™?

No!WayEdgi™ connects directly to your iOS device (iPhone 7, iPad, … etc) without the need of a router.Thus, WayEdgi™ goes wherever your iOS device goes (Note: WayEdgi™ is not designed for underwater use, therefore, it cannot be operated in water),

 

  • Can I use a streaming service (such as Spotify) with WayEdgi™?

Yes! You can use your cellular network (data plan) to receive streaming service data to your mobile device (e.g., iPhone 7) and then use WayEdgi™ to listen to the music coming to your mobile device.Also, along with AirPlay™ (Wi-Fi) connectivity, we’ve added Bluetooth and a headphone jack to WayEdgi™.Therefore, you will always have both a wireless and wired option to enjoy music, movie and gaming audio.

 

  • Can I use WayEdgi™ for calls?

Yes! Along with Wi-Fi, WayEdgi™ also has built in Bluetooth, so you use WayEdgi™ for hands free calls.

 

  • Do you plan to make an Android version of the WayEdgi™ Wi-Fi headset?

Yes! An Android version of our Wi-Fi headset is also covered by our patents.Development of an Android version of WayEdgi™ is already underway and we expect to make it available during the fourth quarter of 2017.

Yes! An Android version of our Wi-Fi headset is also covered by our patents.Development of an Android version of WayEdgi™ is already underway and we expect to make it available during the fourth quarter of 2017.

story:
THE SCENARIO

We have all been there... 





Plug ZAP&GO in for just 5 minutes...

...and re-charge any type of phone, tablet, eBook or headphones on the go.

 

Save upto $200 by supporting our campaign today. See our Black Friday special deal.


Rewards



THE PROBLEM

Existing charger products charge slowly

While people have evolved strategies to keep their phone charged, this is often stressful and time consuming. Powerbanks and external batteries are lithium-based like your phone and take at least as long to charge, which renders them useless if you don't plan ahead.

My iPhone 5s takes 2.4 hrs to recharge. If I use an external charger with a bigger battery (say 3,000mAh) this takes a further 3 hrs to recharge. This is OK when I'm in the office, but no good at all when I am travelling.

Stephen

     


THE SOLUTION

Supercapacitors charge quickly

By contrast supercapacitors charge very fast. In fact they can take in enough energy to fully recharge an iPhone in minutes. So my idea was to use a supercapacitor instead of a battery to recharge a phone.

So why hasn't this been done before?

Existing supercapacitors are made from double wound aluminium foils, and a supercapacitor sufficient to fully recharge an iPhone battery would be the size of a soda can and weigh about 0.5kg (1lb). This is far too big and heavy to package into a phone charger.



The secret: graphene

We are replacing the aluminium, with a new advanced carbon material called graphene. The graphene is orders of magnitude more conductive than aluminium and so the foils inside the capacitor can be made thinner and lighter. This means that our new graphene supercapacitors are now small, light and low-cost enough to be made into a competitively priced phone charger. 

Also we had to develop a new type of power supply because to get enough power into the charger in a few minutes wouldn't work with existing power supplies.



 



The Zap&Go charger



THE SPECS

  •  Designed to charge any type of phone or tablet that has a standard 5v USB (Universal Serial Bus) port (including Apple, Amazon Kindle, HP, HTC, LG, Microsoft, Nokia, Samsung, Sony)
  • Available with all international power plugs
  • Takes 1,500mAh of charge into its graphene supercapacitor in just 5 minutes: enough to charge an iPhone 5 from flat to 100% or a Samsung Galaxy 5 to 75%

THE STEPS

1. Plug ZAP&GO in for just 5 minutes


2. Plug your phone into ZAP&GO whilst it's charging if your battery is critically low. (ZAP&GO will continue to charge)


3. When Zap&Go is fully charged you will hear a confirmation sound.



4. Run for you flight or train and you phone will continue to charge as if it was still plugged into the wall.


THE STATS



THE GEEKY PART

Graphene

Graphene is amazing stuff. So thin that it would take 2 million sheets piled on top each other to be the width of a penny coin. Yet each one of those sheets conducts electricity better than copper. It was discovered by two Nobel Prize winning scientists at the university of Manchester in the UK about 10 years ago. Since then it has been talked about as a wonder material for all sorts of applications from touch screens that bend, new improved medical scanners, to ultra strong lightweight body armour. We have used it to build an electrical double layer capacitor (EDLC) or supercapacitor. Supercapacitors are a hybrid between batteries and capacitors.


Batteries vs. Capacitors

BATTERIES (e.g. lithium phone batteries)

  • charge slowly (requiring a chemical reaction to take place)
  • vulnerable to being over-charged
  • discharge slowly


CAPACITORS

  • charge quickly (some in only a fraction of a second) as no chemical reaction takes place.
  • discharge quickly

If you replaced your mobile phone battery with a capacitor, the phone would charge up in say 30 seconds, but you would only have a few minutes of use before the capacitor lost its charge.


SUPERCAPACITORS

  • charge quickly
  • no risk of overcharging
  • discharge slowly 
The ZAP&GO loses only 20% of it's power in 72 hours (about the same rate as a lithium battery).


Supercapacitors have been used for years in industrial applications, but they are large and heavy because they incorporate two coils of aluminium foils inside separated by an insulating or dielectric layer. We have replaced these foils with graphene foils. Graphene is much thinner than aluminium allowing us to increase the thickness of the dielectric layer. This means we can increase the voltage output above the standard 2.7v, making our graphene supercapacitors much more efficient in consumer electronic applications.

Stephen     




THE DEVELOPMENT PLAN

Zapgocharger Ltd.

Founded in 2013, Zapgocharger was originally called London Graphene. After receiving a UK Government grant, the company began to conduct market research into advanced energy storage applications (including supercapacitors) and in early 2014, licensed patents from the Materials Science group at Oxford University in chemical vapor disposition (CVD) graphene. CVD produces very high quality graphene, orders of magnitude more conductive than copper, enabling Zapgocharger to develop supercapacitor applications.

Stephen Voller

This is not Stephen's first innovative new product. He invented the first CE marked portable hydrogen fuel cell system using an internal metal hydride canister which is now in the London Science Museum. The unique knowledge gained on this project helped him to develop the new power supply for the Zap&Go charger.

The design team

Stephen has been working closely with a team of designers at a leading London-based consultancy to develop the ZAP&GO charger and this campaign will fund further research and development into the technology, functionality and features of this innovative new product.

Next steps

With two fully working prototypes, the second a quarter of the size of the first, we now need funding to complete our development and testing of both the supercapcitor and power supply. To further reduce the size we will replace the aluminium supercapacitors with a single graphene supercapacitor and further development of our quasi-constant power supply will enable us to manufacture a power supply small enough to fit inside the proposed ZAP&GO design. Finally, testing will ensure compliance with all international standards before we can begin shipping in Autumn 2015.


Funding and risks

We are seeking a minimum of $30k to bring this important new technology to market. With this money we will make pre-production quantities.


We believe we have something unique, but the world is a big place and there is always the risk we don't. Also there is a risk we cannot get the product small and low-cost enough to be commercially viable. But what is life without risks? I believe in ZAP&GO and with my knowledge and experience in innovative electronics and your financial support I plan to take this unique new product to market.

Stephen



The Zap&Go package

If you support our campaign, as well as being among the first ever Zap&Go owners, you will receive four adapters  (with each charger) compatible with plugs all over the world. 


For more information on what countries use each plug type, please visit: http://www.worldstandards.eu/electricity/plugs-and-sockets/


Exciting campaign update!

14/11/2014

We are overwhelmed with the support everyone has shown us so far. As a thank you we are giving everyone who pledges a chance to bring some color to your Zap&Go experience.

IF WE REACH $120,000...

Support the campaign today and help us reach $120,000 to have the choice of 4 further Zap&Go colors: 


Cardinal Red


Fresh Green


Electric Blue


Matte Black


IF WE REACH $150,000...

Can we hit the $150,000 mark? 

With your help we believe we can. If we do manage to hit this incredible goal, each of you who have secured yourself a Zap&Go will be able to get a campaign special gold edition for only $10 more (per charger, independent of pledge price). 


Limited Edition Campaign Gold!



So share this campaign with your friends, family and colleagues and get the Zap&Go in your own personal color choice.



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How does it charge so fast?

If you have a mobile phone and a tablet you will notice that the tablets’ adaptor is larger than the one for your phone. This is because the phone uses 1A and the tablet 2.1A. If you have a laptop it will probably have a ‘brick’ charger, which is a transformer operating about 6A. To provide enough charge to charge a phone like the iPhone5 requires about 1.5Ah (1,500mAh - milli Amp hours). Using your 1A phone adaptor through a standard USB port is like using a garden hose to fill a large bucket of water, it takes time (for the iPhone 5 about 2.4 hours). The Zap&Go does this in 5 minutes; like filling the same bucket from a fire hose. Very fast. But to do this we need a 40A power supply. This is the innovation inside the Zap&Go.

Will this damage my phone battery?

Although the ZAP&GO charges in just 5 minutes, it recharges your phone/tablet at the same rate your device would charge if plugged directly into the plug with your normal charge cable. There is no risk of damaging your lithium battery through charging too fast or over charging when using the ZAP&GO.

Doesn't this product already exist?

There are chargers out there that claim they can do it in 15 minutes or less (we have even see one claiming 30 seconds). The graphene supercapacitor can in-fact be charged in seconds. But to charge it in 30 seconds would require a massive 400A power supply. This is why we are wary of those fast charge battery claims, most require a large power supply to use them. 

But won't batteries just get better?

Lithium batteries are getting better all the time, but the reason they charge slowly is that lithium is very sensitive to overcharging. Today it is 2-4 hours to recharge a smart phone, maybe this will be 1-2 hours soon, but it is unlikely to ever be a few minutes. 

If I support this project, when will I receive my ZAP&GO?

If all goes well, with the support from this campaign, we aim to have ZAP&GO in production by Autumn next year (2015), which means your ZAP&GO will be through your post-boxes within time for Christmas.

How do I chose my color?

If the campaign reaches $120,000 the four alternative Zap&Go colours will be unlocked and each supporter will be emailed after the campaign is complete asking them which color(s) they would prefer. If the campaign reaches $150,000 the Limited Edition Campaign Gold Zap&Go will also be available for only $10 more. Supporters will be able to select this option once emailed after the campaign and a payment method will be set up at that time. If the campaign does not reach $120,000 supporters will receive the classic black & white Zap&Go. 




www.zapandgocharger.com


@zapandgo
story_txt:
THE SCENARIO

We have all been there... 



Plug ZAP&GO in for just 5 minutes...
...and re-charge any type of phone, tablet, eBook or headphones on the go. Save upto $200 by supporting our campaign today. See
our Black Friday special deal.RewardsTHE PROBLEMExisting charger products charge slowlyWhile people have evolved strategies to keep their phone charged, this is often stressful and time consuming. Powerbanks and external batteries are lithium-based like your phone and take at least as long to charge, which renders them useless if you don't plan ahead.My iPhone 5s takes 2.4 hrs to recharge. If I use an external charger with a bigger battery (say 3,000mAh) this takes a further 3 hrs to recharge. This is OK when I'm in the office, but no good at all when I am travelling.Stephen     THE SOLUTION
Supercapacitors charge quickly
By contrast supercapacitors charge very fast. In fact they can take in enough energy to fully recharge an iPhone in minutes. So my idea was to use a supercapacitor instead of a battery to recharge a phone.So why hasn't this been done before?Existing supercapacitors are made from double wound aluminium foils, and a supercapacitor sufficient to fully recharge an iPhone battery would be the size of a soda can and weigh about 0.5kg (1lb). This is far too big and heavy to package into a phone charger.The secret: graphene
We are replacing the aluminium, with a new advanced carbon material called graphene. The graphene is orders of magnitude more conductive than aluminium and so the foils inside the capacitor can be made thinner and lighter. This means that our new graphene supercapacitors are now small, light and low-cost enough to be made into a competitively priced phone charger. 
Also we had to develop a new type of power supply because to get enough power into the charger in a few minutes wouldn't work with existing power supplies.

 
The Zap&Go charger
THE SPECS

 Designed to charge any type of phone or tablet that has a standard
5v USB (Universal Serial Bus) port (including Apple, Amazon Kindle, HP, HTC, LG, Microsoft, Nokia,
Samsung, Sony)

Available with all international power plugs
Takes 1,500mAh of charge into its graphene supercapacitor in just 5 minutes: enough to charge an iPhone 5 from flat to 100% or a Samsung Galaxy 5 to 75%
THE STEPS1. Plug ZAP&GO in for just 5 minutes2. Plug your phone into ZAP&GO whilst it's charging if your battery is critically low. (ZAP&GO will continue to charge)3. When Zap&Go is fully charged you will hear a confirmation sound.4. Run for you flight or train and you phone will continue to charge as if it was still plugged into the wall.


THE STATS





THE GEEKY PART
Graphene
Graphene
is amazing stuff. So thin that it would take 2 million sheets piled on top each
other to be the width of a penny coin. Yet each one of those sheets conducts electricity
better than copper. It was discovered by two Nobel Prize winning scientists at the university of Manchester in the UK about 10 years ago. Since then it has been talked about as a wonder material for all sorts of applications from touch screens that bend, new improved medical scanners, to ultra strong lightweight body armour. We have used it to build an electrical
double layer capacitor (EDLC) or supercapacitor. Supercapacitors are a hybrid
between batteries and capacitors.

Batteries vs. CapacitorsBATTERIES (e.g. lithium phone batteries)


charge slowly (requiring a chemical reaction to take place)
vulnerable to being over-charged
discharge slowly



CAPACITORS


charge quickly (some in only a fraction of a second) as no chemical reaction takes place.
discharge quickly


If you replaced your mobile phone battery with a capacitor, the phone would charge up in say 30 seconds, but you would only have a few minutes of use before the capacitor lost its charge.

SUPERCAPACITORS


charge quickly
no risk of overcharging

discharge slowly 


The ZAP&GO loses only 20% of it's power in 72 hours (about the same rate as a lithium battery).
Supercapacitors
have been used for years in industrial applications, but they are large and heavy because they
incorporate two coils of aluminium foils inside separated by an insulating or
dielectric layer. We have replaced these foils with graphene foils. Graphene is much thinner than aluminium allowing us to increase the thickness of the dielectric layer. This means we can
increase the voltage output above the standard 2.7v, making our graphene supercapacitors much more efficient in consumer
electronic applications.
Stephen     




THE DEVELOPMENT PLAN
Zapgocharger Ltd.
Founded in 2013, Zapgocharger
was originally called London Graphene. After receiving a UK Government grant, the company began to conduct market
research into advanced energy storage applications (including supercapacitors) and in early 2014, licensed patents from the Materials Science group at Oxford University in chemical vapor disposition (CVD) graphene. CVD produces
very high quality graphene, orders of magnitude more conductive than
copper, enabling Zapgocharger to develop supercapacitor
applications.
Stephen Voller
This is not Stephen's first innovative new product. He invented the first CE marked portable hydrogen fuel cell system using an internal metal hydride canister which is now in the London Science Museum. The unique knowledge gained on this project helped him to develop the new power supply for the Zap&Go charger.
The design team
Stephen has been working closely with a team of designers at a leading London-based consultancy to develop the ZAP&GO charger and this campaign will fund further research and development into the technology, functionality and features of this innovative new product.

Next steps
With two fully working prototypes, the second a quarter of the size of the first, we now need funding to complete our development and testing of both the supercapcitor and power supply. To further reduce the size we will replace the aluminium supercapacitors with a single graphene supercapacitor and further development of our quasi-constant power supply will enable us to manufacture a power supply small enough to fit inside the proposed ZAP&GO design. Finally, testing will ensure compliance with all international standards before we can begin shipping in Autumn 2015.




Funding and risks
We are seeking a minimum of $30k to bring this important new technology to market. With this money we will make pre-production quantities.

We believe we have something unique, but the world is a big place and there is always the risk we don't. Also there is a risk we cannot get the product small and low-cost enough to be commercially viable. But what is life without risks? I believe in ZAP&GO and with my knowledge and experience in innovative electronics and your financial support I plan to take this unique new product to market.

Stephen







The Zap&Go package
If you support our campaign, as well as being among the first ever Zap&Go owners, you will receive four adapters  (with each charger) compatible with plugs all over the world. 



For more information on what countries use each plug type, please visit: http://www.worldstandards.eu/electricity/plugs-and-sockets/




Exciting campaign update!
14/11/2014
We are overwhelmed with the support everyone has shown us so far. As a thank you we are giving everyone who pledges a chance to bring some color to your Zap&Go experience.
IF WE REACH $120,000...
Support the campaign today and help us reach $120,000 to have the choice of 4 further Zap&Go colors: 

Cardinal Red


Fresh Green


Electric Blue


Matte Black





IF WE REACH $150,000...

Can we hit the $150,000 mark? 
With your help we believe we can. If we do manage to hit this incredible goal, each of you who have secured yourself a Zap&Go will be able to get a campaign special gold edition for only $10 more (per charger, independent of pledge price). 



Limited Edition Campaign Gold!




So share this campaign with your friends, family and colleagues and get the Zap&Go in your own personal color choice.






FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

If you have a mobile phone and a tablet you will notice that the tablets’ adaptor is larger than the one for your phone. This is because the phone uses 1A and the tablet 2.1A. There are chargers out there that claim they can do it in 15 minutes or less
(we have even see one claiming 30 seconds). The graphene supercapacitor can in-fact be charged in seconds. But to
charge it in 30 seconds would require a massive 400A power supply. This is why we are wary of those fast charge
battery claims, most require a large power supply to use them.

Lithium batteries
are getting better all the time, but the reason they charge slowly is that
lithium is very sensitive to overcharging. Today it is 2-4 hours to recharge a
smart phone, maybe this will be 1-2 hours soon, but it is unlikely to ever be a few
minutes.

If all goes well, with the support from this campaign, we aim to have ZAP&GO in production by Autumn next year (2015), which means your ZAP&GO will be through your post-boxes within time for Christmas.

Supporters will be able to select this option once emailed after the campaign and a payment method will be set up at that time. If the campaign does not reach $120,000 supporters will receive the classic black & white Zap&Go.

story:
Short Summary

In the past decade, more than 30,000 Americans have been killed due to distracted driving by cell phone use while behind the wheel. These figures are staggering and yet the U.S. government refuses to do anything substantive to curtail the number of deaths on our nation's highways. Our company, a small start-up in Pennsylvania, has developed the solution: a SMART cell phone jammer that goes into "listen" mode as soon as a motor vehicle hits a speed limit of 10 MPH. If the device detects active cell phone use in the driver's area within the vehicle it puts out a low level disrupting signal that renders the cell phone useless---no more Facebook updates while driving at 80 MPH; no more texting your girlfriend about last night's date with Colby while zipping through an intersection where school children are crossing; no more truck drivers playing Angry Birds while carrying hazardous materials through a city or small town.

Currently our technology is illegal in the United States. Yep, we could go to prison and be fined thousands of dollars if we sell just one unit on American soil----and still people continue to die on our roads!

The U.S. Senate has made it clear to us: first sell your technology overseas where cell phone jamming is legal. Then, once the technology is proven, they will sponsor legislation legalizing cell phone jamming units in motor vehicles in the United States.


What We Need & What You Get

We have used our own funds to develop a fully functional prototype and have a contract manufacturer to mass produce the cell phone jamming unit. There are several foreign governments and companies that have stressed interest in our jamming technology and we are very close to having agreements in place. We need funds to manufacture the first orders until revenues start coming in to make more. Should you decide to help us get over our manufacturing hump we will, in return, give you our undying thanks. We will also post your name (and photo if you’d like) on our website.

The Impact

We have already sold our jammer to a major shipping company in South America. Over the course of 5 years 3 longshoremen were killed on Panamanian docks due to drivers of container vehicles using their cell phones. Since installing our technology there have been no deaths. Our jammer is cell phone platform agnostic, meaning it will prevent any---that’s ANY---cell phone from working while a vehicle is at speed. Passenger cell phones are not impacted---but if they pass their phone to the driver that phone will stop working.

Risks & Challenges

At this time the greatest risk is not having enough funds to manufacture our first orders. By funding us you will help us mitigate this risk. Should we not raise enough funds we will continue to self-fund. We’ll still get to where we need to be. It will just take longer.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute to get this much needed technology launched, that’s OK. Here are some ways you can help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your time and we hope you can help get our technology into every vehicle in the world!

story:
About us

We are a creative studio/manufacturer/brand factory based i Stockholm, Sweden. Since 2011 we have been working under the motto "Empowering a smart generation" through innovative new technologies and products. All our brands are focused on simplifying everyday life for all of us who can not do without our smart devices. Focus has been on the biggest complaint for all smart devices; lack of battery life.

About Graphene

Graphene is a form of carbon similar to graphite, but is unlike graphite only one atomic layer thick. Graphene was discovered in the 60’s and was first investigated in 2004 by Andre Geimand Konstantin Novoselov, who won the 2010 Nobel Prize in Physics for this. Scientists and industry call graphene "a new super material". Graphene is 100 times stronger than steel but is extremely light, thin and flexible. The material conducts electricity more efficiently than copper and 200 times better than silicon. Source: Swedish Royal Academy of Sciences

Problem / Solution

It is a well-known fact that heat dissipation in electronics is a major obstacle to further technology development. It limits power, performance and reliability. The escalation of power densities in electronic devices has made efficient heat removal a crucial issue for progress in energy storage.

Our solution to this is Nano Graphene Technology. A cutting edge material based on Graphene that helps reduce heat and therefore prolong the lifespan and battery life up to 20%.

Products

We expect to start delivering products during the month of March when our first production is finalized. If you are also experiencing that the lack of battery life is a big problem, then we believe this is the product for you, it will give you those extra hours needed to save the day.

NanoCase™ is a hard-case that protects your phone in several ways. Efficiently eliminates excess heat, thereby prolonging the battery life up to 20%. NanoCase is also chock resistant protective hard-case in a sleek and slim design.

NanoCase™ - is available for iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus & iPhone 6/6S.

NanoSticker™ is a universal sticker that works with all iPhone/Smartphones and other smart devices. By diverting excess heat can save up to 15% battery life.

NanoSticker™  - Universal Sticker for all Smartphones (5x7cm).

NanoCase™ video                                       

 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk we can see is that the production is going to be delayed. Nothing indicates this at the moment because everything is prepared and many pre-production samples have been made, and also the final molds for the casings are completed. We have tested the material for a long time with repeated testing to ensure the quality of both product and performance.

Other Ways You Can Help

We'd love if you want to share your experience with others through social media, reviews etc.

 

Thank you

Thank you for taking note of the information. We understand if some people are very skeptical, BUT we guarantee that it works. No magic - pure innovation!

story:
We are surrounded by electronic devices with batteries in them.Companies keep increasing the battery efficiency of their products each year , but at the end of the these devices run out of juice and need a CABLE to bring them back to life.Cables have become an integral part of our everyday lives but big companies don't seem to focus on improving their quality.The cables that ship with the products don't last long , better quality cables cost a ton and Chinese knock offs last a day or a month depending on your luck.Instead of making a new cable we thought of making something that would protect what you already have.

We wanted to come up with a solution that protects any cable for a lifetime and of coarse it had to be dirt cheap and still mange to make your cable like a cable.That's how we came up with JHONNY.Its just 2 heat shrink sleeves on both ends of your cable along with a spring for improved durability and support.The sleeves tightly wrap around the ends of your cable and eliminate the pressure points that cause the wear and tear of the cable.Most of all its just a $1 for black and $2 for colors ! and comes in a cool container with a lighter. 

 

 

 

JHONNY protects your existing cable and makes it the last cable you'll ever buy.Ofcorse we can't help it if you loose your cable :P.94% of the cables are damaged at the ends where the wire meets the connectors and forms a joint.This joint is prone to bending and hence becomes the pressure point from where the damage starts.The spring along with the heat shrink sleeves make your cable ultra durable and rugged at the ends which solves the problem.A dollar spent today can help you save 20x the amount you would spend tomorrow on a new charging cable.What more do you want us to write for a dollar ? 

 

 

   

 

 

 

                                 

 

 

                

 

 

                             

 

 

                       

Just kiddin , the finger is upto you !

 

The packaging is exclusive only to indiegogo backers. Each JHONNY container has -

 

2 x Springs for joints at both ends

2 x High quality heat shrink sleves CE and RoHS certified

1 x Lighter

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have spent a lot of time on perfecting the packaging for JHONNY. 

JHONNY makes your cable invincible and last for a lifetime, which means you won't be buying a cable every 3 months, this not only saves you money but also creates a lasting impact on the environment.The packaging is made using glass containers made by rural women in India,this provides employment opportunities to an untapped human resource.Since glass is 100% recyclable it leaves zero footprint and the container can be used for storage.

story:
Thank You Everyone For Your Support !

Anyone who missed out and would like to purchase Please visit www.nanostate.co   

 

 

Waterproof DIY Kit for your phone & tablet using the latest invisible Nanotechnology coating.

Welcome to Flash Flood DIY waterproofing kit for your Phones & Tablets using the latest military grade nanotechnology repellent.

45% of the worlds mobile phones & tablets that get damaged are damaged by water, usually by people spilling drinks on the table and moisture e.g. bathroom, wet bag, wet pockets and puddles drops etc... Flash Flood stops this problem as it protects your phone or tablet using the latest Nano repellent coating used by the military that can be used on telecommunication devices without effecting the electronics, performance or the natural colour of your device as the coating is invisible.

 

 

So what made you think of this idea ?

I had been working in the natural stone business for over 15 years and coatings for protecting stone floors is part of the job so I had a fairly good knowledge of coatings.

The accident !   About 3 years ago I was in a meeting when I screwed my phone up by spilling coffee on it, it caused me so many problems… I killed my phone, lost all my contacts, photo's and videos of my daughter, I was absolutely gutted. My phone and all those memories gone for good, the contacts being lost I could deal with.

No Solutions ?   I thought there must be some type of coating to prevent this from happening again, just to protect you from day to day accidents like this, a quick search from the internet produced nothing only than big chunky ugly cases or plastic bags which all looked hideous. 

By Chance !   It wasn't until February this year speaking to one of my old suppliers to see if he had any work available that he suggested that I contact a Nanotechnology coating manufacturer to buy and sell Nano coatings for existing flooring, I should use my existing contacts to sell it to, as people were looking of ways to preserve there floors and not replace them with new ones in these hard times.

At last !   After contacting the manufacture there was one particular product that caught my eye and that was listed as "military grade telecommunications coating" which was similar to what I tried to find 3 years ago. I checked the market for a few days solid to find a DIY solution but still nothing existed 3 years on, there were some solutions but you had to send your phone away and it goes in to a chamber machine, took a few weeks to be done and it was as expensive as the phone itself, who needs that head ache or big expenses? Or buy the new waterproof Sony Xperia at $600... No thanks I already have a phone !

Your Help !   So here I am trying to give this new business a go it's been a hard few years without any work and I want to build a new future with a great product that really works, it's no where else, exclusive here only !

 

We all have phones or tablets none of us can predict when any of the above is going to happen and more, there is nothing worse than " omg my phone wont switch on ! " I've been there and done it and I am sure lots of you reading this have too, I know how it feels. 

For a few $ you can save yourself a fortune in case of an accident and piece of mind. Our smallest package 1 x 50ml (US 1.7 fl oz) of Flash Flood which will nanocoat around 25 phones or 15 tablets, you can do the whole family which means the cost is peanuts and the piece of mind is great too ! 

Don't think I will be ok for now, if it happens you won't !

 

 

How does Nanotechnology work ?

Ok ! in simple terms... There are hundreds of different types but all nanotechnology deals with dimensions and tolerances of less than 100 nanometers (40,000 times smaller than the width of an average human hair) Flash Flood Nanotechnology highly resists a wide variety of liquids based on the action of the " Lotus Leaf ". Flash Flood is not not a physical barrier like normal waterproofing so it is 'breathable' which means it does not mist up, the "nano repellent" stops damage to telecommunication devices from liquids, moisture and humid atmospheres.

 

Flash Floods Lotus Leaf Effect Demo

Please see the video on youtube

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hiexliZCL0k

 

How do I apply it to my phone or tablet ?

It's a very simple process this is the full length video, the intro video was speeded up. This is important to watch if you are going to back this project.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rhs9N0FNil4

 

My phone or tablet has a plastic protector on the screen, will it still work ?

 

 

Yes it will ! Just coat the surface the same as the above video demo there is nothing different to do, don't forget if you change your screen protector for a new one you will need to recoat it again.

More Q & A

How long will the coating last for ?

Everyones usage on phones & tablets are different, it should last up to 12 months. Every month or so drop a tiny water drop on the LCD and tip it off, if the water starts streaking then it's time for a new coat and repeat the whole coating process again.

How long does it take to dry ?

it drys within 6 hours, there will always be wet residue on your device after the 6 hours and this is normal with Flash Floods coating system. Just buff  with a microfibre cloth until totally dry and your done and fully protected. We suggest you do it over night when you don't need your phone or tablet.

Is the coating the same process for each phone or tablet ?

Yes the process is exactly the same in the demo video, the demo was using the samsung S3. The iPhone is exactly the same process you can remove the back cover if you want but it's not necessary, just fill in any gaps especially on the rim. 

What will Flash Flood protect my phone or tablet from ?

Most everyday liquids and moisture : water, soda, alcohol, tea, coffee, oil and many more.

I do a lot of sports & activities will my phone or tablet be protected ?

Flash Flood does not make your phone or tablet any stronger, it's just a protective barrier against liquids and moisture which in some sports will be very useful, for example If you do cycling your can put your phone in your phone clamp with no case or protection in open air and the phone will be protected in bad weather. There are many sports or activities it can be used for you just have to think if your sport or activity requires your phone or tablet to be protected, it cannot be used for things like scuba diving where your device would be submerged, Flash Flood is there to protect you from day to day liquid hazards and any moisture as used by the military in telecommunication devices. 

Is Flash Flood toxic ?

No Flash Flood is not toxic and can be used safely inside the home, just use rubber gloves or surgical gloves as it can be an irritant on the skin in large volumes. All the safety information will be labeled according to EU safety standard requirements as by law.

How good is the quality of Flash Flood ?

It's the highest quality Nano coating on the market, I have tested 2 other samples which had no where near the standard of the military grade Nano coatings, the military grade is 8 times more expensive but as you can see in the videos it's of superior quality. The manufacturer I am working with supplies military and commercial applications.

Is there a smaller size bottle ?

Unfortunately not, the minimum size has to be 50 ml  / US 1.7 fl oz to make the project viable and I also have to pay extra for bottling as it's sold as standard in steel drums to the military or commercial use, it's extremely expensive but extremely high quality !

If you're intrested in distributing Flash Flood in your country, please contact me.
story_txt:
Thank You Everyone For Your Support !
Anyone who missed out and would like to purchase Please visit www.nanostate.co
