story:
Why Do We Need 1985?

June 10th, 2013 - Over the last week, the country (and the world) have been rocked by the government's admission, after a wistleblower leak, that they have been monitoring the phone call data of every American in the country for many years.  President Obama has said that we can't have "100% privacy" anymore.  U.S. Sen. Diane Feinstein (D-CA) said "This is called protecting America!"  U.S. Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) said we've "got nothing to worry about." U.S. Sen. Harry Reid (D-NV) said that "everyone should just calm down."

1985 is a protocol and, with your help, a mobile application that will prevent government spying through the use of relays and encryption.  It will operate peer-to-peer, meaning it can't be shut down, it will be free for calls between 1985 users (and cheap for calls to landlines or mobile non-users), and it will be statistically impossible to know who is on both ends of the call.

Everyone deserves privacy, and one need not have "something to hide" in order to be uncomfortable with Big Brother tracking their conversations.

 

What Does The Money Go To?

We need money for two things:

  • To fund a small development team to write the software
  • To fund the infrastructure to route calls to landlines and mobile non-users

Please continue to fund beyond the funding goal.  Two reasons: #1, if you fund at the $25 level, you'll get the first year of landline/mobile non-user service for cheaper than it will normally cost.  #2, If funds beyond our funding goal are received, we will be able to do things like offer free or cheaper subscriptions for landline/mobile non-user calling, produce the app for other platforms (BlackBerry, Windows Phone, and ordinary desktop/laptop computers), etc., so please continue to donate even as we surpass our goal.  Your donation will not be wasted.

 

The Impact

We hope to put an end to en mass spying on the communications of citizens.  The entire country need not use this software to achieve this goal: even if only a few percent of people do, spying on the rest of the citizens no longer accomplishes anything, because one would have to assume that anyone placing a call "worth spying on" would be among the few percent using 1985.

 

Who Runs 1985?

1985 was invented by Jonathan Corbett, a civil rights activist known for his work fighting the Transportation Security Administration's nude body scanners as well as the "stop-and-frisk" policy of the NYPD.  He is also the owner of a mobile application development firm.  His two passions combine together to put him in a position that is uniquely capable of seeing this project to completion.

 

Where Can I Find More Information?

Watch the YouTube video for a 2-minute overview.  If you're interested in the tech details, we have more of that on our Web page, as well as contact information.

story:
SteadyFlix

STEADYFLIX has designed the iPhone GRIPGROOVE!

A iPhone Case, Camera Stabilizer and Tripod designed for the iPhone AND the iPhone user! 

Funding for: Initial manufacturing and distribution.

The entire device fits into a pocket. No need to lug a camera gear bag around.
James Cameron will be jealous.

 

Other designers try to shrink down larger camera accessories to fit the iPhone but they always forget about the iPhone user!

iPhone users don't want 7" camera stabilizer handles or bulky tripods or a price that cost more than the phone.

 

The iPhone user wants a small, compact, easy to use, integrated iPhone accessory at a great price.

 

The GripGroove has 5 unique configurations designed specifically for the iPhone AND the iPhone user.

 

The GripGroove features unique finger grooves and a finger loop for a secure grip!

 

Check out www.SteadyFlix.com for configuration details!

Configuration #1: iPhone case. The protective case features an adjustable finger groove on the case back to provide a secure grip.

 

Configuration #2: A Key Fob. Yep, that's right a Key Fob so it's always with you when you need it!

 

Configuration #3: A Grip. The Key Fob converts to a iPhone grip. Never fumble your iPhone again while trying to hold on to the bottom of the iPhone. Simply connect the "Key Fob" to your iPhone and use the ergonomically shaped finger grooves and finger loop for a secure integrated grip.

 

Configuration #4: Camera Stabilizer. Insert the stabilizer arm into the  iPhone grip and you have an iPhone camera stabilizer. Simply expand the stabilizer arm, adjust the counter balance weight to your personal shooting balance.

 

Configuration #5: Tripod. Insert the stabilizer arm into the  iPhone grip and position the stabilizer to the Tripod position, extend the balance arm and your iPhone can now shoot atop a rock steady Tripod.

 

The stabilizer  uses a combination of counter weights and magnetic counter balances.

The GripGroove will retail for around $149.

 

As SmartPhones gain market share over traditional point and shoot cameras, today, everybody with a SmartPhone is a photographer!

 

www.SteadyFlix.com

story:
What is MyEvidence?

MyEvidence is a safety and security mobile application designed to transmit live audio and video (audio/video) of potentially unsafe situations to a secured server accessible only to the user and other authorized individuals. At the time of transmission, it also provides a GPS position map indicating where the live transmission began. Once the transmission has begun the app is locked so only the user may stop the transmission allowing for audio/video evidence of what occurred. MyEvidence is activated by a simple touch of the app, a hot button, or is voice activated.

Why MyEvidence? 

MyEvidence was developed in response to the numerous recent highly publicized news stories regarding harm to vulnerable individuals (for example; bullying, shooting of innocent teens, domestic violence, victims of the date rape drug, and sexual harassment cases, to name a few).

MyEvidence was created to provide peace of mind to loved ones who are not able to be with their vulnerable family members at all times. In unfortunate cases where a crime has occurred, this app can provide law enforcement officers, parents, or a family member valuable evidence of what has also occurred.

MyEvidence serves as a protector and deterrent. For example imagine a school aged child with a smart phone walking home from school. A van pulls up; the child recognizes this may be an unsafe situation and alerts the predator that live video and audio has begun. The predator then flees. This app has the potential to protect individuals and save lives in many situations just like this. Will you help support our efforts to save lives by pledging?

Where We Stand

Our goal is to release MyEvidence by August 1st for both the IPhone and Android market for approval. Currently, the app is in the initial phase of development. With your help we can complete development and move into the testing phase of MyEvidence by July 2nd. We plan to do extensive testing of this app before August 1st. Please stay tuned for updates

What we need from you

We have established the goal of the minimal amount needed so PLEASE continue to pledge above and beyond the goal. Any amount above and beyond will go to Phase II of the app which we will communicate to all that pledge. We will also use the additional dollars pledged to get the app in the hands of all school aged children and vulnerable adults who carry a smart phone. We also want to connect with schools to minimize or even eliminate bullying. Our vision is to empower anyone that may find themselves in an unsafe situation and ultimately reduce the number of vulnerable children and adults. Any amount above our minimal goal will help us have a greater impact in stopping predators and saving lives.

 

                  ***Please tell family members and friends***

story:
What is Kidzloop ?

Kidzloop is a free iPhone app and website that aims to help parents of younger children save time and avoid frustration by helping them:

  • Find and meet other parents just like them in their neighborhood at nearby parks and playgrounds in real time  for instant playdates.
  • Discover relevant personalized parenting news based on their current interests.
  • Stay up to date with local kid-friendly events and latest product recalls.

Benefits

Using our app will not only make parents lives easier by helping them create a trusted support network of parents just like them in their neighborhood, it will also help younger children make friends and spend more time outdoors on a daily basis. Children who spend more time outdoors are happier, healthier and smarter !

What else can a Kidzloop karate kid and genie do ?

Background

When I was a kid I remember spending hours together playing outdoors with my friends every single day. Sadly today kids are spending most of their time indoors, mostly in school and day care centers. One of the main reasons is that they have very few friends around where they live. Even their parents are disconnected from the communities in which they live. Because they hardly know other parents just like them in their neighborhood, they are dependent on numerous different meet up websites and apps to arrange playdates for their children. This process can be extremely frustrating and time consuming . Despite all the planning, the playdates happens mostly on the weekends with people whom you hardly know !

To put it in perspective, today's’ kids spend only 4-7 minutes playing outdoors on a daily basis. The result being, doctors are treating more and more children for obesity, attention disorders, and depression. In fact every fifth child in the US is obese.

Kidzloop aims to change this forever.

How?

Using our location based app, Parents can now find and meet with other parents just like them in their neighborhood at nearby parks and playgrounds along with their children.

We aim to transform all the parks and playgrounds across the US into meeting places where children can spend more time playing with other children and parents can get involved in the real face to face social networking and get some fresh air.

We don’t stop there. We also help parents discover interesting kid centric news around their current interests which they would have otherwise missed out on. They can even keep themselves up to date with local kid friendly events and product recalls.

The Plan

We are extremely excited about this app. We sincerely believe that kidzloop will significantly help all the parents of younger children in a meaningful way on a daily basis. The app and the companion website will be free to use. To make this happen, we need support from awesome people like you.

We will use the funds primarily for the following purpose:

  • Purchase licensing agreements from key content providers for parenting news
  • Hire professional consulting help for software development and app store launch
  • Digital marketing to create awareness about our app

Kidzloop Super Hero

 

Thank you all for your support !!

Stay up to date with local kid-friendly events and latest product recalls.
Benefits
Using our app will not only make parents lives easier by helping them create a trusted support network of parents just like them in their neighborhood, it will also help younger children make friends and spend more time outdoors on a daily basis. Children who spend more time outdoors are happier, healthier and smarter !
What else can a Kidzloop karate kid and genie do ?


Background
When I was a kid I remember spending hours together playing outdoors with my friends every single day. Sadly today kids are spending most of their time indoors, mostly in school and day care centers. One of the main reasons is that they have very few friends around where they live. Even their parents are disconnected from the communities in which they live. Because they hardly know other parents just like them in their neighborhood, they are dependent on numerous different meet up websites and apps to arrange playdates for their children. This process can be extremely frustrating and time consuming . Despite all the planning, the playdates happens mostly on the weekends with people whom you hardly know !
To put it in perspective, today's’ kids spend only 4-7 minutes playing outdoors on a daily basis. The result being, doctors are treating more and more children for obesity, attention disorders, and depression. In fact every fifth child in the US is obese.
Kidzloop aims to change this forever.
How?
Using our location based app, Parents can now find and meet with other parents just like them in their neighborhood at nearby parks and playgrounds along with their children.
We aim to transform all the parks and playgrounds across the US into meeting places where children can spend more time playing with other children and parents can get involved in the real face to face social networking and get some fresh air.
We don’t stop there. We also help parents discover interesting kid centric news around their current interests which they would have otherwise missed out on. They can even keep themselves up to date with local kid friendly events and product recalls.
The Plan
We are extremely excited about this app. We sincerely believe that kidzloop will significantly help all the parents of younger children in a meaningful way on a daily basis. The app and the companion website will be free to use. To make this happen, we need support from awesome people like you.
We will use the funds primarily for the following purpose:

Purchase licensing agreements from key content providers for parenting news
Hire professional consulting help for software development and app store launch
Digital marketing to create awareness about our app
Kidzloop Super Hero

 
Thank you all for your support !!

story:
What is the Switchbox?

Switchbox is a new gearbox for FIRST robotics that has face and edge slots for easy mounting, can be quickly repaired in the field, makes huge torque by accepting two motors, and has two useful gear ratios: 1:20 and 1:90.
 
We are a group of high school students building the best gearboxes in the world for FIRST robotics.  This is a hard project, and our first step is to get our first-generation gearboxes into the hands of early-adopter FIRST teams.  In exchange for us supplying you an awesome gearbox at cost, we expect you to put it through real-world testing and give us the feedback we will need to build the next iteration of our product.  We want to build a tribe of people obsessed with helping us make the best FRC gearboxes in the world.
 
Oh yeah, the prototypes you see here were built out of ABS plastic.  The final versions that you receive will be made of steel and aluminum.  Unless you choose one of our pretty plastic options.

 
 

Who are we?

We are a group of students from the 7 year FIRST Robotics Team, the ausTIN CANs.   We've built many robots for competitions, and used almost every  available gearbox.  We believe that all current gearboxes have  shortcomings.  With Switchbox, we've tried to build our ideal gearbox  for rigorous world of robotics competitions.

 

A note to our backers from Kickstarter:

We  originally ran a Kickstarter for Switchbox, and the results were great:  we were supported by 93 backers and raised over $3,700.  However, we  did not reach our (admittedly high) funding goal of $15,000.  We are  undaunted.  We still believe in our vision of making the best FRC gear  box in the world.  We are redoubling our efforts, and moving here to  Indiegogo with an updated project.  We have reduced our funding goal to  be more in-line with the market, and are very eager to supply our  awesome gearboxes and rewards to our almost 100 backers. We've also added two new rewards: vinyl stickers, and a 3D printed keychain gear.
 
If you were one of our Kickstarter backers, please join us here by supporting us at the same level!  Since our Kickstarter project was not funded, you will not be charged for your Kickstarter contribution.
 
Finally, we've switched from t-shirts to stickers as our secondary reward.  This will allow us to focus more energy on building gear boxes.  We apologize for any inconvenience, but promise that the stickers will be awesome.
 

What makes Switchbox so cool?

  • Easy to Mount.  The Switchbox can be mounted on the face or  edges.  We use slots instead of holes for mounting to allow sliding.   This helps in  aligning gears or tensioning chains or belts.
  • Super Torque--Can Use Multiple Motors.  The Switchbox can be powered by one or two 500 series motors, which are very common in FIRST robotics.  
  • Easy to Expand and Maintain.  The Switchbox is easily assembled  and customized to different gear ratios. If a gear becomes stripped,  maintenance is simple, and only one of the mounting plates need to be  removed, the motors do not need to be detached from the mounting  position. 
  • Durable.  We chose large, durable spur gears that can stand up to the abuse of competition.
 

What shortcomings did we see in existing gearboxes?

Existing gearboxes' ratios aren't always optimized for what teams use  them for, because of their max torque load. When these gearboxes strip and break, the internal gears are hard to replace, often  times requiring the replacement of the whole gearbox and motor, to save  time during the heat of competition. Mounting certain gearboxes prove  to be sometimes difficult because of the precision required to drill the  mounting holes.   
 
We've created an alternative gearbox to solve all of  these problems. We offer 2 different gear ratios, optimized for high  torque uses. Instead of a planetary style gearbox, we've created a spur  gearbox to make gears easier to replace if they become stripped. To  solve the issue of mounting, we've created two slots. This means that if  the holes that are drilled slightly off, they'll still hold the gearbox  in place.   
 
For a while we've wanted to have the ability  to use two fisher-price or other 500 series motors on the same gearbox  to get more torque, and that's exactly what we did. Our solution allows  you to mount one or two of these motors on the gearbox.   
  

What rewards are available?

  • Five dollars buys our our gratitude, and helps us along!
  • Visually stunning vinyl stickers that show you are part of the Switchbox tribe.
  • Tiny 3D printed plastic gear keychain!  See pics below.
  • Switchbox gearbox with one gear reduction (20:1).  This is the exact  same frame and first gear stage as the other Switchbox.  The only difference is that the final gear stage, axle and bearings are omitted  to save money.  This will be the real deal, made of steel and aluminum.  It will come with bearings and axles.  You supply your own motors.
  • Switchbox gearbox with two gear reductions (20:1 and 90:1).  This will be the real deal, made of steel and aluminum.  It will come with bearings and axles.  You supply your own motors.
  • Clear side plate!  See pics below.
  • The original orange plastic prototype gearbox! There is only one of these in the world!
 Please include

Keychain gear!

This small reward is a 3D printed plastic gear.  Makes a cool keychain!  The gear will also fit over pencils, so you can build your own tiny gear box.
 
 

 

Clear side plate!

A clear body plate for your Switchbox.  This makes the Switchbox suitable for desktop display or teaching about gears.  Note that the gearbox should not be used under load with this plastic side.
 

Stress Test

Previously, our stress test was an unlockable reward.  We are now committed to running the stress test for free.  We are committed to creating a durable gearbox that stands up to real-world  robot competitions.  We will conduct a stress test and publish the  results online.  We will examine the effects of real-world torque and speed over time.  At a minimum, we will run the gearbox under load for one week or until failure.  Note that our exact experimental set up is yet to be  determined.
 
 

What's the money for?

Our plan is to spend all of the money on the parts to build our gearboxes.  Any money left over will go toward our stress testing and future prototypes.
 

What are the specifications?

  • Dimensions: L: 7.5" W: 1.5" H: 4.2" 
  • Motor types: 500 series- Banebots, Andymark, Fisher Price
  • Motor pinions: 12 tooth 32dp
  • Mounting options: slots on either end of the top/bottom
  • Mounting hole diameter: 1"x1/4" slot
  • Gear reductions: 20:1, 90:1.  Note: these gear reductions have been  updated since our original prototype.  See FAQ below for details.
  • Shaft types: 3/8" hex shaft with machine rounded ends
  • Shaft diameters: Idler shaft 1 1/2", Output shaft 3"
  • Max output torque: 11.25 N*m, 56 N*m
 
Please note that these specs may change slightly as we iterate toward better design.  We will post news about any  specification updates.
 

Timeline

First of all, for FRC teams who will be using these gearboxes in the 2013 season, we will have them express manufactured and shipped to you by January 24 2012 for use this season.  If you would like this option, please email us.
 
For all other orders, we will ship March 15, 2013.
 

CAD Files:

We will make the CAD files of the finished product publicly available.  This will help teams to include them in future designs, and  will make it easier to modify and repair the gearbox.
 

How its made:

We will be purchasing most of the gears and bearings from West Coast  Products. We plan to get the plates of the gear box cut from a water jet  cutter at a local business then have them bent using a break.  Our plan  is to make the shafts in house in our shop. Then once we have all the  individual pieces we will assemble the gearbox in house

story:
English (wersja polska poniżej)

Jacek Halicki is a Wikipedia volunteer, mostly active as an article illustrator. During the last three years of his activity, he has created a large amount of articles about monuments. He has also uploaded over 9.000 photos to Wikimedia Commons - a multimedia repository that is being used by Wikipedia users from all over the world. Many of Jacek's photos have gained Quality Image, Valued Image or Featured Picture status. Some of them have also been presented on the main page of the Polish Wikipedia. A couple of his high quality pictures have been appreciated enough to get awarded in Wiki Likes Monuments 2013 and 2014 competitions. It is worth mentioning that Jacek's photos are being published on the Creative Commons free licence, meaning that anyone can make use of them for no charge.

Not long ago Jacek had his computer stolen from him. Buying a new one proves to be a big problem since he is a disabled person and his only source of income is a modest pension. It took him a couple of years to buy all the components - it was worth about 8.000 zl - 1800 €.

We have decided to help Jacek buy a new computer, so he can keep illustrating Wikipedia, thus suporting the free knowlege. You can help, too, by contributing to this campaign!

Polski

Jacek Halicki jest wikipedystą, szczególnie aktywnym jako ilustrator artykułów. W ciągu trzech lat swojej działalności stworzył wiele artykułów dotyczących zabytków, a także załadował ponad 9.000 zdjęć na Wikimedia Commons, będące repozytorium multimediów wykorzystywanych przez wikipedystów z całego świata. Wiele zdjęć Jacka zdobyło status Quality Images,  Valued Images i Featured Pictures a także było prezentowanych na stronie głównej polskiej Wikipedii. Polscy wikipedyści docenili wysoką jakość jego zdjęć, nagradzając kilka z nich w konkursach Wiki Lubi Zabytki 2013 i 2014. Warto wspomnieć, że zdjęcia Jacka są opublikowane na wolnych licencjach Creative Commons, co oznacza że każdy może z nich korzystać.

Niedawno Jackowi ukradziono jego komputer, a kupno nowego jest dla niego dużym problemem, ponieważ jest niepełnosprawnym ruchowo inwalidą, a jego jedynym źródłem utrzymania jest niewysoka renta. Skradziony komputer był kompletowany latami, a jego wartość wynosiła około 8.000 zł.

Postanowiliśmy pomóc Jackowi w kupnie nowego komputera, aby mógł dalej ilustrować artykuły Wikipedii i w ten sposób wspierać wolną wiedzę. Jeżeli możesz to przyłącz się do tej zbiórki, każda złotówka się liczy.

story:
Version Française

>> Cliquez ici pour accéder à la version française >>> 
 

Short Summary

Hello all and welcome to our indiegogo campaign! We are a great mix of two sociologists, two software engineers and a physicist based in Lausanne and Geneva, Switzerland, and are excited to introduce you to our fabulous project : Faveeo!

Faveeo is a next-generation content discovery tool, that changes the way we find information about our interests and passions!

Faveeo allows you to :

Follow your passions easily by creating a magazine for each of your favorite interests!

Use our visual keyword suggestion map to discover related concepts and trends around your passions!

Monitor the whole web to filter and extract the best content for your favourite topics, so you don't have to make the same searches over and over again!

You can think of it as your own personal web and social networks assistant as it will help you find interesting content about your favourite topics, without you having to search over and over for the same keywords.


Have a look at a quick video presentation of the concept here!

Follow us on Twitter! 

 

Faveeo in Action

 

 

 

 

What is the difference between Faveeo and a Search Engine

First, it will push new quality content to you as soon as it appears, so you don't have to search over and over again for your favourite topics, Faveeo searches and discovers content for you.

Second, users can only search about concepts and topics they actually know. This might seem obvious, but for researchers, students and people looking to learn the details about something, it's challenging and especially time consuming to find the proper keywords to use.

Of couse, we know there are some great tools out there already helping to circumvent these issues, either leveraging social media, or by enabling "alerts" but our mission with Faveeo is to simplify the process of advanced information discovery, by offering you an all in one advanced platform that is powerful, reliable and really simple to use at the same time.

Today, with Faveeo, we are offering to democratize these tools, and make them available to everyone!

What is different between Faveeo and other discovery tools?

1) Discovery of new sources and networks: By teaching Faveeo about the kind of sources and you are looking for, our system can figure out those who are likely to be trusted sources of information.

2) Learning about your different profiles: By using advanced text extraction methods, we go further than most recommendation systems by identifyng the tone, the lenght and other signals that can indicate your preferences about a specific topic, using more than simply the keywords in that text.

3) Social recommendations: …By detecting users that seem to click, like, share or save the same articles, we can connect them together to mutualize their search and discovery operations, in order to speed discovery and recommendations.

 

Some example searches

To have an idea on how Faveeo can help build advanced searches really easily, here are some examples of "related keywords" propositions using our prototype tool.

Climate change  (Click to enlarge)

An example of a search about "Climate change" using Faveeo, gives a great overview of the related keywords and concepts that can be used to narrow down or broaden your search.

Drupal CMS (Click to enlarge)

Another example, this time about our favourite CMS : Drupal! The results are indeed quite relevant and allow you to see the related projects and technologies around Drupal!

Key Benefits of our tool

Speed up information sharing by automatically connecting like minded users, even if they are not "formally" connected by their current social networks.

Construct advanced queries thanks to our visual search engine that will help identify related concepts and trends you might have missed otherwise;

Discover relevant information quickly thanks to our recommendation engine that will filter and adapt itself according to your ongoing feedback.

 

How can you help?

We need to raise 75000$ to cover the cost of finalization of our product, making sure it works for any topic out there, making sure the architecture is solid, fast and reliable and that we can build the best recommendation engine around.

We will also use these funds to build mobile applications for Android, iPhone and Windows, as well as enabling the usage of our product in spanish, french and german as well as english and, finally, integrate new media types to our recommendations, especially images and video!

That's quite a lot to do, but we are already moving fast and the 5 of us are  committed to make this possible in the next few months!

What do you get for contributing?

For your contributions, we're offering free access to faveeo for periods going for 3 months to 2 years! We are also offering, for only 150USD a free Faveeo subscription for life! We're also of course sending out some cool gifts, like cool faveeo stickers, and some surprise seeds you can then plant in your home or garden!

By contributing to our project, you will help us finish our prototype and release a proper public version of our already promising product! But more importantly, you'll be helping the launch of a smart filtering and discovery platform that for the first time is designed and aimed at regular internet users and not at large corporations!

 

 

OK, fine. But who are you guys?

We are geeks, we love bigdata, semantics, machine-learning and statistics! Yeah! (And we love the web!)

First of all, we are a great mix of skills. First we are two sociologists, Alexis Dufresne and Kian Rieben, that have an academic background in research.

The social sciences approach, gives us great insights on such topics as "what is quality information", "what are the different quality signals users can send to a system", "how can we analyse and emerge hidden relations between users", "how can we detect trust and confidence from social signals", and much much more really interesting questions.

The social sciences side is backed up by our CTO, Nicholas Wolff and lead engineer, Marc Escher an EPFL Software Engineer that has the skills to handle Big Data type calculations and systems, providing with the arsenal needed to tackle these large problems.

Finally, our last co-founder, Yves Maumary, an ex-CERN physicist amongst other great things, also brings his own experience helping us figuring out ways we can relate physics to network analysis. It's always nice to have someone that comes from where the web was born in our team.

With this team of passionate and, let's admit it, hardcore geeks, we are confident we can deliver Faveeo and make it the most useful information discovery tool you've seen!

 

 How does Faveeo work?

Faveeo allows you to create advanced searches that we call "magazines". Each faveeo account as a definite number of magazines that can support really complex queries.

Once your query is ready and satisfying, then you can start consuming the content with our full page magazine interface, from which you can curate, share, save and vote on articles in order to teach the system how you want this specific magazine to behave.

See the following screenshots to have a good understanding on how the magazines work!

 

 Start by creating a magazine

Launch a new magazine by selecting some interesting keywords. You can already have a preview of the content that's returned by query.

 

Construct complex queries by using AND's and OR's with our visual tool

Add some keywords in your "Formula" using our visual search interface. It's really easy to create complex queries including multiple groups of AND / OR to either broaden or narrow your search.

 

 Once happy with your query, you can start reading!

The "Full View" magazine page, allows you to vote on articles, hide them, share them either on your social networking accounts (great for content curation!) or also within specific Faveeo Communities. Everything you do on this page teaches the recommendation engine how to adapt this specific magazine to your tastes!

  

Manage your sources

Each magazine allows to have an overview and a control of which sources are influencing your magazine's content. Using this tool a user can simply reorder and remove sources according to it's preferences.

 

What are our motivations? (Why are we doing this?)

The problem with the current social networks is that one still needs to "follow" or to "friend" quite a lot of people to start getting valuable content from the network. 

This system is annoying and especially time consuming. It's also very limiting.

How about a system who can connect you with interesting users automatically based on various criteria including common interests, network proximity, similarity?

How about a platform who could provide the right content, to the right people, at the right time, by being able to understand your specific needs, about specific topics?

This is exactly what drives us.

 

How much Faveeo will cost when released? Why is it not free?

When officially released to the public, Faveeo will cost 99USD / year for the basic package including 3 magazines. Each extra magazine will then cost 3USD / month so you can adapt your pricing depending on you needs. The billing will be on a monthly basis, with no contract attached.

We have decided to go this route to be able to not show any advertisement on the site, and of course to not have to sell our user's data to advertisers in order to monitize the site. We think this is an incredible value-added of our product, as your privacy data will not be sold to third-party thanks to our fair pricing policy! 

Get your Faveeo subscription now during our Crowdfunding campaign to enjoy these great prices, especially the 150USD lifelong subscription!

 

When can you expect your gift?

 The releases of the rewards are planned for mid-april, but hopefully it will be sooner! Everyone who gets the Faveeo "Patron" and "Hero" perks, we are aiming at a  early-VIP release early march.

Thanks for looking at our page, and welcome to the Discovery Revolution!

 

Faveeo : Plateforme intelligente de découverte d'informations.

Cliquez sur l'image pour voir le vidéo de présentation Faveeo en français!

Bonjour à tous, bienvenue! Toute l'équipe de Faveeo est heureuse et très fière de vous présenter Faveeo notre plateforme intelligente de tri et de découverte d'informations!

En résumé, Faveeo accélère toutes les étapes de la recherche et de la découverte sur le web.

Notre système découvre, filtre, remixe et recommande du contenu de qualité présent sur tout le web et les médias sociaux et vous l’envoie soit sur le web, par email ou sur votre téléphone portable!

Vous pouvez le considérer comme votre propre assistant personnel de recherche qui surveille les sujets qui vous passionnent!

Faveeo est idéal pour les étudiants, les blogueurs, les journalistes, mais aussi simplement pour les passionnés qui peuvent désormais très facilement surveiller leurs centres d'intérêts!

  

 

 

Principales fonctionnalités

Accélère le partage

Accélère le partage des informations dans la communauté en connectant automatiquement des utilisateurs intéressés par des sujets simllaires même s’ils ne sont pas formellement reliés par leurs réseaux sociaux actuels. Nous parlons ici d’« intelligence connectée ».

Le contenu présenté dans votre magazine est recommandé en fonction de la qualité du texte, de la source, ainsi que des recommendations "sociales" de l'ensemble du réseau (et pas que de vos amis twitter et facebook). 

 

Facilite la création de recherches avancées

Construire des requêtes avancées grâce à notre moteur de recherche visuel devient extrêment simple et rapide grâce à la carte conceptuelle qui permet de visualiser en un coup d'oeil les mots clés pertinents et liés à votre recherche.

Créer une recherche avancée n'a jamais été aussi simple : sélectionnez des mots clés proposés sur la gauche, afin de les insérer facilement dans votre "formule" à droite. Les mots clés proposés sur la gauche s'ajustent en fonction de la recherche en cours afin de permettre de creuser ou d'élargir votre requête.

 

S'adapte en permanence à vos retours

Notre moteur de découverte et de recommendations, s'adapte en permanence à vos retours en essayant d'affiner les résultats en fonction de différents critères comme le type de publication recherché, les sources de confiance, le ton, la longueur des textes appréciés, etc. En indiquant vos préférences au système, il s'adapte afin de faire émerger les "perles rares" parmi la masse d'informations disponibles.

 

Quelles sont nos motivations ? 

Internet peut être ennuyeux si vous ne savez pas où regarder. Le succès de sites comme Facebook, Twitter et Youtube montre que les utilisateurs préfèrent s’installer confortablement et attendre que le contenu vienne à eux. 

Nous aimerions faciliter et surtout accélérer la découverte sur le web, afin de vous aider à élargir vos horizons et à découvrir de nouvelles sources de contenu.

Pourquoi nous aider?

Nous devons trouver 75.000 $ pour couvrir les frais de finalisation de notre produit afin de nous assurer qu’il fonctionne pour tous les sujets possibles, que son architecture soit solide, rapide et fiable et que nous pouvons créer le meilleur moteur de recommandations.

Nous utiliserons également ces fonds pour créer des applications mobiles pour Android, iPhone et Windows et nous permettrons l’utilisation de notre produit en espagnol, en français, en allemand ainsi qu’en anglais. Enfin, nous intégrerons de nouvelles formes de média à nos recommandations, en particulier des images et des vidéos !

Nous avons beaucoup de pain sur la planche mais nous avançons déjà rapidement et les 5 membres de notre équipe s’engagent à faire de ce projet une réalité dans les prochains mois !

En échange de vos dons, nous vous offrons un accès gratuit à Faveeo durant des périodes s’étalant de 3 mois à 2 ans ! Nous vous proposons également un abonnement à vie à Faveeo pour seulement 150 USD !

Bien entendu, nous envoyons aussi des petits cadeaux, comme des autocollants Faveeo sympas et des graines surprises que vous pourrez planter dans votre maison ou votre jardin !

 Encore plus important, vous contribuerez au lancement d’une plateforme intelligente de filtrage et de découverte qui est, pour la première fois, conçue pour et destinée aux utilisateurs réguliers d’Internet et qui n'est pas réservée aux grandes entreprises!

 

Ok, c'est super.. mais qui êtes vous, en fait?

Tout d’abord, nous représentons une excellente combinaison de compétences grâce aux deux sociologues fondateurs, Alexis Dufresne et Kian Rieben,disposant d’une expérience universitaire en matière de recherche.

L’approche des sciences sociales nous donne de bons aperçus sur des sujets tels que « en quoi consiste une information de qualité », « quels sont les différents signaux de qualité que les utilisateurs peuvent envoyer à un système », « comment pouvons-nous analyser et faire ressortir les liens cachés entre des utilisateurs », «comment pouvons-nous détecter la fiabilité des signaux sociaux et la confiance à leur accorder » et bien d’autres questions très intéressantes! 

Le rôle des sciences sociales est appuyé par notre Directeur technique et principal ingénieur, Nicholas Wolff, titulaire d'une maîtrise d'ingénieur logiciel gérer les calculs et les systèmes de données "Big Data" et doté de l’arsenal nécessaire pour s’attaquer à ces gros problèmes. Traîter un million de documents par jour? Pas de problème...

Nicholas est appuyé par Marc Escher, aussi ingénieur EPFL qui a une longue expérience en développement et en création d'entreprises. Ces deux développeurs créent une parfaite balance entre notre ADN sociologique et technique.

Enfin, notre dernier co-fondateur, Yves Maumary, un ex physicien du CERN, apporte également son expérience en nous aidant à découvrir des manières de relier la physique à l’analyse des réseaux de manière a bien injecter une bonne dose de science pure à toutes nos activités.

Forts de cette équipe composée, admettons-le, de geeks passionnés et irréductibles, nous sommes sûrs de pouvoir lancer Faveeo et d’en faire l’outil de découverte d’informations le plus utile possible!

Comment utiliser  Faveeo?

Faveeo vous permet de créer des recherches avancées que nous appelons «magazines». Chaque compte Faveeo dispose d’un nombre défini de magazines qui peuvent supporter des requêtes complexes.

 Dès que votre requête est prête et satisfaisante, vous pouvez commencer à consulter le contenu sur notre page complète de l’interface du magazine, à  partir duquel vous pouvez organiser, partager, sauvegarder et voter pour les articles afin d'enseigner au système la manière dont vous souhaitez que ce magazine particulier se comporte.

Commencez par créer un magazine selon vos intérêts

Sélectionnez quelques mots clés et lancez simplement votre nouvelle recherche.

 

Utilisez notre engin de recherche visuel afin d'affiner votre requête.

En utilisant les opérateurs ET / OU, vous pouvez préciser très facilement la portée de votre recherche.

 

 

Une fois satisfait de votre requête, votre magazine est prêt!

Votre magazine vous permet de lire, noter, sauvegarder et de partager les contenus intéressants.

 

 

Pourquoi Faveeo n'est pas proposé gratuitement?

Quand il sera officiellement proposé au public, Faveeo coûtera 99$/an pour le forfait de base comprenant 3 magazines. Chaque magazine supplémentaire coûtera alors 3 USD/mois afin que vous puissiez adapter votre montant en fonction de vos besoins.

La facture se fera sur une base mensuelle, sans contrat.

Nous avons décidé d’opter pour cette procédure afin de ne pas afficher de publicités sur le site et, bien sûr, pour éviter de vendre les données de nos utilisateurs aux annonceurs. Nous pensons qu’il s’agit d’une incroyable valeur ajoutée à notre produit étant donné que vos données confidentielles ne seront pas vendues à des tiers grâce à notre politique de prix équitable.
story_txt:
Version Française

>> Cliquez ici pour accéder à la version française >>> 
 

Short Summary
Hello all and welcome to our indiegogo campaign! We are a great mix of two sociologists, two software engineers and a physicist based in Lausanne and Geneva, Switzerland, and are excited to introduce you to our fabulous project : Faveeo!
Faveeo is a next-generation content discovery tool, that changes the way we find information about our interests and passions!
Faveeo allows you to :
Follow your passions easily by creating a magazine for each of your favorite interests!
Use our visual keyword suggestion map to discover related concepts and trends around your passions!Monitor the whole web to filter and extract the best content for your favourite topics, so you don't have to make the same searches over and over again!
You can think of it as your own personal web and social networks assistant as it will help you find interesting content about your favourite topics, without you having to search over and over for the same keywords.
Have a look at a quick video presentation of the concept here!
Follow us on Twitter! 
 
Faveeo in Action
 

 

 
 
What is the difference between Faveeo and a Search Engine
First, it will push new quality content to you as soon as it appears, so you don't have to search over and over again for your favourite topics, Faveeo searches and discovers content for you.
Second, users can only search about concepts and topics they actually know. This might seem obvious, but for researchers, students and people looking to learn the details about something, it's challenging and especially time consuming to find the proper keywords to use.
Of couse, we know there are some great tools out there already helping to circumvent these issues, either leveraging social media, or by enabling "alerts" but our mission with Faveeo is to simplify the process of advanced information discovery, by offering you an all in one advanced platform that is powerful, reliable and really simple to use at the same time.
Today, with Faveeo, we are offering to democratize these tools, and make them available to everyone!
What is different between Faveeo and other discovery tools?
1) Discovery of new sources and networks: By teaching Faveeo about the kind of sources and you are looking for, our system can figure out those who are likely to be trusted sources of information.
2) Learning about your different profiles: By using advanced text extraction methods, we go further than most recommendation systems by identifyng the tone, the lenght and other signals that can indicate your preferences about a specific topic, using more than simply the keywords in that text.
3) Social recommendations: …By detecting users that seem to click, like, share or save the same articles, we can connect them together to mutualize their search and discovery operations, in order to speed discovery and recommendations.
 
Some example searches
To have an idea on how Faveeo can help build advanced searches really easily, here are some examples of "related keywords" propositions using our prototype tool.

Climate change  (Click to enlarge)


An example of a search about "Climate change" using Faveeo, gives a great overview of the related keywords and concepts that can be used to narrow down or broaden your search.

Drupal CMS (Click to enlarge)


Another example, this time about our favourite CMS : Drupal! The results are indeed quite relevant and allow you to see the related projects and technologies around Drupal!
Key Benefits of our tool
Speed up information sharing by automatically connecting like minded users, even if they are not "formally" connected by their current social networks.
Construct advanced queries thanks to our visual search engine that will help identify related concepts and trends you might have missed otherwise;
Discover relevant information quickly thanks to our recommendation engine that will filter and adapt itself according to your ongoing feedback.
 
How can you help?
We need to raise 75000$ to cover the cost of finalization of our product, making sure it works for any topic out there, making sure the architecture is solid, fast and reliable and that we can build the best recommendation engine around.
We will also use these funds to build mobile applications for Android, iPhone and Windows, as well as enabling the usage of our product in spanish, french and german as well as english and, finally, integrate new media types to our recommendations, especially images and video!
That's quite a lot to do, but we are already moving fast and the 5 of us are  committed to make this possible in the next few months!
What do you get for contributing?
For your contributions, we're offering free access to faveeo for periods going for 3 months to 2 years! We are also offering, for only 150USD a free Faveeo subscription for life! We're also of course sending out some cool gifts, like cool faveeo stickers, and some surprise seeds you can then plant in your home or garden!
By contributing to our project, you will help us finish our prototype and release a proper public version of our already promising product! But more importantly, you'll be helping the launch of a smart filtering and discovery platform that for the first time is designed and aimed at regular internet users and not at large corporations!
 
 
OK, fine. But who are you guys?
We are geeks, we love bigdata, semantics, machine-learning and statistics! Yeah! (And we love the web!)
First of all, we are a great mix of skills. First we are two sociologists, Alexis Dufresne and Kian Rieben, that have an academic background in research.
The social sciences approach, gives us great insights on such topics as "what is quality information", "what are the different quality signals users can send to a system", "how can we analyse and emerge hidden relations between users", "how can we detect trust and confidence from social signals", and much much more really interesting questions.
The social sciences side is backed up by our CTO, Nicholas Wolff and lead engineer, Marc Escher an EPFL Software Engineer that has the skills to handle Big Data type calculations and systems, providing with the arsenal needed to tackle these large problems.
Finally, our last co-founder, Yves Maumary, an ex-CERN physicist amongst other great things, also brings his own experience helping us figuring out ways we can relate physics to network analysis. It's always nice to have someone that comes from where the web was born in our team.
With this team of passionate and, let's admit it, hardcore geeks, we are confident we can deliver Faveeo and make it the most useful information discovery tool you've seen!
 
 How does Faveeo work?
Faveeo allows you to create advanced searches that we call "magazines". Each faveeo account as a definite number of magazines that can support really complex queries.
Once your query is ready and satisfying, then you can start consuming the content with our full page magazine interface, from which you can curate, share, save and vote on articles in order to teach the system how you want this specific magazine to behave.
See the following screenshots to have a good understanding on how the magazines work!
 
 Start by creating a magazine
Launch a new magazine by selecting some interesting keywords. You can already have a preview of the content that's returned by query.

 


Construct complex queries by using AND's and OR's with our visual tool
Add some keywords in your "Formula" using our visual search interface. It's really easy to create complex queries including multiple groups of AND / OR to either broaden or narrow your search.

 

 Once happy with your query, you can start reading!
The "Full View" magazine page, allows you to vote on articles, hide them, share them either on your social networking accounts (great for content curation!) or also within specific Faveeo Communities. Everything you do on this page teaches the recommendation engine how to adapt this specific magazine to your tastes!

  
Manage your sources
Each magazine allows to have an overview and a control of which sources are influencing your magazine's content. Using this tool a user can simply reorder and remove sources according to it's preferences.

 
What are our motivations? (Why are we doing this?)
The problem with the current social networks is that one still needs to "follow" or to "friend" quite a lot of people to start getting valuable content from the network. 
This system is annoying and especially time consuming. It's also very limiting.
How about a system who can connect you with interesting users automatically based on various criteria including common interests, network proximity, similarity?
How about a platform who could provide the right content, to the right people, at the right time, by being able to understand your specific needs, about specific topics?
This is exactly what drives us.
 
How much Faveeo will cost when released? Why is it not free?
When officially released to the public, Faveeo will cost 99USD / year for the basic package including 3 magazines. Each extra magazine will then cost 3USD / month so you can adapt your pricing depending on you needs. The billing will be on a monthly basis, with no contract attached.
We have decided to go this route to be able to not show any advertisement on the site, and of course to not have to sell our user's data to advertisers in order to monitize the site. We think this is an incredible value-added of our product, as your privacy data will not be sold to third-party thanks to our fair pricing policy! 
Get your Faveeo subscription now during our Crowdfunding campaign to enjoy these great prices, especially the 150USD lifelong subscription!
 
When can you expect your gift?
 The releases of the rewards are planned for mid-april, but hopefully it will be sooner! Everyone who gets the Faveeo "Patron" and "Hero" perks, we are aiming at a  early-VIP release early march.
Thanks for looking at our page, and welcome to the Discovery Revolution!

story:
BIG NEWS! We are excited to announce that WE HAVE RECEIVED A $50,000 CONTRIBUTION!!!

Because the contribution was made outside of Indiegogo, it is not reflected above, but we wanted to let our supporters know about the exciting news and know.

KUBI is a remote controlled desktop stand for your tablet that adds hands-free convenience and a dynamic social element to video calls. Friends, family, and colleagues can use KUBI to control their view through your tablet camera from anywhere in the world while video chatting.

Chat with Skype, FaceTime, and other video clients while controlling KUBI through our web app, or use our video chat app with fully integrated controls. With a KUBI on your end you can experience hands free video calling, and your friends can be empowered to follow the action around the conference table, kitchen, nursery, or wherever video calls normally take you. 

 

Read The Reviews

                    

Watch the TechCrunch Live Demo Video

 

Two Ways to Control KUBI

 

KUBI is compatible with your favorite video client, and it can also be used with our integrated video app. Read below to find out how it works.

1. With other video clients… 

a)   From a Laptop

Connect your video call using your preferred video client*. Then, simply log in to the KUBI Kontroller at meetkubi.com on your web browser and use our intuitive positioning control grid interface to direct your video feed from the KUBI tablet’s camera.

b) From a Tablet or Mobile Device

Connect your vieo call using your preferred video client*. Then, log in to the KUBI Kontroller at meetkubi.com in a web browser with any other smartphone, tablet, computer or iPod. You’re now free to control your own video feed via our intuitive positioning control grid interface. 

Tap on any square to move the KUBI and change your video feed. Each square represents a unique position on KUBIs pan and tilt range, so you can tap one square to direct your view to that position, or use the arrows to make smaller step adjustments to your feed. 

2. With KUBIs integrated video app on your touch screen device…

Video calling with the KUBI app is simple. Just download from the app store and create your username. Connect your video call to your friends, family, or colleagues and then tap your touch screen to center the video feed in a new position. 

FEATURES

  • Fits tablets 7.9" to 10.6" screen size (iPad mini to Microsoft Surface) in both portrait and landscape
  • Smooth motion of 300⁰ pan and 90⁰ tilt driven by precision servo motors
  • Geared center design for easy, one handed tablet mounting
  • Wall powered or on-board battery for approximately 4hrs of use
  • Most tablet charging ports accessible while mounted in KUBI
  • Wireless Bluetooth 4.0 connection - no cable compatibility issues!
  • Does not interfere with other Bluetooth audio devices
  • Open motion control API, compatible with any OS - anyone can create new applications!
  • Injection molded plastic body with a durable finish
  • Arms and plate are bead blasted, electro-polished and anodized aluminum
  • Removable base plate for travel
  • Standard tripod screw mount for use on tripods and photo-clamps



 

KUBI is for Hackers, Too


A special version of KUBI is available for developers interested in integrating KUBI’s functionality into their apps. This Hacker Kit will ship in February 2013, and will include servos, circuit boards, structural and mounting pieces, power adapter, and all assembly hardware. The Hacker Kit will provide all necessary components for a fully functioning KUBI, however the mounts on this version are only compatible with iPad 3 and iPad 4 in portrait mode. Other tablets can be connected through Bluetooth.

 

 

 

 

 

Where We’re Going


After multiple prototype iterations, we have designed a KUBI that is very close to the final product. The prototypes shown in the video and images are real and fully functional.

Up to this point, prototypes have been laser cut and 3D printed, but latest iteration is injection moldable once the tooling is ready. The electronics are very far along, can reliably connect to iPads via Bluetooth 4.0 and drive the motors. You can test them too, we're holding regular LIVE DEMO sessions regularly, email info@revolverobotics.com to set an appointment. 

Our current software displays the core functionality of the final product. It can send motion control commands from a graphical UI over the web through iOS with output using Bluetooth 4.0 to KUBI. We routinely Skype with a KUBI that lives in New York from our homes in San Francisco and it is SA-WEEET!

We need your help to transition from prototypes to production and finalize the iOS application.  

The process of bringing KUBI to you will include: 

  • Design for manufacturing
  • Building production tooling
  • Further prototypes and production validation samples
  • Safety and compliance testing
  • Further software development
  • Distribution and fulfillment

FAQ

How can I try one?
We’re holding open demo hours each week so you can log in, take KUBI for a spin, and have a real-time QA session with us! Open hours are listed above, please email info@revolverobotics.com to schedule an appointment.

Will my tablet work with KUBI?
KUBI is compatible with all devices that run Bluetooth 4.0, so you can use it with any tablet from an iPad to a Microsoft Surface. KUBI’s first production release will come with an iOS app, following with an Android version, and we are confident that the development community will creat apps to run KUBI on all other operating systems.

Will KUBI charge my tablet?
In order to maximize KUBI’s flexibility as a tablet stand, we have not included charging capabilities. However, KUBI is designed so that the charging port for most tablets is readily accessible during use, so you can charge your tablet with your original cord.

Can KUBI work with my smartphone?
Yes! KUBI is compatible with any device that runs Bluetooth 4.0 and has the free KUBI app. We’ve designed a smartphone adaptor for KUBI so you can run it with your phone. Once we solidify the manufacturing cost of this, we will add it as a reward.

Will the app include motion tracking for “follow me”?
We’ve created stretch goals as appendices to our $100k production goal in this crowdfunding campaign. If together we can raise $200k, we can make motion tracking and “follow me” a reality for the first production release of KUBIs! 

Will my non-iPad tablet work with KUBI? 
KUBI is controlled using Bluetooth 4.0, so any tablet that has Bluetooth 4.0 compatibility will be able to connect to KUBI. We are creating an iOS app to coincide with KUBI’s first production release which will be followed with an Android version and we confident that the development community will create apps to run KUBI on other operating systems.

What happens the goal isn't met? We are committed to delivering KUBI to everyone that orders them. In the case that we are unable to deliver your KUBI as promised, we will refund your contribution in full.

 

Who we are

Hi! Marcus and Ilya here from Revolve Robotics, a San Francisco based start-up creating robotic platforms for today’s tablet computers. We first met as colleagues at Artificial Muscle, Inc. where we commercialized AMI’s Electroactive Polymer technology. Many products we’ve worked on together focused on enhancing user experience of touch screen and gaming devices with a high fidelity haptic feedback technology called ViviTouch. That startup was successfully acquired and we decided to take our personal passions in robotics and consumer electronics into creating Revolve Robotics and KUBI. 

Marcus: Previously worked at SRI International on biologically inspired walking, jumping, climbing, swimming and slithering robots for the US Department of Defense and commercial applications.

Ilya: Has led a successful combat robot team on the Comedy Central TV series BattleBots and later worked in industrial automation, building assembly robots as well as creative projects from electronic sculptures to electric skateboards. 

 

A Sincere THANK YOU to Our Team!

Our Incubator

Lemnos Labs

Our Development Partners

Radtastical, Cambria 

Our Advisors

Scott Metcalf, Kicker Studio, Alex Beavers, Brad Marro, Frank Nuovo, Manthi Nguyen, Eric Klein, Ben LaRue

Our Sales & PR team

SOS Networks

TriplePoint PR

Red Bricks Media

Our Video Production Team

Maximize Video

Our Legal Team

Dorsey & Whitney

And our Friends & Family for enduring all the pitches! 

 

Apple, iPad and the Apple logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., no endorsement implied.
story_txt:
BIG NEWS! We are excited to announce that WE HAVE RECEIVED A $50,000 CONTRIBUTION!!!
Because the contribution was made outside of Indiegogo, it is not reflected above, but we wanted to let our supporters know about the exciting news and know.

KUBI is a remote controlled desktop stand for your tablet that adds hands-free convenience and a dynamic social element to video calls. Friends, family, and colleagues can use KUBI to control their view through your tablet camera from anywhere in the world while video chatting.
Chat with Skype, FaceTime, and other video clients while controlling KUBI through our web app, or use our video chat app with fully integrated controls. With a KUBI on your end you can experience hands free video calling, and your friends can be empowered to follow the action around the conference table, kitchen, nursery, or wherever video calls normally take you. 
 
Read The Reviews
                    
Watch the TechCrunch Live Demo Video

 
Two Ways to Control KUBI
 
KUBI is compatible with your favorite video client, and it can also be used with our integrated video app. Read below to find out how it works.

a)   From a Laptop

story:
EASY IN FEW WORDS
Easy+ will come in two versions:  
  1. Standard Copy Screen 
  2. Premium Security

STANDARD COPY SCREEN  FEATURES

Have you ever needed to capture some information from your computer screen, but were unable to copy because it’s either an image, a locked PDF file or some text in a video? Today the only options at hand are:

  • Grab a piece of paper and write down what you need and retype it on your computer
  • Open a different window and try to copy every letter of a long text or link

This is too much work and it is prone to typos. At Easy+ we believe in making things easier for all… and that´s how the Easy + idea came to be !

Easy+ recognizes all the letters within an image and then follows your orders and commands.

Easy+ opens the door for a revolutionary way of extracting text from your screen... We call it “Universal Copy”.  With Easy+ you’ll be able to:

  • Extract text
  • Open a link in an image
  • Translate text
  • Read QR Codes 

Anywhere on your screen and all at once with just one click.


PREMIUM SECURITY FEATURES

QR CODES

The Premium Security version will include all the features of the Standard  plus incredible security applications.  We have developed a software that can encrypt your  notes, emails and texts using QR Codes. 

You can save your information encrypted in Qr codes that JUST YOU and the people you decide can read.

The Premium security version allows you to:

  • Improve physical portability: You can convert your information in QR codes. One page with QR codes contains HUGE amount of information.

  • Link to your website or info: You can create QR codes that link you to your website, then just print it in your business cards
  • Encrypt and Compress Text: Encrypt your messages or documents, to keep them safe or share them just with the people you decide. 

See the following video for SECURITY PREMIUM information
TECHNOLOGY

Our software is based on Optical Character Recognition, usually abbreviated OCR.  Easy+ will convert scanned or photographed images of typewritten or printed text into a readable text. In other words, virtually anything you can read on the screen Easy+ will be able to convert it to text.

Here are some examples:

  • Imagine you are traveling and you need to read a document or a sign in a different language.  Just take a picture and Easy+ will translate it for you, so you don’t need to copy word by word.

Just take a picture and Easy + will translate it for you, so you don’t need to copy word by word.


  • You’re working on your homework/thesis and you need to copy a paragraph of a blocked PDF. Copy word by word??… Not anymore!, Just select what you want to copy and Easy + will do the work for you.
  • You need to know more about any topic… just select it or take a picture of it and Easy + will open your browser to give you more information
  • You’re watching a video on YouTube and there’s a link you would like to follow, just mark the link...

... and Easy+ will open the website for you


*Initially for Windows™ platforms
Future applications:
  • Cloud explanation:  For Premium version you will be able to save everything you copy in the cloud.  All the info would be available for future searches.

  • Easy +  can also  be connected to your phone, so if you’re working on your computer and see a number you want to dial, just select it and Easy + will dial it for you
  • You’re walking down the street and you see an email or phone number you’d like to contact.  

...Just take a picture and Easy + will write an email or dial the number for you.


PROTOTYPE

We already have a prototype to do all of the major features, but we need your help to develop new features and improve the existing ones.  Quality and reliability are our signature, that’s why we need your support in order to make this dream come true.

Check out this video to see the working prototype


Here is our prototype menu:

All of us want to have a simpler life, Easy+ and your help will make it possible


OUR TEAM

ESTIMATED DEVELOPMENT TIME

We need your help to develop Easy+ and make life easy for all.  The more working capital we can achieve, the more features we’re going to develop. 

Why do we need the start up capital? Mainly to obtain an Optical Character Recognition system(OCR)  that implements an image processing algorithm to increase the accuracy recognition of computer displayed fonts.  To do it, we need a software that improves the current prototype in order to make lines of text perfectly horizontal or vertical, increase the script recognition, convert all images to black and white and more important enhance character isolation.

Another important part of the project refers to enhance processing and storage power to process large volume of documents simultaneously. The infrastructure needed to support all requirements is very costly. 

Finally, we want to make Easy+ cross-platform, in other words, make it compatible with Windows™, Android™ and iOS™.

    Our functional prototype guarantees Easy+ is achievable and will become a reality.  You´ll be the first to enjoy Easy+ at a price significantly lower than future retail price. 

    Everyone wants to have an Easy+ life
