story:
FODI is a paper thin, multi-purpose stand that uses a carefully designed origami structure that can hold your smartphone, laptop, books and more. Origami, which is a Japanese traditional art form of paper folding, is not only a beautiful piece of art, but also has use cases in engineering and architecture. Even NASA is using Origami structure on their satellites!

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

The world is multi-dimensional and so is FODI. Despite having a strong structure, FODI weighs only 0.08 lbs (40g), which means FODI can quite literally transform into a piece of paper when laid flat. With a thickness of only 1mm, you can easily put FODI in your bag, laptop or even use it as a bookmark!

With our unique patent-pending origami structure, FODI can hold up to 44 lbs (20kg) of weight! As you can see from the photo above, FODI can easily hold 4 stacks of A4 papers.

 

 

FODI comes with 2 magnetic buckles - in 2 different sizes so they will fit all charging cables. They come on and off easier, absolutely no glue or tape needed! Buckles get rid of tangling and it holds the cable firmly, making sure you don’t drop it! The powerful buckles can also pin memos and note to the FODI when you are not recharging. Multitasking just like FODI itself.

 

Made with environmentally-friendly fibre paper, FODI is water and stain-resistant, which means you can easily clean it. There’s no hassle, even if you accidentally spill your coffee all over your desk!

 

 

 

Laptops, tablets and smartphones are designed for our convenience, yet their extensive usage, especially while sitting at a desk, can lead to various health issues. These include bad posture, stiff neck and back pain. With FODI, you can continue using your devices, all while keeping a comfortable, and most importantly, healthy posture.

FODI is not only good for your health, but can also improve your device's condition. By increasing space between your laptop and the surface, FODI improves the natural convection of air, thus reducing the risk of overheating.

 

 

Unlike ordinary paper, our patented fibre paper offers multiple advantages. Made of polypropylene fibre, the texture is much stronger than that of normal paper, it is water and stain resistant and can even withstand up to 248 degrees Fahrenheit or 120 degrees Celsius. Additionally, FODI is not wood-made, so there is no mold threat.

FODI doesn’t just support your electronic devices, it also supports our earth. The outer layer of FODI is made of patented polypropylene fibre paper, which is very durable and most importantly recyclable.

During the early stages of product development, we decided to use the origami technique in order to succeed in designing and creating an ultra-slim product form. Our fibre paper has enabled us to create FODI without compromising on any of the product's features.

Keeping in mind the small-scale, neat design of popular laptops and tablets available on the market, we made FODI as compact as possible. After countless adjustments, we came up with the ultimate size for all users and devices, guaranteed to meet your individual needs.

 

 

 

Kade Chan - Designer of FODI, is a professional origami artist and product/graphic designer. Kade Chan has been recognized for his design work and has been rewarded with various origami awards and honors on several occasions. Most notably, in 2012, he received the Eric Joisel Award from Origami Canada, and in 2013, the Yoshino Issei Fund from the Japan Origami Academic Society. Kade was also invited to be the special guest of Korea Origami Convention 2015 and Origami USA Convention 2016.

Now Kade Chan has more than 100 original origami designs and over 10 years of experience in origami teaching. He has also organized more than 60 public events/exhibitions and collaborated with many famous brands such as Berluti, L'Eau de Chloé and TOD's.

Kiho Satoshi, is an aspiring artist and designer. Born in Hyogo, Japan. Currently studying in university. Started video-shooting in 2015. Passionate about innovation. "Simple is the best" is his motto.

 

 

 

 

The packing of FODI may looks minimal, but we believe less is more. We have designed the protective packing to do its job with the least material - so less gets thrown away. Our design ensures FODI to arrive perfectly straight and unscratched.

A BIG THANKS to everyone who helped a lot in this project!

 

We have put thousands of hours into this project to make it live! But now we need to get it in front of the right people. We would love you for you to help spread the word by clicking the links below. Thank you!

story:
Missed our indiegogo campaign? Get them here at...

GreenBulb: http://www.greenbulb.com/?page_id=814

 

We've reached our $50,000 goal! 

The success of this project would not have been possible without the support, the belief and the contribution of my 487 funders. THANK YOU! (please click on update to see the full update and to follow the progress of the XStylus Touch)

 

 

How strong is the magnetic Pen holder? Click to see what other iPad users think.













A time lapse video: Alan drawing a Schnauzer with an XStylus Touch using Autodesk SketchBook Pro (iPad 2)













 

What is the XStylus Touch?

The XStylus Touch is a transforming wide-grip heavy weight touch pen for the iPad.  


It comes with a discreet, secure, crystal clear magnetic holder so that you can carry both your iPad and your touch pen in style, anytime, anywhere!

 

The XStylus Touch is available in glossy black + metal, and glossy white + metal.




 

 

 

What kind of user experience does XStylus Touch provide?

XStylus Touch simulates the user experience of a quality (or expensive) fountain pen.

 

 

Why the XStylus?

 

  • Bring it everywhere

    • The minimalistic crystal clear magnetic holder allows you to securely carry your XStylus and iPad to meetings, to classes, to rehearsals or to the cafe. The holder has been tested on over 50 popular iPad cases, and itï¿½s very likely that you can continue to enjoy your cool iPad case with the XStylus Touch.


  • Responsive pen tip

    • The tip of the XStylus Touch glides smoothly on any glass screen and is optimized for sensitivity so that even the slightest strokes are registered. You will rarely need to retouch the beginning of your strokes with your XStylus Touch. Check out our iPad styli review video (3M Smart Pen vs Bamboo vs XStylus Touch)


  • Play, create and work longer with an ergonomic wide-grip stylus

    • The bulk weight XStylus Touch is distributed in the triangle formed between your thumb and your index finger in the grip.  The combination of weight and grip size minimizes strain to your wrist and forearm, thus allowing you to play, create, and work longer.

 
  • Be cool and original! 

    • By supporting this project, you will be part of a small group of people in the world turning an user-oriented idea into a marketable product, hopefully, there'll be at least 2000 of us. We hope to produce a limited quantity of the XStylus Touch at this initial stage.  Hope you'll join us in this exciting adventure!

       

 
 





 

What You Get

$15 per XStylus Touch + Holder for the first 200 funders.  

It'd be in either glossy black or glossy white, so it's gonna be a total surprise! :)


$25 per XStylus Touch + Holder for everyone else afterwards.

 

 

 

 

What We Need

Our project goal is US$50,000 and itï¿½s the bare minimum amount for me to start the production of the XStylus Touch.  This cost includes the cost of...

  • wax moulding for the metallic part (pen core), 
  • injection moulding for the plastic part (pen body),
  • labour intensive hand polishing, 
  • stainless steel screws,
  • assembly, 
  • sourcing and trial of the raw materials, 
  • the initial prototypes by CNC technology, 
  • packaging,
  • shipping charges etc...  
 

 

 

Why is it so expensive?

The metal pen core is made entirely of solid metal and it's pricey as it's made from wax moulding.  A method commonly used to make precious metal jewelry.  Each piece will then be hand polished to the quality you see in the photos.  


Since this piece is the heart and soul (and weight) of this pen, we will "forge" ahead using this iron alloy, which really feels and looks incredible for its weight and polishing.


The XStylus Touch prototype weighs 32 grams. The final product will be very close to this weight, making it one of the heaviest iPad styli on the market. It really feels great in the hand and we've already done all the legwork by choosing the perfect material and the manufacturing process. 

So, once we reach our goal, we can kick in production right away.  This back and forth process has taken us over 3 months and here are a few photo showing the prototyping process and visits to the factories.

 

 





 


  


 

Really, why it is so expensive? 

In additional to manufacturing and prototyping cost, should we reach our goal in 60 days, the cost of fundraising is US$3,500 in commission, exchange rate fees and transaction fees.  This sum goes to IndieGoGo and Paypal.  So, I'd really end up with just around US$46,500 to produce just around 2000 copies of this stylus.

 

So, that explains why this project is so costly.  But if we can get enough people to want XStylus Touch and XStylus holder, we might just be able to materialize this idea into something beautiful and useful.

 

 

 

But wait, what if we donï¿½t reach our goal?

Hereï¿½s what will happen.  Since we canï¿½t start the project without full funding, we'll have the pay 9% of the amount fundraised to IndieGoGo as a commission and weï¿½ll refund the entire amount to you. So, you can support this project in full confidence. This is our promise to you and it's a risk we are taking.

 

 

So, is this a "All-or-Nothing" Funding Model?

 

Yes, it is.  You will receive a full refund if we don't reach our ambitious goal. Promise.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

How can we get people interested in this project?  Please help us spread the word to friends, teachers, students, artists, illustrators, gamers, and family that you think would be interested in a wide grip iPad stylus.  


Please email, facebook, and tweet about us and share your support with people around you!  Feel free to use the sharing tools underneath the video on this page.  


Thank you for reading all this and we hope to shout out your name and a big thank you on our facebook page soon!

So, you can support this project in full confidence. This is our promise to you and it's a risk we are taking.
 

 
So, is this a "All-or-Nothing" Funding Model?
 
Yes, it is.  You will receive a full refund if we don't reach our ambitious goal. Promise.

How can we get people interested in this project?  Please help us spread the word to friends, teachers, students, artists, illustrators, gamers, and family that you think would be interested in a wide grip iPad stylus.  

Please email, facebook, and tweet about us and share your support with people around you!  Feel free to use the sharing tools underneath the video on this page.  

Thank you for reading all this and we hope to shout out your name and a big thank you on our facebook page soon!

story:
Are You Ready for Change? 

Are you a cell-phone user or someone intending to buy a cell-phone plan in the near future?

Do you find it difficult to figure out what is the best cell phone plan out there?

Are you annoyed by the multiple time-consuming steps you have to take to find the best plan?

Our research shows users spend a lot of time browsing the Internet, talking to friends & family, visiting multiple stores and talking to service providers trying to find a plan and still not getting what they want. Actually…

Did you know that our research shows users spend on average 2 hrs looking for a cell-phone plan? What if we could cut that search time to less than 30 seconds through 1 Click Search?

Did you know that 82% of the online shoppers look for some sort of assistance with their purchase; you are probably one of them. What if we could connect you with the service providers instantly to get your questions answered?

Did you know that the Canadian government actually spent $1.4million in 2009 to build a cell-phone rate calculator because consumers like you expressed frustration with paying high phone bills, only to abandon it right before launch?

Canada has tried for years to build a competitive wireless environment to provide consumers with more choices in pricing, plans, and features.  Actually, in Canada, despite massive capital investments by the new entrants, the incumbents still control 95% of the market. Judgements and political arguments aside, the incontrovertible truth of the matter is that consumers in Canada are still paying one of the highest cell-phone plan prices in the world!

Choice, as it turns out, promised by the government and endorsed by the market leaders, is still very limited and the pent up frustration shared by consumers is being reflected in higher churn rates. Despite flanker brands like Chatr, Koodo, Fido, Solo and Virgin, consumers do not have true choice.

Just Imagine…

Imagine how great it would be to be able to compare cell-phone plans side-by-side in one screen, tailored to the exact information you provide for what you need, and then connect directly to the service provider who offers this plan without the hassle of all the inefficient steps.

Imagine how much bargaining power we (cell-phone users and intenders) could have if we were armed with the right knowledge when talking to service provider agents – both when buying/contracting a new plan or re-negotiating an existing one.

In a world of so much information, Big Data, why is it still difficult for cell-phone users to get access to information on great cell-phone plans that meet their needs and doesn’t cost a fortune?  While Big Data appears to only serve big companies wanting to sell us more, we can use Big Data for the consumer benefit by providing cell-phone users with all the information about different Carriers’ plans in one place, making it easier to compare different plans side-by-side.

This is exactly what http://ucompareplans.com/ aims to do! You can visit our Technology Preview Website to see the model and get more information.

Canada, it’s time to wake-up, voice your opinion, shake the industry and demand more choice with fair pricing!

So, what is the Solution uComparePlans offers?

We want to build a free website that allows cell-phone users and intenders to compare different cell-phone plans side-by-side in one screen. Using:

1 Click Search: innovative algorithm that provides users with the ability to enter a postal code and find all the different plans with best prices and coverage in that area. It’s quick and does all the work, saving users time and money.

1 Click Connection: technology that enables users to interact in real-time with service providers via multiple channels such as Call, Call Back, and Chat. First in the world for a price comparison site - this technology integrates seamlessly in the backend through APIs with service providers’ call center infrastructure.

1 Click Purchase: Group Discount Deals bring “Groupon” style deals to Telecom users with unique technology features that enable users to Speak-up about their dream plans, Share with people, Control their spending and get Discounts through the power of collaboration.

What are the benefits to Users?

1 Click Search

  • The ability to enter a postal code and find all the different plans with coverage in that area
  • It’s quick, free and does all the work to compare different plans side by side on one screen, saving users time and money

1 Click Connection

  • The ability to interact in real-time with service providers via multiple channels such as Click to Call, Chat & Email

1 Click Purchase

  • Group-Discount Deals: Empowers user to Speak-Up about their dream plan -> Share with friends & family -> Control their spending -> Save Money through the power of collaboration – WHY NOT?

Recommendations

  • The ability to get notifications based on submitting a set of criteria, existing contract expiry date or simply uploading a bill and ucompareplans.com does the work
  • Helps existing users to compare their current plans and determine if they are spending too much money
  • Provides up-to-date unbiased information, user reviews and testimonials

 Here is How You can Help:

uComparePlans wants to make this choice possibility a reality by building a FREE and EASY-To-USE beta website.  Yes – we said FREE, but to do this we need your help. 

We need $30,000 to build and run the beta website that will allow users to compare plans and enable us to raise the next level of funding from investors to launch a fully commercial website.

Website Development cost: $20,000

Information Sourcing and Research: $5,000

Maintenance and Security: $5,000

So, if you answered YES to the questions posed at the start, please show your support by contributing to this vision. In return, other than getting to use the website for free of course and saving yourself time and money in the process, here are some additional perks that we have for you:

Other ways you can help

  • ‘Like’ us on Facebook and share our campaign with friends and family
  • Voice your opinion by taking our Survey at https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/ucompareplans-survey
  • If you are a savvy programmer who loves developing and would like to help us out, please contact us at contact@ucompareplans.com. You have a chance to receive equity stake in the company and many other perks

Thank you and we look forward to receiving your support in building a website that empowers consumers and provides them with real choice!

uCP Team – Who We Are (Other than frustrated cell-phone users):

Dilanka Tyrer, CEO 

Lou Natale, VP Sales 

Dr. Siphiwe Dube, Manager, Research and Business Analysis
story_txt:
Are You Ready for Change?  
Are you a cell-phone user or someone intending to buy a cell-phone plan in the near future?
Do you find it difficult to figure out what is the best cell phone plan out there?
Are you annoyed by the multiple time-consuming steps you have to take to find the best plan?
Our research shows users spend a lot of time browsing the Internet, talking to friends & family, visiting multiple stores and talking to service providers trying to find a plan and still not getting what they want. Actually…
Did you know that our research shows users spend on average 2 hrs looking for a cell-phone plan? What if we could cut that search time to less than 30 seconds through 1 Click Search?
Did you know that 82% of the online shoppers look for some sort of assistance with their purchase; you are probably one of them. What if we could connect you with the service providers instantly to get your questions answered?
Did you know that the Canadian government actually spent $1.4million in 2009 to build a cell-phone rate calculator because consumers like you expressed frustration with paying high phone bills, only to abandon it right before launch?
Canada has tried for years to build a competitive wireless environment to provide consumers with more choices in pricing, plans, and features.  Actually, in Canada, despite massive capital investments by the new entrants, the incumbents still control 95% of the market. Judgements and political arguments aside, the incontrovertible truth of the matter is that consumers in Canada are still paying one of the highest cell-phone plan prices in the world!
Choice, as it turns out, promised by the government and endorsed by the market leaders, is still very limited and the pent up frustration shared by consumers is being reflected in higher churn rates. Despite flanker brands like Chatr, Koodo, Fido, Solo and Virgin, consumers do not have true choice.
Just Imagine…
Imagine how great it would be to be able to compare cell-phone plans side-by-side in one screen, tailored to the exact information you provide for what you need, and then connect directly to the service provider who offers this plan without the hassle of all the inefficient steps.
Imagine how much bargaining power we (cell-phone users and intenders) could have if we were armed with the right knowledge when talking to service provider agents – both when buying/contracting a new plan or re-negotiating an existing one.
In a world of so much information, Big Data, why is it still difficult for cell-phone users to get access to information on great cell-phone plans that meet their needs and doesn’t cost a fortune?  While Big Data appears to only serve big companies wanting to sell us more, we can use Big Data for the consumer benefit by providing cell-phone users with all the information about different Carriers’ plans in one place, making it easier to compare different plans side-by-side.
This is exactly what http://ucompareplans.com/ aims to do! You can visit our Technology Preview Website to see the model and get more information.
Canada, it’s time to wake-up, voice your opinion, shake the industry and demand more choice with fair pricing!
So, what is the Solution uComparePlans offers?
We want to build a free website that allows cell-phone users and intenders to compare different cell-phone plans side-by-side in one screen. Using:
1 Click Search: innovative algorithm that provides users with the ability to enter a postal code and find all the different plans with best prices and coverage in that area. It’s quick and does all the work, saving users time and money.
1 Click Connection: technology that enables users to interact in real-time with service providers via multiple channels such as Call, Call Back, and Chat. First in the world for a price comparison site - this technology integrates seamlessly in the backend through APIs with service providers’ call center infrastructure.
1 Click Purchase: Group Discount Deals bring “Groupon” style deals to Telecom users with unique technology features that enable users to Speak-up about their dream plans, Share with people, Control their spending and get Discounts through the power of collaboration.
What are the benefits to Users?
1 Click Search

The ability to enter a postal code and find all the different plans with coverage in that area
It’s quick, free and does all the work to compare different plans side by side on one screen, saving users time and money
1 Click Connection

The ability to interact in real-time with service providers via multiple channels such as Click to Call, Chat & Email
1 Click Purchase

Group-Discount Deals: Empowers user to Speak-Up about their dream plan -> Share with friends & family -> Control their spending -> Save Money through the power of collaboration – WHY NOT?
Recommendations

The ability to get notifications based on submitting a set of criteria, existing contract expiry date or simply uploading a bill and ucompareplans.com does the work
Helps existing users to compare their current plans and determine if they are spending too much money
Provides up-to-date unbiased information, user reviews and testimonials
 Here is How You can Help:
uComparePlans wants to make this choice possibility a reality by building a FREE and EASY-To-USE beta website.  Yes – we said FREE, but to do this we need your help. 
We need $30,000 to build and run the beta website that will allow users to compare plans and enable us to raise the next level of funding from investors to launch a fully commercial website.
Website Development cost: $20,000
Information Sourcing and Research: $5,000
Maintenance and Security: $5,000
So, if you answered YES to the questions posed at the start, please show your support by contributing to this vision. In return, other than getting to use the website for free of course and saving yourself time and money in the process, here are some additional perks that we have for you:
Other ways you can help

‘Like’ us on Facebook and share our campaign with friends and family
Voice your opinion by taking our Survey at https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/ucompareplans-survey

If you are a savvy programmer who loves developing and would like to help us out, please contact us at contact@ucompareplans.com. You have a chance to receive equity stake in the company and many other perks
Thank you and we look forward to receiving your support in building a website that empowers consumers and provides them with real choice!

story:
Eventula is an app designed for your smartphone, that helps you find parties and other cultural events. Find out what your friends are attending, and show them what you are up to. You get rewards for hosting your events, as well as for attending your friends events. The app is planned to be free, although there will be a premium account option for a price. 

Launchrock: http://eventula.launchrock.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Eventula_lv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Eventula

Imagine this! It’s Friday and you’re feeling very sociable and would like to attend a party. But there’s a problem. You have no clue where and what is happening, nevertheless you are unaware of what your friends are up to tonight. You send multiple SMS's to your friends, spam twitter, facebook, etc. Basically, the time that you could be spending having a good time, you spend by annoying people. Admit it, you've been in a situation like this. Don’t give up. To find out what’s up, just grab your smartphone and check Eventula – your key to having a good time. 

               

               

We are three students from one of the best schools in Riga. We are purposeful and assertive and we stand for our ideas. The idea of Eventula came to us, because we encountered problems, that this app would resolve. Since we are socially active people, we had problems like this very often. We knew that an app that could simplify the search for nearest events would easily catch on. Help us make this idea come to life and nor only you will simplify life for yourself, but for thousands of people as well. 

We need the funding for development of Eventula. Since the app currently is only in a state of an idea, the money will be used for Eventula's start-up. Our vision is an ergonomic and easy to use product, and developing a product like this is not cheap. If we get enough funding to start the development of our app, the money will go there. If not, we will spend our resources on making a better campaign and attracting investors. 

        

        

It’s pretty simple. You have a section of the nearest events, that are displayed on a map. Every event has a type, host, location and time. Event types are divided into too main sections: public events and private events.

Public events are divided into smaller categories, for example: Concert, Opera,etc... Private events are divided into two categories: open and invitations only. Events that are invitations only are visible to others, but only people that have an invitation from the host, can join.  For every event there is a specific location and time, so you know when and where it’s happening. 

                                       

If you have found something interesting, and would like to attend it, simply press the ‘’Join’’ button. When the event has ended, you can leave a review and a rating of it, so people know what kind of events to expect from this host. You will receive points for every event you attend. These points help you raise your ‘’Attendant’’ level.

                                       

                                     

Hosting an event is very easy. Just press the ‘’Host’’ button and enter some information about your event. Enter the type and category as well as the location and time of your event. Write a short description and if you want, add a photo. Your event will gain points for it’s attendance and reviews. The best events will be collected in a leaderboard (best of this week, month, year). You will get host points, that will go to your ‘’Host’’level, so people can see, how good of a host you are.

You will get bonus points for having people with VIP or Premium accounts and Hosts with a Premium account get their events promoted. 

                                       

There will be three types of accounts:

1.  Standard - The basic account that everyone can get by simply signing up.

2.  Premium - You have to pay a little fee to have a premium account. Premium accounts get their events promoted, can host multiple events at a time and can access some extra features, like statistics of your events. Suitable for businesses. 

3.  VIP – The account that only the development team can give to you. People with VIP accounts will be the kings and the queens of our app. It will be a great honor to have someone with a VIP account attend your events.

Account privileges may be altered during development!

      

   

Please, keep in mind that even the smallest contribution means a lot to us. If the app gets funded and we get it started, every single one of Eventula's contributors will receive a special package that represents our gratitude for making our idea come to life.  

1 EUR Perk:

You'll receive updates on the project, a special "supporter'' badge and a premium account subscription for one month.

10 EUR Perk:

You get a life-time premium account and you will be able to access the beta version of the app.

35 EUR Perk:

You will get a lifetime VIP account for your profile, which is a priceless upgrade, because it can not be received in any other way. It will represent that you are with us from the start. You will also receive a package with Eventula related goodies.

We would be more than thankful if you contribute to our project. We are offering valuable and interesting perks!

And please share our project on Twitter: http://clicktotweet.com/bY8e0

If you have any questions please write to us on twitter or facebook, we will be more than happy to answer!


  • https://twitter.com/Eventula_lv
  • https://www.facebook.com/Eventula

story:
Deutsche Version

 

bestSitter offers also a visual highlight or stands out visually: compared with common box-type baby-monitors, bestSitter has a child-friendly cover – a soft toy or cuddly toy named 'Buddi'.

Almost every smartphone owner has it within arm’s reach. Smartphones are used every day or 24/7 or on a daily basis to make phonecalls, send texts, surf the net etc …

Enjoy the Video! Comment the Project with your Feedback!

 

 

bestBuddi - we are 4 People from Cologne who believe that there is a modern, safe way to look after our kids. Timo started developing bestSitter and Tanja, Isabel and Sassan came on board or joined the team! We spent about six month planning and organising our vision, we now can proudly say: Made in Cologne - with love.

 

Almost every smartphone owner has it within arm’s reach. Smartphones are used every day or 24/7 or on a daily basis to make phonecalls, send texts, surf the net etc …
We love it! Via wifi and a camera, equipped with infrared, sounds and images are transferred through the app to your smartphone. For example, you could attach the sender to the cot and if your baby cries the app gives a notification with a supervisory tone and informs about the activity of the baby.

 

bestSitter offers also a visual highlight or stands out visually: compared with common box-type baby-monitors, bestSitter has a child-friendly cover –a soft toy or cuddly toy named 'Buddi'. Each ‘Buddi’ is unique and made by people who enjoy tailoring and sewing. And thus we enable people to top up their pension or earn some pocket money while doing something they enjoy; our motto is handmade instead of mass production. We want ‘Buddi’ to be made globally, so if you are purchasing ‘Buddi’ in the USA, your ‘Buddi’ will be made in the USA.

 

BestSitter supports all modern Smartphones or tablets with iOS, Android or Windows 8 and Windows phone 8.

» Supports iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows phones
» WiFi b/g/n
» IR Camera 3MP
» Battery pack
» Micro USB
» Handmade ‘Buddi’ cover

To use BestSitter on the go, your mobile device requires a direct WiFi connection to bestSitter or an internet Connection if bestSitter is located at home.

 

We believe in a good infrastructure not only at our office, therefor we created a plan which is perfect for our economy. You may read that bestBuddi is made by retired people in your country for stocking their pension. We are doing the same with the Hardware, everything is then “Made in [YOUR COUNTRY HERE]” from Productbox to assembly including Buddi. This is also the best Base for having components which are safe in your environment, including better localized Apps and creating Jobs around the world. On Successful founding we will create an office in North America for the best Product Support you can imagine.

 

"I can now have a look at bestSitter when I feel like checking up on my daughter, even while in a business meeting" - Sassan

 

“I believe in this product and for me it’s the best solution, having a ‘Buddi’ to monitor my kids.
When I had the idea I knew that it has to be be a high-performance, user-friendly and portable device. To stand out, different ‘Buddi’ covers are available, like most smartphones have today.  After many hours behind the drawing board, bestSitter was born” - Timo

 

“When developing the app, it was important to us to make it parent-friendly so that you can use bestSitter anytime from anywhere via the internet. Like a big brother, who is always by your side and alerts the parents as soon as something is happening. Another benefit is that it fits everywhere and is always present“ - Tanja

 

“When I designed the little ‘Buddi’ it was important to me, that he it looks friendly and made from tactile materials – so a little “watch dog” who is always by the side of babies and like a best buddy accompanies them everywhere.” - Isabel

 

 

Check out our perks, be the first and get yourself an early bird package oroffer!

If you have any questions regarding the perks, PLEASE feel free to contact us.

 

Covers are available in various colors, so the sooner you order the more choice you have

A lot of costs are involved: product development, plastic molds, electronic parts (i.e.  high quality cameras, microphones, WiFi modules, battery packs etc), as well as the indiegogo fee.

The prototype apps have to be optimized, set up and then the ‘Buddi’ covers have to be made.  To pursue our vision, the covers are handmade, for example by tailors who have retired and want to earn some extra money, - and want to be part of buddi family.

For sure, if you like to make your own Buddi for this device, you can request blueprints!

Then we will pack it safely and send your kids new ‘Buddi’ to your home!

 

check our Website at: www.bestbuddi.com

Community: www.facebook.com/Bestbuddi

EMail: your@bestbuddi.com

 

Deutsche Version

 

Ein Team aus vier jungen Menschen aus Köln bilden das Team von bestBuddi. Timo hatte die Idee für ein Babyfon für Smartphones und holte Tanja, Isabel und Sassan ins Boot. Daraufhin haben wir sechs Monate lang geplant, entwickelt und organisiert um unsere Vision zu realisieren. Jetzt können wir mit Stolz und Freude sagen: Made with love in Cologne.

Fast jeder Smartphone-Besitzer hat dieses maximal eine Armlänge von sich entfernt und verwendet es über den Tag hinweg unzählige Male zum Telefonieren, Nachrichten senden, im Internet surfen etc…


Wir lieben es! Mittels WLAN und einem Kameramodul mit integriertem Infrarot kann bestSitter Geräusche und Bilder mithilfe einer App auf das Smartphone übertragen. Der Sender kann beispielsweise am Kinderbettchen befestigt werden. Sobald das Baby Laute von sich gibt, meldet sich die App mit einem Hinweiston und informiert über die Aktivität des Nachwuchs..

 

Ein optisches Highlight bietet bestSitter auch: Im Gegensatz zu den gewöhnlich sterilen Plastikboxen anderer Babyphones, hat bestSitter eine kinderfreundliche Hülle – eine Nickifigur, die den Namen Buddi trägt.

Zudem soll jeder Buddi einzigartig sein. Deshalb sollen die Nickihüllen auch von Personen angefertigt werden, die Spaß am Nähen haben. Nebenbei können sich diese ihre Rente aufbessern oder ein kleines Taschengeld dazu verdienen.

Hier seht Ihr wie Buddi's Innenleben aussieht, ein Baby Fon mit allen technischen Finessen in einer Hülle aus Nicki! Wenn Ihr kreativ seid, könnt Ihr sogar eigene Buddi's basteln!

„Von Hand genäht statt maschinell massen-angefertigt“.

Bestsitter unterstützt alle modernen SmartPhone betriebssysteme, Windowsphone 8, Android und natürlich auch Geräte wie iPhones und iPads.

» Endgeräte iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows phones
» WLan mit b/g/n Unterstützung
» Infrarot Camera 3MP
» Battery pack
» Micro USB
» Handverarbeitetes ‘Buddi’ cover

Um bestSitter bei Freunden und Bekannten zu benutzen muss entweder eine direkte Verbindung mit dem Telefon oder hergestellt werden oder bestSitter in ein WLan Netzwerk eingebunden. Die Verwendung ist so einfach, das jeder der eine Smartphone App benutzen kann in der Lage ist bestSitter einzusetzen.

Wenn du Unterwegs bist, kannst du jeder Zeit über dein SmartPhone auf bestSitter zu Hause zugreifen, Voraussetzung dafür ist eine Mobiledatenverbindung mit dem Telefon.

 

Ich kann jederzeit einen Blick ins Kinderzimmer werfen, wenn ich meine Tochter vermisse, sogar wenn ich einem Meeting bin!“ - Sassan

„Als ich die Idee für das Babyphone hatte, war mir klar, dass es ein leistungsstarkes, einfach zu bedienendes und portables Gerät sein musste. Zudem durfte es kein Plastik-Objekt sein, sondern die Möglichkeit bieten, verschiedene Hüllen zu nutzen, wie bei den meisten Smartphones heutzutage. Nach vielen Stunden vor dem Lötkolben kam dabei bestSitter heraus“ -  Timo 

 

„Bei der Planung der App war wichtig, dass diese elternfreundlich ist, so dass jederzeit von überall via Internet auf bestSitter zugegriffen werden kann. Ein großer Bruder für Babys, der immer da ist und die Eltern alarmiert, sobald es unruhig ist. Ein weiterer von vielen Vorteilen ist, dass es selbst in die überfüllteste Handtasche passt und somit immer dabei ist“ – Tanja

 

„Als ich den kleinen Buddi designte, war mir vor allem wichtig, dass er freundlich wirkt und Lust zum Anfassen bereitet – ein kleiner Aufpasser also, der im metaphorischen Sinne den Babys stets zur Seite steht und sie wie ein guter Freund begleitet.“ – Isabel

 

 

Eine Menge Auswahl an unserem neuen Produkt. Haben wir Erfolg auf Indiegogo, bekommst du spätestens im September dein Produkt! Wenn du einen coolen Display Reiniger Pad für dein SmartPhone oder Tablet haben willst oder ein cooles T-Shirt von bestbuddi, bekommst du diese auch schon früher geliefert!

In Dollar zu bezahlen ist mit PayPal kein Problem, du bekommst auch den Wert in Euro vor der Bezahlung angezeigt damit auch weißt wie viel du bezahlst. (1USD ca 0,78€)

Wenn du fragen hast, schreib uns einen Kommentar oder benutze auf www.bestbuddi.com/de/contact unser Formular.

Wenn Ihr euch einen Perk/Vor ab Produkt ausgesucht habt könnt Ihr Euch hier eine Anleitung für die Indiegogo durchlesen.

http://www.bestbuddi.com/indiegogo-anleitung/

 

Jetzt aber zu den „Perks“

10$+ Vielen Dank - Du erscheinst auf unserer bestBuddi-Cloud

Wir lieben Feedback und das möchten wir auch zeigen! In unserem Büro werden wir eine Cloud gestalten, auf der sich alle Unterstützer wiederfinden! Wenn Du zwischen 10.00 und 19.00$ spendest, wird Dein Name auf unserer Bürowand im Eingang stehen als Unterstützer!

20.00 $ + bestBuddi Cleaner und Dein Name auf unserer Cloud

Wenn Du zwischen 20.00 und 49.00$ spendest, erhälst Du einen kleinen Buddi für Dein Smartphone! Es ist ein kleiner Smartphone-Wischer, der immer an Deinem Samrtphone klebt und Deinen Display reinigt. Außerdem wird Dein Name Teil auf unserer Cloud sein.

 

50.00 $ + Ein richtig volles bestBuddi-T-Shirt von uns gestaltet + Cloud

Du wirst ein einzigartiges bestBuddi-T-Shirt erhalten! Nein, kein langweiliges Logo-T-Shirt – ganz im Gegenteil! Bitte teile uns Deine Kleidergröße mit, wenn Du spendest. Natürlich bist Du auch auf unserer Bürowand im Eingang zu sehen als Unterstützer!

 

50.00 $ + Gutschein in Höhe von 50 USD +Cloud

Du erhälst einen Gutschein in Höhe von 50.00 $ mit einem persönlichen Gruß vom bestBuddi-Team. Bitte teile uns Deinen Namen mit, wenn Du spendest. Natürlich erscheinst auch Du auf unserer Bürowand im Eingang zu sehen als Unterstützer!!

 

100.00 $ + Eine handgenähte Buddi-Hülle vom bestBuddi-Team

Du teilst uns Deine Lieblingsfarben mit und wir gestalten eine ganz persönliche bestSitter-Hülle für Dich! Du kannst Deinen Buddi auf Deinen Schreibtisch stellen oder wenn Du einen bestSitter besitzt, kannst Du die Hülle natürlich hierfür benutzen. selbstverständlich wird Dein Name noch größer auf unserer Bürowand im Eingang zu sehen als Unterstützer!.

 

179.00 $ + bestSitter-Starter-Kit – Originalpreis 199.00$

Dieses Angebot gibt es nur exklusiv hier auf Indiegogo. Du erhälst ein bestSitter-Starter-Kit für 20$ weniger als im Handel. Natürlich bist auch Du mit dabei auf unserer Bürowand im Eingang zu sehen als Unterstützer!.

 

179.00 $ + „Früher Vogel“ Starter-Kit inklusive zwei verschiedene Hüllen, eine vom Team handgenäht

Dies ist eine „Früher Vogel“-Option. Du erhälst das Starter-Kit mit zwei verschiedenen Hüllen anstatt mit nur einer. Ein Buddi ist sogar persönlich von unseren Team-Mitgliedern Tanja oder Isabel handgenäht mit einer persönlicher Widmung vom bestBuddi-Team. Wir bringen Dich in einer besonderen Farbe auf unsere Bürowand!

 

515.00 $ + 3 Familien-Kits – Originalpreis 597.00$

Warum nicht gleich Freunde und Familie mit bestSitter ausstatten? Du sparst eine Menge Geld und unterstützt natürlich unser Projekt. Du erhälst 3 bestSitter-Kits zum Indiegogo-Angebot. Du bist auf unserer Bürowand als Unterstützer mit von der Partie.

 

 

515.00 $ + „Früher Vogel“ - 3 bestSitter-Kits mit zwei verschiedenen Hüllen, eine vom Team handgenäht

Das ist die „Früher Vogel“-Option 2. Du erhäst 3 bestSitter-Kits mit jeweils zwei Hüllen anstatt nur einer. – ein Buddi ist wieder handgenäht von unseren Team-Mitgliedern Tanja oder Isabel mit persönlicher Widmung vom bestBuddi-Team. Wir bringen Dich in einer besonderen Farbe auf unsere Bürowand!

 

3500.00 $ – Werde ein bestBuddi von bestBuddi

Auch Du kannst ein bestBuddi sein! Wir laden Dich für 3 Tage nach Köln in unser Office ein. Du bekommst einen exklusiven Einblick in unsere Arbeit und an welchem Projekt wir gerade aktuell arbeiten.Wir zeigen Dir zukünftige Projekte und erzählen Dir die Geschichte, wie wir zu bestBuddi(s) wurden.

 

Die Buddi figuren werden in vielen Verschiedenen Farbvariationen  verfügbarsein, sofern du dir ein Early Bird Paket geschnappt hast, kannst du dir hier die Farben zusammenstellen!

 

In der Realisierung sind einige Kostenfaktoren die man nicht unterschätzen darf, diese haben wir kalkuliert ob wir das Projekt realisieren können.

Beispielsweise Hardware wie Kamera, Mikrophone, Akkupack und Wlan Modul, hinzukommen die Gebühren die wir an Indiegogo bezahlen um das Projekt hier bereitzustellen.

Neben der Hardware und den Gebühren gibt es ja noch die APPS als Software, diese müssen optimiert werden damit diese in den jeweiligen Marketplaces veröffentlich werden können.

Und zum Schluss ist da ja auch noch Buddi, der Handgenäht wird damit diese Schutzhülle auch unseren Qualitätsansprüchen gerecht wird.

Wenn Ihr selber einen Buddi machen möchtet könnt Ihr Euch auch die Schnittmuster anfordern, die schönsten werden wir dann auch veröffentlichen. (Dafür benötigen wir eine Zeichnung vor ab)

Dann werden wir das Produkt hochwertig verpacken damit Buddi auch sicher zu Euch kommt!

 

 

 

Unsere deutsche Website: www.bestbuddi.com/de

Soziale Netzwerke: www.facebook.com/Bestbuddi

EMail: your@bestbuddi.com
story_txt:
Deutsche Version
 
bestSitter offers also a visual highlight or stands out visually: compared with common box-type baby-monitors, bestSitter has a child-friendly cover – a soft toy or cuddly toy named 'Buddi'.
Almost every smartphone owner has it within arm’s reach. Smartphones are used every day or 24/7 or on a daily basis to make phonecalls, send texts, surf the net etc …
Enjoy the Video! Comment the Project with your Feedback!
 
 

bestBuddi - we are 4 People from Cologne who believe that there is a modern, safe way to look after our kids. Timo started developing bestSitter and Tanja, Isabel and Sassan came on board or joined the team! We spent about six month planning and organising our vision, we now can proudly say: Made in Cologne - with love.
 

Almost every smartphone owner has it within arm’s reach. Smartphones are used every day or 24/7 or on a daily basis to make phonecalls, send texts, surf the net etc …We love it! Via wifi and a camera, equipped with infrared, sounds and images are transferred through the app to your smartphone. For example, you could attach the sender to the cot and if your baby cries the app gives a notification with a supervisory tone and informs about the activity of the baby.
 

bestSitter offers also a visual highlight or stands out visually: compared with common box-type baby-monitors, bestSitter has a child-friendly cover –a soft toy or cuddly toy named 'Buddi'. Each ‘Buddi’ is unique and made by people who enjoy tailoring and sewing. And thus we enable people to top up their pension or earn some pocket money while doing something they enjoy; our motto is handmade instead of mass production. We want ‘Buddi’ to be made globally, so if you are purchasing ‘Buddi’ in the USA, your ‘Buddi’ will be made in the USA.
 



BestSitter supports all modern Smartphones or tablets with iOS, Android or Windows 8 and Windows phone 8.
» Supports iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows phones  » WiFi b/g/n » IR Camera 3MP » Battery pack » Micro USB » Handmade ‘Buddi’ cover
To use BestSitter on the go, your mobile device requires a direct WiFi connection to bestSitter or an internet Connection if bestSitter is located at home.
 
We believe in a good infrastructure not only at our office, therefor we created a plan which is perfect for our economy. You may read that bestBuddi is made by retired people in your country for stocking their pension. We are doing the same with the Hardware, everything is then “Made in [YOUR COUNTRY HERE]” from Productbox to assembly including Buddi. This is also the best Base for having components which are safe in your environment, including better localized Apps and creating Jobs around the world. On Successful founding we will create an office in North America for the best Product Support you can imagine.
 

"I can now have a look at bestSitter when I feel like checking up on my daughter, even while in a business meeting" - Sassan
 
“I believe in this product and for me it’s the best solution, having a ‘Buddi’ to monitor my kids.  When I had the idea I knew that it has to be be a high-performance, user-friendly and portable device. To stand out, different ‘Buddi’ covers are available, like most smartphones have today.  After many hours behind the drawing board, bestSitter was born” - Timo
 
“When developing the app, it was important to us to make it parent-friendly so that you can use bestSitter anytime from anywhere via the internet. Like a big brother, who is always by your side and alerts the parents as soon as something is happening. Another benefit is that it fits everywhere and is always present“ - Tanja
 
“When I designed the little ‘Buddi’ it was important to me, that he it looks friendly and made from tactile materials – so a little “watch dog” who is always by the side of babies and like a best buddy accompanies them everywhere.” - Isabel
 
 

Check out our perks, be the first and get yourself an early bird package oroffer!
If you have any questions regarding the perks, PLEASE feel free to contact us.
 


Covers are available in various colors, so the sooner you order the more choice you have


A lot of costs are involved: product development, plastic molds, electronic parts (i.e.  high quality cameras, microphones, WiFi modules, battery packs etc), as well as the indiegogo fee.The prototype apps have to be optimized, set up and then the ‘Buddi’ covers have to be made.  To pursue our vision, the covers are handmade, for example by tailors who have retired and want to earn some extra money, - and want to be part of buddi family.For sure, if you like to make your own Buddi for this device, you can request blueprints!Then we will pack it safely and send your kids new ‘Buddi’ to your home!
 



check our Website at: www.bestbuddi.com
Community: www.facebook.com/Bestbuddi
EMail: your@bestbuddi.com
 
 Deutsche Version
 


Ein Team aus vier jungen Menschen aus Köln bilden das Team von bestBuddi. Timo hatte die Idee für ein Babyfon für Smartphones und holte Tanja, Isabel und Sassan ins Boot. Daraufhin haben wir sechs Monate lang geplant, entwickelt und organisiert um unsere Vision zu realisieren. Jetzt können wir mit Stolz und Freude sagen: Made with love in Cologne.

Fast jeder Smartphone-Besitzer hat dieses maximal eine Armlänge von sich entfernt und verwendet es über den Tag hinweg unzählige Male zum Telefonieren, Nachrichten senden, im Internet surfen etc…
Wir lieben es! Mittels WLAN und einem Kameramodul mit integriertem Infrarot kann bestSitter Geräusche und Bilder mithilfe einer App auf das Smartphone übertragen. Der Sender kann beispielsweise am Kinderbettchen befestigt werden. Sobald das Baby Laute von sich gibt, meldet sich die App mit einem Hinweiston und informiert über die Aktivität des Nachwuchs..
 

Ein optisches Highlight bietet bestSitter auch: Im Gegensatz zu den gewöhnlich sterilen Plastikboxen anderer Babyphones, hat bestSitter eine kinderfreundliche Hülle – eine Nickifigur, die den Namen Buddi trägt. Zudem soll jeder Buddi einzigartig sein. Deshalb sollen die Nickihüllen auch von Personen angefertigt werden, die Spaß am Nähen haben. Nebenbei können sich diese ihre Rente aufbessern oder ein kleines Taschengeld dazu verdienen.
Hier seht Ihr wie Buddi's Innenleben aussieht, ein Baby Fon mit allen technischen Finessen in einer Hülle aus Nicki! Wenn Ihr kreativ seid, könnt Ihr sogar eigene Buddi's basteln!

„Von Hand genäht statt maschinell massen-angefertigt“.

Bestsitter unterstützt alle modernen SmartPhone betriebssysteme, Windowsphone 8, Android und natürlich auch Geräte wie iPhones und iPads.

» Endgeräte iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows phones  » WLan mit b/g/n Unterstützung » Infrarot Camera 3MP » Battery pack » Micro USB » Handverarbeitetes ‘Buddi’ cover
Um bestSitter bei Freunden und Bekannten zu benutzen muss entweder eine direkte Verbindung mit dem Telefon oder hergestellt werden oder bestSitter in ein WLan Netzwerk eingebunden. Die Verwendung ist so einfach, das jeder der eine Smartphone App benutzen kann in der Lage ist bestSitter einzusetzen.
Wenn du Unterwegs bist, kannst du jeder Zeit über dein SmartPhone auf bestSitter zu Hause zugreifen, Voraussetzung dafür ist eine Mobiledatenverbindung mit dem Telefon.
 

Ich kann jederzeit einen Blick ins Kinderzimmer werfen, wenn ich meine Tochter vermisse, sogar wenn ich einem Meeting bin!“ - Sassan
„Als ich die Idee für das Babyphone hatte, war mir klar, dass es ein leistungsstarkes, einfach zu bedienendes und portables Gerät sein musste. Zudem durfte es kein Plastik-Objekt sein, sondern die Möglichkeit bieten, verschiedene Hüllen zu nutzen, wie bei den meisten Smartphones heutzutage. Nach vielen Stunden vor dem Lötkolben kam dabei bestSitter heraus“ -  Timo 
 
„Bei der Planung der App war wichtig, dass diese elternfreundlich ist, so dass jederzeit von überall via Internet auf bestSitter zugegriffen werden kann. Ein großer Bruder für Babys, der immer da ist und die Eltern alarmiert, sobald es unruhig ist. Ein weiterer von vielen Vorteilen ist, dass es selbst in die überfüllteste Handtasche passt und somit immer dabei ist“ – Tanja
 
„Als ich den kleinen Buddi designte, war mir vor allem wichtig, dass er freundlich wirkt und Lust zum Anfassen bereitet – ein kleiner Aufpasser also, der im metaphorischen Sinne den Babys stets zur Seite steht und sie wie ein guter Freund begleitet.“ – Isabel
 



 
Eine Menge Auswahl an unserem neuen Produkt. Haben wir Erfolg auf Indiegogo, bekommst du spätestens im September dein Produkt! Wenn du einen coolen Display Reiniger Pad für dein SmartPhone oder Tablet haben willst oder ein cooles T-Shirt von bestbuddi, bekommst du diese auch schon früher geliefert!
In Dollar zu bezahlen ist mit PayPal kein Problem, du bekommst auch den Wert in Euro vor der Bezahlung angezeigt damit auch weißt wie viel du bezahlst. (1USD ca 0,78€)
Wenn du fragen hast, schreib uns einen Kommentar oder benutze auf www.bestbuddi.com/de/contact unser Formular.
Wenn Ihr euch einen Perk/Vor ab Produkt ausgesucht habt könnt Ihr Euch hier eine Anleitung für die Indiegogo durchlesen.
http://www.bestbuddi.com/indiegogo-anleitung/
 
Jetzt aber zu den „Perks“
10$+ Vielen Dank - Du erscheinst auf unserer bestBuddi-Cloud
Wir lieben Feedback und das möchten wir auch zeigen! In unserem Büro werden wir eine Cloud gestalten, auf der sich alle Unterstützer wiederfinden! Wenn Du zwischen 10.00 und 19.00$ spendest, wird Dein Name auf unserer Bürowand im Eingang stehen als Unterstützer!

story:
¥ What is the iDrunk?
     The iDrunk is a technological breakthrough that prevents people from posting to social media sites, uploading videos, making wagers on online gambling sites, making expensive impulse purchases or performing other acts of questionable judgment; acts they would not perform had they not consumed too much alcohol to make better decisions. 

¥ How does the iDrunk work? 
     Using a combination of cutting edge computer hardware and software the iDrunk will prevent you from sending information to web sites that you want to protect yourself from. The iDrunk software will notice your attempts post to the Internet and will prompt you to blow into our nip-bottle housed breathalyzer. It will only allow your post to the Internet if you are sober enough to post. 

¥ What's in the little bottle? 
     Unlike products that rely on dexterity skills to test inebriation, the iDrunk uses a specially designed electronic breathalyzer that measures your blood alcohol content. This specially designed hardware communicates your sobriety level via USB or Bluetooth technology to your Smartphone or PC. 

¥ Can I download the iDrunk software and use it with out the iDrunkbreathalyzer? 
     No, the iDrunk software requires the iDrunkbreathalyzer be connected to your PC in order to block or permit traffic based on sobriety levels. 

¥ How drunk do I have to be before the iDrunk will stop me? 
     Since the effect of alcohol on people varies from person to person the iDrunk lets you set your own level of impaired judgment. Fine tuning the settings of the iDrunk just may be the most fun youÕll ever have when configuring a computer peripheral. 

¥ Which web sites will the iDrunk work for? 
     The iDrunk will work for any web site you can send data to. It comes preprogramed to block posts to Twitter and Facebook. Through the user interface you can add any social media, gambling or shopping sites you wish. 

¥ What browsers does the iDrunk support? 
     Currently the iDrunk works with Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Internet Explorer. 

¥ Will purchasing an iDrunk make me more attractive to the opposite sex? 
     Yes, yes it will. 

¥ If the iDrunk says I'm sober, does that mean I am ok to drive an automobile? 
     The iDrunk is for entertainment purposes only. Although we at iDrunk enjoy having a good time we remind everybody that being sober enough to post does not mean you are sober enough to drive. 

¥ Who should purchase an iDrunk? 
     You should. If youÕve read through this FAQ all the way to question 10 you know you want one. It also makes a great gift for friends who like to enjoy life but donÕt know when to shut up about it. You know the people weÕre talking about;the people who repeatedly make embracing posts that leave you shaking your head. You owe it them to get them one too. 

¥ Who makes the iDrunk? 
     The iDrunk is the flagship product of 4 Wizard LLC. 4 Wizard is committed to producing the finest electronic and software products for the connected life in the 21st century.

story:
Our mobile devices consume a ton of battery power and we go through the excruciating process of charging them every day, multiple times, on top of which we deal with slow charging speeds, frayed cables, broken phone sockets, smashed phones while tripping over cables. MuConnect is an answer to all these problems.

MuConnect is a beautifully designed smart gadget, for a faster, safer and convenient mobile charging experience (supports Android and iOS devices).

 

   Transform the way you charge your mobile  

You can now charge your mobile devices 2X faster from your laptop while at work or while travelling, instead of searching for a wall port everywhere you go.

When charging the device from public charging ports or others laptops, there is a chance of unauthorized access to your personal data, photos, important information and a lot more.

This video shows how hackers can put your device at risk when charging via public charging ports.

MuConnect’s fast charging mode protects your device from data theft and malware installations, as it disables data sync. You can now safely charge your devices anywhere when you are on the go.

With MuConnect, connect your charger magnetically to your device with ease. No pointless fiddling. 

Easy plug and easy detach helps reduce stress on your cables and mobile charging sockets to a great extent - thus preventing frayed cables and loose sockets.

*NOTE: There has been a change in the switch design of MuConnect. Below you can see the new design where the switch has been shifted to a vertical position from the original horizontal placement. This has also has increased the overall size of the product to 21 mm length and 10 mm in width.

INTRODUCING MuCONNECT ZERO

MuConnect Zero is a lite version of the MuConnect Pro. Zero has all of the PRO features other than the Fast Charging and Data Protection. Zero has been designed for the not so heavy mobile users.At the core of Zero is its Easy Plug/Detach feature making charging a lot of fun and easier. It also helps in protecting your sockets from damage, prevents dust and water entry, you also no longer need to worry about frayed cable or tripping over cables and damaging your phone, cables.


 Watch Zero's Demo Video

MuConnect is featured in :                            

                                                                                

1. Insert the Pin into your phone charging socket .

2. Fix the Connector into your charging cable. 

3. Bring the Connector near the Pin. It aligns and charges away!

*Please note- The parts you see here are 3D printed prototypes. The finished products will have a better shine and dimensional accuracy.

Slide the button to navigate between fast charging mode and data sync mode.

MuConnect is for everyone who uses a mobile device, whether you are an iPhone or an Android user.

Reversible Micro USB (Android and Windows devices)

Smart and Faster Charging

LED Indicator (Easily locate your charger in the dark)

At a glance 

 MuConnect can be used for any devices with a micro USB or a lightning port

            

In addition to all these features, we took every care to make MuConnect unobtrusive so that it can be seamlessly integrated into your everyday life. Its small and elegant design can be accommodated in any of your custom phone cases and be connected to all your favorite chargers. You don't have to give up any of your favorite accessories to use MuConnect.

Dimensions :

NOTE: A survey will also be sent after the campaign ends where you can choose if you want the micro USB (Android) or the lightning(Apple) version.

How we will use your funds -  

We want to bring MuConnect to you so that it can make your life a bit more comfortable. But as a new startup, we need your help. With your pledge and support, we will be able to cover our tooling and manufacturing costs which will enable us to make this product a reality and available worldwide.

Introduce your friends to MuConnect - 

Please help us spread a word about this campaign by sharing via the social buttons present next to the campaign photo. 

You can also

Like us on               Facebook     

Follow us on           Twitter         

Follow us on            Instagram   

Subscribe to us       Subscribe 

About Us

We are a new product design start up with the aim of providing simple solutions to everyday tedious tasks. The driving force behind us is to implement small but significant innovations into our products to make life more comfortable. With our first product MuConnect, we hope to kick-start a large chain of consumer products.

 

 

FAQs

Does MuConnect support data transfer?

Yes. Make sure that the switch is in data sync mode and you are ready to go!

Does MuConnect support data transfer during fast charging?

No. You need to switch it to data sync mode for data transfer.

What is fast charging in MuConnect?

Mobiles when charging through laptops charge very slowly due to data sync. This gadget when switched to fast charging mode turns off data transfer thus allowing the mobile to take more power – so it charges faster.

Does fast charging work with my AC adaptor too?

No. It works only when connected to laptops or car chargers.

Is MuConnect compatible with Quick Charge 2.0 and 3.0?

Yes.

Will this come with MFI Certification for the lightning set?

We will pursue MFi certification once we reach the stretch goal.

How can I select lightning or micro USB pack for my pledge?

We will send out a survey at the end of the campaign where you can select which one you want.

Will MuConnect support USB C?

USB Type C will be available once we reach our stretch goal.

Is there any patent infringement with Apple?

We have done our due diligence and found out there isn't any infringement on any patent.

How is MuConnect water resistant?

The pin which goes into the phone will be reinforced with a silicon ring, so as it covers your port all the time, water and dust can not enter.

How is MuConnect smart?

Different mobile devices have different proprietary standards to enable fast charging (like BC1.0, 1.1, 1.2, YD/T-1591 spec, Samsung Fast charging standard, Apple iPhone/ iPad Fast charging standard etc). MuConnect can automatically detect which device is connected to it and sets the standard, thus signalling the device to take maximum power. That is why MuConnect is smart.

What is the refund policy ?

We will not be accepting any refunds once the campaign is over.
For the InDemand Backers you can avail refunds through Indiegogo as long as you have the option. After this time no refunds will be accepted.
story_txt:
Our mobile devices consume a ton of battery power and we go through the excruciating process of charging them every day, multiple times, on top of which we deal with slow charging speeds, frayed cables, broken phone sockets, smashed phones while tripping over cables. MuConnect is an answer to all these problems.MuConnect is a beautifully designed smart gadget, for a faster, safer and convenient mobile charging experience (supports Android and iOS devices).    Transform the way you charge your mobile  You can now charge your mobile devices 2X faster from your laptop while at work or while travelling, instead of searching for a wall port everywhere you go.When charging the device from public charging ports or others laptops, there is a chance of unauthorized access to your personal data, photos, important information and a lot more.This video shows how hackers can put your device at risk when charging via public charging ports.MuConnect’s fast charging mode protects your device from data theft and malware installations, as it disables data sync. You can now safely charge your devices anywhere when you are on the go. With MuConnect, connect your charger magnetically to your device with ease. No pointless fiddling. 
Easy plug and easy detach helps reduce stress on your cables and mobile charging sockets to a great extent - thus preventing frayed cables and loose sockets.
*NOTE: There has been a change in the switch design of MuConnect. Below you can see the new design where the switch has been shifted to a vertical position from the original horizontal placement. This has also has increased the overall size of the product to 21 mm length and 10 mm in width. 
INTRODUCING MuCONNECT ZERO
MuConnect Zero is a lite version of the MuConnect Pro. Zero has all of the PRO features other than the Fast Charging and Data Protection. Zero has been designed for the not so heavy mobile users.At the core of Zero is its Easy Plug/Detach feature making charging a lot of fun and easier. It also helps in protecting your sockets from damage, prevents dust and water entry, you also no longer need to worry about frayed cable or tripping over cables and damaging your phone, cables.


 Watch Zero's Demo Video




MuConnect is featured in :                            

                                                                                


1. Insert the Pin into your phone charging socket .
2. Fix the Connector into your charging cable. 
3. Bring the Connector near the Pin. It aligns and charges away!

*Please note- The parts you see here are 3D printed prototypes. The finished products will have a better shine and dimensional accuracy.
Slide the button to navigate between fast charging mode and data sync mode.


MuConnect is for everyone who uses a mobile device, whether you are an iPhone or an Android user.





Reversible Micro USB (Android and Windows devices)
Smart and Faster Charging

LED Indicator (Easily locate your charger in the dark)

At a glance 

 MuConnect can be used for any devices with a micro USB or a lightning port


            
In addition to all these features, we took every care to make MuConnect unobtrusive so that it can be seamlessly integrated into your everyday life. Its small and elegant design can be accommodated in any of your custom phone cases and be connected to all your favorite chargers. You don't have to give up any of your favorite accessories to use MuConnect.
Dimensions :



NOTE: A survey will also be sent after the campaign ends where you can choose if you want the micro USB (Android) or the lightning(Apple) version.









How we will use your funds -  


We want to bring MuConnect to you so that it can make your life a bit more comfortable. But as a new startup, we need your help. With your pledge and support, we will be able to cover our tooling and manufacturing costs which will enable us to make this product a reality and available worldwide.

story:
U2 ADAPTER FACT SHEET
 
Inventor: Mustapha Hydara
Drawings: Jennifer Shockley                                                                         Location: Glendale, Colorado
INVENTION NAME: Universal UNO Lamp Shade Adapter (U2 Adapter)
Product Category Type: Lighting Accessory                                              Usability: Existing UNO Table Lamp, Floor Lamp, Swing Arm, Chandelier and Sconce.                                                                                                                    Mobility Type: Direct application (snap on)
Geographical Usage: Global

 

U2 Adapter is a conceptual design product geared towards eliminating customer’s frustration in trying to convert their existing Uno lamps to fit traditional harp base lamp shades. Uno/Ring base lamp sockets is a standard structure commonly used in Europe and most widely mass lamp manufactures. Stores like Ikea, target, Wal-Mart and other macro table lamp and floor lamp manufactures use UNO sockets.

U2 Adapter is the only product of its kind ever produced to eliminate the frustration by converting any UNO Lamp to accommodate any traditional harp base lamp shades. With an easily push on snap adapter, customers can use any harp base shade without taking the lamp to a repair shop to change the socket and fit in a saddle.

Repair or conversation of an Uno based socket to a harp base socket may cost customers from $25 to $40. Most customers can't understand the logic of buying the whole lamp of $30 just to convert the socket to fit with a harp base socket to cost that much. They eventually trash their lamp or go ahead and buy the same lamp shade again and again.

U2 Adapter is the only invention in the market to ease customer’s preference to instantly convert the UNO shade socket to fit any standard harp base socket.

Market projection:
Research shows a growing trend of UNO lamps ranging from modern to contemporary designs significantly growing 10% faster than traditional socket base. It is projected that by 2016, the number will raise to 20% when markets like India and Latin American countries adopt the home décor template of table and floor lamps in their home décor set ups.

All lighting stores, lamp shade stores, appliance stores, UNO lamp manufactures and light manufactures will be highly interested to add U2 adapters to their inventory as an add-on item to give customers the flexibility to use any lamp shade of their choice. As a champion product, its value will stay as long as traditional, vintage, modern and contemporary lamp styles exist.


Saddle Slot
The U2 adapter has two parallel slots that is attached to the adapter shaft. The slots enable the standard lamp harp of any size to rest/fit in the slot firmly to avoid or minimize wobbling.

Switch Wedge
The switch wedge on the U2 adapter is the only UNO fitting that allows a direct sleeve to pass over the lamp switch knob for easy on/off switching. The U2 adapter is versatile to mount on any uno switch for quick conversation to fit a shade of your choice.

Saddle Bracket
The bracket is the link between the saddle slot and the adapter shaft and the bracket comes in two styles; horizontal and vertical bracket. See sample pictures.

Adapter Shaft
The adapter shaft is the outer pocket cell of the U2 adapter. It acts as a support for rigid mounting on any UNO socket.

 

Briefly describe your campaign and why it’s important to you?The intention of this campaign is to get the U2 Adapter on store shelves all across
the nation and around the world so customers can be flexible to the array of
traditional lamp shades available in the market. Because I am a lighting professional, I have seen numerous occasions where customers say they have had a lamp for 4 generations but now they cannot find any lamp shade that will fit because of the UNO/Ring socket. Some customers complain about the high cost of repair to convert the UNO socket to a traditional socket at repair shops.

Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Contributions will help the implementation of the U2 Adapter production,
packaging, marketing and distribution. As a start up inventor for this product,
I am hoping to eliminate the dilemma of the UNO lamp shade conversation and lack of options for UNO lamp shades in the market. 

As an immigrant naturalized US Citizen, I want to contribute to the economy by inventing a one of a kind product that can be used globally. I can only do this with
your sincere help. Without your contribution; there is no way to get the
product to the population.

Describe where the funds go if you don’t reach your entire goal.

Your contribution is intended for the manufacturing, distribution and marketing
of the U2 Adapter with a vision to be a product MADE IN AMERICA. I am optimistic that the U2 Adapter will be any lamp owner's desirable product and if for some reason I can’t reach the goal, the funds contributed will be used for patenting and
product licensing and will still go to the production of the U2 Adapter but the manufacturing will be outsourced.

Why the U2 Adapter is valuable?

As of this date there is no other invention of this kind with a quick conversion that works with all UNO shades and UNO lamps to easily adapt with any traditional lamp shade.

As a professional lighting salesman, I realize the need for an UNO lamp shade adapter and that led to the creation of U2 Adapter. The U2 Adapter will salvage lots of UNO lamps that will end up in our landfills because customer can’t afford or don’t want to pay cost for repair/conversion.

 

                                 U2 Adapter main frame Brush Nickel Finish

                                     U2 Adapter main frame Bronze Finish

                           U2 Adapter main frame Gold Finish

                            U2 Adapter main frame Side View

                                    U2 Adapter Upright View with harp

                                     U2 Adapter with a harp Mount Side View

                                        U2 Adapter Harp Upright View

                                    U2 Adapter Harp Side view

story:
The Lightest & Smallest GaN Fast Charger

Equipped with 4 ports, the 65W GaN PD Fast Charger has ergonomic design and saves up 50% space for you. Only 165g, half the weight of a roll of toilet paper

3 USB-C & 1 USB Port

With the popularity, high frequency use, more and more devices come with Type-C charging, adhering of the design concept of All in One, we put 3 USB-C(Type-C)  and USB-A ports in this little cube charger.

Charge Smartly with Efficiency

Charge 50% within 30 min for iPhone X, the UGREEN 65W GaN PD Charger features fast charging for iPhone, iPad Pro 2020, Nintendo Switch and AirPods at the same time. The intelligent power management delivers optimal charging power to fast charge your devices.

Designed for Apple Fans

Only one charger to meet all i-devices for Apple Fans; The 65W charger is able to handle the devices such as MacBook Air 2020, iPad Pro, iPhone 11 Pro, AirPods Pro and Apple Watch etc.

One for All

The UGREEN charger is able to charge almost every kind of digital devices, and supports nearly all the Fast Charging Protocols, (PD 3.0/2.0, QC 4.0/3.0/2.0, AFC, FCP, SCP, SFCP) makes sure your devices being charged with 3-times better efficiently. One charger for your work and casual life.

Revolutionary GaN Tech

To achieve all above, we applied the latest GaN semiconductor material to the charger, which allows power components to work under higher voltage and more frequent switches, hence to boost up the charging efficiency with even smaller design.


More Functions in A Smaller Products

The GaN technology makes it possible to fast-charge 4 devices, meeting multiple needs of all family members. Only half the size of poker. The best choice to replace the bulky laptop wall charger; Ideal for creators, designers, students or all consumers who use multiple electronic devices

World's First 93.48% Efficiency of AD/DC

UGREEN generates much less heat than others, and compared to other PD charger, its AD/DC efficiency is 93.48％. As shown in the picture, UGREEN's output power is 66.316W（20.405V * 3.25A） when input power is 70.94W, 66.316W / 70.94W = 93.48％

Safe Charging

So many electronic components are densely packed in a small cube, so there is indeed a concern about heat generation and emission in such a small space.
Therefore, when charging the 15-inch MacBook Pro from 0% to 100% battery level, we measured 30 points of the UGREEN charger. The temperature of the internal components does not exceed80ºC, and the temperature of the external housing does not exceed 50ºC, which is in a leading position in the entire industry. -Standards are 130ºC and 65ºC respectively.

Essential for Travel/Office/Home

One charger solves all the troubles. No need to bring multiple charging adapters when travelling; No worries about the large size of the traditional multi-port charger, which is not convenient for carrying.

 

Work easily, no longer need to equip each device with a different charger, make the desktop clean and tidy, and no longer worry about the cluttered power cord and the insufficient socket.

Designed for your ideal life, spend a good time with your family, no longer dispute about who's in charge.

A Great Fit for Worldwide

The  charger fits all Britain, US（foldable charger） and EU standards, making it available in every corner of the world. It also supports voltage from 110V to 240V even in its foldable design. For specialists around the world, UGREEN GaN Fast Charger can meet all your needs.

Protocols: C1 / C2: PPS / PD3.0 / PD2.0 / QC4 + / QC4 / QC3.0 / QC2.0 / AFC / FCP / SCP / PE2.0 / PE1.1 / SFCP / support BC1.2 DCP mode certifications: FCC, UL, PSE, CE, RoHS

Sophisticated Design

1. GaN high frequency power controller: SC1936 from PI, built in Gallium Nitride Metal Oxide Semiconductor, improves the efficiency, consume less power, integrates with power control circuit, clean and tidy; De-rating design, secure and reliable;
2. Fast recovery bridge rectifier stack: reduces the cost of EMI, complaint with EMC standards
3. Low RDSon: sync with the Metal Oxide Semiconductor, efficient, low temperature with stress de-rating design, secure & reliable;
4. 3 USB C &1 USB A layout: intelligent power management, with a max 65W power output. Suits for fast charging for phone, tablet, Nintendo Switch, laptops;New devices coming with Type C charging port, the USB-A port for old device for the transition period;
5. PC+ABS Anti-burning casing: 94V-0 rating;
6. High density insulation sheet: isolated the primary voltage against the secondary voltage, ensure product application security;
7. Copper radiator: high thermal conductivity, efficient heat dissipation for components, meet the thermal stress reliability requirement;
8. Foldable prongs: tiny to fit in the bag, avoid the scratch for other items;
9. High voltage electrolytic capacitor: store energy, coupling signals,  bypassing low-frequency signals;
10. High frequency transformer: transform the AC mains to low voltage direct current, power supply for your devices;
11. Solid capacitor: store energy, coupling signals, bypassing low frequency, offer low ripple DC for output;

Specifications

REWARDS

About UGREEN

Product Update

UGREEN All in One 65W 4Port 3C1A GaN PD Fast Charger begins to be mass-produced. As the official team of global digital accessories brand, we honor our brand, cherish the relationship with our customers, and promises to guarantee delivery. And you can get our worry-free 18month warranty from the day when you receive the charger. Besides, UGREEN provides high quality product and service guarantee, you will always have our back.
