story:
• Dropped calls, slow data, and constantly needing to recharge are the biggest annoyance for iPhone owners.
  • All are caused by a weak signal.
  • When your phone has to constantly search for a signal, this slows performance and drains your battery.
  • Our new Firefly iPhone Case with patented Super Antenna Technology built right in solves this problem!
  • This results in improved cellular, WiFi, AND Bluetooth connectivity.
  • The Firefly is also incredibly shock absorbent — no more broken screens, even from a 12-foot drop onto concrete!
  • Compared to comparably priced iPhone cases, the Firefly does MUCH more.
  • Available for the iPhone 6, 6s, 7, 8, X, and all Plus models.

 

We've built our patented new Super Antenna Technology right into the Firefly case, so dropped calls, slow data, and constantly having to charge your battery are things of the past!


We believe that a better connection makes the world a better (and safer) place, in so many ways.

You'll enjoy flawless FaceTime calls, enhanced gaming, interruption-free streaming, and fast load times with your favorite apps, thanks to improved data speed with the Firefly case.

Plus with enhanced data speed your phone's GPS will work better, so you can safely go farther and stay connected on your next road trip, beach vacation, or hiking adventure.

As you can see from this speed test, the FireFly iPhone Case increases your data speeds dramatically! 


We tried out an iPhone with no Firefly case on it and got only 1 bar, resulting in poor connection, a constantly drained battery, and dropped calls. Then we put on the Firefly case, reset the connection, and instantly improved the signal to a solid 2 bars!

 

 
A number of factors went into enabling the Firefly iPhone Case to help your iPhone get better reception.

This chart shows how our technology improves your reception in three important ways:

 

Firefly is essentially a super antenna that captures your phone's energy and re-radiates with the most optimal coverage pattern. The measured data below details this pattern with a peak gain of 4+dBi. It is of our base antenna element in free space at port 1. The testing was certified by MET Laboratories, Inc.

You just can't stick something on your phone and claim to improve signal reception. The antennas in your phone are inherently narrowband, which means they cover a specific frequency pipeline.

The problem is that narrowband antennas can be sensitive to detuning.  Remember Antenna Gate for the iPhone 4? The end user's hand shifted the phone's frequency, which induced loss of connectivity. The bumper add-on was a loading solution to minimize the detuning from the frequency shift.

Since Firefly is a broadband and frequency diverse solution, we essentially eliminate detuning issues!


We all know the pain of a dropped iPhone, don't we! It's not fun, but unfortunately it happens all too often.

The Firefly case frame itself, however, is more than just a sleek home for the signal enhancing antenna. Its WavGEL inner liner absorbs kinetic energy and is built into a shock-absorbing TPU for reinforced 12-foot drop protection (phone + screen). Its corners are reinforced for extra protection, too.

All this state-of-the-art protection keeps your iPhone and its screen incredibly secure!

 

Here you can see an iPhone in a Firefly case being dropped from a 12-foot ladder onto a concrete floor....


 And here it gets thrown against a brick wall....


The iPhone in its sturdy Firefly case comes through with flying colors, even when subjected to the dreaded ninja throw!


But we didn’t stop there. We knew the case had to look as great as it protects, and as well as our technology performs. So we decided to add a luminescent outer layer to the frame that provides a soft glow in the dark. That's why it's called the Firefly!

 

 

The WavStand allows you to prop up your phone either vertically or horizontally, which is great for when you want to have a hands-off conversation on speakerphone or watch a streaming movie.

It folds flat and is magnetic, which comes in very handy for attaching your phone to the fridge or other metallic surface:


The WavStand is included with several of the rewards, listed on the right and in the chart below.

 Another reward bonus is our tempered glass screen protector:

In some ways, he shouldn’t even be here, much less be creating pioneering antenna solutions. During WWII, when he was a small child, my dad lost his mom when she shielded him with her body during a bombing raid. Eventually, he became a refugee.

He emigrated to the USA and went on to earn both his Master’s degree and his Ph.D. in Aeronomy (atmospheric physics). During these early years, he developed a reputation for solving problems associated with communications systems in the Defense and Aerospace sectors.

Many of the solutions he contributed to are still used to this day in service of our country, like the Patriot Missile, a defensive missile with a radar component that helps protect soldiers and civilians. 

Fast forward to now. My father's new invention is the ultimate MIMO broadband solution and covers any frequency of interest in a small form factor. This makes it a perfect fit to help cure the "can you hear me now?" disease that plagues everyone.

After extensive lab testing and field testing across highways and remote areas, we successfully demonstrated our working prototypes to established retailers. 

When comparing the Firefly Case to traditional big store brands it is easy to see that for about the same price the Firefly not only provides a high level of protection, but also ads a lot more value by improving your phones overall performance.

I am asking for your support to so that we can bring this game-changing technology to the masses and to help honor my father. My father believes that a connected world is a safer world. All his life, he has gone farther with the purpose of doing good. So this is where we are, at the climax of his story.

We will use the Kickstarter funds to continue to expand our product line, help pay for custom tooling, stock raw materials, hire skilled labor, and help solve signal problems once and for all.

Together, we can make the dream of a better, more connected world come true, with an iPhone case that improves our own wireless connection.

 

 

 

Choose one of the rewards over on the right and fill out your info to become a backer, helping us bring this innovative new technology to market. To say thank you, we offer a low introductory price and make sure you as a Kickstarter backer get a Firefly before anyone else!

Not only do we want to reward you for backing the Firefly iPhone Case, but we also want to be certain you receive your reward when promised.

We are so confident that we’re going to deliver your Firefly on time and as promised that if we don’t, we’ll refund 100% of your initial pledge. Such guarantees are rare in crowdfunding, but we are doing it to make your decision to pledge that much easier.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

What unique challenges might we face after our project is successfully funded?

For the most part, our Defense and Aerospace experience mitigate any development risks. We have already engineered through any potential barriers as demonstrated in our working case prototypes for the iPhone 6/6s, 7/8 and iPhone Plus 6, 7, 8 models.

It should be noted that our current development for the unnamed wireless carrier (because of NDA) provides us incredible insight and information because wireless operators are the primary market drivers.

We have top tier consultants with industrial design and micro radio experience on standby to help us maximize and perfect the first go-to-market iterations for the iPhone 6/6s, 7/8 and iPhone Plus 6, 7, 8.

We are so confident that we will deliver your Firefly on time and as promised that if we do not we will refund 100% of your initial pledge.

We are excited to be launching on Kickstarter and even more excited to get Firefly in your hands and on your phone, to fulfill my father’s dream to better the world with better wireless connectivity. With your support, I know we can do it! Thank you.
story_txt:
Firefly iPhone Case for iPhone 6/6s, 7/8, X and iPhone 6/6s/7/8 Plus
 

 


Dropped calls, slow data, and constantly needing to recharge are the biggest annoyance for iPhone owners.
All are caused by a weak signal.
When your phone has to constantly search for a signal, this slows performance and drains your battery.
Our new Firefly iPhone Case with patented Super Antenna Technology built right in solves this problem!
This results in improved cellular, WiFi, AND Bluetooth connectivity.
The Firefly is also incredibly shock absorbent — no more broken screens, even from a 12-foot drop onto concrete!
Compared to comparably priced iPhone cases, the Firefly does MUCH more.
Available for the iPhone 6, 6s, 7, 8, X, and all Plus models.


 

Firefly is the world’s first iPhone case that not only protects your phone, but improves your global cellular, WiFi, and Bluetooth signals, which help save battery power at the same time.
We've built our patented new Super Antenna Technology right into the Firefly case, so dropped calls, slow data, and constantly having to charge your battery are things of the past!

Maybe you want an improved signal in your home, so you don’t have to worry about dead spots and dropping calls? Or perhaps you are tired of being “that guy” on the conference call with a bad connection….

story:
ECLIPSE Marble Edition is available in Black Aluminum | Black Marble, and Gold Aluminum | White Marble.

 

Not sure what electrical plug type you need? Check out the list of electrical plugs by country. If ECLIPSE isn't available with your country's plug type, don't worry! It's 110-240V, so you can always use an adapter.

 

 

 

 

 

Armed with this information, we went against the status quo. Instead of tons of USB ports, which only adds to our cable frustrations, we stuck to the essentials.Think you need more? Think again. How often do you charge more than 3 devices at the same time?

 

Furthermore, there are different standards competing with each other (Qi, PMA, etc.) making this market still really niche. We decided that it was not worth increasing the total price and size of ECLIPSE by adding a wireless charging coil that would only benefit a limited number of users. However, ECLIPSE works with most wireless charging devices. It's flat wooden top will be the perfect support for any charging mat.
story_txt:
Now Shipping - Buy ECLIPSE Today on the Indiegogo Marketplace!
 
 
 ECLIPSE is available in Taupe | Walnut Wood, and Marine | Cherry Wood.ECLIPSE Marble Edition is available in Black Aluminum | Black Marble, and Gold Aluminum | White Marble. ECLIPSE is available with a Type A/B, Type C/E/F/J/L, Type G, or Type I electrical plug. Not sure what electrical plug type you need? Check out the list of electrical plugs by country. If ECLIPSE isn't available with your country's plug type, don't worry! It's 110-240V, so you can always use an adapter. 

 
 
We rely on our tech more and more every day, but all these devices need charging. This means more cables – cables that quickly get chaotic.
 

ECLIPSE is the only USB charging hub you won’t want to hide away. With its compact and round design, it can live on your nightstand, desk, and even your wall using the included wall mount.
 

Up to three of your USB cables are wound into their own precision-engineered channel, so you’ll never have to worry about them tangling or overlapping. 
 

We designed ECLIPSE to be as user-friendly as possible, so you can use the cables you already own (up to 8 feet).
 

Since your cables are safe and secure in ECLIPSE, they’ll be out of the way from everyday dangers like people tripping on them, rolling chairs, playful cats, and cable thieves (you know who you are).
 

Cable boxes and charging stations just hide your mess of cables and force you to untangle them before charging. With ECLIPSE, you can access your cables and unwind them to their maximum length easily and without frustration.
 

ECLIPSE comes with a braided power cable, essentially extending each of your charging cables by an extra 4 feet.
 

ECLIPSE exists to get rid of cable clutter, that's why the power cable comes with a genuine leather strap. If you don't need a full 4 feet for your power cable, just wrap it up and keep things neat.
 

Now you only need one power socket for your daily charging needs. 
 

Unlike a lot of underpowered USB hubs out there, ECLIPSE uses smart IC technology to ensure that your devices are always charging at their maximum speed (up to 2.4A, and 3A via USB-C).
 

Always ahead of the curve? We hear you. For the early adopters among you, one of ECLIPSE’s USB-A ports can be turned into a USB-C port.
 

Why would you trust a cheap power adapter to charge your expensive tech? ECLIPSE uses an advanced transformer to guarantee safe currents that won’t damage your devices’ batteries in the long term.
 

With a single touch, ECLIPSE rises and emits a subtle halo, so you can forget about fumbling around for your cable in the dark. Tap it once more and its halo fades away - along with your cable frustration.
 

 

About a year ago, we started to work on a new product with the ambition to transform the way we charge at home. After multiple design directions and prototypes, we are now in the final stage of the development. With your support, we will start the certifications process and open tooling to kick off production.
 

 

We did our research. We asked thousands of people and discovered that the average person owns 6 devices, but only charges 2 or 3 devices on a daily basis. 
Armed with this information, we went against the status quo. Instead of tons of USB ports, which only adds to our cable frustrations, we stuck to the essentials.Think you need more? Think again. How often do you charge more than 3 devices at the same time?
 

We have been waiting for wireless charging to become the norm for years now, but the reality is, we're still very much in the cable era. Current technologies require a charging mat or puck that still needs a USB cable to be plugged into a power source. The charging speed is slower, and you can't comfortably use your mobile device while it charges because it needs direct contact with the mat.
Furthermore, there are different standards competing with each other (Qi, PMA, etc.) making this market still really niche. We decided that it was not worth increasing the total price and size of ECLIPSE by adding a wireless charging coil that would only benefit a limited number of users. However, ECLIPSE works with most wireless charging devices. It's flat wooden top will be the perfect support for any charging mat.
 

 

NATIVE UNION was born out of a shared passion for good design and well-made products. By combining the finest materials, functional design, and considered details, we create products with personality, that enhance the way you live with your tech. 
 

Want to write about ECLIPSE? Download our Press Pack!

story:
Short Summary

Get the app on Android or iOS here!

Nothing is more powerful than prayer. 

Prayer moves mountains, changes hearts, and by God's grace saves souls.

And in the Catholic Church, we have a rich treasury of approved prayers, including novenas. Novenas are a devotion where, typically for nine days, you request the intercession of a particular saint, for a specific prayer intention.

For centuries Catholics have been praying novenas. Now, we've brought the power of novenas to smart phones with our free app, Pray. But until now, it's only been on iPhone and iPad. 

We want to port it to Android so that thousands more Catholics can join together to move mountains through prayer.

My name is Devin Rose. I'm a Catholic husband and father. I write books to strengthen people in their Catholic faith. And I'm a computer programmer and wrote this novena app, but I need your help to get it to Android.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need several thousand dollars to port the app to Android
  • You will get:
    • Recognition in the app: badge and patron level
    • Exclusive ebooks to strengthen you in your faith
    • Personal coaching in apologetics from yours truly
    • Unlock all the features and bonuses in the app
    • NOTE: iPhone users who back this project get all the perks, just with the Pray app on iOS.
  • Even if we don't reach our goal, the money raised will be used to port the app to Android, and I'll fund the rest from my own pocket

The Impact

  • Imagine tens of thousands of Catholics storming Heaven everyday
  • Imagine Catholics joining together in prayer, "where two or three are gathered..."
  • Imagine spreading devotion to the saints to every family...
  • ...And leading people into the Catholic Church

Risks & Challenges

The risk is that we don't raise much money, and I have to rely on my own funds and time to port the app to Android. That will delay the app's progress for many months, if not for a year or more.

I've completed many large Catholic projects in print, video, media, and with mobile apps, so I am confident I can make this happen, but hiring another developer who could port the app over is the fastest and best way.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the campaign to your friends!
  • Pray for the success of the campaign

Thanks and God bless,
Devin

story:
Brad: Chad, wake up...the auction for the suit of armor is scheduled to end in 10 minutes.

Chad: What time is it?

Brad: It's 3:30am, but based on our research this is the best time to buy! Now get up and get ready to bid.

Chad: Can't we try another night? You know, when it's not so late!

Brad: No, unless you are willing to pay a premium. Don't make me push you out of the bed!

Chad: Fine, I am getting up....but we need to find a better solution in the future.  We have spent way too many late nights trying to win these auctions.

Ah, Brad and Chad's dilemma is a common occurrence. eBay has accrued such a large number of users, that it's nearly impossible to get a steal using their proxy bidding system. In fact, for many, bidding on an item becomes almost an obsession to a point that the buyer will do anything to outbid the next person, including paying a much higher price than they need to pay.

You see, the proxy bidding system is a great concept and will work on some things.  But in order to get the best price for an auction, you really need to wait until the final few seconds of an auction to place your bid.  Or find auctions that are ending in the wee hours of the night. The problem is, you need to be sitting in front of your computer at that moment in order to do this. 

Who has the time for this? With work, meetings, soccer practice, sleep and good old family time, most of us basically have a window between 8pm and 11pm to shop on eBay.  Unfortunately, those are the worst times to bid.  I used to buy/sell electronics on eBay, and over the course of time I realized I would sell my products for much higher prices if I ended the auctions at 11pm eastern on Tuesday nights.  Why? Because I get East Coast and West Coast buyers at home during their only moments to bid on products that they wanted.

Mobile eBay Sniping App

What is eBay sniping? Good question.  Sniping allows an eBay buyer to use a third party application to place a bid for them typically in the final 5 seconds of an auction, thereby giving other bidders virtually no time to increase their bid.  It also avoids the possibility of getting into a bidding war with other bidders and paying more than needed.

Other advantages include:
  * Not having to sit at your computer when the auction is ending
  * More reliability because the third party has a faster internet connection
  * Ability to bid on auctions at odd times of the day
  * Generally resulting in paying less for an item

The Winning Bid!

The Winning Bid will be the premier eBay auction sniping mobile application out there. Built with a highly intuitive graphical interface for the iPhone, iPod and iPad along with a dedicated back-end web system. Users will manage all of their sniping activity directly from their IOS device. The application will then communicate with our web servers to store the sniping information.  When the auction is coming to a close, our technology will automatically place a bid for the item.  Push notifications will then be used in the app itself to notify the user if the snipe was successful or not.

The application will appeal to a large audience of eBayers, from those that purchase a couple times a year right through to those that are purchasing 10s if not 100s of items per month. The Winning Bid, will be the winning solution when it comes to your eBay buying needs.

What will the funds be used for?

At this point we have raised the funds for the backend database and some of the funds for the application itself.  The funds raised here will strictly go towards the creation of the iPhone/iPad application.

story:
OMG! Wait, it can do WHAT?!  You heard right. This magical machine can crop any of your photos and magazines and transform it into your personally decorated iPhone 5 Case. Yes, even *those* photos. That crazy one, where you met Lady Gaga backstage. Relive that moment by turning it into your personalized iPhone case OR better yet, use your own amazing vacation photos. The look of your phone is unlimited, inspired by what you can think of.
Powerful! Here's what you can really use it for. Imagine, having the ability to change the design of your iPhone everyday, without even leaving the house. Your friends will think you have 1000's of cases. A new one everyday.
Here's some ideas. Change your style everyday to match your outfit. Crop out that Burberry pattern from the magazine. Show off your Green Bay Packers loyalty. Make a case with your family photos and your adventure trip to Cancun. Use a print of your favorite Bieber Instagram photo, or not. You take it from there. Show off and get noticed.
What's in the box. The Case Maker Pro Kit comes with the Case Maker Pro photo cropper, a polycarbonate crystal clear Pro Case, and a number of optional lamination films.

Case Maker Pro. The Case Maker itself is stainless steel. The 14 multi-angle blades are fully enclosed for safely cutting with precision. The precision camera hole, radial corner edges, and full glorious body image is sliced in one single powerful motion. The top cover comes in a combined finish of high gloss polish with matte texture design accents. Ultra durable construction ready for repeated use.

Pro Case. The included Protection Case is a dual injection polycarbonate with a high grade silicon corner protector edge and a slim low profile grip. Maximized crystal clear transparency to vividly display the colorful graphic underneath. New side transparency walls shows your iPhones original metal edges.

Laminators. The lamination films are machine laser cut to perfectly fit with the case and your newly cut graphic. An exact formula of stickiness has been applied to one side so it sticks to your graphic cut out. This doubles the thickness of your photo and gives it a gloss shine while protecting your new masterpiece. It helps it look awesome.
Our Design Story.

Like most ideas, the concept sparked at the strangest moment. I was cleaning my attic, where I've collected a ton of comic books, magazines, and personal photos left in dusty shoeboxes. Laughing and enjoying these photos made me realize that I wanted all these photos to be with me everyday as part of my daily life. They simply gave me a happy kick. One way, I could lug around these photos in my wallet at all times. Then it hit, a better idea, I could cut and carry all these photos in my phone case, at the same time decorating the phone and laughing at these photos everyday.

After talking to a bunch of friends, everyone said they had their own personal photo and magazine collection and would totally get the same happy kick from using something like that. Expanding on that, we discovered the freedom to cut any image that we owned, our favorite is magazine covers, and turn it into an artistically expressive phone case. Thrilled by the overwhelming interest and excited to bring this concept to as many people as possible, my company and I started on this development adventure.
Our Manufacturing Process.

Patented. The design and utility of the Case Maker Pro has been patented worldwide. This allows IndieGoGos to be the first with the special ability to infinitely create 1000's of the own Smart Phone cases at home.

Go Green, One Product can Save the Earth's Resources.
If you care about the earth like we do, this will totally thrill you. The Case Maker can save Mother Earth's natural resources. Seriously, realize the eco-power in your hand. You will never need to buy another case again. That means, if enough humans used the Case Maker we could physically the save the earth and her natural resources. Consider the billions of people with smart phones. Overseas factories are producing multiple billions cases in every combination of Color x Style x Phone model x Phone manufacturer. This is to keep up with consumer demand.
Now the scary part, the overseas factories guesses what images they think you want on your case. So the Factories produce these billions of cases with tons of ABS and PVC plastic injection raw materials, color dyes and polluting the air. The cases are then assembled and shipped via cargo boats, planes, and trains consuming ungodly tons of crude oil to reach their final destination. The Final Desitination? ...a retail store where, no one likes the case's design, and where the unsold cases wait to die. It's like the phone case version of Toy Story. Tons of wasted resources, simply because the consumer did not like the picture.
If we stop and think about it, Case Maker can help to solve the world wide waste problem by simply creating your own case design, and using the case that you designed for yourselves. Let's do our part to save our Earth and at the same time enjoy the images that make us happy.

We are passionate about this project, hopefully it shows from our continuous investment with our own savings in getting the project to this production ready stage.
Now we need your help. Pledges will be directly utilized for development, mass production, and delivery - immediately to our new indieGoGo friends. We'll make your stuff and get it to you right away. Thanks for your support. You are main reason that turned CaseMaker Pro Kit into a reality.
You can help by selecting your favorite Perk Pack. The $49 Black Gloss Pack is the Most Popular!

story:
Real Life Stories

Chris bought a new 3D LCD TV after saving money for many months and was very happy. A year down the track there was some quality issues with the new TV. He knew this problem would be covered by warranty. He started looking for the receipt, found it but it had faded. He went back to the store but they couldn't find this item in their system. Without an invoice they refused to do anything....he had to buy a new TV for $900.

Irina went to shopping and found a great shoe shop. She liked quite a few, so she bought a few with an option to return in 15 days. After 10 days when she thought of returning the extra pair of shoes to get a refund of $150 ..... but she could not find the invoice.

Samantha and John had built their home with lot of effort and hard earned money. One day there was a burglary in their house and lot of valuables were stolen. They had content insurance but got a massive shock when the insurer asked for invoice or photo of the items stolen. They could not find most.... and lost more than $4k even after getting $10k from insurance.

On hearing of the above incidents, I started thinking, what do we do with receipts and invoices?

I have done different things:

- filed them but found the receipt was faded

- thrown them away and regretted later when I needed

- put them in a safe place and quite often didn't find it afterwards

- taken photos and stored in Google docs and Dropbox, but could not find it in the maze of different stuff stored

These solutions worked sometimes but non of them are perfect, simple and easy.

A Simple and Secure Solution - CHAMBU

This is when the concept of CHAMBU was thought of.  Chambu is a simple and smart application, which takes the guesswork out of finding your invoice or warranty when you really need it.

Saving you dollars, time and effort:

Chambu is accessible 24/7. It is easy and reduces hassles at critical times as you don’t have to search through piles of paper. And importantly, it saves you money by finding those critical bits of paper and photos when you need it.

It works in 3 easy steps:

Click- Use your mobile to simply take a photo of your warranty or invoice immediately after your latest purchase before it gets lost or thrown away

Record- Using our simple mobile app upload the photo with the relevant information and we’ll safely store it on our cloud server

Retrieve- Instantly retrieve the details when required and download the copy of invoice to be printed or shared directly

Prototype Available

We have built the prototype version for Apple and Android. You may download this app to view, use and provide us feedback.

Apple App Store ( iphone & ipad)

https://itunes.apple.com/au/app/chambu/id641941955

Google Play Store ( Andriod):

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

About me

I am Sid. I am passionate about innovative and new ideas which address people's real need. I have helped people with their ideas in converting models from concept to reality. However, whenever I pursue something or help someone it is always paramount that it addresses some need and makes a real difference to people.

The snippets mentioned above are real stories. These people lost the items, valuables, collectibles or simply a right to return or exchange. For a lack of easy and simple way to store! Some of the losses were irreplaceable, some very hard earned money. I was disappointed on hearing these but I was thinking how can I help them. Why we don't have simple to store and easy to retrieve solution?

When you contribute to CHAMBU, you contribute to benefitting ordinary people, like you and me. You are helping convert a prototype to reality. You are helping create a simple to store and easy to retrieve solution. You are helping create something that makes life easy for people, reduces hassles and benefits them.

We now need to get this app built such that it has all the features, is still simple to use, has cloud backup and quick retrieval. This requires about $12,500.

story:
iCare Connect

by HomeActive

A smart bracelet that anyone can wear to plan and track their daily health activities.

It is a stand alone device that connects directly to the cellular data network. Data from sensors in the bracelet is sent to a secure web dashboard. The wearer can monitor their progress, and family can check in on the status of their loved ones.

A new and essential connection between people aging in home and their caregivers.

How it works and why.

Input a simple plan on a web dashboard, based on your personal situation. Select from a menu of items related to common chronic health conditions. Simple events – like getting out of the bed in the morning, taking medications, and measuring vital signs.

Sensors on the bracelet track the detailed spatial and temporal vectors of the bracelet. Motion estimation algorithms detect planned events like eating or taking pills, around the scheduled time.

Messages are displayed for quick single button confirmation on the bracelet. Medication? Yes. Caregivers can message directly to the bracelet. You OK? Yes.

When vital sign measurements are taken from a bluetooth enabled device, like a glucometer, blood pressure cuff, or weight scale, the bracelet automatically collects the data and reports it to the dashboard.

Advanced dashboard settings let caregivers set thresholds for alerts, based on vital signs or detection of negative events like a fall, or period of inactivity. Alerts are sent to the bracelet and the caregiver.

Caregivers can participate in the daily routine of their loved ones aging in home with a chronic health condition, when they are not able to be physically present.

It is probably for you, or someone you know.

Half the adults in the US have a chronic condition. 50 million of us provide care to a loved one. Chances are you know someone or have heard a story of something missed and an avoidable event. We can solve this through technology.

It can happen now.

Extend care into the home. It’s a gap in the system. Together we can make this happen, now. If everyone that sees it backs it, innovation will emerge from this crowd source.

Deliver a new tool for people to take control of their health and the health of their loved ones. Our first product delivers the essentials. The analytics architecture we are building in the cloud will someday predict events in advance. So we can react even sooner.

Rewards for our contributors.

The Promise Band. Comes in two colors, stretchy rubber. Pick one or get the pair. Its a proxy for the real connection the product will provide and a nice expression.

 

Our Status.

This is our hardware prototype. It has a machine-to-machine (M2M) module development board, an ultra low power bluetooth processor with sensors development board, an oled development breakout board, a serial protocol generator and protocol analyzer, to name a few. Dr. Hartung is a little freaked out, but we decided to show it.

Most of these components will be integrated into a single custom printed circuit board about an inch long. We have a close design specification, we know where everything goes. Dr. Hartung is uniquely familiar and experienced with this step. It is a challenging process, and hard to replicate, thus the picture. The result will be a custom mechanism similar to our CAD designs and renderings.


Fund the project. Watch it happen. We will post pictures along the way.

Project Plan

We have a clear end goal for our project - produce the perfect prototype of the iCare Connect bracelet. No small task. We break it down into two big steps.

$75,000 Goal: PHYSICAL PROTOTYPE

Make the form factor perfect. Measure twice. Cut once. We are 3D printing versions of the bracelet mechanism and band designs. Tweaking little things like:

  • mechanism curvature
  • anatomical conformity
  • simple durable clasp
  • button tactile response
  • water resistance
  • materials selection

Little things that make a big difference in aesthetics, comfort, usability and overall appeal.

$150,000 Stretch Goal: ELECTRONIC PROTOTYPE

Integrate the components. This is innovative hardware design. Making everything fit into the lightest, thinnest full featured device on the market. Elements of this stage include:

  • design and print custom circuit board
  • alignment, balance, center of mass
  • hardening for durability
  • display luminance
  • haptic motor vibration

For seamless functionality, simple navigation and a stand alone device in a package smaller than anything on the market.

If we can meet our stretch goal, we can pursue the projects in parallel and the product gets to market faster.


And then what ?

Before we go commercial, we have some work to do.

Software development. Perfect prototypes need perfect software. Our feature set is well defined and we understand the scope and resources required to deliver on the specification. We have built enterprise class software many times, for many products.

Run it by the pros. We are partnering with a nursing organization affiliated with a top 20 hospital to run trials to test usability and effectiveness in improving patient adherence to planned activities and caregiver intervention; and a F500 pharmacy chain to trial with a portion of their customers.

Get the right approvals. It's not a medical device, its a consumer communication tool. The data must be safe. No problem, we know encryption. We've been through FCC and CE before.

Offer it to you. You backed it. Thank you.

And then...

Change the world for the better. We are doing this for a lot of reasons. Personal, business and to solve a big problem.

Solve the care gap. Cover the 'last mile' of largely ignored or unaffordable extension of remote monitoring into the home.

Move forward, and we have big plans. Think predictive diagnostics - as a cloud service - where you get a heads up that something may happen before it happens. So you can react and stay healthy.

Create a new future of remote sensors and cloud analytics. And health care. We think it can start here.

Meet The Team


Risks

Our team has brought many innovative hardware and communications products to market. We understand the challenges and have been through it. We have spent many years in some way preparing for this product.

There are always challenges. We believe we have reduced the risks down to a set of manageable tasks, and can execute our plan. Still, things can happen along the way to completing a perfect prototype, and we are prepared to address them.

Supplier Risks. We have developed a detailed specification and associated bill of materials and have completed a thorough sourcing analysis through familiar large providers we have worked with in the past. Aside from our PCB, these are mostly off-the-shelf components available in high volumes and low lead times.

Hardware Risks. We will employ a familiar design shop and local contract manufacturer we have worked with in the past. The design shop is in New Jersey, and does very high quality work, often for F500 electronics and communications companies. We have worked with the circuit board assembly and production house in the past on highly complex enterprise class designs that have delivered lasting commercial success.

story:
What is Our Bookshelf?

  • Our Bookshelf is a social network where people can share their ebooks as easily as they can share print books. At the moment, most copyrighted ebooks don't allow you to share them. This is because when you buy an ebook you don't own the book the way you own a print book. You own a license to read it on certain devices and most of these licenses prohibit sharing. We plan to create a new license that does allow sharing, but in a way that treats authors and publishers fairly. This is a huge undertaking that your contribution will help make possible. We will start by creating a social network for sharing public domain ebooks. These ebooks are not copyrighted so users can share them freely. A lot of great books are in the public domain, including most classics. True you can find some of them elsewhere, but learning about them through your friends can introduce you to books you might not have known about or overlooked. 
  • Once the site is up and running, we will reach out to authors and publishers to adopt our new licenses that will allow sharing of copyrighted works through our site. Once an author has made an agreement with Our Bookshelf, users may upload copyrighted ebooks by that author onto their virtual bookshelf to share with their friends. Because these files will have no DRM (digital rights management), a user can get a copy of an ebook from a friend and hold onto it for as long as it takes them to finish the book. Although this means users will give non-DRM copies of their ebooks to friends, Our Bookshelf will do 3 things that will prevent copies from multiplying and spreading to the point they become a problem for copyright holders.
  1. Users can only borrow and lend ebooks with friends in their network. This prevents users from giving a copy of an ebook away to everyone who has an internet connection (the way most file sharing methods do).
  2. A user may not borrow a book from a friend’s virtual bookshelf and then place it on their own virtual bookshelf. This will prevent people who did not purchase the ebook, and therefore do not have the right to share it, from making it available to others on Our Bookshelf.
  3. When someone checks out an ebook from your virtual bookshelf nobody can check out that ebook from your bookshelf for 3 weeks. This will prevent one person from giving an ebook to everyone in their network at once. Copyright holders will appreciate this consideration for new releases and popular titles.

             Free to use and rewards for uploading books

  • Our Bookshelf is completely free. Users will also gains points for the number of ebooks they upload, the number of friends in their network, the number of reviews they write, and the number of ebooks checked out from their virtual bookshelf. Users can redeem these points for coupons from participating ebook retailers.

Why is this important?

  • People have shared books for as long as they have read them, but now publishers want to change the rules and prevent you from sharing ebooks. Our Bookshelf will work hard to make sure people can share ebooks as easily as they share print books. By contributing to our campaign you will help us take the important first step needed to accomplish this. Our Bookshelf will also allow authors to promote their work directly to readers, by helping them identify people who have read similar works. 

Who is creating this?

  • My name is Greg Belvedere and I have worked for the past 4 years as an adult librarian at the Brooklyn Public Library. I have served on the library's electronic resource advisory committee which is responsible for evaluating and selecting new electronic media for the library's collection. I have also worked as a freelance information architect creating effective user interfaces for different websites. This experience has given me a strong understanding of the current ebook environment and knowledge of how to create seamless user experiences online. http://www.linkedin.com/pub/greg-belvedere/44/756/330
  • My business partner is Herve de Maulmont. Herve has an MBA from Cambridge University and has run several successful businesses. You can find more information about Herve here http://www.linkedin.com/in/hervedemaulmont


What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $20,000 to create a social network where people can share their public domain ebooks. The site is fairly intricate and will require a well thought out content management system that allows us to verify the copyright status of uploaded ebooks and manage the virtual bookshelves of our users. I have designed the architecture of the site, but I need to hire a skilled development team to actually write the code and do the graphic design (including our logo). We have a great team lined up to do this. Your contribution will help us build Our Bookshelf: A DRM-Free Ebook Sharing Social Network
  • We offer our contributers great incentives. All contributers get an invite to the site when it launches. Contributers at slightly higher levels can get a coffee mug or t-shirt with the Our Bookshelf logo. We have something very special for larger contributions. They will get recognition in the form of a banner or star on their Our Bookshelf profile identifying them as a founding member. This is a great way to let everyone know you helped make Our Bookshelf a reality. Think of it like having a plaque with your name on it in a building you helped fund. Everyone likes to boast that they knew about something first, this will let people know you believed in Our Bookshelf from the beginning.
  • If we do not reach our goal we will still create the first phase of Our Bookshelf, but we will supplement funds raised here with funds we had intended for legal fees arising from the second phase of Our Bookshelf.

The Impact

  • Our Bookshelf will allow people to share ebooks as easily as they share print books, but it will treat copyright holders fairly so they can keep creating. We will give our users something of incredible value by giving them a convenient way to share ebooks with their friends. We will give them even more value by rewarding them for adding content to Our Bookshelf. 
  • Our Bookshelf will allow authors to promote their work directly to readers, by helping them identify people who have read similar works.
  • It is true some ways of sharing ebooks have sprung up in the last few years, but they don't really care about the reader. One model lets a user lend an ebook once for 14 days and after that they can never lend the ebook again. I don't know about you, but when I buy a print book I can lend it to as many people as I wish and they can take as long as they need to read it. We understand the fear publishers have about DRM-free ebooks, but we think they have gone about things the wrong way. We think our method strikes the right balance between the interests of readers and publishers.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We know times are tough. If you like our idea but can't contribute, please tell your friends and family about our campaign. We know that a lot of people wish they had a better way to share ebooks. If you have friends who like ebooks or just like to read, tell them about us. Post a link to facebook or twitter and let your family and friends know about us. They will thank you and so will we.
story_txt:
What is Our Bookshelf?


Our Bookshelf is a social network where people can share their ebooks as easily as they can share print books. At the moment, most copyrighted ebooks don't allow you to share them. This is because when you buy an ebook you don't own the book the way you own a print book. You own a license to read it on certain devices and most of these licenses prohibit sharing. We plan to create a new license that does allow sharing, but in a way that treats authors and publishers fairly. This is a huge undertaking that your contribution will help make possible. We will start by creating a social network for sharing public domain ebooks. These ebooks are not copyrighted so users can share them freely. A lot of great books are in the public domain, including most classics. True you can find some of them elsewhere, but learning about them through your friends can introduce you to books you might not have known about or overlooked. 




Once the site is up and running, we will reach out to authors and publishers to adopt our new licenses that will allow sharing of copyrighted works through our site. Once an author has made an agreement with Our Bookshelf, users may upload copyrighted ebooks by that author onto their virtual bookshelf to share with their friends. Because these files will have no DRM (digital rights management), a user can get a copy of an ebook from a friend and hold onto it for as long as it takes them to finish the book. Although this means users will give non-DRM copies of their ebooks to friends, Our Bookshelf will do 3 things that will prevent copies from multiplying and spreading to the point they become a problem for copyright holders.



Users can only borrow and lend ebooks with friends in their network. This prevents users from giving a copy of an ebook away to everyone who has an internet connection (the way most file sharing methods do).
A user may not borrow a book from a friend’s virtual bookshelf and then place it on their own virtual bookshelf. This will prevent people who did not purchase the ebook, and therefore do not have the right to share it, from making it available to others on Our Bookshelf.
When someone checks out an ebook from your virtual bookshelf nobody can check out that ebook from your bookshelf for 3 weeks. This will prevent one person from giving an ebook to everyone in their network at once. Copyright holders will appreciate this consideration for new releases and popular titles.

             Free to use and rewards for uploading books


Our Bookshelf is completely free. Users will also gains points for the number of ebooks they upload, the number of friends in their network, the number of reviews they write, and the number of ebooks checked out from their virtual bookshelf. Users can redeem these points for coupons from participating ebook retailers.



Why is this important?

People have shared books for as long as they have read them, but now publishers want to change the rules and prevent you from sharing ebooks. Our Bookshelf will work hard to make sure people can share ebooks as easily as they share print books. By contributing to our campaign you will help us take the important first step needed to accomplish this. Our Bookshelf will also allow authors to promote their work directly to readers, by helping them identify people who have read similar works. 


Who is creating this?


My name is Greg Belvedere and I have worked for the past 4 years as an adult librarian at the Brooklyn Public Library. I have served on the library's electronic resource advisory committee which is responsible for evaluating and selecting new electronic media for the library's collection. I have also worked as a freelance information architect creating effective user interfaces for different websites. This experience has given me a strong understanding of the current ebook environment and knowledge of how to create seamless user experiences online. http://www.linkedin.com/pub/greg-belvedere/44/756/330




My business partner is Herve de Maulmont. Herve has an MBA from Cambridge University and has run several successful businesses. You can find more information about Herve here http://www.linkedin.com/in/hervedemaulmont







What We Need & What You Get

We need $20,000 to create a social network where people can share their public domain ebooks. The site is fairly intricate and will require a well thought out content management system that allows us to verify the copyright status of uploaded ebooks and manage the virtual bookshelves of our users. I have designed the architecture of the site, but I need to hire a skilled development team to actually write the code and do the graphic design (including our logo). We have a great team lined up to do this. Your contribution will help us build Our Bookshelf: A DRM-Free Ebook Sharing Social Network


We offer our contributers great incentives. All contributers get an invite to the site when it launches. Contributers at slightly higher levels can get a coffee mug or t-shirt with the Our Bookshelf logo. We have something very special for larger contributions. They will get recognition in the form of a banner or star on their Our Bookshelf profile identifying them as a founding member. This is a great way to let everyone know you helped make Our Bookshelf a reality. Think of it like having a plaque with your name on it in a building you helped fund. Everyone likes to boast that they knew about something first, this will let people know you believed in Our Bookshelf from the beginning.


If we do not reach our goal we will still create the first phase of Our Bookshelf, but we will supplement funds raised here with funds we had intended for legal fees arising from the second phase of Our Bookshelf.



The Impact

Our Bookshelf will allow people to share ebooks as easily as they share print books, but it will treat copyright holders fairly so they can keep creating. We will give our users something of incredible value by giving them a convenient way to share ebooks with their friends. We will give them even more value by rewarding them for adding content to Our Bookshelf. 



Our Bookshelf will allow authors to promote their work directly to readers, by helping them identify people who have read similar works.


It is true some ways of sharing ebooks have sprung up in the last few years, but they don't really care about the reader. One model lets a user lend an ebook once for 14 days and after that they can never lend the ebook again. I don't know about you, but when I buy a print book I can lend it to as many people as I wish and they can take as long as they need to read it. We understand the fear publishers have about DRM-free ebooks, but we think they have gone about things the wrong way. We think our method strikes the right balance between the interests of readers and publishers.

Other Ways You Can Help




We know times are tough. If you like our idea but can't contribute, please tell your friends and family about our campaign. We know that a lot of people wish they had a better way to share ebooks. If you have friends who like ebooks or just like to read, tell them about us. Post a link to facebook or twitter and let your family and friends know about us. They will thank you and so will we.

story:
ONLY 65 HOURS LEFT ON OUR CAMPAIGN AND ASKING FOR A MIRACLE ON THIS INCREDIBLE PRODUCT!  IF YOU HAVE A SMARTPHONE OR TABLET THEN THIS PRODUCT IS FOR YOU!

WATCH OUR MAIN VIDEO, CLICK ON THE GALLERY TAB AND WATCH THE VIDEO THAT COMPARES ONE OF THE PLUGIN CHARGERS IN THE STORES TO OUR ENERGY AND BATTERY SAVING PLUGIN OUTLET...


Has charging your electronic device become a family competition to the empty plug? 

Tired of spending money on phantom electricity?

Help us solve a Universal Problem...

"We're the USB Charging Guys..."

We understand the market and know that millions of people need a solution for charging their electronic devices and help save energy costs at the same time. 

There are millions of people out there who live in apartments, rental properties or just don't want to mess with electricity and replacing wall sockets.  Or they want the freedom to move the charger from room to room or take it to work.  

SUPPORT US IN BRINGING TO MARKET

THE USB SOCK-IT PLUG-IN OUTLET

+ Easy to install

+ The USB chargers use no electricity when the doors are closed

+ Using SMART Technology Circuitry, the outlet measures the requirements of your smartphone or tablet etc. and only gives that amount of power

+It will never overheat your battery

+ When the battery of your electronic device is fully charged our USB chargers turn off

+Never overcharge your batteries again, especially your iPad®/ It's SMART Technology

+Tamper Resistant AC Plugs

+ 3.0 amps of shared charging power, translation, our outlets will charge 2 iPads® or any other electronic device SIMULTANEOUSLY!

EXAMPLE: PLUG IN YOUR iPAD® INTO THE USB CHARGER AND IT MEASURES AND TRANSMITS APPROXIMATELY 2100 MILLI AMPS OF POWER, LEAVING 900 MILLI AMPS AVAILABLE IN SHARED POWER.

NEXT PLUG ANOTHER iPAD® INTO THE REMAINING USB CHARGER. THE OUTLET GIVES THE iPAD® 900 MILLI AMPS OF POWER UNTIL THE FIRST iPAD® FULLY CHARGES. ONCE THAT OCCURS THE CHARGER WITH THE FULLY CHARGED iPAD® SHUTS OFF AND RE-DIRECTS THE REQUIRED POWER TO THE REMAINING iPAD®. NO BABY SITTING IS NECESSARY AS THE OUTLET DOES ALL OF THIS AUTOMATICALLY...

THE TECHNOLOGY IS SO GOOD THAT WHEN YOU HAVE A FULLY CHARGED iPAD® OR TABLET AND TURN THE SCREEN ON, THE OUTLET WILL TURN ON AND TRICKLE CHARGE POWER INTO THE DEVICE WHICH IS DRAWING POWER FROM THE SCREEN BEING TURNED ON...

With Your Help We Can Help Millions Of People Reduce The Frustration Of Charging Devices And Save Them Money On Energy Costs As Well...

HOW THE FUNDS WILL BE INVESTED


  • UL Testing and Certification (The Technology has already been UL certified in the USB Sock-It Replacement Wall Outlet)
  • Lab Testing to Validate the cost savings eliminating phantom electricity
  • Sample Production for Rep Groups and Retail Buyers
  • Packaging Design and Production

BACKGROUND INFORMATION

IN 2009 ALL OF THE WORLD PHONE MANUFACTURERS HELD A CONFERENCE AND DECIDED TO COME UP WITH A "STANDARD CHARGING SOLUTION".  ONE WAY TO CHARGE INSTEAD OF 10 DIFFERENT CONNECTIONS TO EACH PARTICULAR BRAND. 

THE SOLUTION THEY DECIDED ON:

USB TO MICRO USB CHARGING!

USB Sock-It Shoelace Cord with Universal MICRO USB Tip

 

AS OF 1 JANUARY 2012 MOST PHONES WILL NO LONGER COME WITH THE BULKY CHARGERS WE HAVE BEEN FRUSTRATED WITH OVER THE YEARS.  MOST PHONES WON'T EVEN HAVE ANY CHARGER IN THE BOX.  NOW YOU WILL HAVE THE CONVENIENCE OF JUST USING YOUR USB CORD FOR CHARGING...EVEN APPLE USERS.  APPLE CORDS USE THE APPLE CONNECTION ON ONE END AND THE USB ON THE OTHER END OF THE CORD.

 

 
USB Sock-IT 3 Foot Extension Cord-Reward #1
 
 
 
 
USB Sock-IT Plugin Outlet and FloWire Cable In White or Pink Cable with Blue Lights-Reward #3

 

iPad® is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.

U.S. MARKET

THE NUMBERS ARE STAGGERING FOR THIS PRODUCT AND THE MARKET IN GENERAL.  IN 2009 THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY DID A STUDY AND FOUND:

57.9 MILLION HOMES HAVE 1-3 RECHARGEABLE DEVICES

36.4 MILLION HOMES HAVE 4-8 RECHARGEABLE DEVICES

7.9 MILLION HOMES HAVE 9+ RECHARGEABLE DEVICES

PLUS IT WAS ANNOUNCED IN THE 4TH QUARTER OF 2011 THAT THERE ARE OVER 100 MILLION SMARTPHONES IN THE UNITED STATES...


 

FAQ's


What makes this outlet different from what's out in the market now?

Simply put, it's Blue Ocean Technology because there is nothing that compares...no phantom power is being generated when the doors of the USB Chargers are closed.  The SMART Technology samples the rechargeable device and only gives the appropriate amount of power, preventing overheating of the battery.  When the Plugin Outlet senses the battery is fully charged, it turns off the USB Charger automatically, while using a sliver of power to monitor the device (.04 amp).  There is no need to babysit your device(s).  The cost savings from phantom electricity and replacement batteries will pay for the Plugin Outlet with regular use.  The two LED lights display the USB Chargers are powering the device(s).

Unique faceplate design to charge 4 electrical devices, even two standard chargers in the AC plugs and two USB cables in our SMART Technology USB Chargers.

The USB Sock-IT Plugin Outlet 1/4" lip completely covers the existing faceplate.

Removable cover for a clean look and semi-permanent installation with 3 connection points.  

Tamper Resistant AC plug receptacles. 

Charges 2 iPads® simultaneously. 

Switch on the back side that designates one of the AC plugs for Light Switch power control.  Think apartments that have little or no overhead lighting and use light switches to control lamps.  

What colors will be available?

White, Black, Brown and Almond.

How can we customize the cover design of our outlet?


We have two concepts of custom designs for the outlet.  One is to use a vinyl graphic molded sticker that will come in two pieces, one for the cover and one for the circular faceplate in the middle.

The other concept is to offer plastic covers with the designs already imprinted into the plastic and a circular molded vinyl sticker for the faceplate.  We are open to suggestions from our backers and will render a decision once mass production has begun.  The custom covers will be sold as a separate item. 

What will the USB Sock-IT Plugin Outlet retail for?

$24.99-26.99

Where do you manufacture the Outlet?

We have contracted manufacturing with a privately owned factory in Zhongzhan, a city in southern China near Hong Kong.  Our plan with 8G Electronics in the long term is to bring our company's manufacturing back to the U.S., which includes Engineering/Circuit Board Production/Injection Molding/Test and Evaluation/Assembly and Packaging. 

 

BIOS ON OUR CO-FOUNDERS


Mark Provo

Mark has a strong background in Sales/Marketing and Finance.  Upon leaving military service, Mr. Provo worked as a Managing Director of a Venture Capital Firm, analyzing business plans/financials of prospective companies looking for investment capital.  He also raised funding for his firm's three venture funds. Mark held a SEC Series 7/63 license.  

His experience is also on the other side of the table as an entrepreneur.  Mark owned a wireless business that specialized in offering wireless service through word of mouth referrals.  He wrote the white paper proposal that would create free unlimited wireless service by referring three people to the service.  It has become a tremendous success for that company. 

His responsibilities include:

  • Building Sales and Marketing Channels
  • Online and Offline Brand Building
  • Development and Execution of Financial Strategies
  • Supply Chain Logistics U.S.
  • Product Idea and Design
  • Spokesperson For 8G Electronics

Serving in the U.S. Navy as both enlisted and officer, Mark is a combat experienced fighter pilot flying missions in Operation Desert Storm.  He was also selected and flew the Opposing/Lead Solo Pilot slots with the United States Navy Flight Demonstration Squadron, The Blue Angels.  He served as the Operations Officer with the Blue Angels and managed the training, scheduling and command operations of the Team.  Mark retired from the Navy as a Commander (O-5). 

Mr. Provo is excited and passionate about bringing high quality products to the marketplace and help people solve their everyday challenges charging smartphones and tablets…

 
 
 

Tom Nilsen

Currently living in Hong Kong, Tom has developed numerous relationships with designers, engineers and manufacturers over the last five years.  

Tom has been sourcing and designing products in China for the sporting, toy and electronics industry over the last ten years.

His responsibilities include:

  • Designing and sourcing leading edge products
  • Working with the manufacturer on specific product design details
  • Design and implementation of software design with our products
  • Packaging and graphics design
  • Shipping and Logistics
  • Contract Implementation
  • Product Quality Assurance and Testing
 

Mr. Nilsen has a BS degree in Computer Science from the US Naval Academy. Tom served in the US Navy as an Officer and Naval Aviator, instructing and flying combat missions in the FA-18 Hornet during Operation Desert Storm. Mr. Nilsen speaks several languages and is conversational in Chinese.  Tom is the hand's on Chief Inspector/Tester in the factory, ensuring we offer only the highest quality product to our customers.

story:
Hi Again!

We want to introduce the iCamera KEEP, the next great DIY home automation and security solution from iSmartAlarm.  We've taken some of the best ideas of security cameras and video monitoring and made one clean, awesome package. 

1280 x 720 HD Resolution?  Yes.

350°x40° Pan and Tilt?  Oh yeah.

FREE cloud video recording and storage?  Wow.

Real-Time On-Demand Streaming Video?  Certainly.

Night Vision?  Absolutely.

Motion Sensor?  You got it.

Audio Sensor?  Definitely. 

Can I use it by itself?  Yes, up to four!

Can I use it with my iSmartAlarm?  Yes, for even more comprehensive security.

No monthly fees, no contracts!  Whoa - Of course not!


The iCamera KEEP works on your home's existing Wi-Fi network, or as part of the iSmartAlarm Home Security System.  Add up to four to any network, and take advantage of the free iSmartAlarm App to view, manage, and control your home from anywhere in the world.  Know when glass is broken or there is movement in your home INSTANTLY.  See what is going on, and call the authorities.  You have proof - the iCamera KEEP begins recording as soon as motion is sensed, and stores 10 second video clips for you for free.  In the future, we'll be adding local and remote cloud storage for video as well.


Ah, the name - We knew we wanted to retain the "iCamera" name.  But how do we differentiate it from the original, first generation iCamera?  iCamera Pro?  It's definitely a huge step forward. iCamera HAL 9000?  A bit creepy.  iCamera HD?  It certainly is HD, but that's boring.  iCamera Plus?  No, that's silly.  After weeks of discussion, whiteboards full of names/acronyms/gibberish, and asking our fans and customers for their ideas, we decided on The iCamera KEEP.  

Keep: Verb (used with object)

  • To hold or retain in one's possession; hold as one's own.

Keep: Noun (object)

  • The innermost and strongest structure or central tower of a medieval castle.
Well, that fits pretty perfectly, don't you think?


Once you setup the iCamera KEEP, either as a part of the iSmartAlarm or on its own, you can move it anywhere in your house.  No wiring is required - All it needs is a power source (a standard wall-outlet), and you're all set!

The iSmartAlarm gives you complete, easy control.  View multiple iCameras at once, or choose just one to view in full screen and landscape. Follow activity throughout the house with a wide range of pan and tilt controls.



Users (up to 12) will receive text, phone call, email, and push notifications on their smartphones in case of emergency or by user-defined conditions.  You can edit and customize your iCamera KEEP network - change the motion and audio sensor sensitivities, change night vision strength, create delays between the automated snapshots, and more!


To be honest, we had such a fantastic time when we launched our iSmartAlarm Home Security System on Indiegogo in January 2013, we wanted to do it again!  Indiegogo gives us a great place to reach out to our original contributors, and to also find new customers and fans that will like our iCamera KEEP as well as our iSmartAlarm system.
  • Contributing now, during our Pre-sale campaign on Indiegogo, can save you over $100!
  • Already have an iSmartAlarm system?  Add one or more iCamera KEEP!  You can add 4 additional iCamera KEEPs, so if you already have the original iCamera, you'll have 5 streaming video cameras at your beck and call!


iSmart Alarm, Inc. was founded in Silicon Valley in 2012 on the principles of safety, beauty, and intelligence.  Inspired by break-ins in the area of unoccupied or under-construction homes (including Steve Jobs' family home), and of rental homes that simply could not afford or wire their homes with ADT or similar systems, we focused on design and developing the best expandable smartphone-enabled home security and home control system. 

The iSmartAlarm puts a 21st century spin on traditional security systems. The sleek, sophisticated system utilizes iOS and Android devices to put home security and home control in the palm of its users’ hands. Our products are cool, really easy to use, and affordable to everyone.  iSmartAlarm protects your home intelligently.


Oh, we've been very very busy in the last year!

  • Seven Firmware updates
  • Six App updates (iOS and Android)
  • Developing, testing, and launching the wonderful iCamera KEEP!
  • Launch and support of the iSmartAlarm in Europe
  • Beta testing Australia and New Zealand
  • Launching the Smart Switch to control lights and appliances, available on our site
  • Design and development of over 10 devices, in various stages
  • IFTTT compatibility, ETC November
  • Expanding our reach in the US and Canada to over 15 major retailers
  • And lots and lots and lots of other things we can't quite talk about yet ;)


  • CNet - "People who've never been able to even consider upgrading their home security finally have access to a legitimate alternative. To me, that's tech at its best."
  • PC Mag - "The app is well designed and user friendly, and the entire system is a breeze to install and configure. Most importantly, it does what it is supposed to do, which is alert you when somebody is trying to gain unauthorized access to your home or apartment."
  • SecurityGem - "The iSmart Alarm System is a must for home security newbies and those who want to upgrade to video surveillance."
  • TrustedNerd - "iSmartAlarm was the result of an amazing Indiegogo campaign over a year ago. I’ve been following them ever since and I am extremely impressed with their products. They have an amazing team supporting that is supporting and constantly looking to improve their product."
  • MacWorld - "iSmartAlarm's...low price and ease of use make it a compelling option in a realm dominated by costly installed systems."
  • TUAW - "Some buyers in the home security market will want a full-blown system with monitoring by a professional company, and there are plenty of solutions out there. But there are lots of people who are unprotected, and who want something that is relatively inexpensive and reliable. The iSmartAlarm system meets that need, and does it well. I want one."


Why yes, we're going to give you the chance to get your iCamera KEEP for free.

Here's the deal -

  • For EVERY contributor you send with your links that pledges for an iCamera KEEP, you'll get $10 off your purchase.  Every single one, until your purchase is free.  Your friends can do it too, until theirs is free.  It's a wonderful cycle!

Example:
Did you get in on the ground floor for the Earliest Early Bird price of $99?

Send ten contributors, and yours is free.  If you send 5 contributors, we'll refund $50 to you.  You get the picture.

When the whole campaign is over (Scheduled for end of October), we will refund you based on the number of referrals.

We'll be posting more instructions and tips on how to get the most out of your sharefulness (is that a word?) on our Facebook page, so join us there  - https://www.facebook.com/iSmartAlarmInc  You should "Like" us too, if you don't.  We're nice people.

Any method works, as long as it tracks as you in Indiegogo.  Write an article on your blog and put your link in there.  Share to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Reddit, Buzzfeed, StumbleUpon, or any similar sites! (Oh, please don't post to our forum or our Facebook page - That would be cheating).  Send it to friends if they are interested, and make sure they use your link when they submit their contribution.  It's THAT easy!  Have fun and get creative - Paint it on the side of your car, carve it into your Halloween pumpkin, hire a skywriter, the possibilities are endless!

Make sure you're logged into Indiegogo, grab your link or click the buttons, and you're on your way to saving even MORE money!  You can see how many contributors you've sent by clicking on your name in the upper right corner, click on "My Contributions," and then "Referrals."


How much for international shipping? 

This Indiegogo campaign is for US and CA only.  Shipping in the US is $0, and Canadian orders please add $20 to your Perk contribution.

When will I get my iCamera KEEP?  

We're going to have the devices in our California warehouse in November, and as soon as we can get everything sorted, labeled, and ready to go, they'll be on their way to you wonderful people!

Does an iPhone come with the system?

No.  But you knew that.

What happens if I move, and want to take it with me?

You can!  Every device and system we offer is completely portable.  If you attached the iCamera KEEP to the wall with the included aluminum mounting bracket, just unscrew the screws and reattach to the new location the same way.  No wiring, no running ethernet cables all over the place, no fees.  You can move tomorrow morning and have the system up and running in 15 minutes.

How is the iCamera KEEP powered?

AC, wall-outlet, 110/220v

What's the size of the iCamera KEEP?

5" tall and 2.25" deep/wide. It's basically a 5" tall cube.

How does the video storage and playback work?

When the iCamera KEEP detects motion (you must also have a CubeOne connected to the iCamera KEEP for these functionalities), it will automatically record and store ten seconds of video at a time. You can watch, listen, and download the video. If an intruder walks into a room with an iCamera KEEP, it will begin recording. If an intruder moves to another room with another iCamera KEEP, that iCamera KEEP will begin recording. You can track movements and have video evidence of fiendish wrongdoers. Did I mention the video recording and storage is free?

Does the iSmartAlarm and the App work with Android?

Absolutely.

Is there a Warranty or Return Policy for the iCamera KEEP?

The same Warranty and Return Policy applies for the iCamera KEEP as all other iSmartAlarm products. Check it out here.

Will we be able to add on additional devices at a later time?  Order a la carte?

Sure!  You can do that right now!  You can go to our website, or any of these fine retailers online -

Amazon

SmartHome.com

Apple Stores

Walmart

Fry's

HomeSecurityStore.com

story:
What we are doing

We have been working on pushing the speed of the bank card size USB flash drive so that it’s faster than ever before and coming out with more interesting designs as well as giving everyone the ability to have their own design with the amount of memory they want. Personal designs which can be from person picture, drawing, designs and logos of any format be it JPG, PNG, GIF, AI, PSD. Unlike other bank card USB flash drives we have included a space to enable the USB flash drive be used as key holder. It’s common to not have your USB flash drive when you need it outside home, but with the bank card size USB flash drive which can be in your wallet, it can be taken anywhere with you without any inconvenience from shape or size unlike other USB flash devices.

Giving everyone the opportunity to have their own design and memory size


Before now

We have been making different USB flash drives for some time now but we are not satisfied with the designs, speed and limited uses. Also, losing USB memory flash drive is easy, and many times we forget to carry them along with us when we most need them. The Credit Card or Bank Card size USB flash memory provides solutions, it is (*) Easy to carry in your front pocket and wallets (*) Dressed for whatever occasion, its use friendly (*) It can be used as key holder (*)


Having just the design and memory size you want makes the bank card usb drive a better experience, designs can be form family photos, company logos and design, city photo, flags etc. never before has any one had the opportunity to decide how friendly their usb flash drive should be, but we think its important to have things just the way you like them.

As big as 512GB memory in your wallet

Our Designs


Our designfor kickstarters & space foryourown design


Perspective view



All USB with key holder possibility

story:
I'm just about to complete my third year studies @ Kaunas University of Technology,  

I have a special interest in Search engine Optimization (SEO) and have been taking years trying to learn all I can and finally I come up with a web application that will offer all in one seo needs to website owners. If you have a website and want to get successful and popular online, you know the key to this is best and safe seo services. This is what my application is designed to offer. From link building, web analysis and error fixing, ping and indexing tools, article/directory submissions, crawl pages, page rank and backlinks check, social media share and many surprising services. Yes these are what I have come up with and trust me this will be 100% safe and affordable. 

My number one problem is to afford some applications that I need which requires funds and also domain/hosting and web security. Because I want every user to be safe and confident using our services, this requires high tech applications and tools, that's where am lacking and need your support.

If you assist me today and you own a website, trust me I will help get your site a high page rank and help you dominate the web within a shortest possible time.

Your support today might just be not far from developing a million dollar company and in turn helping so many others. Because I know what I can do and my capabilities, I ask you for support with confidence.

If you are reading this but can't support or help, You can do me a great favor by sharing the message to others and by using Indiegogo share tools or your facebook, twitter or any other social media you can.

story:
The Beginning of Genie

Judy, the founder of Genie, found herself alone in a Washington DC hotel room wondering if anybody else in the hotel was going to the same innovation conference she was signed up for... and whether they wanted to talk about entrepreneurship in youth. Turns out there were five other people going to the same conference in that hotel who would have wanted to chat, but she didn't find out until the end of the conference. 

Why is it that we can be surrounded by people willing to meet up with others but not have any idea that they're there? 1 in 3 college students have reported prolonged periods of depression, and 30% reported feeling frequently overwhelmed. College is a community of mentors and peers with whom we study, eat, and go to class, yet college students often feel alone and isolated. 

Genie takes away that loneliness. Genie is an app that provides a safe, crowdsourced platform that finds people in the same location based on common interest and mutual benefit. Have a homework set due in an hour and stuck on a line of code? Holler for help on Genie. Stuck in a parking lot and need to jumpstart your car? Holler for help on Genie. Feeling blue and general want to chat or grab a study break with someone? Holler on Genie. People in close proximity will see your request and come to your aid. Everyone's a genie, they just don't know it yet.

What We Need & What You Get

  • $5,000 will sustain the core Genie team to work full time on the August launch
  • The more support we get, the more likely we are to proceed to Round 3 of the Duke Startup Challenge
  • And, of course, perks!

Other Ways You Can Help

Become a Duke student rep and get all the insider perks of working for a Duke startup. Contact Judy at zhudiyi@gmail.com
