story:
にほんご  | Deutsch

Blackview BV9500 Pro

The Amazing & Unbreakable Smartphone

With BV9500 Pro, you notice the difference. We’re rethinking the way you use and take care of your smartphone by making it indestructible, reliable and cutting edge. Blackview is creating a phone with impeccable design, rugged qualities and designed to withstand all of the elements life throws at you.

Shooting Image & Video In The Sea Water  

Incredible & Unbreakable 

 

Safe Even In The Oil

 

What Are The Medias Saying?

Photos Shooting on BV9500 Pro

 

Walkie-Talkie: Address Your Customers Directly

Don't worry if you have no signal! BV9500 Pro’s walkie-talkie feature allows you to remain in contact in any aituation, simply connect the removable antenna and remain in contact even when there is no signal.

 

2X Fast Charging

Leading edge 12V/2A 24pin TYPE-C Quick Charge Technology, more than 2 times faster than normal 5V/2A charge technology.  10000mAh is fully charged via 3.5 hours.

 

Stay Powered Up All Day Long

BV9500 Pro comes with wireless charging and adopts QI wireless fast charging standard.

 

Order In-Store, On-The-Go and At Home

Worldwide 4G Coverage

Offering dual SIM and one TF card(128GB), dual 4G standby, either Sim can work on 4G, while one is working on 4G, the other one can be working on 2G/3G

 

Full Specifications

 

In The Box

 

The Timeline

In production We are working really hard to get the BV9500 Pro into production as soon as possible so that you can receive your product soon after purchasing. We are confident this is a great product and ready to ship out soon!

Meet Blackview Team

Our vision has always been to create a  smartphone that is rugged and advanced. One that you don't have to worry about breaking, that immerses itself in your outdoor experience and workplace. A smartphone that is intelligent and not only improves but inspires your day, particularly during the tougher times!

The passionate and energetic Blackview staffs are full of inspiration and making a good team.

 

Add-On Perk： Wireless Charger 

Affiliate & Retail Partnerships

If you are interested in an affiliate partnership for the Indiegogo campaign or to be our distributors for future opportunities with Blackview, please Contact Us.

Special Thanks

We would like to thank our team members, friends, and everyone who has helped throughout our journey. Your feedback, support, and positive encouragement have been incredibly helpful. Special thanks to the Indiegogo for all of their help towards our campaign.

We would also like to thank Nuuk Digital for all of their marketing efforts.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is there any certification for the phone to use in Europe?

A: We already have CE & FCC certified.

Q: Will this phone work in my county?

A: Yes, it will be work in any country, it covers the global frequency and offers global full 4G signal. Can be compatible with every US telecom operators like T-mobile、 AT&T Wireless、Verizon Wireless、Sprint Nextel &Alltel; Australia telecom operators like Telstra, Optus,Vodafone, etc.

Q: How many sim cards can be in the phone?

A: 2 Sims & 1 TF card. Dual 4G standby, either Sim can work on 4G, while one is working on 4G, the other one can be working on 2G/3G, can not be working on 4G on both SIMs at the same time.

Q: Can the walkie-talkie work between other walkie-talkies?

A: Yes, the frequency on walkie-talkie is 400-470mhz.

Q: What is the range of the walkie talkie

A: Sea level: 4-10KM / Office Building : 1-30 Floor

    Urban Area : 1-5KM / Driving Status: 0.5-2KM    

Q: What is the test method on MIL-STD-810G

A: Test Method 501.5 High Temperature / Test Method 502.5 Low Temperature

     Test Method 514.6 Vibration / Test Method 516.6 Shock

Q: I don’t like the antenna, how can I do?

A: BV9500Pro with removable antenna.

Q: How long is the return & replacement window  and warranty time?

A: Return & replacement within 15 days of delivery and 1 year warranty.

Q: When will the phone be shipped and what is the shipping time?

A: We are expected to ship in Aug. 2018. The shipping time depends on different carriers and different regions. We will notify you of the delivery time by email when we ship.

Q: Which regions are available for shipping and how much is the shipping fee?

A: Worldwide shipping and we are offering worldwide free shipping to all of our backers. We currently do not support shipping to P.O. Boxes.

Q: Change of address and order?    
A: If you need to update your shipping address or order information, please contact our customer service team: kelly@blackview.hk

Q：How can I check the status of my pre-order?   
A:  The Blackview team will continuously update the Indiegogo campaign page and update every backer on the manufacture and shipping process. For more info, please contact kelly@blackview.hk

story:
Check out Teracube 2e - Our Next Evolution Smartphone here!!

 

 

Most smartphones last an average of 2 years or less. Teracube is engineered to last longer and is backed by the industry's first 4-year warranty to ensure you can enjoy your device with peace of mind.

Teracube is good for our planet, too. Smartphones’ biggest environmental impact comes from the manufacturing process and the e-waste when discarded. Over 135 million smartphones are thrown away every year in the US alone. The longer you keep Teracube, the more sustainable it becomes. It is not only good for the earth, it’s great on your wallet as well! 

Source: TreeHugger (www.treehugger.com, July 2017)

 

Teracube’s 4-year hassle-free warranty promises high performance for years to come - ensuring you can keep one piece of personal technology for a longer period of time, keeping your wallet happy and the planet healthy.

Warranty Coverage

Teracube warranty covers all parts, performance, labor and two-way shipping at no cost to you. It even includes free battery change.

Express Replacement

We understand you depend on your phone day-in and day-out. This is why we offer an express replacement option so that you will never be without a phone should something unforeseen happen.

Accidental Repairs

Accidents happen, we know it and we have your back. Unlike other companies who charge an arm and a leg, we only ask for a reasonable fee for any damage caused by accident, liquid or misuse (price includes parts, labor, and 2-way shipping).

 

Teracube is powered by the latest MediaTek 12nm 2.0GHz P60 octa-core processor with AI accelerated technology, making it one of the fastest smartphones in its category. Whether it is gaming or productivity, Teracube can handle all tasks effortlessly while delivering amazing battery performance.

Teracube’s dual rear cameras take vivid and sharp pictures. One camera captures the depth of the objects while the second captures vibrant colors and other details.

The front camera utilizes artificial intelligence technology to take beautiful selfies for you to share with your friends, family and the rest of the world. 

Actual photos taken with Teracube

Most comparable smartphones come with 4GB RAM and 64GB storage. Teracube features 6GB RAM and 128GB storage. If you love playing games, downloading music, storing documents or saving photos, Teracube has plenty of storage for you. A built-in Micro SD slot allows an additional 256GB of storage.

With Teracube’s 6GB RAM, multitasking is now a breeze. Having that extra RAM ensures your Teracube will have great performance for years to come.  

 

 

With a 3400 mAh battery, Teracube will stay charged all day long, and even tomorrow. You won’t have to worry about finding the closest plug on your lunch break. 

 

Teracube's display is constructed with sturdy Gorilla Glass to handle the demands of everyday life. The screen is scratch-resistant and much stronger than normal glass. The metal alloy frame provides ultimate strength making Teracube highly durable. 

 

Technical Specification

  • Android 9 Pie (Android 10 update will be available in Spring 2020)
  • Processor: MediaTek P60 2.0Ghz Octa-core processor
  • Memory: 6GB RAM and 128GB storage
  • Screen: 6.2" Full HD+ IPS Display (1080 x 2280)
  • Rear camera: 12+5MP dual rear cameras
  • Front camera: 8MP
  • Battery: 3,400mAh lithium-ion polymer battery
  • Security: PIN, pattern, fingerprint, face unlock
  • Sensors: accelerometer, light, proximity, gyro, fingerprint, NFC
  • NFC: supports Google Pay
  • 5V/2A quick charger
  • Bluetooth 5.0
  • Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac (2.4/5GHz)
  • Headphone jack
  • GPS
  • Dual SIM
  • MicroSD support up to 256GB
  • USB-C port
  • Dimensions: 157 x 75.5 x 7.7mm
  • Weight: 176g
  • Color: Black
  • Carriers (Unlocked): AT&T, T-Mobile, MetroPCS, Cricket, Lyca, and more
  • GSM: 850/900/1800/1900
  • LTE: 1/2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17

The display notch can be hidden

 

*Please check FAQ section for the list of other countries and carriers supported by Teracube.

 

 

Every awesome product starts with a great idea, and Teracube is no different.

Teracube’s co-founder, Sharad Mittal, envisioned the goal of changing the disposable nature of the consumer electronics industry by designing products that last longer. He believes that small changes can make a huge impact. Mittal is a passionate environmentalist and has more than 10 years of experience in consumer electronics design & retail, and more than 10 years in software development.

At Teracube, our core mission is to create great products that you can enjoy for years to come and to help save our environment. This campaign is just a start. We want to keep pushing the envelope in this direction by building more environment-friendly products with modular designs, eco-friendly components, and fair-trade practices.

 

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Teracube a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Teracube, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 

Risks and challenges

The team bringing you Teracube has many combined years experience launching consumer electronics and software. To minimize delays, a great deal of the work has already been done before launching on Kickstarter. We have been developing and testing the prototypes for the past 6 months. We have a set of proven partners in both software and hardware engineering for building the phone itself, as well as fulfillment companies for shipping. Last but not least, a contract has been signed with our manufacturing partner which allows us to start production as soon as the campaign completes. There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to deliver and have taken all the necessary measures. The project timeline includes buffers to accommodate parts or manufacturing delays. If anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

story:
The sound in wireless earbuds is mediocre. Even the most expensive wireless earbuds lack the power, volume and quality we desire. People we spoke to would go on and on about the difference great-sounding music makes in their lives, and expressed significant disappointment that a wireless earbud with great sound didn't exist.

 

The hybrid driver system uses two different drivers -- a balanced armature driver to control the highs and mid frequencies, and a dynamic driver to isolate the low frequencies, acting as a built-in subwoofer.

The warm sound makes the experience of listening to music feel more like you’re attending a live performance. 

What makes 26 special is more than just having two drivers, it's the way both the drivers work in unison. They hybrid driver system utilizes a crossover communication process to tell both drivers not only what sound to produce but what sound not to produce. When paired together, the drivers can focus both on their strengths and not worry about their weaknesses. 

 Ironically, all the products mentioned by customers claim sweat and water resistance.

 

Every single internal part of 26 has been coated in our proprietary hydrophobic solution. 

We’ve taken every precaution to ensure our earbuds will perform under the toughest conditions. Others claim to be waterproof, but we can back it up.

Nobody has figured out how to create a secure and comfortable fit without some obtrusive ear hook, uncomfortable wing, or bulky neck-mounted collar. We might as well wrap your earbuds in duct tape and strap them to your ears - equally as comfortable and effective.

 

 

 

 

 

High intensity fitness locks use the natural curves of your ears to lock the earbuds in place without an ugly hook or neck collar. 

 

In other words, the wide variety locks and wings can create 144 unique combinations, allowing you to achieve the perfect custom fit for your ears. 

Who wants to be tethered to a charging brick, or USB cord just to make sure you have enough juice to make it through your workout? Additional batteries that magnetically clip onto 26 give you the extra juice when they need it most. This way you get 15 hours of play/talk time and over 400 hours of standby time.

 

 

Our microphone is specifically tuned to pick up the human voice and filter out ambient background noise, ensuring that your voice is crisp and clear in any environment.

  

Plain and simple, most wireless earbuds are not attractive. The stability mechanisms make it difficult to wear outside the gym. The designs continue to miss the mark in being versatile enough to wear throughout your entire daily routine. They sacrifice fashion for function and vice versa. At every turn we worked with fashion bloggers to make sure that 26 exudes the transcending class with which you live and be the perfect accessory for your journey.

 

 

Whether you’re on the road, at home, in the gym, or at the office, music is the catalyst that inspires us to take that step and reach the next level. Fuel your journey with music and ignite your passion. 

 

 

  

 

Bluetooth Specifications: Version 4.0, Class 2

Frequency Response: 19hz - 20khz

In-Line Stabilizers: Dimensions: 41.3mm x 17.5mm x 10mm

In-Line Stabilizers Weight: 10.73 grams (Total Combined Weight)

Mobile Charging Clip: Dimensions: 41.1mm x 17.5 x 12mm (Includes positioning walls)

Mobile Charging Clip Weight: 7.76 grams

Battery Capacity: 

  • Internal Battery: 120mAh 
  • Clip-on Battery: 80mAh

Battery Life:

  • Operation Time: 15+ Hours
  • Stand-by Time: 400+ Hours

Charging Time:

  • 2 Hours for a full charge
  • Quick-Charge: 5 minutes charging will give 1 hour of playtime.

We've been working on 26 for the past year. It's been a long road and we’re extremely excited to introduce the wireless sport earbuds that everyone deserves.

In order to get the costs to a price we believe creates value for our customers, we need to have a large initial production run. Your support will allow us to place our first large order with our manufacturers so that we can reduce production costs and get 26 in the hands of people everywhere 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Zipbuds was born in 2009 because we’re passionate about improving people’s lives. Our passion for music, dedication to our community, and love of solving problems drive us to challenge the status quo every day.

We’ve recruited the world’s finest audio engineers and industry leading manufacturers to to help us deliver new innovative technology.

We refuse to compromise when it comes to quality and source only the best components from 6 different countries around the world.

This is the culmination of seven years of research, passion, and love...

Video Production by http://startmotionmedia.com 

Following the campaign, you will receive a survey from us (more details to come) which will collect your information and specifications.

story:
The ProBack Cover InDemand Pre-Sale is available for a limited time only 

 

Sketching is one of my favorite mediums to visualize my concepts. I was blown away when the iPad Pro and Apple Pencil launched; a portable and powerful tablet that I can go anywhere with, and a sleek pencil that replicated the tangible grip of a traditional pencil. It was the smoothest transition from a notebook to a tablet! After using the duo for a couple of weeks, I started to notice some things that bothered me:

 

I needed to find a way to store my pencil, I didn’t want to damage or misplace it. The way that the Apple Pencil charges through iPad Pro was inconvenient and also very dangerous, so...

 

The Solution

And so, I set out to design the ProBack. Not only does it protect the iPad Pro from scratches, it also stores and charges the Apple Pencil safely from the side. 

 

Product Guarantee

ProBack's core belief is to deliver products that are simple to use with quality assured. We have tested the functionality through various prototypes. If for any reason you are not satisfied with the quality of the case, we will replace the ProBack for you, free of charge.

Our idea has already been funded and validated. We expect to ship our ProBack Covers June 2017. Order now to take advantage our limited discount on InDemand!

Press Kit

Would you like to feature our story? In this link you will find everything you need, including a press release and High Res images.

If you have any comment or questions we’d love to answer them. Please contact us at press@tikainnovation.com

Disclaimer: Our ProBack case is not affiliated with Apple Inc. iPad and any other Apple products' names are trademarks or registered trademarks of Apple Inc.

Please contact us at press@tikainnovation.comDisclaimer: Our ProBack case is not affiliated with Apple Inc. iPad and any other Apple products' names are trademarks or registered trademarks of Apple Inc.

story:
The Bandana ZX Pro idea!

After the creation of the bike paths, Didier buys a bike, mean of transportation facilitating its movements and especially environmentally friendly.

After a few weeks of use, he realizes that his helmet is uncomfortable and “not fashionable".

The helmet is not aesthetic, especially when he goes to a business meeting.

He then begins to look for another type of protection...and there comes the flop. After many conversations, his wife, a back-street look woman always wearing a bandana on her head said: "Let’s create a protective bandana, both fashionable and more convenient for riding."

The protective bandana also fits to other sports: skateboarding, sailing, skiing, skating and other big thrill activities.

After working with a consulting firm (engineers) and a factory specializing in the creation of molds for shockproof materials and antiperspirant fabrics, we are in possession of a sampling and patent.


The Bandana ZX Pro is born!

The Bandana ZX Pro is for those who exercise regularly or occasionally and want protection; hence the Bandana ZX Pro is for an international market.

Moreover, it is customizable and can be changed indefinitely (variation of colors and fabrics, sponsors, brands, etc...)

Therefore this is a global market for a new way of protection.

Today, we call on crowdfunding for Bandana ZX Pro:

  • To acquire the C.E. norm agreement.
  • To start a marketing campaign to make it a brand, start a collection to generate a craze.
  • To create and fund the packaging, (a bag) very important element.
  • To start a fabrication.


The investors in this project may obtain the Bandana ZX Pro at production price individually or in packs.

  • The unit price is $ 52 and the unit price for the investors is $ 26.
  • There are possibilities of branding (Coca-Cola, Red bull, etc.)
  • This is a new Idea (fashion) and an especially useful one
  • The project is already patented
  • Manufacturing is already developed.
  • Sampling is ready



------------------------------------------------------------------------


L’idée Bandana ZX Pro !

Après la création des pistes cyclables, Didier achète un vélo, moyen de transport facilitant ses déplacements et surtout écologique.

Après quelques semaines d’utilisation, il s’aperçoit que son casque est inconfortable et surtout « pas fashion » car Didier est directeur commercial.

Le casque n’est pas esthétique, surtout quand il se rend à un rendez-vous professionnel.

Il se met alors à chercher un autre mode de protection...et voilà le vide.  Après maintes conversations, son épouse au look back-street toujours avec un bandana sur la tête lui dit : « Eh bien créons un bandana protecteur », c’est à la fois un look fashion, et en plus pratique pour le vélo.

Le bandana protecteur est aussi valable pour les autres sports de glisse : skateboard, voile, ski, roller et autre activités à sensations fortes.

Après avoir travaillé avec un bureau d’étude (ingénieurs) et une usine spécialisée dans la création de moules pour matériaux antichoc, et tissus anti-transpirant, nous sommes en possession d’un échantillonnage et d’un brevet.


 Le Bandana ZX Pro est né !

Le Bandana ZX Pro s’adresse à tous ceux pratiquant un sport et qui veulent se protéger volontairement la tête. Peu encombrant, pliant, pratique et facile d’utilisation, le Bandana ZX Pro s’adresse à un marché international.

De plus, il est personnalisable à souhait et peut se décliner indéfiniment ; (variation de couleurs et tissus, ajout de logos, noms de compagnies, sponsors, etc...)

Il s’agit donc d’un marché mondial d’un nouveau mode de protection.

Aujourd’hui, nous faisons appel au financement participatif pour le Bandana ZX Pro

  • Pour obtenir la norme C E.
  • Lancer une campagne de marketing pour en faire une marque, lancer une collection, afin de générer un engouement.
  • Créer et financer le packaging (un sac) élément important.
  • Lancer une fabrication.



Les contreparties

Les investisseurs dans ce projet pourront obtenir au tarif de production ledit bandana individuellement ou en pack.

  • Le prix  public unitaire est de 52$  et le prix unitaire contrepartie est de 26$.
  • Possibilité de branding (Coca-cola, Red-bull, etc.)       
  • Idée nouvelle (fashion) et surtout utile
  • Le projet est déjà breveté
  • Fabrication déjà au point.
  • Échantillonnage OK.

story:
With iPhone X and iPhone 8 starting enable the QI wireless charging, the market is full of different types of wireless chargers. We checked the market and find out they are all or less similar with each other both in design and function. That's why we come up with the MAGQI RGB, which is the world's first RGB fast wireless charger for cellphones.

 

 

The RGB colorful light will make your desk and charging experience totally different, especially when you have use the rgb keyboard and mouse. The RGB light will stay on all the time while charging and color changing as well. 

 

The MAGQI RGB supports 5W/7.5W/10W fast wireless charging. For most of the Samsung cellphones, it can support 10W fast charging while for iPhone X&8, 7.5W fast charging is enabled. Regarding other cellphones does not have the fast charging capability, it provides 5W normal charging speed. The chip will cut off the charging automatically while the phone is fully charged and the charging distance can be as far as 10mm. 

 

The video below shows how the fast charging works on Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge. 

 

The MAGQI RGB wireless charging is 138mm in length, 82mm wide and 9mm thick. The input will be 12W and output can be 5W/7.5W/10W depending on the devices you are using. Becuase of the top quality chip used inside the charger, the charging distance can be as far as 10mm. 

The video below show the charging distance can be as far as 10mm. 

 

                           

 

The unique oval-shaped design and high quality CNC machined zinc alloy shell brings the product perfect hand feeling and outstanding appearance. 

The chip inside the charger are USA made while the capacity inside it are from Japan, that's why this charger is super safe to use. 

 

 

 

 

We're a group of like-minded professionals who has been in the electronics industry with more than 10 years of experiences collectively from all over the world. The company is currently based out of Shenzhen, China. The sales forces of the company are professionals from multinational FMCG companies around the world.

 

If you are distributor or have any further questions, please send an email to

hello@magqi.cc

 

Q1, When will you ship MAGQI RGB?

The MAGQI RGB will ship to you in Octorber, 2018. 

 

Q2, What's are the power output of MAGQI RGB?

The MAGQI RGB wireless charger can support 5W/7.5W/10W fast Charging. 

 

Q3, Can MAGQI RGB work with phone case? 

Yes, the charging distance as far as 10mm, so it can work with cases without any problem except these metal phone cases. 

 

Q4, Will the RGB light turn off when charging? 

No, the RGB light will always on during charging, so we suggest you to use it only in the office not in the bedroom. But if you prefer some light during sleeping, it will be perfect use in the bedroom.

story:
Our products are currently in the production stage, and therefore we can guarantee that every order will be fulfilled, or your money will be refunded in full, no questions asked.

If you have questions about your order, email us for 24-Hour support at: mercurymobilecharging@gmail.com.

  • 10,000 mAh battery capacity, will charge any phone from 0-100% up to three separate times
  • QI wireless charging feature allows you to charge your devices without the use of cables.
  • Wireless charging currently works for: iPhone 8 and X (+newer), Samsung S6, Note 5, or newer, and any other model with wireless charging capabilities.
  • Quick charging USB output allows you to charge your device using any charging cable when wireless charging is not possible
  • Built in high-powered LED flashlight can be toggled on/off. Works using the power already stored within your power bank

 

​

 

​

 

 

 

 

 

  • A powerful charging cable hidden discreetly within one of 5 clean bracelet styles
  • Use Mercury charging cable bracelets to charge your phone using any normal USB power source, including the quick charging USB output included on all Mercury power banks
  • Our charging cable bracelets will charge your phone ~20% faster than standard charging cables
  • Mercury's charging cable bracelets function exactly like any standard charging cable for your iPhone, Android, or other device.
  • Just plug into a USB power source and begin charging.   

 

 

 

 

 

 

    Discounted Prices for Crowdfunding Campaign-

    The purpose of our crowdfunding campaign is to offer you (our initial supporters) discounts on any of our initial products, which are exclusively available through the Perks section above. In the process, we hope to build support for our company, and open customers up to the great products we have to offer.

    After the conclusion of this campaign, all prices will return to normal so please, take advantage while it lasts!

    Fulfillment-

    ​We estimate that all orders will arrive at the buyer's doorstep within 40 days following the end of our crowdfunding campaign. In the event that your order does not arrive within 40 days, know that we are working hard to get your order to you as quickly as possible. The fulfillment process/schedule is roughly as shown above!

story:
NVDA Remote Access

Would you pay more than $1,000 to remotely communicate with another computer? The blind have to. Please help us change this!

Despite the proliferation of smarter technology in our homes and at our jobs, the American Foundation for the Blind reports more than 70% of the blind community in the United States is still unemployed. The problem is compounded by special software priced well into the thousands to do computer tasks everyone else takes for granted. NVDA Remote Access does its part to reverse this trend by creating more job opportunities for tech entrepreneurs, system administrators, rehabilitation specialists, and educators.

What Is Distance Accessibility?

Blind people use screen readers to access information displayed graphically on a computer, tablet or mobile phone. The screen reader employs a variety of heuristics to convert the visual information into text that is rendered in speech via a synthesizer. NVDA Remote Access builds on the open source screen reader NVDA, allowing a blind person to send commands to and hear the speech from another user's computer. This provides an ideal tool for real time communication between workstations and opens doors for a variety of previously-inaccessible job tasks.

Why NVDA Remote Access?

There are two popular screen readers for the Windows environment, NVDA and JAWS. NVDA is free software and can be employed anywhere by blind people, their educators, their employers and anyone else who needs non-visual access to a Windows based PC. JAWS is commercial software that sells for $1,095 per copy, placing it well beyond the reach for most individual users and increasing the cost of employing or educating a blind person. The irony? The publishers charge $200 more to enable the software's remote access feature. Would you pay over a thousand dollars to remotely interact with another computer?

The NVDA Remote Access Advantage

NVDA Remote provides a feature set unmatched by its competitors and does so totally free for the end user.

Advantages to using NVDA Remote Access include:

  • Emphasis on ease of use and thorough documentation for the novice and expert user alike
  • Compatible with remote desktop connection, VNC, Team viewer, PC over IP, PC anywhere, remote assistance, SCCM remote control tool, among other protocols
  • Ability to run from a thumb drive, eliminating the need to install a screen reader
  • Reliant on state-of-the-art encryption for maximum security and privacy.
  • Configurable automatic connection to a remote system for any time access to a remote computer.
  • Connection to a remote PC using a relay server, ensuring functionality across different types of networks such as when the end-user cannot open ports
  • Free Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS)
  • Available on GitHub for collaborative expansion of the source code

Exciting Possibilities Created By NVDA Remote Access

NVDA Remote Access will give blind users the freedom to enjoy a number of career and educational options. Blind Technical Support Professionals and amateurs alike can Use NVDA Remote access to connect to their clients computers remotely in real time and walk them through multi-step procedures or teach them new applications, techniques and workflows. Educators can hear what their students are doing on their computers and vice versa, providing a perfect environment for hands-on training from afar. Whether in an office down the hall or a datacenter on the other side of the globe, NVDA Remote access will provide powerful, minimal latency access to the Windows desktop via speech.

Why You Should Contribute To This Project

Blind people are passionate about moving from beneficiaries to contributors. Unfortunately their forward momentum is often inhibited by software that is as cost-prohibitive as it is difficult to navigate. NVDA Remote Access is built on a platform designed for maximum efficiency with minimal prerequisite training.

The $10,000 funding goal will be invested directly into the research, development and maintenance of the product. The software design is specialized enough to require experienced software engineers to create and launch the software, and while a relatively low cost professional Windows programmer costs in excess of $75 per hour, Tyler Spivey and Christopher Toth, owners of [GetAccessibleApps] and founding members of [3 Mouse Technology,] agreed to make this contribution to the blindness community for a fraction of their traditional development cost.

With NVDA Remote Access in hand, blind computer users will capitalize on the results of your investment without the undue burden of spending exorbitant amounts per copy to perform the same computer tasks sighted colleagues perform out of the box. NVDA Remote Access will be another step forward in improving employment, educational and lifestyle opportunities for this traditionally underserved community.

story:
Hi! My name is Gratiano. I am a product designer focus on mobile device accessories and camera accessories.

As a designer, I don't just seat and think inside the box. I will use the products, talking to other users about what they think and what they want.

After months of developing and testing. I am here to introdue you a new exciting product called: Validus

The idea behind the Validus is to create a case which can suit most iPad 2 / The new iPad users everyday needs. 

- It is strong with good protection ability since it is made with aluminum. 

- It is light weight because it is also made with PE/nylon to keep the weight down to a minumum.

- It is multi-functional due to the Validus is capable to set different standing positions and angles, and able to rotate in 360 degrees for more flexiblilty at the same time. 

- Plus the two-ways magnetic switch which can put your iPad into sleep mode on both top and bottom directions.

- The most important thing of all is the beauty of the Validus is second to none. It is crucial to design the Validus which can seamlessly compliment Apple's style and design.

2 different standing positions

Part of the difficulty to create this product is to find the right materials and how to implement them together into one. The case itself each plate is produce with 2 pieces of aluminum sandwiched with PE/nylon inside in order to maintain it strong but light weight characteristic.

The PE/nylon is also to helps lock the flipping parts back to the original possible becuase of it flexibility which aluminum lacks. Also to keep the case as thin as possible.

The high pressure hinge helps to maintain the iPad to hold at an angle, and will not losen for a very long time.

The hook plug is very important part of this creation, it is to help securely locking the flip position in place without fallen apart. And it just look nice on its own.

The iPad back cover is also a mix of 2 materials to maintain its flexibility and to minimize its weight. We've been tested with many different combinations before we finally settled with the current composition.

We Need Your Support

In order to put this product into reality. We will need the funding for the following purposes:

- The tooling needed for the alumimum and PE/nylon sandwiching process.

- The moulding for the iPad back cover.

- All the materials itself. In order to make this as affordable as possible, we need to place a large order and buy all parts in bulk.

- The high pressure hinge which is specially created for this product.

- The assembling. It is all done by hand.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think this looks cool please spread the wordUse the different share options on this page to let your friends know about this campaign.

- The most important thing of all is the beauty of the Validus is second to none. It is crucial to design the Validus which can seamlessly compliment Apple's style and design.

2 different standing positions


Part of the difficulty to create this product is to find the right materials and how to implement them together into one. The case itself each plate is produce with 2 pieces of aluminum sandwiched with PE/nylon inside in order to maintain it strong but light weight characteristic.
The PE/nylon is also to helps lock the flipping parts back to the original possible becuase of it flexibility which aluminum lacks. Also to keep the case as thin as possible.

The high pressure hinge helps to maintain the iPad to hold at an angle, and will not losen for a very long time.
The hook plug is very important part of this creation, it is to help securely locking the flip position in place without fallen apart. And it just look nice on its own.

The iPad back cover is also a mix of 2 materials to maintain its flexibility and to minimize its weight. We've been tested with many different combinations before we finally settled with the current composition.
We Need Your Support
In order to put this product into reality. We will need the funding for the following purposes:
- The tooling needed for the alumimum and PE/nylon sandwiching process.
- The moulding for the iPad back cover.
- All the materials itself. In order to make this as affordable as possible, we need to place a large order and buy all parts in bulk.
- The high pressure hinge which is specially created for this product.
- The assembling. It is all done by hand.
Other Ways You Can Help


If you think this looks cool please spread the wordUse the different share options on this page to let your friends know about this campaign.

story:
Official Press Kit is here!




Click Here to Learn About Our Rewards Program - Share and Get Money Back!
















What is the battery life for SafeBand and Safe Tags?   

The SafeBand battery will last from 7 to 30 days and depends on the intensity of use and quantity of Safe Tags connected. SafeBand Safe Tag battery (CR2032) will last anywhere from 6 to 9 months, after which it can be easily replaced.   

What is the radius of SafeBand's signal?   

SafeBand employs Bluetooth Smart technology, so it's radius is from 5 to 50 meters depending on environment (thick walls, crowded rooms). Safe Tag uses the same principles and technology as the bracelet, so it's radius is the same.   

How protected are SafeBand and Safe Tag?   

SafeBand is water-resistant up to IP67 standard. It means that the bracelet is protected from long-term water exposure. Bear in mind, however, that the leather strap is not waterproof and may be damaged.  In case of Safe Tag getting wet, we recommend to remove the battery, let the device dry out, and turn it back on. The electronics inside Safe Tag will be water- and short circuit-protected.   

How does SafeBand switch between the ‘home’, ‘office’ and ‘street’ modes?   

SafeBand combines three methods - it uses GPS and WiFi on your smartphone and a stationary Safe Tag (if you choose to use a tag for this purpose) to identify your location. Once you’ve set it up via application, SafeBand will recognize when you’re at home, and not send alarms if you leave tagged objects in one room and move to another. However, once you leave your house and you’re outside, SafeBand switches to street mode and keeps track of your valuables more closely, to alarm you to any potential loss. You can also choose to set any of these modes manually.   

Will SafeBand give false alarms for theft or loss of devices?   

Safety is SafeBand's main priority, so while we worked hard to minimize the false alarms, we chose to not compromise the reliability. However, the user is free to set the range for SafeBand alarm, and change it depending on the environment.   

How do I use Safe Tags? How do they protect my things?   

Safe Tag can be used as a sticker and pendant, you choose how to attach it to the objects. The Safe Tag keeps track of the tagged object’s movement and acceleration, so if the object starts moving (e.g., falls or is stolen), it will start buzzing, and the bracelet will vibrate. Same when the tagged object leaves the bracelet range (e.g., you forget something on your desk). 

Is wearing SafeBand every day harmful to my health?   

No. Bluetooth Low Energy is completely safe. You can wear SafeBand daily, you can sleep with SafeBand on. 

If I lose my SafeBand, can anyone access all the passwords stored on it?   

No. Your SafeBand will be connected to the application and will require authorization; nobody can use your band, or gain access to the information stored on it without this authorization. The bracelet is a personal identifier, not a password storage, so stealing the bracelet doesn't mean access to your access keys.   

What if I forget online account password?   

You can restore it with your email address.   

Can I do all the set up for SafeBand myself?

  It’s very simple. You will not need do more than charge your bracelet, download an application and follow a few easy steps. All the settings are ready in default mode for you to start using the bracelet from the box. If you want to learn all the tricks, however, we will also provide you with a manual. 

What if my bracelet is out of charge? Will the Safe Tags still work?   

Yes. You can operate your Safe Tags through your smartphone. But don’t worry - you can also charge your SafeBand from any USB port using enclosed charging cable.   

So when do I get it?   

We estimate the delivery at November, 2015 in the US. Shipments in the US are free. However, if you require international shipment, it will cost about $15 additionally and may take longer. It depends on the local delivery particulars.

SafeBand employs patent pending technology.

story:
StopSpy is the best webcam cover! It protects all devices: mobile phones, tablets, laptops and desktops computer.

Small StopSpy for mobile phones and tablets

Large StopSpy fo laptops and desktops

 

StopSpy Cover featured in:

Designed to cover webcams on cellphones, tablets, and computers. World's thinnest webcam cover (0.3 mm).

Install it in 3 seconds! Cover your webcam at your convenience. Protect all your devices: mobile phones, tablets, laptops and desktops computer. Made from flexible plastic. It also comes in different colors. StopSpy is compact and never falls.

Stop Spy is best webcam cover, a hardware solution that guarantees that no one (spyware or similar) is spying on you. The urgency of covering your webcam is high now! International security agencies like the FBI recommend protecting all cameras on phones, laptops and desktops. All this because of the large number of spywares that circulate on the internet.

From just 20 euros, anyone without programming knowledge, can buy spyware on the internet! These programs fully track the victim, and can even remotely activate the webcams in phones, tablets and other devices, Taking photos and videos without your consent. Criminals, jealous partners or just business competitors can easily access these programs and use the cameras in your devices to spy on you.

Here are some news articles about it :

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-...

https://www.nytimes.com/2016/06/23/technology/p...

http://www.businessinsider.com/fbi-director-cov...

http://smoda.elpais.com/moda/mundo-tapa-las-cam...

http://computerhoy.com/noticias/software/creepw...

https://www.merca20.com/fbi-recomienda-tapar-we...

 

 

Why you should cover your laptop camera. by: Tech Insider

Other webcam covers are:

  • Difficult to install. 
  • They consist of 2 or 3 parts that can be lost easily. 
  • Made out of metal or magnets that can affect or break your screens. 
  • Too thick! They prevent your laptop from closing properly. 

 

The StopSpy Webcam Cover is:

  • Really the thinnest on the market! Just 0.3mm / 0.012 inches thin. 
  • Can be installed in just 3 seconds! Simply slide it open or close. 
  •  Fits on all mobile devices, tablets and computers on the market.
  •  We included FREE worldwide shipping! (For pledged of more than 15 Euros).

World's thinnest (0.3mm). Really the most compact webcam cover!

Hi, my name is Ismael Soltero. I have been a member of the Spanish Civil Guard (National Police Force) for the past ten years and I have seen the cyber-crime rate grow year by year: cyber harassment and extortion of individuals and companies. To solve this problem, and so you won’t have to keep putting post-its on your webcams, I have invented: StopSpy, the security sticker you can open and close whenever you want. After a year of development, we have managed to create the thinnest gadget on the market to cover the webcams on mobile devices, laptops, and desktops, as thin as the post-it you used to use to cover your webcam. Please support us and share this campaign with all your friends and relatives, so that StopSpy can reach every household.

story:
Mofin is the world’s best gravity wireless charger. The natural gravity and weight of the phone makes it conveniently secure or take it out in just seconds. Just place your phone on the top of the charger and its arms will automatically lock the phone in place to start charging. With its unique triangle fixed design, it holds your phone firmly even when you’re turning or at a speed bump.

 

 

Mofin employs Qi inductive charging technology to charge your phone effortlessly so you don’t have to worry about finding outlets or connecting to power cords. It works with iPhone X, 8/8 Plus, Galaxy Note 8, S8+ and any other Qi-compatible phones.

 

 

Compared with the mainstream wireless chargers in the market that charges slowly, Mofin offers a better solution.The conversion efficiency of Mofin has increased up to 80%, which is faster than most wireless chargers since they can only reach 60%. With the 10w fast charging, Mofin can charge faster a lot compared with the 5w chargers.

 

 

Mofin wireless charger is easy to set up to use and stable than ever. In addition to being a car mount, the design of the clip makes it fit for most air vents. Unlike other mounts, when you use them for a long time, they will be loosed. The screwable rotation knob makes Mofin stable on your car and keeps your phone secure and insight for navigating.

 

 

The Mofin charger is made of plastic material with a bracket crafted from anodized aluminum covered with non-slip silicone at each end of the arm to better protect your phone from scratches and hold it firmly.

 

 

  

 

 Mofin Kit includes:

  • Mofin Wireless Charger
  • USB Cable
  • Premium Car Mount
  • Convenient Desk Stander

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We took about a year to design and test the prototypes and samples. Now, we’ve finally found the perfect balance between charging efficiency and the structure of the charger.

 

 

We are a start-up specializing in creating convenient daily electronic gadgets. We are an energetic team that loves creating innovative products to solve programs people face daily. 

We started the project by considering how we can improve our daily charging life.We found out that even with the current wireless charger, people are still experiencing problems. Through an extensive commitment in R&D, we are happy to bring you the Mofin, a much more versatile and easy to use wireless charging kit.

Piwere Mofin represents our passion and goal to provide cool and creative phone accessories to your daily life. Thank you, our fans and supporters who shown us much love along this journey. With your help, ideas, and feedback, we will continue to create useful accessories for everyone around the world.

story:
Short Summary 

The Canmaxx was invented by Warren McDuffie, a devoted husband and father of twin sons.  "My innovation was driven by the need to find a simple solution to the problem of recycling not being easy enough for more people to practice regularly."  Once the concept was turned into a working plastic printed prototype, we knew we had something that could do way more than just help people recycle!

  

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • In order to make the molds for the product which will last up to 1 million products made and to manufacture the initial run of 5,000 CanMaxx's, we need to raise $30,000. 
  • The funds will also go to packaging and UPC coding.
  • Not only will you be able to pre-order CanMaxx in different volumes, you'll get them at wholesale cost!  Talk about Perks!!! That's half of the MSRP of $19.99.
  • If we don't reach the total goal, all funds will be put towards the molds first.  Then, all of the pre-orders will be filled with the remaining funds.  Every pre-order will be fulfilled, guaranteed.

The Impact

For years, the benefits of recycling have increased the numbers of people recycling in their homes, offices or work places but knowledge of benefits hasn't been enough to get the 47% of Americans who don't recycle regularly to participate.  With this one simple, yet highly functional product, recycling can become as easy as throwing something away.  Thus, compelling the folks who want to "be green" and removing the excuse of inconvenience from their arguments.  It's so easy that kids can secure the adapter.

  • CanMaxx makes recycling parctical  and even fun. 
  • CanMaxx isn't just for recycling.  it can hold two laundry bags in one hamper to help separate white and color clothes.  It can hold pet or live stock feed in a single container or how about separating grass trimings from sticks?  It is there for the user to choose what container they want to Maximize!
  • The midwests largest recycling vendor stated that, "the CanMaxx, just makes sense."  And that a product that doesn't force people to re-learn how to use a garbage can but re-invents, the possiblities of its use is truly exciting!"
  • I have invested over $20,000 of my own money to get to this point and now its a click away from Maximizing the worlds efficiency.


Risks & Challenges

Feedback from injection mold manufacturers via RFQ's for  manufacturing the molds and production of the product uncovered the remaining challenges that we had to deal with and overcome. 

  •  I found out that I had over engineered the CanMaxx's design and I needed to simplify  it for injection molding.
  • The process of 3D printing the CanMaxx unfortunately, isn't viable for large scale manufacturing as it costs over $100 each and can take more than half a day to create one.
  • Working with my designer, one of the best in the world, I was able to create a design that would be injection moldable and  would function at the highest level, making it easy to secure any desired bag to the adapter.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, here are a couple ways you can still help.

  • Use one of the handy Indiegogo share tools to share this project.
  • Recycle!!

story:
CRITICAL UPDATE

During the post-recording editing of episode 39, our onboard video card died. We are now unable to produce anything. This could mean the end for the NGC. Would be great to update the video above, but we can't. Please give or share. Your support matters.

THE NO GOD CAST

The No God Cast is a long-form interview show featuring interviews with well-known and infamous atheists, theists, humanists, and creationists. We've interviewed Sean Carroll, David Silverman, Ray Comfort, D.J. Grothe, Jerry Dewitt, Mark Sandlin, Madison Kimrey, Peter Boghossian, Dale McGowan, and many others. Find episodes at NoGodCast.com

WHAT WE NEED

A workstation PC capable of the video processing power we require to offer live streaming events, and other video-based features and special events to our listeners.

WHY WE NEED IT

The show is currently recorded on an Acer Aspire V laptop with i5 intel processor and 8gigs of RAM. There are multiple issues with this configuration, the biggest being that the video memory is onboard - this combined with the fact that multiple USB devices are being used during a recording, makes coherent video recording nearly impossible (very choppy and capture freezes frequently). 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

  • Give whatever money you can
  • Share this fundraiser with your social networks

story:
We are Protek Innovations and we make products that limit exposure to cell phone radiation. My partners and I all met in college at UCLA, where several of us studied electrical engineering. As we were graduating from college, cell phones had permeated the scene. Everyone we knew was growing increasingly more attached to these gadgets. 

During my younger years, my father and his partners always carried around cell phones and pagers because they were on call as emergency room physicians. As a child, those massive devices with their huge antennas made my father and his friends look like astronauts calling the moon. I could never understand how those phones could work without “roasting” the user. 

One day, my father came home with the terrible news that his close friend and business partner, Mickey, discovered a tumor behind his ear as he was combing his hair and needed immediate surgery. A few days later my father attended Mickey's funeral. Since then, we have wondered about cell phone radiation and its potentially harmful side effects. 

For those of us left mourning Mickey’s sudden death, we found it very odd that Mickey developed a brain tumor so quickly. Over the years, as more and more friends were stricken with powerful and rapidly spreading cancers, I began to reflect on how precious life is, and how quickly it can be taken away. 

 

 

It may sound silly, but ProTek was literally started to Prot-e-k people from consumer technology. The team members are seasoned developers, inventors and engineers having invented some of the coolest accessories in consumer electronics, some of which I am sure you can recall for their ingeniousness and cleverness. 

After a long weekend in Sedona Arizona, where we met people who were immersed in alternative healing, and learned the healing power of crystals, meditation and energy, our mission became clear and we set out to build our first product, WaveBlocker. 

The first prototype started with shielding materials we sourced from around the world and thankfully one of our team members, who was very knowledgeable in RF helped us engineer a solution that we believe is so elegant it has to be seen to be believed. 

We created WaveBlocker for those like us, who are skeptical and do not like making a call with our handset placed against our head. When we did the research we found that there were many large organizations funded by cell phone companies trying to keep news about cell phone radiation quiet. 

Based on our research, we have discovered that there is something known as SAR, or Specific Absorption Ratio, which is basically a guideline for device manufacturers regarding how much radiation their device can generate while being deemed safe. 

We have seen experiments showing seedlings exposed to radiation and what happens. We all know how red, hot, and sometimes even sweaty our ears get when we are on long calls. SAR is different for all models of phones but one thing all manufacturers agree on is that operate cell phones safely, should not come in direct contact the body, meaning they should not be held up to your head. 

Initially, we were skeptical. How could this be real? We continued researching and discovered in the fine print, under the RF exposure tab on Apple’s website, it clearly indicates how much distance a user must keep between themselves and their device to be SAR complaint. We further discovered it is recommended that a user maintain a .5mm distance between themselves and their phone, something that most people do not do. 

All of us at Protek wondered what all of this cumulative exposure to what is known in the scientific community as non-ionizing radiation is doing to us little by little each day. 

WaveBlocker is designed as a passive circuit, meaning it has not power source such as a battery. Wave blocker converts the cell phone radiation your cell phone ordinarily gives off into electricity and then harmless light energy by turning on a little LED light. WaveBlocker lets our customers know it is “Proteking” them with an LED light that flutters on and off. 

WaveBlocker is significant because it simply reduces the cumulative exposure to cell phone radiation we expose ourselves every day. When you see WaveBlocker’s red LED flutter you can be sure our patented circuit is converting the cell phone radiation your phone ordinarily emits into electricity and then into harmless light. 

Our backers and supporters will help us iterate our technology into a cell phone case for a multitude of different devices. Our circuitry was carefully designed by an experienced team and has been tested in a lab and shown to significantly reduce exposure. Our dream is to incorporate this technology into the device one day and enter into licensing deals with the manufactures to include this safety technology.

 

 

This company has survived many years of getting by when times were tough and finances were limited. Somehow, we managed to make 2 highly functional prototypes, a lab certification on performance and patent(s). 

This team is a resourceful scrappy bunch and we will not stop until we see millions of cell phone cases with our cell phone radiation mitigation technology embedded. This team has been doing this for several years because we want to be the best at making a technology that can be of service and actually make a difference. Our perseverance is there because we enjoy making things with each other and have built a camaraderie over the years. 

With people buying $65M each year in cell phone accessories that simply prolong battery life or protect devices, we see a far more important health concern with selling all these consumers WaveBlocker Smartcases with our technology to reduce exposure. 

We see cell phone proliferation as a part of our society that isn’t going away, and usage will only increase. If I am going to continue to have to hold this huge device against my head for another 10 years, I want the peace of mind that goes along with having a WaveBlocker.

 

 

 

 

We are raising $4000 to manufacture a cell phone case prototype and optimize our design for other cell phone models including Android devices. 

Our goal is to have a circuit that functions for all Apple iPhone models and Android devices. Our current prototype functions universally on the majority of mobile devices which have multiple antennas. 

During our research, we found that Apple and Samsung devices have multiple antennas located on the top and bottom of each device. In our next iteration of the circuit, we intend to focus on the antennae closest to the users head in order to limit radiation exposure to the head and neck. 

Our current design was tested in an independent lab – the same one used by the device manufacturers to test efficacy – and when tested, WaveBlocker reduced exposure by 65%. 

If we do not reach our entire goal we will be delivering the WaveBlocker units we sell and exploring alternative ways to fund the next step which is integrating our circuit design into a cell phone case design. We have identified firms to work with and hope that the crowd fund will help us reach those interested in supporting us by purchasing a WaveBlocker, or one of the other perks. 

Our goal is to make products that are made in the USA and priced competitively so everyone can benefit from the technology and we need the IndieGogo communities help us to get there. This is why we are selling our wave blocker units at discounted pricing during this crowd fund.

 

 

 

 

 

 

This project is valuable to the contributor because they will be part of an awareness movement, where transparency reigns. We don’t want the SAR information relegated to the small print. We want manufacturers to inform consumers, and not sell products that are designed to only be safe in certain conditions. We all place our devices in our pockets or to our faces and we shouldn’t have to worry about the health risks that can come with such a benign act. 

Helping us get a WaveBlocker in the hands of another conscious consumer has a worldly impact because we are all connected today in this globalized world and economy. It is important that consumers of the world stand for transparency with the companies they support and accept nothing less. Buying a WaveBlocker might not do much in the short term to stop manufacturers from relegating the things they don’t want you to see, but hopefully it will strengthen the community of self-aware consumers who are not afraid to question everything.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram and please support us by giving a comment, share and like for the content we work so hard to put out. We thank you and appreciate your support in getting to know us and understanding our journey. We hope that the people will help us fund our next steps so we can bring this technology to everyone and make WaveBlocker a household name.

 

Shaun Baden - CEO

Business development specialist as well as technology entrepreneur, Shaun Baden has collaborated successfully with a myriad of start-ups. Shaun brings to the table 15 years of venture fundraising acumen, a talent for human capital acquisition, and an eye for identification and curation of valuable venture partner relationships. Recent projects of note include Ring A Doc, which put patients in touch with physicians and sold to private buyers in 2014; Jerkfit, an innovative Crossfit apparel brand; Invigorade, the first and only non-GMO, GRAS approved, beta-alinine endurance beverage. Shaun earned a B.S. in psychology with a minor in economics at University of California-Los Angeles (UCLA).

 

Technical Advisor

Sunny Trinh is a 24 year veteran in the semi-conductor and electronics industry. He is currently VP of Demand Creation for Avnet Electronics, where he helps companies solve problems and hardware startups successfully move from idea to production to revenue.  He is also an advisor and lecturer for local incubators Hub 101 and Impact Hub. Sunny is a co-founder of 9 Fish Surfboards.  He was an adjunct professor for Cal Lutheran University's MBA program where he developed the school's technology tract.  Sunny holds a Bachelor's and Master's degree in Engineering from Harvey Mudd College and an MBA from Cal Lutheran University
story_txt:
We are Protek Innovations and we make products that limit exposure to cell phone radiation. My partners and I all met in college at UCLA, where several of us studied electrical engineering. As we were graduating from college, cell phones had permeated the scene. Everyone we knew was growing increasingly more attached to these gadgets. 
During my younger years, my father and his partners always carried around cell phones and pagers because they were on call as emergency room physicians. As a child, those massive devices with their huge antennas made my father and his friends look like astronauts calling the moon. I could never understand how those phones could work without “roasting” the user. 
One day, my father came home with the terrible news that his close friend and business partner, Mickey, discovered a tumor behind his ear as he was combing his hair and needed immediate surgery. A few days later my father attended Mickey's funeral. Since then, we have wondered about cell phone radiation and its potentially harmful side effects. 
For those of us left mourning Mickey’s sudden death, we found it very odd that Mickey developed a brain tumor so quickly. Over the years, as more and more friends were stricken with powerful and rapidly spreading cancers, I began to reflect on how precious life is, and how quickly it can be taken away. 
 

 
It may sound silly, but ProTek was literally started to Prot-e-k people from consumer technology. The team members are seasoned developers, inventors and engineers having invented some of the coolest accessories in consumer electronics, some of which I am sure you can recall for their ingeniousness and cleverness. 
After a long weekend in Sedona Arizona, where we met people who were immersed in alternative healing, and learned the healing power of crystals, meditation and energy, our mission became clear and we set out to build our first product, WaveBlocker. 
The first prototype started with shielding materials we sourced from around the world and thankfully one of our team members, who was very knowledgeable in RF helped us engineer a solution that we believe is so elegant it has to be seen to be believed.

story:
What is Ninja Bodyguard?

Ninja Bodyguard is a mobile app designed to keep people safe and to provide a discreet way to alert others that something is up.

How can Ninja Bodyguard help you? Suppose:

  • You get pulled over by the police. Without taking your phone out of your pocket, you trigger the app to start audio recording, just in case.

  • You are on a blind date. It isn't going well, so you reach into your purse (without breaking eye contact) and trigger an alert. Seconds later, your friend responds by calling you with the perfect excuse to get out of there.

  • You are walking around and you notice that someone is following you. Without looking, you reach into your bag and trigger an alert. Audio recording starts automatically, and within a few seconds a Neighborhood Ninja is calling you to make sure you are ok.

  • You are having a conversation, and something about it makes you feel uncomfortable. Without arousing suspicion, you reach into your pocket and start recording audio, which you can use or refer to later.

  • You are walking home from your library at night. It takes you 10 minutes to get home, so you set a delayed alert for 15 minutes. If something happens to you on your way home, the timer counts down to zero, triggering a text message and your location to your group. When you get home safely, a single tap disarms and resets the timer.

What We Need & What You Get

Ninja Bodyguard is already available on the Google Play store with all of the features above. With your help, we can bring those features to iPhone users and provide the kind of testing needed to make sure the app always works when you need it most.

Here's where this project is headed:

  • iOS Development 
    • What: First and foremost, let's create an iPhone version of the app.
    • Why: currently, Ninja Bodyguard is Android only.
    • Need: 30 hours of a professional's time to jump-start the conversion to iOS.
    • What You Get: a beautiful iOS ninja and equal protection for iPhone users.
    • Bottom Line: $1800 = 30 hours X $60 per hour of expert's time.
  • Safety Network Feature
    • What: This web-based service makes sure a ninja always has your back. If and whenever you trigger an alarm, a (human) Neighborhood Ninja will be notified that you need help, along with your GPS coordinates. Your NN will try to reach you for 90 seconds, and if you don't pick up or otherwise respond, you'll know local emergency response teams will be on their way.
    • Why: Add an extra layer of notification and security for everyone who opts in.
    • Need: 10 hours professional development
    • What You Get: A guarantee that within 90 seconds, someone will try to help you.
    • Bottom Line: $600 = 10 hours X $60 per hour
  • App Unit Testing
    • What: Rigorous testing to make sure the app doesn't crash, notifications are always triggered, and your Ninja is always dependable.
    • Why: This is an app someone might depend on in an emergency. It needs to work 100% of the time.
    • Need: At least 10 hours of professional-grade performance testing
    • What You Get: A reliable app you can count on
    • Bottom Line: $600 = 10 hours X $60 per hour
  • Artwork
    • What: A visually appealing user interface.
    • Why: People are more likely to use if if they love it, and to love an app, it needs to be beautiful.
    • Need: Beautiful icons, badges, Ninjas, and overall design tweaks.
    • What You Get: An app that looks so pretty, you actually want to use and share it.
    • Bottom Line: $500 = 20 hours X $25 per hour
  • Videos
    • What: Show everyone how easy it is to use the app through a quick, professional overview video
    • Why: To get the word out, generate interest, and explain the purpose of the app
    • Need: Two 30-60 videos
    • What You Get: A beautiful promotional clip to share with anyone interested in the app
    • Bottom Line: $400 = Two videos at $200 each
  • Used iPhone
    • What: I need an iPhone to effectively build and test the iOS version of the app
    • Why: My primary phone is an Android (Nexus 6).
    • Need: A used iPhone for testing purposes
    • What You Get: Ninja Bodyguard for iOS
    • Bottom Line: $200 = two used, slightly older iPhone versions
  • Promotional Hardware
    • What: Keychains and stickers to advertise Ninja Bodyguard
    • Why: We want to distribute merch at a few academic campuses to help generate interest and get feedback.
    • Need: Designs and resources to commission merchandise.
    • What You Get: Back the project to get some of the merch for yourself.
    • Bottom Line: $400 = 300 stickers ($0.33 x 300) + 250 keychains ($1.20 x 250)
  • Software
    • What: Adobe Illustrator
    • Why: This goes back to making the app look beautiful and professional
    • Need: A subscription to Adobe Illustrator for at least 5 months
    • Bottom Line: $100 = 5 months X $20 per month

The Impact

[From the X Prize Website] The Anu & Naveen Jain Women’s Safety XPRIZE is a $1 million global competition that challenges teams to leverage technology to empower communities with a transformative solution that ensures women’s safety. Armed with innovative safety nets, communities everywhere can rapidly respond to threats against any of its members, ensuring that help is always available when needed. The winning team’s solution will autonomously and inconspicuously trigger an emergency alert while transmitting information to a network of community responders, all within 90 seconds and at an annual cost of $40 or less.

This campaign is about more that just creating the best Ninja Bodyguard - it's about winning the Anu & Naveen Jain Women’s Safety XPRIZE competition. 

  • What's better than $40 annually? Free for life. Ninja Bodyguard and the Ninja Neighborhood will always be absolutely free.
  • Consider this an investment. I will refund 1,000% (10x) every individual's contribution to the campaign if Ninja Bodyguard wins the X Prize competition. So if you contribute $20, I will refund you $200 if we win.
  • Level up that investment: contribute more than $100 and I pledge to refund 100x your contribution if/when Ninja Bodyguard wins the X Prize competition. 
    • Turn $200 into $20,000
    • Better odds than gambling or the lottery!

Risks & Challenges

Solid funding and collaboration will help Ninja Bodyguard win the XPRIZE and keep people safe. However, winning is not a guarantee. 

What I can guarantee is this:

  • I will continue working on Ninja Bodyguard until women's safety is not at risk in the world
  • The features that keep people safe should and always will be free
  • iOS Ninjas will be available eventually - and sooner, with your help
  • Smart Watch ninjas will also be available eventually

Other Ways You Can Help

Get involved in any way possible! 

  • Share the link to this campaign to help Ninja Bodyguard reach its potential
  • Tell your friends with Android to download the FREE Ninja Bodyguard app
  • Email suggestions for additional features you would like to see, or other feedback about the app or campaign: david@ninjabodyguard.org
  • Share the link to the website: NinjaBodyguard.org

Thanks for reading the the bottom - ten points for you!

story:
Imagine that a raging wildfire is spreading out of control, beyond management of firefighters, creeping closer to a rural neighborhood. Residents have been instructed to leave and only have time to collect their families, their selves, and a few precious items before fleeing to safety. Neighbors, family, and friends are forced to become onlookers as flames spread through their yards and begin to creep up the walls of their houses. Homes are devoured by flames, leaving behind charred skeletons of the structures they once were, irreplaceable belongings are reduced to ash. Lives are forever devistated and a solution is so clearly needed. What if there was a way to avoid all of this loss and heartache?

Dennis Cortese, an entrepreneuer from Fort Collins, Colorado, has created such a system to prevent the devistation associated with wildfires: FireStop. This inivative system will protect families and individuals from losing all they have when these threats approach mountain and rural areas.

FireStop is an automated fire suppresant system that protects homes from incoming wildfires. A holding tank of FireStop's heat resistant and flame retardent foam is installed anywhere on the building. Its sensors, fixated to the exterior of a home, indicate the threat of an approaching fire automatically. The system responds by releasing the foam through a series of nozzles; the home is encased with a layer of the foam that leaves wildfire flames with no opportunity to penetrate the structure. A wildfire can pass the protected home and leave it undamaged. The house and everything inside is safe while the fire moves on. This foam is patented and tested to be eco-friendly and successful in protecting homes through burning demonstrations. 

Dennis Cortese's patented invention is expontentially cheaper than similar fire suppresant systems on the market today. This eco-friendly product is also easy to install either by yourself or with the help of a contractor. We are currently raising funds to bring this product into complete fruition by bringing it to markets everywhere that are afflicted by wildfires. Right now we have a couple of prototypes, set to head to production.

Lives are forever devistated and a solution is so clearly needed. What if there was a way to avoid all of this loss and heartache?
Dennis Cortese, an entrepreneuer from Fort Collins, Colorado, has created such a system to prevent the devistation associated with wildfires: FireStop. This inivative system will protect families and individuals from losing all they have when these threats approach mountain and rural areas.
FireStop is an automated fire suppresant system that protects homes from incoming wildfires. A holding tank of FireStop's heat resistant and flame retardent foam is installed anywhere on the building. Its sensors, fixated to the exterior of a home, indicate the threat of an approaching fire automatically. The system responds by releasing the foam through a series of nozzles; the home is encased with a layer of the foam that leaves wildfire flames with no opportunity to penetrate the structure. A wildfire can pass the protected home and leave it undamaged. The house and everything inside is safe while the fire moves on. This foam is patented and tested to be eco-friendly and successful in protecting homes through burning demonstrations. 
Dennis Cortese's patented invention is expontentially cheaper than similar fire suppresant systems on the market today. This eco-friendly product is also easy to install either by yourself or with the help of a contractor. We are currently raising funds to bring this product into complete fruition by bringing it to markets everywhere that are afflicted by wildfires. Right now we have a couple of prototypes, set to head to production.

story:
Revolution has come! Make calls, send text messages and emails, share photos and files in your 50+ favorite apps unlimited worldwide.

 

Avirsim is specially developed for you and your favorite apps that you use daily. Now you will always be online and stay in touch with your friends and family no matter where you are: home, on a business trip or on vacation. Avirsim covers 200 countries and more than 400 networks. It became possible with the development of a smart data chip that produces intelligent high efficient global data connectivity and reliable multi-network connections.

We guarantee that from now on you will not miss any of your important calls, messages, emails or notifications.

 

Compatible apps

 

Avirsim connecting people

 

We guarantee you incredible savings

Avirsim saves up to 89% on your mobile internet spending when you are abroad. Compared to your local operator, Avirsim is always on your side. Economy and balance awareness is Avirsim's main prerogative. That’s why we bring the best and unique solutions for frequent travelers that need to stay secure online anytime and anywhere.

Comfort

Comfort is what Avirsim strives for when it’s up to global data feature. There is no more need to change your sim or buy a local one when you are traveling to a new destination country.   With Avirsim’s high intelligent chip you always feel yourself home thanks to flat-rate tariffs that it offers on its behalf.

Coverage

Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Anguilla, Antigua and Barbuda, Argentina, Armenia, Aruba, Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Barbados, Belarus, Belgium, Benin, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Triple sim (3 in 1)

Averim’s chip uniqueness is that we have implemented more than 400 networks 200 countries at local rates. Its technology provides intelligent high efficient global data connectivity.

 

Compatible with various devices

Avirsim is compatible with any mobile device that has a sim card slot. No matter what operating system your device is running on Avirsim will connect it to the network.

 

Why you should contribute for Avirsim

 

Anonymity & encrypted data transfer

This is why we call Avirsim awesome! All data traffic is encrypted so you can feel yourself safe. We do not ask for your personal information, we do not collect store or distribute any information regarding your personal calls, emails or text messages, pictures and files or any type of access through your mobile browser.

 

Worldwide shipping

We will ship Avirsim right in your hands no matter where you are.

 

Unseen worldwide 4G LTE Tariffs

If you need more data for other applications or browsing Avirsim can offer unique worldwide data bundles starting from 10 MB and up to 20 GB or even more if you need. Also, you may activate unlimited worldwide data bundle for 24 hours.

 

Save your local phone number

Save your local phone number and use it for receiving in-app calls while traveling. No more need to setup any type of calls forwarding or redirection.

 

Support 24/7/365

We would like to be near you, that's why our support team will assist you not only via email and phone but also via your favorite apps like Whatsapp, Facebook, Viber and Line.

 

Timeline
