Does Aversim use any innovative technology? 
Yes, it is a smart data chip that produces highly efficient global data connectivity and reliable multi network connection. 

How may I activate Avirsim? 
For activation you have 2 options, you may activate Avirsim on our official website or download Avirsim application from Play Market or Appstore. 

I need more apps to be available on Avirsim service, what shall I do? 
If you need more apps available on your device you may use additional data bundle or if the app is popular and Aversim users will decide that they need this app on it, we will be able to add it. 

Do Aversim requires any type of identity document for activation? 
No, we do not ask for an identity document. 

Does Aversim encrypt all data while end user uses the chip? 
Yes, all data that end users use is encrypted at 2048 bits key, also we use latest VPN networks. 

What apps are supported by Avirsim? 
All compatible apps are listed on the top of this page in Compatible apps section. 

With what operating system Avirsim is compatible with? 
Avirsim is compatible with iOS, Android and Windows phone operating systems. 

My phone is locked on the local carrier, will I be able to use Avirsim? 
Avirsim is working flawlessly only with unlocked devices. 

I have a dual sim device, will Aversim work with my device? 
Yes Avirsim is compatible with dual sim devices, regardless what sim slot you use first or second. 

Whith what type of devices Avirsim is compatible with? 
Avirsim is compatible with any device that has a sim slot. 

May I use Aversim for M2M solution connectivity? 
Yes, for this type of requests please contact support@avircell.com 

When will perks be delivered? 
All perks will be delivered in accordance with the timeframe that is noted on the park. 

What shipping method Aversim uses for shipping?
Regular airmail shipping. 

How long does shipping take? 
Shipping takes about 1-3 weeks, all depends on the destination country. 

I haven't written my shipping address what shall I do? 
Please contact us directly at shipping@avircell.com we will solve the issue. 

Note! Please take more time while filling the shipping address for reviewing it if it matches your current address. 

I have not yet received my perk, what shall I do? 
Please contact us directly at shipping@avircell.com we will solve the issue.

 

Additional Terms for Avirsim Services and Features


1. Permissible and Prohibited Data Uses

Your Avirsim Service is intended for in-app voice calls, messaging, pictures and file sharing and similar activities on your device and does not include tethering. 
Unless explicitly permitted by your Avirsim service, other uses are not permitted.

Examples of prohibited uses include but are not limited to: 
(a) server devices or host computer applications, including automatic data feeds , continuous Web camera posts or broadcasts, automated machine-to-machine connections or peer-to-peer (P2P) file-sharing applications that are broadcast to multiple servers or recipients, "bots" or similar routines that could disrupt net user groups or email use by others or other applications that denigrate network capacity or functionality;
(b) as a substitute or backup for private lines or dedicated data connections; 
(c) any activity that affects the ability of other users or systems to use either Avirsim's services or the network-based resources of others, 
including the generation or dissemination of viruses, malware or "denial of service" attacks; 
(d) accessing, or attempting to access without authority, accounts or devices of others, the information, or to penetrate, or attempt to penetrate, 
Avirsim's or another entity's network or systems;
(e), running software or other devices that maintain continuously active Internet connections when a computer's connection would otherwise be idle, 
or "keep alive" functions. For example, you cannot use Avirsim for Web broadcasting, or for the operation of servers, telemetry devices and/or supervisory control and data or 
(f) engaging in atypical web usage behavior.

2. Protective Measures

To provide a good experience for the of our customers and minimize capacity issues and degradation in network performance we may take measures including 
temporarily reducing data throughput for a subset of customers who use a disproportionate amount of bandwidth. 
In addition, in the event that a customer is in violation of the Permissible and Prohibited Data Uses listed above, Avirsim may reduce your data speed or terminate data service without notice or refund. We may also suspend, terminate, or restrict your access to Avirsim services if 
you use them in a manner that is interfering with other customers' service, our ability to allocate network capacity among customers, or that otherwise may degrade service quality for other customers.


Prohibited Activities

Without limitation, you may not use (or allow anyone else to use) our Services to:

1) use, possess, transmit, upload, post, disseminate or otherwise make available content that is unlawful or violates the copyright or other intellectual property rights of others (as described in more detail below);

2) participate in any illegal soliciting or gaming schemes;

3) attempt to use the Services in such a manner so as to avoid incurring charges for usage;

4) participate in any fraudulent activities, including impersonating any person or entity or forging anyone else's digital or manual signature. 
You assume all risks regarding the determination of whether material is in the public domain;

5) access the Internet via the Services using Internet Protocol (IP) addresses other than the IP address(es) assigned to you by us;

6) invade another person's privacy or collect or store personal data about other users, or stalk or harass another person or entity;

7) access any computer, software, data or any confidential, copyright-protected or patent-protected material of any other person, without the knowledge and consent of that person, or use any tools designed to facilitate access, such as "packet sniffers";

8) upload, post, publish, deface, modify, transmit, reproduce, distribute in any way or otherwise make available information, software or other material protected by copyright or other proprietary or contractual right (such as a non-disclosure agreement) or related derivative works, without obtaining permission of the copyright owner or rightholder;

9) use, reproduce, distribute, sell, resell or otherwise exploit the Services or content we provide or which you obtain through the Services for any commercial purposes withouth our explicit permission;

10) copy, distribute, sub-license or otherwise make available any software or content we provide or make available to you or which you obtain through the Services, except as authorized by us;

11) alter, reproduce, or tamper with the Services or any function, component or identifier of your Equipment, such as the International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI), that is not meant to be altered, reproduced or tampered with;

12) restrict, inhibit or interfere with the ability of any person to access, use or enjoy the Internet, the Services or any Equipment used to connect to the Services, or create an unusually large burden on our networks, including, without limitation, posting, uploading, transmitting or otherwise making available information or software containing a virus, lock, key, bomb, worm, Trojan horse or other harmful, limiting, destructive or debilitating feature; distributing mass or unsolicited e-mail ("spam") or other messages; or otherwise generating levels of traffic sufficient to impede others' ability to send or retrieve information; 
or to use the Services in an abusive manner in connection with any unlimited packages, options or promotions.

13) disrupt any backbone network nodes or network service, or otherwise restrict, disrupt, inhibit or impede our ability to monitor or deliver the Services, any transmissions or data;

14) interfere with computer networking or telecommunications service to or from any Internet user, host, provider or network, including, without limitation, denying service attacks, overloading a service, improperly seizing or abusing operator privileges ("hacking"), or attempting to "crash" a host;

15) use the Services for anything other than your own personal purposes (such as reselling the Services, providing Internet access or any other feature of the Services to any third party) or share or transfer your Services without our express consent;


16) forge headers or otherwise manipulate identifiers in order to disguise the origin of any content transmitted through the Services; or

17) port scan a person's computer or wireless device without that person's consent, or use any tools designed to facilitate these scans.


Unlawful or Inappropriate Content

Any Avirsim service Party, reserves the right to move, remove or refuse to post any content, in whole or in part, that it, in its sole discretion, decides is unacceptable, undesirable or in violation of the Terms . This includes, without limitation:

1) defamatory, fraudulent or deceptive statements;

2) threatening, intimidating, abusive or harassing statements;

3) content that violates the privacy rights or intellectual property rights of others;

4) content that unlawfully promotes or incites hatred;

5) content that is otherwise offensive or objectionable; or

6) any transmissions constituting or encouraging conduct that would constitute a criminal offence, give rise to civil liability or otherwise violate any municipal, provincial, federal or international law, order or regulation.

For purposes of this terms, "content" refers to all forms of communications including, without limitation, text, graphics (including photographs, images, illustrations, drawings, logos), executable programs, audio recordings, and audiovisual recordings .

 

Security

As set out above, you are responsible for any misuse of the Services, by your or by any other person with access to the Services through your Equipment or your account. Therefore, you must take steps to ensure that others do not gain unauthorized access to the Services through any means, including, without limitation, wireless networking. The Services may not be used to breach the security of another user or to attempt to gain access to any other person's equipment, software or data, without the knowledge and consent of such person. Additionally, the Services may not be used in any attempt to circumvent the user authentication or security of any host, network, or account, including, without limitation, accessing data not intended for you, logging into or making use of a server or account you are not expressly authorized to access, or probing the security of other networks. Use or distribution of tools designed for compromising security, such as password guessing programs, cracking tools, packet sniffers or network probing tools, is prohibited. You may not disrupt the Services. 
The Services also may not be used to interfere with computer networking or telecommunications services to any user, host or network, including, without limitation, 
denial of service attacks, flooding of a network, overloading a service, improper seizing and abuse of operator privileges and attempts to "crash" a host. 
The transmission or dissemination of any information or software that contains a virus or other harmful feature is also prohibited. You are solely responsible for the security of any device you choose to connect to the Services, including any data stored on that device. In particular, Avirsim recommends against enabling file or printer sharing of any sort. Avirsim recommends that any files or services you do choose to make available for remote access be protected with a strong password or as otherwise appropriate. You agree to treat as confidential all access codes, personal identification numbers and/or other passwords that we may provide to you for use with the Services.

Unsolicited Communications

The Services may not be used to send unsolicited, bulk or commercial messages or for any other unsolicited communications. 
This includes, without limitation, using automatic-dialing and announcing devices to or otherwise make unsolicited voice or facsimile calls and bulk mailing of commercial advertising, informational announcements, charity requests, petitions for signatures and political or religious messages. 
Such communications may only be directed to those who have explicitly requested it. The Services may not be used to send messages to any individual who has indicated that he/she does not wish to receive messages from you. The Services may not be used to collect responses from unsolicited e-mail messages sent from accounts on Internet hosts or e-mail services that violate this terms or the acceptable use policy of any other service provider. 
Also, unsolicited e-mail messages may not direct the recipient to any web site or other resource that uses the Services. 
Forging, altering or removing e-mail headers is prohibited. The propagation of chain letters is as well prohibited, whether or not the recipient wishes to receive such mailings. Avirsim is not responsible for the forwarding of e-mail sent to any account that has been suspended or terminated. 
Such e-mail will be returned to sender, ignored, deleted, or stored temporarily, at Avirsim's sole discretion.

Usage, Data Storage and Other Limitations

You must comply with the then current usage, data storage and other limitations on your applicable Services. 
You must also ensure that your activity does not improperly restrict, inhibit, or degrade any other subscriber's use of the Services,
 nor represent (in the sole judgment of Avirsim) an unusually large burden on our networks. 
In addition, you must ensure that your activity does not improperly restrict, inhibit, disrupt, degrade or impede Avirsim's ability to deliver the Services, and monitor and investigate the Services, backbone, network nodes, and/or other network services or components. 
You may not resell, share, or otherwise distribute the Services or any portion thereof to any third party without the written consent of Avirsim. 
The Services are consumer products designed for personal purposes. For example, the Services do not provide the type of security, upstream performance and total downstream throughput capability typically associated with commercial use. You may not run a server in connection with the Services.
You may not provide network services to others via the Services. In addition, you are prohibited from running servers for mail, http, ftp, irc, and dhcp, and multi-user interactive forums.

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your service if your service usage results in unusually high usage.

Your use of the Services is subject to the Misuse of Service or Device conditions, as set out in the Terms and Conditions.

Network Management

We reserve the right to manage our networks in order to optimize their efficiency for the benefit of our subscribers, including, without limitation, by way of the following: rate limiting (speed), rejection or removal of spam or otherwise unsolicited bulk e-mail, protocol filtering, and anti-virus mechanisms. 
We may take any other action we deem appropriate in order to help ensure the integrity of the network experience for all subscribers.

Terms violation

As set out in the Terms, we have the right, but not the obligation, to monitor or investigate any content that is transmitted using the Services (other than voice Services) or the Equipment; and to access or preserve content or information in accordance with the Terms. 
We advise subscribers of inappropriate behavior and any necessary corrective action. However, if the Services are used in a way that we, in our sole discretion, believe violates this terms, any of the Avirsim Parties may take any responsive actions they deem appropriate. 
Such actions may include, without limitation, temporary or permanent removal of content, cancellation of newsgroup posts, filtering of Internet transmissions, and/or the immediate suspension or termination of all or any portion of the Services or your account. 
Avirsim Parties will have no liability for any such responsive actions. The above described actions are not exclusive remedies and the Avirsim Parties may take any other legal or technical action deemed appropriate. Upon termination of an account, any of the Avirsim Parties are authorized to delete any files, programs, data and e-mail messages associated with such account. The failure to enforce this terms, for whatever reason, shall not be construed as a waiver of any right to do so at any time. If any portion of this terms is held invalid or unenforceable, that portion will be construed consistent with applicable law as nearly as possible, and the remaining portions will remain in full force and effect. This terms shall be , 
construed and exclusively governed by in accordance with the governing law provision set out in the Terms.

Aversim work with my device? Yes Avirsim is compatible with dual sim devices, regardless what sim slot you use first or second. Whith what type of devices Avirsim is compatible with? Avirsim is compatible with any device that has a sim slot. May I use Aversim for M2M solution connectivity? Yes, for this type of requests please contact support@avircell.com When will perks be delivered? All perks will be delivered in accordance with the timeframe that is noted on the park. What shipping method Aversim uses for shipping?Regular airmail shipping. How long does shipping take? Shipping takes about 1-3 weeks, all depends on the destination country. I haven't written my shipping address what shall I do? Please contact us directly at shipping@avircell.com we will solve the issue. Note! Please take more time while filling the shipping address for reviewing it if it matches your current address. I have not yet received my perk, what shall I do? Please contact us directly at shipping@avircell.com we will solve the issue. Additional Terms for Avirsim Services and Features1. For example, you cannot use Avirsim for Web broadcasting, or for the operation of servers, telemetry devices and/or supervisory control and data or (f) engaging in atypical web usage behavior.2. among customers, or that otherwise may degrade service quality for other customers.Prohibited ActivitiesWithout limitation, you may not use (or allow anyone else to use) our Services to:1) use, possess, transmit, upload, post, disseminate or otherwise make available content that is unlawful or violates the copyright or other intellectual property rights of others (as described in more detail below);2) participate in any illegal soliciting or gaming schemes;3) attempt to use the Services in such a manner so as to avoid incurring charges for usage;4) participate in any fraudulent activities, including impersonating any person or entity or forging anyone else's digital or manual signature. You assume all risks regarding the determination of whether material is in the public domain;5) access the Internet via the Services using Internet Protocol (IP) addresses other than the IP address(es) assigned to you by us;6) invade another person's privacy or collect or store personal data about other users, or stalk or harass another person or entity;7) access any computer, software, data or any confidential, copyright-protected or patent-protected material of any other person, without the knowledge and consent of that person, or use any tools designed to facilitate access, such as "packet sniffers";8) upload, post, publish, deface, modify, transmit, reproduce, distribute in any way or otherwise make available information, software or other material protected by copyright or other proprietary or contractual right (such as a non-disclosure agreement) or related derivative works, without obtaining permission of the copyright owner or rightholder;9) use, reproduce, distribute, sell, resell or otherwise exploit the Services or content we provide or which you obtain through the Services for any commercial purposes withouth our explicit permission;10) copy, distribute, sub-license or otherwise make available any software or content we provide or make available to you or which you obtain through the Services, except as authorized by us;11) alter, reproduce, or tamper with the Services or any function, component or identifier of your Equipment, such as the International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI), that is not meant to be altered, reproduced or tampered with;12) restrict, inhibit or interfere with the ability of any person to access, use or enjoy the Internet, the Services or any Equipment used to connect to the Services, or create an unusually large burden on our networks, including, without limitation, posting, uploading, transmitting or otherwise making available information or software containing a virus, lock, key, bomb, worm, Trojan horse or other harmful, limiting, destructive or debilitating feature; distributing mass or unsolicited e-mail ("spam") or other messages; or otherwise generating levels of traffic sufficient to impede others' ability to send or retrieve information; or to use the Services in an abusive manner in connection with any unlimited packages, options or promotions.13) disrupt any backbone network nodes or network service, or otherwise restrict, disrupt, inhibit or impede our ability to monitor or deliver the Services, any transmissions or data;14) interfere with computer networking or telecommunications service to or from any Internet user, host, provider or network, including, other than your own personal purposes (such as reselling the Services, providing Internet access or any other feature of the Services to any third party) or share or transfer your Services without our express consent;16) forge headers or otherwise manipulate identifiers in order to disguise the origin of any content transmitted through the Services; or17) port scan a person's computer or wireless device without that person's consent, or use any tools designed to facilitate these scans.Unlawful or Inappropriate ContentAny Avirsim service Party, reserves the right to move, remove or refuse to post any content, in whole or in part, that it, in its sole discretion, decides is unacceptable, undesirable or in violation of the Terms . Additionally, the Services may not be used in any attempt to circumvent the user authentication or security of any host, network, or account, including, without limitation, accessing data not intended for you, logging into or making use of a server or account you are not expressly authorized to access, or probing the security of other networks. Use or distribution of tools designed for compromising security, such as password guessing programs, cracking tools, packet sniffers or network probing tools, is prohibited. You may not disrupt the Services. The Services also may not be used to interfere with computer networking or telecommunications services to any user, host or network, including, without limitation, denial of service attacks, flooding of a network, overloading a service, improper seizing and abuse of operator privileges and attempts to "crash" a host. The transmission or dissemination of any information or software that contains a virus or other harmful feature is also prohibited. You are solely responsible for the security of any device you choose to connect to the Services, including any data stored on that device. In particular, Avirsim recommends against enabling file or printer sharing of any sort. Avirsim recommends that any files or services you do choose to make available for remote access be protected with a strong password or as otherwise appropriate. You agree to treat as confidential all access codes, personal identification numbers and/or other passwords that we may provide to you for use with the Services.Unsolicited CommunicationsThe Services may not be used to send unsolicited, bulk or commercial messages or for any other unsolicited communications. This includes, without limitation, using automatic-dialing and announcing devices to or otherwise make unsolicited voice or facsimile calls and bulk mailing of commercial advertising, informational announcements, charity requests, petitions for signatures and political or religious messages. Such communications may only be directed to those who have explicitly requested it. The Services may not be used to send messages to any individual who has indicated that he/she does not wish to receive messages from you. The Services may not be used to collect responses from unsolicited e-mail messages sent from accounts on Internet hosts or e-mail services that violate this terms or the acceptable use policy of any other service provider. Also, unsolicited e-mail messages may not direct the recipient to any web site or other resource that uses the Services. Forging, altering or removing e-mail headers is prohibited. The propagation of chain letters is as well prohibited, whether or not the recipient wishes to receive such mailings. Avirsim is not responsible for the forwarding of e-mail sent to any account that has been suspended or terminated. Such e-mail will be returned to sender, ignored, deleted, or stored temporarily, at Avirsim's sole discretion.Usage, Data Storage and Other LimitationsYou must comply with the then current usage, data storage and other limitations on your applicable Services. You must also ensure that your activity does not improperly restrict, inhibit, or degrade any other subscriber's use of the Services, nor represent (in the sole judgment of Avirsim) an unusually large burden on our networks. In addition, you must ensure that your activity does not improperly restrict, inhibit, disrupt, degrade or impede Avirsim's ability to deliver the Services, and monitor and investigate the Services, backbone, network nodes, and/or other network services or components. You may not resell, share, or otherwise distribute the Services or any portion thereof to any third party without the written consent of Avirsim. The Services are consumer products designed for personal purposes. For example, the Services do not provide the type of security, upstream performance and total downstream throughput capability typically associated with commercial use. You may not run a server in connection with the Services.You may not provide network services to others via the Services. In addition, you are prohibited from running servers for mail, http, ftp, irc, and dhcp, and multi-user interactive forums.We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your service if your service usage results in unusually high usage.Your use of the Services is subject to the Misuse of Service or Device conditions, as set out in the Terms and Conditions.Network ManagementWe reserve the right to manage our networks in order to optimize their efficiency for the benefit of our subscribers, including, without limitation, by way of the following: rate limiting (speed), rejection or removal of spam or otherwise unsolicited bulk e-mail, protocol filtering, and anti-virus mechanisms. We may take any other action we deem appropriate in order to help ensure the integrity of the network experience for all subscribers.Terms violationAs set out in the Terms, we have the right, but not the obligation, to monitor or investigate any content that is transmitted using the Services (other than voice Services) or the Equipment; and to access or preserve content or information in accordance with the Terms. We advise subscribers of inappropriate behavior and any necessary corrective action. However, if the Services are used in a way that we, in our sole discretion, believe violates this terms, any of the Avirsim Parties may take any responsive actions they deem appropriate. Such actions may include, without limitation, temporary or permanent removal of content, cancellation of newsgroup posts, filtering of Internet transmissions, and/or the immediate suspension or termination of all or any portion of the Services or your account. Avirsim Parties will have no liability for any such responsive actions. The above described actions are not exclusive remedies and the Avirsim Parties may take any other legal or technical action deemed appropriate. Upon termination of an account, any of the Avirsim Parties are authorized to delete any files, programs, data and e-mail messages associated with such account. The failure to enforce this terms, for whatever reason, shall not be construed as a waiver of any right to do so at any time. If any portion of this terms is held invalid or unenforceable, that portion will be construed consistent with applicable law as nearly as possible, and the remaining portions will remain in full force and effect. This terms shall be , construed and exclusively governed by in accordance with the governing law provision set out in the Terms.

story:
Experience The HELPER! Prototype

 

What is the HELPER!

The HELPER! is a software interface which allows for the remote management of a device in order to help those less technically capable.  Upon touching the HELPER! icon, a person in need of guidance can choose a person in their network - be it a friend, family member or caregiver- by touching their image icon and connecting with them.  Once the connection is accepted by you, the Helper, you have the ability to mange their device and guide them to complete desired tasks.  You can stay online and enjoy shared time exploring the beautiful world accessible from one’s fingertips.  Once finished, simply turn the management of the device back over to them.  

The simple and important creation of The HELPER! can benefit so many individuals in need of basic assistance.  A recent New York Times article reveals that Americans live further away from their parents than ever, an average of over 18 miles.  While technology aids in maintaining bonds, often the confusion creates stress on the strong emotional ties.  The HELPER! allows you to be with them when they need help.  The current solutions of a phone call or text just aren’t that easy for some.

 

Use

( Un-complicate the Complicated)

  • Help people who are scared of technology
  • Share online experiences with people you care about
  • Use to explain confusing digital content to those that don’t understand
  • Assist people who have trouble with their digital devices
  • Use to teach people about new applications and software
  • Help people who are physically or cognitively impaired
  • Spend time with those who are lonely 
  • Use with people who have language barriers

 


 

 

Why The HELPER! is important to me: 

 

My Dad with his Granddaughter and Helper​ 

I started to conceptualize and build the architectural structure of The HELPER! after experiencing a rough year with my 84-year-old Dad.  He said to me, ‘Steve, I never thought I would be this lonely, this frustrated, and frankly, this scared.’  I found it unsettling to hear that coming from my inspiration, the hero that raised me.  Especially coming from a man that spent 55 years selflessly taking care of others as a pastor, a guiding light to those in hospitals and assisted living homes.  I said, ‘Dad, why don’t you listen to the music you love, those old hymns, or watch uplifting family videos?’  To which he said, ‘I just can’t remember how you showed me.’  This led me to realize the problem.  How can we help?  I know we can help!  My dad is not the only one hundreds of miles away from his family struggling to stay positive.  


                           

The Strongest Person I've Ever Known

I was the Caregiver for over a decade for the strongest person I've ever known. She endured chemotherapy for 11 years, one procedure after another.  I stayed with her most nights- both at home and in the hospital.  When I was gone, even for a few hours, she would feel distressed and lonely.  

I remember that absent look on her face upon returning to the hospital.  She told me how whenever I left, whether for a few hours or out of town to work, she was instantly overcome by a helpless feeling.  She could never remember what to look to for comfort or where to find things I had told her about on her computer and the internet.  It was so frustrating to see her loneliness and helplessness.  With all the wonderful technological advancements today, still so many get left behind. 

So the seed was planted.  Now came time to build upon the idea.

This inspiration led me towards creating the simple interface of The HELPER! We can help people through this problem, together.  Whether it's for your frustrated father or in the labor of love called caregiving for a person struggling with physical or cognitive challenges,  even helping someone understand a new app or software, we can be there to show them we care.  When we can't physically be present, with The HELPER! we can provide access to it all.  Help friends and family connect to the world outside of their struggles and help within their struggles… Help others take advantage of the incredible content, convenience and connectivity of the internet, all the while showing them we care no matter how small the task, we're there for them.

Louis Armstrong said it best in the song ‘What a Wonderful World’…”I see friends shaking hands, saying how do you do but what they’re really saying is, I love you.”  Whether aiding in filling out a form, reading or writing a story or simply finding family photos together, say ‘I love you’ with The HELPER!

Members of our fantastic team

My name is Stephen White and I have created products for the last 25 years.  I call it idea farming.  Discover an idea, plant it and see if you can provide what it needs to grow and positively affect lives.  I believe the culmination of experience gained from each project I have worked on is demonstrated through the amazing team of designers, developers and business people involved in creating The HELPER!

Unlike so many products in the market, The HELPER! will make a difference and impact countless lives.  I find it so fulfilling to make a product that enables so many people to help those they care about.  Our team has a background in software and app development around the world.  We have worked together on multiple projects and understand the strengths and weaknesses that will lead to the most efficient and successful work methods.  

Currently, the team has developed the wires and design prototype, assembled a tech stack and begun coding The HELPER!  We aim to create a very simple and easy-to-use image driven user interface and user experience.  Most of the technology involved in The HELPER! already exists.  The team has worked to repurpose the existing concepts in order to make The HELPER! affordable to anyone.  Our goal is to eventually provide The HELPER! at no cost for those who cannot afford it.

Help us make this dream a reality.  We have already begun developing The HELPER! but need your support to expedite production time from over a year to a just few months.  People need our product now.  Time is so important.  Your support will allow families and friends to connect and benefit from technology like never before.

 

Here's an example of recent project of ours, Solu: 

This product allows you to record the stories and save the memories of your life.  Imagine being able to use The HELPER! to encourage your loved ones to share their past with you.

 

Our Critical Risks

The critical risks for The HELPER! center around two key points.

1. Timing

To address the timing risk, we have adapted our development schedule to include a 20% margin of error.  This leeway gives us confidence with our product timeline.   

2. Quality across devices

Initially, The HELPER! will be available as a native desktop web interface and native android app.  The risk arises with ensuring functionality across numerous types and versions of these devices.  The team will apply significant quality controls to assure performance success.  The HELPER! will initially reach the most people through the desktop and Android market.  We plan to produce an iOS version once The HELPER! is up an running for the initial market.

 

Our Goal: KEEP IT SIMPLE

story:
Have you ever lost a lighter?

No worries, we have your solution right here.

 

  • Now your iPhone case is also your own personal lighter, with a slick, modern, and beautiful design.
  • The iLighter is made of Aluminum and works just like any other case that your put on your iPhone
  • It has its own battery with separate charging, much like how a portable charger works.
  • Check out our website: www.ilightercase.com

 

 

Short Summary

We took the well known concept of having everything on your phone simply another step further, and developed a slick solution that would enable you to always have your lighter on you.

We the iLighter team, part of iTics LLC, are a group of young entrepreneurs who have broad experience in the hi-tech, marketing, and advertising worlds.  We have managed to create the prototype using our own means, and this was after endless working hours of allowing the technology to function properly and the design that would be comfortable and modern looking to share with the consumer.  With your help and commitment, we would like to take this product and share it with the world. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise enough money in order to move forward with production on a large scale of the product.

The amount we are asking for is $15,000, and this would give us the initial start-up funds to quickly go into production.

Of course if we raise over the mark we are asking for, we would be able to go beyond the initial phase and market the product in such a way that it can reach everyone.

See the pledges to the right to see what you can get upon making your donation.

Thanks for your support

 

 

The Impact

Lighter factories use and burn copious amounts of plastic in order to create an endless number of lighters.  Such factories are part of the more global concern when discussing the sort of impact it has on the environment , and of course this is only a fraction of the issue that is going on.  In this case though, instead of always buying and using disposable lighters, it would be a good option to switch to a reliable, rechargeable version that you wouldn’t have to throw away at the end of every month because it’s out of fluid or simply the thumbwheel stopped turning.

Furthermore, the impact of having such a product is simple, as you wouldn’t be searching for a lighter every time you want to have a cigarette, and ultimately, the time spent for smokers looking for a lighter decreases significantly.

Lastly, less things to carry and worry about in your pockets.  The idea is to have nothing more than your cigarettes and phone in there…and of course perhaps some gum.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Spreading the word – WOM has always been the most effective tool
  • Sharing the project using the share tools
    Contribution doesn’t always have to be with cash, but promoting awareness of the product would be highly appreciated as well

 

 Thank you!

story:
The Project

I have built so many websites for my clients that I could not even keep count, but I never built a website for myself, I mean a real website not some static info website, but one the stature of the big ones (Hopefully with your help). Many ideas came to my mind at first but not this one. This project actually came to me by chance I wanted to add some simple 3D effect to an exciting website, as I was applying the effect thoughts kept scrolling in my brain. And. I was jumping from idea to another, going from moment of creativity to the next. Then I thought to myself why not build a website totally in 3D. I was not thinking about lame wannabe 3D websites I was thinking about Playstation like 3D Graphics, were the user can get immersed in a 3D world, navigate and interact within it in a never before seen manner. I envisioned the completed project as machup between Facebook & Amazon but in 3D. I new about SocalLife but I wanted something different and more video game like. I also imaged how this would grow up to an entire virtual city; with streets, villas, theatre, bars, clubs and oceans. It will be a place where people can do almost anything they can do in real life, without the risk of getting smashed by a car.

As you can see this is a really big project and I cannot do it on my own. I soon will start taking freelancing Jobs to support myself as I always did, and it would be harder for me to find the free time to make this incredible dream a reality. If I get enough funds for the project I will dedicate my energy full time to this project and treat it as a full time Job. Even if I don’t reach my funding goal I will keep developing this project but at a slow snail pace :) since I will be bombard by other projects.This project is so cool to ignore I won’t stop no matter what.

I am looking for fresh minds to back me up on this project and support me in any way possible. Any contribution is a good contribution. Your name will be engraved somewhere in the project for life.


I know people always like to see a proof of concept. So I decided to build a really simple and much smaller scale interactive demo so people can see my point. Please keep in mind that is nothing like the actual project but as a proof that the technology exists and that the project can be done. Sorry for the badly animated character, I know he kinda looks and walks stupid but the characters in the official project will be highly detailed and incredibly animated using motion capture technology. Please note that for now the demo requires a <1MB plug-in but later on it will be plug-in-less.

http://3dmoviehaven.com/3ddvdstore.php

 

The project will be divided into phases; each phase will have its own campaign. This will be phase one of the project and will include the following:

1)      Develop the core engine that control every aspect of the project

2)      Build a 4 story high 3D shopping mall with over 200 unique stores

3)      Add social networking functionally like chat, commenting, friend’s management, messaging etc.

4)      Model 3D characters to roam the virtual mall

 

Pointers:

1)      Products in mall can be actually purchased either by store owners or through affiliates like Amazon

2)      3D People in the mall will be real people which you can interact with. You can perform cool stuff like asking a fellow buyer about products that they have purchase in a specific store and get their opinion and feedback.

 

 

What makes this project so special?

1)      This is real 3D. I mean OpenGL like hardware acceleration type of 3D. Most current websites try to mimic a 3D appearance but is not actually 3D.

2)      It offer a never before seen level of interaction on the web, whether it socializing or buying virtual or real tangible products.

3)      Incredibly fun, no boring 2D text based pages any more.

4)      Does not require the user to use a desktop application. Its web based and viewable in all major browsers.

5)      It has the potential to pave the way for a new breed of websites. Guess what, your contribution will make you part of history.

 

Where will the money be spent?

1)      Foremost it will prevent me from taking freelance projects, just wanted to be honest

2)      Hire creative 3D artists to chop in with the design

3)      Hire talented programmers to help me with coding.

This is big project; I cannot do everything on my own and need all the help I can get.

Development will start as soon as we start getting funds.

 

What You Get

You will get various types of perks depending on your level of contribution. Read more at the perks sectionand checkout the cool USB Access Key Giveaway.


P.s The "People Who Made This Happen" list will be ordered by biggest contributors first

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always help grows the project. A great way to help is to spread the word about the project. You can do that in any way you like; by sharing on Facebook or Twitter, writing articles, blogging, email and whatever tool you see best. Don’t forget about the share tool here on indiegogo it is a great way to get you started.

story:
As a writer, you already know how hard it is to find a publishing company to publish your novel. You may have even considered borrowing money from a friend or relative in order to self-publish. Publishing your first novel should not be this difficult.

 

Why publish with us

The decision an author makes on which publishing company to work with can be difficult. Often times an author is either stuck with whomever liked their manuscript, or they self-publish which is a big up front expense most talented authors cannot afford. You, as a writer, have already devoted countless hours and resources into writing your manuscript. Why not let us relieve some of the stress, publish with us for free. The only thing we ask for in return is exclusivity while you are published on our site, but you can leave any time. So what are you waiting for? Be among some of the most diverse and unique writers who have chosen eWriteNow as their publishing company. 

 

Traditional Publishing

With the traditional publishing companies several talented authors fall to the waist side due to red tape and bureaucracies. Authors generally need a literary agent in order for publishing companies to even consider their manuscript. Finding an agent to represent you can be even more difficult than finding a needle in a haystack. Each agent has a different taste in the written word increasing the complexity of the situation. With a lot of luck and perseverance an author may find a break.


Self-Publishing

Self-Publishing is a fantastic idea for the author that wishes to do it all on their own: creating a marketing campaign; flying all over the country promoting their book; spending countless hours searching for outlets to sell; and finding funds to support these activities. The first few months for a self-published author can be crippling if the author is unable to fund the activities to continue on. Self-published authors can make more per novel than traditional publishing; however, the author is on their own to do everything. 

 

Finally there is a better way

We offer an outlet in which any author can succeed. Unlike traditional publishing companies, we do not require agents rather we work directly with the authors. Our mentality is that our authors are our greatest asset and without them we would not exist. This creates a completely different relationship between the author and publishing company. We do not force you into a commitment period, or force you to edit your works to conform to our standards. Rather we allow you to express yourself artistically and provide the outlet for success. Allow us to work for you – submit your manuscript today.

 

Who We Are

eWriteNow, LLC was founded by writer Kimberly Lowe and entrepreneur Allen Lowe. Kim’s experiences with the difficulty of publishing gives her insight into how challenging and discouraging publishing your first novel can be. Allen’s business experience gives him the insight into how to run a lean organization in order to increase the author’s profits. Together Kim and Allen are determined individuals who have their authors’ interests at the forefront of every business decision they encounter. Not only will you experience a personalized approach to publishing your novel, but you will also receive a greater portion of the profits than with any other company.

Our Goals

  • To change the face of publishing by providing a better royalty split
  • Providing the platform necessary for an author to learn and grow
  • Giving freedom to authors by allowing them to leave at any time
  • Allowing every talented author the same opportunity
  • Empowering the readers by allowing them to decide the Top Novel

story:
Short Summary

We are # 1 company in world who provide a rent a hockey stick (for now, we will expand to other equipment later as well)

But to  get a clear Idea about how it will work just this:

"Netflix" for Ice Hockey Sticks.

You don't need to pay a $$$ for hockey stick and if you feel not comfortable with stick or just simply don't like it you will  sell it on ebay  or craigslist for half price or even less..

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need some marketing $$ and some funds for inventory

It will be spend for generate relationship with local hockey stores and local adds.

Those of you who will invest in early stage we will provide a more when 50% discount!!

If we dont reach expected funds we will put all for inventory..and we will work with local F&F fundings sources(Friends and Family)

How it works:

Its easy as 1 - 2 - 3

1. Select a ice hockey stick  from our  inventory

2. Click rent button  (add numbers of days, select insurance & shipping cost) and check out..with paypal

3. Your stick will be delivered to your address..

4. If you'd like to keep it, we will just a charge rest of the price..

5. If you don't like it, send it back with same box (just add return label can be printed from your order)

Really simple..No need to pay a $$$ high price for Professional ice Hockey sticks, try it before you decided to buy or not to buy.

 

Risks and challenges

 

Where is no risk :

Try hockey stick, and if you don't like it send it back.. 
No risk for investors as well, product is done, fulfillment process is complete , money goes for inventory only, not for development etc. 
We start Beta in May, and will sign around 100-200 beta customers ( hockey players from Bay Area) for feedback and fixing process for better usability and excellent support our customers.

story:
This campaign is in support of my Dad’s website www.GospelSynergy.com.  My Dad has had the Gospel Synergy Magazine for over 15 years.  I am his webmaster and we have had the magazine online since April 2006.  It was one of the first Gospel Publications online.

Our budget for the website is very small and I do not have the software and skill to keep up with the pace of change on the internet.  To stay competitive and to provide a great experience to our visitors we need to update our site in many ways.  We need support to upgrade the site and keep providing Good News, God’s Word, and Gospel Music.  Our publication is one of the top supporters of Independent Gospel Musicians and we recently won the Stellar Award for our online radio station, Synergy1 Radio.  To truly continue the services we provide it is time to upgrade our website.

Help Us Do the Following and Get Some Air Time

The $2000 that we are raising will:

-          Update the web page design, making it easier to use our pages

-          Allow our page to work well on mobile devices

-          Clean and backup our database

-          Backup the entire website

-          Upgrade the online magazine software for faster loading and easier reading

-          Give more usable space for highlighting artists and advertising

-          Cover specialized web programming

-          Cover new host server costs

-          Completely make the site Search Engine Optimized

If we have any excess funds we will use them to change all previous issues to the faster loading format, upgrade our radio station interfaces, and it's web design.  Funds will also pay for our broadcast time to ensure the station continues to air great independent music.

For supporting us you will get at a minimum a "Shout-Out" on the website in a magazine article.  Depending on how much you support us we will provide air time, space in the magazine, both and advertisement on the website.   So ,support us in any way and enjoy the rewards!

What This Means To Us and Our Readers

For my Dad he has strived to provide useable information on current affairs inside and outside the church.  He assists young independent artists in getting their music and message heard.  He wishes to continue assisting others be seen and heard, by upgrading the site we will continue in that great work versus becoming invisible on the ever-changing internet.

You can help in many ways…

Prayer works and we are always thankful for your prayers.  Support at any level works from $1 to the complete $2000 or more.  Other ways to help is to get the word out!

2000 people can give $1 and we make our goal or 20 people give $100 and we are done.  This campaign only runs for 35 days.  So, share it with everyone on Facebook, Twitter, and any other place you can!  Word of mouth still works too!

 

Thank you and stay blessed!

story:
This will be a photo sharing website with a live interactive news feed. You will be able to like photos, share photos, follow others, and add friends. JeTpic will be 100% free and without all the ads and crowded pages full of nonsence.  There will also be an iPhone app. and android app. available for all users to download. I currently have a web design company in Denver working on the project as we speak. What I need to finish this project is the funds for the servers, apps, and SEO services for when the website is launched.

What We Need & What You Get

I would need around $60,000 to create a apple and android app. Sounds like a lot for this starter project, but if you want a great and functional app you need to spend a little bit more money. Also I need the dedicated the servers, and SEO services. If you help me create this project, You will be the first to use the website and get both apps for free!

The Impact

This website will allow people to share beautiful photos with one another. Anyone from photographers to average dailey users will be able to take a photo add a filter and share it with the world fast and easy.

One of the coolest features this will have is the most popular photo, if your photo gets the most likes and shares you will be desplayed on the most popular photo page. This will allow your photo to get more attention. If you are a photographer this will be key to getting your work noticed by others in the community. Millions of people use photo sharing websites everyday and I want to share my idea with the world to bring joy and fun to those who use these websites.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help me that is fine, you can always share this with other people. Also when the website and apps launch you can join.

story:
We are introducing referral program where the most active of you will get CulCharge 3-in-1 PowerBank for free - each day! 

What is more, most active referrer for the whole campaign will get a brand new Apple Watch! 

Please visit our special ThankYou Program page for details.


                                                            

CulCharge is the smallest ultrathin charge and data USB cable, only 2,3" (6 cm) long.


COUNTRY DISTRIBUTORS WANTED - WORLDWIDE

For more information contact us at sales@culcharge.com


Wrote about CulCharge already:

Mashable.com – "Stay Powered Up With This Tiny USB Smartphone Charger" + video review

CoolestGadgets.com – "CulCharge ensures you always have a way to charge your phone"

PhoneArena.com – "CulCharge is just 6 centimeters (2.3 ") long so it will fit perfectly on your keychain" 

TrendHunter.com - "CulCharge is the most compact portable USB charger on the market"

GadgetReview.com - "CulCharge is Smallest USB Charge and Data Cable for iPhone and Android"

TechnologyTell.com - "The price is also hard to beat"

USBtips.com - "The CulCharge has a simplistic, modern design that really catches the eye."

Crowdfundmafia.com - "Reaching only 2,3″ (6 cm) long, the ultrathin design makes it the most accessible charger available."

Coolbusinessideas.com- "CulCharge ultrathin Charger"

Walyou.com - "CulCharge has the honour of being able to call itself “the smallest ultrathin charge and data USB cable”."

Reviewsgang.com - "CulCharge without mincing words is a must have for all mobile smartphone users."

Tech.co - "Leave your outlet charger at home, and never worry about leaving it at work again."

CrowdFundInsider.com - Interview: CulCharge Creators on Crowdfunding Campaign Strategy

SmartCrowdFund - "Great campaign on Indiegogo."

and many others.. :)


CHARGE ANYWHERE

According to statistics, there are more than 16 billions devices with usb all around the World. 

With CulCharge you can charge your smartphone from cars, laptops, desktops, printers, TVs, monitors, game consoles, airplanes, motorbikes, boats, HIFIs, and many other electronic devices which have USB input.

Perfect solution for not only travelers and active people. 


 

CHARGE EVERY PHONE

To meet everybody`s satisfaction, we have developed 4 types of CulCharge – with Apple Lightning (iPhone 5), Iphone 4, MicroUSB and MiniUSB connectors. Whether you have iPhone, Samsung, HTC, Blackberry, Sony, Nokia, LG, Motorola, Huawei etc., CulCharge is perfect solution for you.   

No more stressful situations with weak battery, CulCharge is always with you.

 


 CULCHARGE ADVANTAGES

  • SMALL - just 2,3" (6 cm)long, ultrathin.
  • COOL - modern minimalistic design
  • UNIVERSAL - for almost every mobile device currently on the market, charge from almost every USB device.
  • AFFORDABLE - reasonable price for everybody. Preorder CulCharge for you, your family and friends.

"CulCharge Standie" - Smart POS

With CulCharge, we did not just developed and design the product. We have developed business model, that will sell these helpful mini cables worldwide and which brings business opportunity to many small entrep

Standie is eye-catching attractive Point of Sale stand with 8 inch LCD display.Combination of CulCharge and attractiveness of CulCharge Standie POS allows you to sell these useful gadgets to customers in various places, such as stores, gas stations, hotels, airports, events etc.

Standie offers easy and affordable way to start up your own business without experiences, big financial resources, technical equipment or other expensive investments.

It also helps retailers to sell these products via interactive presentation and modern looking stand. 

Target audience - potential customers of CulCharge are millions smartphones users all around the World.

Initial Investment - Choose between $500, $1000, $2000 or $5000 small business packages and start the business on your own immediately. 

Bigger the package, better the Return On Investment.


Our Goal

Always have a chance to charge your smartphone almost everywhere. Smile on your face, CulCharge in your pockets and CulCharge standies in stores all around the World.

 

If you like CulCharge, please support us and do not miss the opportunity to become our distributor.   


MOST ACTIVE WIN CULCHARGE OF HIS/HER CHOICE EVERYDAY OR NEW IPAD AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN.

  1. LOG-IN&GO TO OUR CAMPAIGN

  2. COPY YOUR UNIQUE LINK

  3. SHARE AND WIN

Make sure you use your unique link which can be found under our video and contains a 7-digit number at the end of the link. Person, who sends the most referrals to our Indiegogo campaign website each day, win CulCharge every day. Most active of you will get New iPad at the end of the campaign.

                                       

ABOUT US

CulCharge is developed by Jozef Zemla and Viktor Reviliak, MBA graduates from Bratislava, Slovakia.

We are young gadget enthusiats with years of experiences in product design, development and international business.

We would like to present our ideas, which would solve daily problems all around the World.

 

FAQ

I preordered 1 CulCharge (except iPhone 5) perk, how would you know which of 3 types (MiniUSB, iPhone 4, MicroUSB) to send me ?

We will contact every single pledger after the campaign by an email where we would ask which specific type that he/she wanted.

I forgot to add shipping!  What should I do?

Please contribute the shipping amount and select no perk.  We will match your contributions up.

I would like to have different amounts of different connectors in my perk, would it be possible?

Yes, for perks $500 and more,  just write us which connectors you prefer and we will find a solution to your perk.

I don't have an iPhone. Will it work on my phone?

We developed 4 types of CulCharges with iPhone 5, iPhone 4 connectors as well as Micro USB and Mini USB connectors which works on Android, Blackberry, Samsung, Nokia, Sony, HTC, LG, Motorola, Huawei and all devices that charge with a Micro or Mini USB cables.

Will it really fit in my pocket, wallet, keys?

Yes. CulCharge is only 2,3” (6 cm) long & ultraflat cable so you can have it always with you.

Can I hang phone on CulCharge when connected?

The USB plug is designed to fit perfectly into USB intput while your phone hangs and charges below. As you can see in our pictures or video, smartphones hold in extreme charging situations such as charging off of the side of a TV, though we might not recommend this.

How flexible is CulCharge?

CulCharge can be bend to more than 180 degrees, so you can really charge from almost any USB input you find around.

Can I transfer data as well?

Yes, CulCharge doesn't just charge your phone, but it also enables data transfer and sync.

For any other questions, please contact us directly | info@culcharge.com

What is more, most active referrer for the whole campaign will get a brand new Apple Watch! 
Please visit our special ThankYou Program page for details.

CrowdFundInsider.com - Interview: CulCharge Creators on Crowdfunding Campaign Strategy
SmartCrowdFund - "Great campaign on Indiegogo."
and many others.. :)

CHARGE ANYWHERE
According to statistics, there are more than 16 billions devices with usb all around the World.  
With CulCharge you can charge your smartphone from cars, laptops, desktops, printers, TVs, monitors, game consoles, airplanes, motorbikes, boats, HIFIs, and many other electronic devices which have USB input.

Perfect solution for not only travelers and active people.  





 
CHARGE EVERY PHONE






To meet everybody`s satisfaction, we have developed 4 types of CulCharge – with Apple Lightning (iPhone 5), Iphone 4, MicroUSB and MiniUSB connectors. Whether you have iPhone, Samsung, HTC, Blackberry, Sony, Nokia, LG, Motorola, Huawei etc., CulCharge is perfect solution for you.   
No more stressful situations with weak battery, CulCharge is always with you.
 




 CULCHARGE ADVANTAGES



SMALL - just  2,3" (6 cm)long, ultrathin.


COOL - modern minimalistic design


UNIVERSAL - for almost every mobile device currently on the market, charge from almost every USB device.


AFFORDABLE - reasonable price for everybody. Preorder CulCharge for you, your family and friends.

story:
Shield your valuables from unwanted eyes. A wristband for hiking, camping, running or anywhere!

With the Shield wristband you have a secure and hidden pocket with you at all times.

       

The SHIELD wristband has been designed to be multi-functional. The secret pocket has the right size to fit your; keys, usb flash-drive, money, medication, whatever you want. 

Over the last few months we have working on the design to ensure the SHIELD wristband concept came to life. We have covered all aspects of the design to ensure maximum function, style and comfort. We particularity chose a Premium American leather because most wristbands currently available are made of sub-standard fabric leather. We believe in quality. What we need now is support for the tooling, materials, packaging and production.

A pocket to store your keys, money, usb flash-drive, medication and much more safely and securely.


Inserting a USB memory stick, (width: 20 mm).

The secret pocket is hidden by the overlapped leather strap and secured with two metal press studs. 

SHIELD wristband's secret pocket is hand stitched ensuring highest quality and durability.

An example of our early designs and prototypes.


SHIELD wristbands are Hand-crafted from Hermann Oak Tannery premium leather using water based eco-friendly dyes. The leather is 1.6-2.0 mm thick giving a robust, flexible and comfortable wristband. 
A quality veg-tanned leather that stamps with beautiful colours. Embosses and moulds without cracking. Dyes, oils and finishes smoothly.

This is not thin fabric leather stitched together, unlike some other wristbands, this leather will last for years, ageing with you. 

SHIELD wristband's secret pocket is hand stitched ensuring highest quality and durability.

To ensure the wristband stays on your wrist we have incorporated two metal press studs into the design. 

To keep very small items secure or to keep the pocket contents waterproof then use small zip-lock resealable plastic bags.                                                           

We want this product to be completely unique to you. So because of that we are offering a Hot Branding service for up to 20 letters.

The Hot Branded letters can be placed either on the top of the wristband or hidden on the inside.

Personalise your SHIELD wristband with your own name or your favourite sports team,

 

We all like to look different so there are 9 amazing colours to choose from:

  • Small (S) – Wrist size - 5 - 6 inches (12.7cm - 15.24cm).
  • Medium (M) - Wrist size - 6 - 7 inches (15.24cm - 17.78cm).
  • Large (L) - Wrist size - 7 - 8 inches (17.78cm - 20.32cm).
  • Extra Large (XL) – Wrist size - 8 - 9 inches (20.32cm - 22.86cm).

Measure the circumference of your wrist and choose your size!



               




Manufacturing - 

The wristband has been designed with the manufacturing process in mind to ensure that the highest standards are met. We have already completed the final prototypes and are very pleased with the results. We now need your support to go into full manufacturing.

Packaging -

We are currently on the final design stage for the packaging. 

Our goal is to be upfront with all backers, insuring they're informed about their rewards. Contact will be made to all backers on completion of the campaign for individual requirements, colour, sizing, HOT Branding lettering.


We will endeavour to meet and hopefully surpass your expectations.


Thank you for your support.

story:
Missed the campaign?

You can still order Wolflink at great price at www.wolflinks.com

Wolflink is a next-generation router for smart home, with remote control by mobile APP, VPN support, built-in network security and easy as 1,2,3 setup, it can also be powered by power bank or laptop. You need one for your home connection!

As Featured In：

"Unlike traditional WiFi routers, which come with complex instruction manuals and outdated admin interfaces, the Wolflink can be easily controlled from any smartphone device."

--The Network Journal

“Wolflink prides itself on being made with highest quality materials, boasting a top spec aluminum alloy case that sets it apart from other routers on the market.”

--Daily Herald

"Wolflink is the router that can do more than just routing-it enables home automation. By using smart phones, users can view and manage the devices accessing to the network. "

--LA Daily News

Features：


Features – The benefits that you can get by using Wolflink

With Wolflink, you can manage all functions of router on your Mobile phone, and also can control multiple routers on your single mobile.  It can even be used to manage your content security, and internet usage etc.  Here’s a look into the different features that Wolflink has to offer.

Remote Control By Mobile APP

By using your smart phone to control your Wolflink router, you’ll be able to view how many devices the polar router has been connected to, manage the connected devices, check out the speed, restart the router, and manage plug-ins and other information. Using the mobile remote enables you to control your home internet any time, anywhere. 

With Mobile Control APP, you can get

  • Strong, Stable, and Fast Signal 

* Wolflink router wireless signal is capable of getting through 2 or 3 walls and transmits more than 200 meters.

* 2*5dBi high gain antennas based on 802.11n MIMO technology provide high performance up to 300Mbps.

* Just tap “Through Walls” tool on mobile APP to boost wireless coverage and get wireless signal penetrate dead zones or dead spots.

  • Parental Control

With the “Parental Control” tool, you can set an on/off schedule for all of the devices connected to the router to limit the time of your children spend online; you can also block inappropriate and dangerous sites on mobile without looking over their shoulder 24/7.

  • Intelligent Bandwidth Allocation

Allocate the bandwidth according to different devices' demands, to limit interruptions for games or video.

  •  Wi-Fi Timer Switch

    • The “WiFi on/off Switch” tool allows you to set up a wireless schedule on your router to keep health and good habit, avoid radiation and save energy.

    (Panel Lights on/off--Wolflink has a front panel showing three indicators only display when they are energized, you can turn on/off the lights according to your needs on mobile when you are sleeping at night.)

    Easy as 1,2,3 Setup

    It's extremely easy to set up and use Wolflink. Just plug in the power and network cables, type ”admin” (default password) and you're done. No complicated configuration or confusing software to worry about. And no more 192.168.1... nonsense. Wolflink is “plug and play”. 

    Elegant Design Meets Simplicity

    100% of the material can be recycled, and Wolflink's black metal texture shell and white smooth lines, is so beauty and user-friendly, environment-friendly and effective for body heat. Wolflink's aluminium alloy case, a little larger than an iPhone 5S.

    Network Protection

    Wolflink’s built-in network security defense system is the real firewall for your home, making sure you are always safe online. Thanks to the alert techniques that quickly identify Wi-Fi squatters and kick them out. They will also be tagged automatically by the intelligent system so there will be no second chance for such visitors. 

    Internal Power Supply

    You can charge the router with the mobile power supply or laptop through the mini-USB port. This feature enables Wolflink users to enjoy better and uninterrupted Wi-Fi network especially in the power-outage situation. 

    VPN Service Support

    VPN service is built in the router without any downloading or installation. Users only need to put in your VPN account information to enjoy the service. 

    Wolflink Offers Great Value

    Thumbs-Up For Proven Quality 

    Through WirelessMon, the professional wireless signal test software, several tests were made to compare Wolflink and T (a mainstream router with 5dBi high-gain dual-band antennas and 300Mbps wireless rate) on the high performances of signal intensity, wall feed-through behavior, and wireless transmission. Please refer to the following link to get to know more.

    Tech Specs：

    HARDWARE                       FEATURES
    Interface 4 10/100Mbps LAN PORTS 1 10/100Mbps WAN PORT
    Button Reset Button 
    External Power Supply 5VDC / 1A
    Wireless Standards IEEE 802.11n, IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11b
    Antenna 2*5dBi omni-directional antennas
    Dimensions ( W x D x H ) 5.3 x 3.6 x 0.8 in.(135 x 91 x 21 mm)
    WIRELESS FEATURES
    Frequency          2.412~2.472 GHz  Transmission speed: 300Mbps  Available channels: 1~13
    Wireless Functions Enable/Disable Wireless Radio, WDS Bridge, WMM, Wireless Statistics
    Wireless Security WPA2,WPA-PSK / WPA2-PSK
    SOFTWARE FEATURES
    Configuration CPU frequency: 580MHz  Memory: DDR2, 128MB        
    RAM: 16MB extended interface supports SD cards (SDHC)
    OTHERS
    Certification CE, RoHS, FCC
    Package Contents 1* Smart Router WL0722;
     1*Power supply;
    1* USB Cable;
    1*User Manual

    What makes Wolflink so Awesome?

    Wolflink Board

    Why we need Indiegogo?

    We are extremely keen to introduce Wolflink to Indiegogo; a platform that will answer to our goals thanks to its renowned program and accessible tools. Having a tech-driven culture and an outstanding product, we believe that early adopters and trendsetters are those who will help get Wolflink up and running. This active and smart group is found amongst Indiegogo users. One of the key reasons we need support is to develop and improve Wolflink, so it offers its finest results when it comes to software, hardware, production, and industrial design. Our hardworking team is committed to revolutionizing the tech-market with Wolflink as the intelligent device for Internet users. It is imperative that we place substantial orders to make sure Wolflink gets marketed at an affordable price; as a synergetic contribution will go a long way in achieving mutual benefits, Indiegogo’s funding is highly vital to our business.

    Frequently Asked Questions 

    Q1. Do I need to have SD card to use with Wolflink router?

    SD card is forthe future use. A. Supporting cloud platform B. Installation of more 

    plug-ins C. Cache for future acceleration service. This is not yet included in our 

    packaged accessories. 

    Q2. Am I supposed to add shipping fee if I’m in the United States?

    No shipping fee within USA. 

    Q3. Am I supposed to add shipping fee for international orders?

    Depends. Please add 10 dollars to your pledge and 5 dollars for each additional Wolflink router.But if you get more than five Wolflink routers, there is no shipping fee for international orders at all. 

    Q4. When are you going to be shipping my Wolflink device? 

    Estimated national and international shipping is early December 2014.

    Q5.I accidentally put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my perk. What do I do?

    Please e-mail our customer service at service@wolflinks.com with your full name, address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order.

Certification
CE, RoHS, FCC


Package Contents
1* Smart Router WL0722; 1*Power supply; 1* USB Cable; 1*User
  Manual



What makes Wolflink so Awesome?

Wolflink
Board




Why
we need Indiegogo?
We are
extremely keen to introduce Wolflink to Indiegogo; a platform that will answer
to our goals thanks to its renowned program and accessible tools. Having a
tech-driven culture and an outstanding product, we believe that early adopters
and trendsetters are those who will help get Wolflink up and running. This
active and smart group is found amongst Indiegogo users. One of the key reasons
we need support is to develop and improve Wolflink, so it offers its finest
results when it comes to software, hardware, production, and industrial design.
Our hardworking team is committed to revolutionizing the tech-market with
Wolflink as the intelligent device for Internet users. It is imperative that we
place substantial orders to make sure Wolflink gets marketed at an affordable
price; as a synergetic contribution will go a long way in achieving mutual
benefits, Indiegogo’s funding is highly vital to our business.
Frequently
Asked Questions 
Q1. Do
I need to have SD card to use with Wolflink router?
SD card is forthe future use. A. Supporting cloud platform B. Installation of more 
plug-ins C. Cache for future acceleration service. This is not yet included in our 
packaged accessories. 
Q2. Am
I supposed to add shipping fee if I’m in the United States?
No
shipping fee within USA. 
Q3. Am
I supposed to add shipping fee for international orders?
Depends.
Please add 10 dollars to your pledge and 5 dollars for each additional Wolflink
router.But if you get more than five Wolflink routers, there is no shipping fee
for international orders at all. 
Q4.
When are you going to be shipping my Wolflink device? 
Estimated
national and international shipping is early December 2014.
Q5.I accidentally put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my
perk. What do I do?
Please
e-mail our customer service at service@wolflinks.com with your full name,
address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you
in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order.

story:
My name is Bill Kaltenekker, I am a retired electrical engineer and
physicist with a lifelong passion for thoroughbred horse racing. My
father was also and every Sunday, when the races were on at Hollywood
Park, or anywhere else within driving range of Los Angeles, we would
head for the track. My father taught me to handicap early on and it
was my job to keep track of the daily results in what we now call a
data base. I did the work faithfully looking up information from news
papers and the “Racing Form” . I got a job at the track, cleaning
out stables and walking down horses after their exercise runs. I
learned a lot about handicapping horses and the talk around the
stables. We were successful in our wagers more often than not but
much of the reason why we went was my father's love for horses. It
was also nice to win.

            
What I want to do is to develop the best handicapping service available
anywhere. I will use my past experience in horse racing developed in
over 60 years of being associated with the sport, my knowledge of
computer programming and numerical analysis and my research
experience to develop this handicapping method.


I will gather a huge data base of race results from every track in the US.
Data will be collected for every horse racing at any track . The
things that will be included in the analysis for each horse is past
performance, breeding data, jockey data, trainer data , pertinent
race data (size of purse, class, etc), track information and any and
all other data necessary to make the best possible prediction as to
the race outcome.

I will set up a private corporation, with a board of directors to run
the Company. There will be five directors, the five people making the
highest investment will be asked to be directors. I will be the
chairman for the first two years. After that an election , all the
investors, will decide the next chairman. Shares will be issued to
all investors, one share for each dollar invested. The Company will
run as a normal private corporation with all the rules and
regulations that are required. The Company will return a portion of
the profits each year as a share dividend.

 

                 
The Company will advertise it's service in racing magazines, newspapers
and pamphlets available at the various tracks. It will have a well
prepared website. Customers will be able to send a text to a supplied
phone number giving the race number and track information and receive
a text message back with recommendations for win, place, show,
excacta  and trifecta wagers. There will be some charge, yet to be
determined, per text received. 


                 
I think this will be a good service for people and will increase their
enjoyment at the track. It will allow people not familiar with
handicapping to become more involved at the track and increase their
excitement level considerably. It will allow people to place wagers at any track in the US......  I think the Company will be profitable and generate a good return for all investors. I plan to expand to other countries once the US Company is operational.

Please, there has been a lot of people looking at this but only 2 funders, if you do not fund a portion could you please tell me what your objections are? I would really like to develop this idea. You could just leave a comment!
