story:
The MasterPark Sentinel is an invention in the final stages of prototyping. It provides access control, parking control, security, boat security and lane control in some of its uses.

In order to finish the invention into a marketable product, we require extra funding. Once the invention has been completed, it will need to be tested which will require extra models to be made.

story:
What is this?

Say you ordered a pizza, and the delivery boy rings the doorbell and says your bill is $23. You reach your pocket and see you have a $20 and a $10. The delivery boy has no change either! How much you wish you could just swipe your card!

Take out your phone, dial Eashmart, key in the delivery boy's number, the amount and choose one of your cards, that you have already added to your account! The pizza comany, delivery boy and you get notified of the payment right away!

Now relax and enjoy your pizza!

Did we mention? You will be able to pay your auto driver, maid, milkman, just about anyone you can imagine, through Eashmart!

What We Need & What You Get

Eashmart needs to become an aggregator to provide merchants and businesses with a special account that is needed for them to be able to accept payments through your cards. Banks charge a joining fee that is as high as $6000(roughly Rs. 3.25 lakhs). Eashmart needs to pay the bank this fee to be allowed to charge a card and deposit the money to the business' account.

  • The funding is required to get an agrregator license from ICICI Bank. This will allow Eashmart to process a card payment and deposit the amount to a business' account.
  • We are deeply grateful to all of our backers and have some great perks we think you'll love!
  • If you back us with more than $500 we will provide you with $1000 worth of transactions without any TDR! That is your transaction fee will be 0!

The Impact

Every penny raised by this campaign will allow Eashmart to make the payments easy and hassle free in India. You will no longer need to carry your wallet. There is no risk of losing cash or your cards, no matter what happens.

  • You no longer need to carry cash around. We know that your wallets become an inconvenience with cash in it.
  • We have felt the hassle of running around for change every time the auto driver denied having change. We know how aweful it is when you forget your wallet at home. We know how embarrasing it is when you realise you don't have enough cash on you when you go shopping. Eashmart promises to save you all that trouble
  • Currently we are launching only in India, but we are looking forward to expand globally soon!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute monetarily, please help us spread the word about Eashmart and this campaign.

  • Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and tell your friends/family/colleagues about Eashmart
  • If you have a business and would like to use Eashmart, feel free to contact us, and we will be glad to help you get ready to use Eashmart when we launch!

story:
Short Summary

  • Hi. Ben and Lucas here. We are saving up to buy a 3D Printer.
  • We could use the printer for both fun and education.
  • What We Need & What You Get
  • The printer costs $1,200. We also need a small amount of money for plastic.
  • If you donate enough, you could get a small, medium, or large item produced by the very 3D printer you helped us buy! All of those items come with a Smile Makers®
  • If we don't get to our goal, all of the money will go into the printer fund, and we will find other ways to get profit.
  • Any extra money will go towards plastic for the printer.

The Impact

  • This machine will be not only entertaining, but it could be educational too.
  • We have been looking forward to getting one of these machines for a long time!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You may not be able to help us by donating, but you can tell other people about us.
  • Don't forget you can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Combimouse is a combination keyboard and mouse. 

This video shows the Combimouse in use. It's best to set the resolution of the video to 720p HD and to set it to full screen so that you can see text being entered.


Project Plan

Click here to view the project plan.

Campaign objective

We have completed the proof of concept phase and are looking for investors to help us manufacture the Combimouse as detailed on the Combimouse website here. We can only go into production once the design is complete.

The objective of this campaign is to allow us to continue development while we look for an investor.

We have run two previous Indiegogo campaigns which have helped us progress. You can view the campaigns here and here.

Note that even if we don't reach our goal of $10K for this campaign we still receive all funds contributed.

What is the Combimouse

The Combimouse is a Combination Keyboard and Mouse that makes computer input easy and very fast.

It is a split keyboard with separate left and right parts to be used by the left and right hands. You don't have to move your hand off the keyboard to use the mouse. For more information on how it works see the Combimouse website.

The mouse feels like a normal mouse and works just as well as a normal mouse.

The Combimouse has been in development for a number of years.

There is a lot of interest in the product. Our website has been viewed over 200,000 times and a Google search generates about 50,000 results. In May this year we finally resolved all ergonomic issues and expect to go into production soon. There are about 1.6 billion computers in use and so we think the Combimouse will be very popular.

How it works

Below are two photos showing the two ways the right part can be gripped during mouse mode.

The first one is exactly the same way as gripping a normal mouse. It takes fractionally longer to reach then the second method, but it is more accurate because you wrist is supported on the table.

The time to grip using the second grip mode is virtually zero. Pointing is slighly less accurate than the first method because you wrist isn't supported on the table.

When the part is touched on the right side by the small finger, a sensor is activated and the part switches to mouse mode. The keyboard keys then become mouse click buttons.

 


Team

Ari Zagnoev, CEO. Main engineer. Majority Combimouse shareholder.

Learn more about Ari at Linked In.


Roger Larcome, Software Engineer. Combimouse shareholder

Learn more about Roger at Linked In.

Simon Herron, Accountant and Business Development. Combimouse shareholder

Learn more about Simon at Linked In.

Follow Combimouse

Website

Twitter @combimouse

Facebook

Google Plus

Thank You

If you contribute you will be helping us get the Combimouse into production.

In return you will receive the first Combimouse off the production line.

Blogs

Combimouse Project Plan

Combimouse Funding

What's it like using the Combimouse? 

Combimouse key layout and variations to support international options

Why not disclose how the Combimouse Keyboard mode brake works

Gaming on the Combimouse

What should the Combimouse sell for?

Should we make a Left Handed version Combimouse?

Scroll solutions for the Combimouse

Even with touch devices there is a huge market for Combimouse

Background Blogs

The Combimouse Story

Combimouse design evolution

Combimouse Prototypes Over the Years

Printing the Combimouse plastic using 3D printing is not possible

story:
What is Wekey? 

While there are existing wireless keyboards out there that are less than 3mm thick, these generally rely on electrostatic touch technology for tactile responses. Wekey's super slim touch keyboard overcomes these circuit and mechanical technological barriers by using constant pressure type film technology and hi-tech components and materials.




About Wekey


Why use Wekey?

Unlike laptops, tablet PC's were developed with the focus of being extremely portable. However, tablets are not as comfortable to type on as laptops. With that said, we don't want to carry around thick or heavy keyboards just to use with our tablets. Wekey was designed to be extremely portable and to fit into your tablet case like a bookmark, allowing you to use it wherever you are.


Because of its thickness (2.5mm) and weight (160g), a lot of people may be concerned that the keyboard will easily break. But as you can see from our video, even if a car drives over it (or dropped from 5 meters) the keyboard is highly durable and does not break easily. 


Using your tablet to give presentations while attached to a projector can be inconvenient, but connecting Wekey to an Android powered tablet allows remote control of the touchpad and wheel (up to 10 meters) for easy slide transitions, pointing, etc. 


When using your tablet at a cafe, a traditional wireless keyboard is prone to breaking from accidental coffee spills. But not with Wekey. Simply wipe off the coffee and keep on typing.

In addition, from a user's perspective, having to constantly worry about battery life is something no wants to deal with. With its large Li-Po batteries that triples the capacity of other competitors' keyboards, Wekey can be charged fully in an hour and a half and can be used for 3 months (avg. 4 hours a day). This means you only need to charge it 4 times a year! 


Multi-pairing support allows up to 3 devices to be paired with Wekey and Wekey will remember which device and OS it's connected to match the OS's keyboard layout. If multi-pairing is just a basic feature, then Wekey brings the next level of convenience by automatically configuring to match the OS of the currently connected device for maximum user comfort. 


Unlike cell phones, taking selfies with a tablet is uncomfortable. Because of their weight and size, using one hand to open the camera app, getting the right pose, and using the other hand to press the capture button takes some effort. Wekey can launch the camera app (Fn + F4) and even take the photo for you allowing you take more natural photos wherever you may be.


Touchpad/Wheel at work


Specification


Pouch


About WOORIN

Why did we choose Indiegogo?

We believe that crowdfunding is a necessary part of the development stage for a development company. Before releasing our products on the market, we want to test and receive honest feedback from all of you. All of you can help pinpoint areas where we need improving or to find something we're missing to help us raise the quality of our products. We want to show our thanks to those that back us by giving them the opportunity to be the first to receive our products through our crowdfunding campaigns. Crowdfunding allows us to create something together. Wekey isn't just our product, but something that's created with the help of all of you. 


The funds we collect through Indiegogo are necessary for mass production. We spent the past year developing our product and receiving support from the federal government to develop Wekey and now we need feedback from all of you. Please support our product if you believe it's something worthwhile.


Timeline


Perks

Delivery of perks are subject to our best efforts and not guaranteed.


Risks & Challenges

1) Over-sensing

- Slim keyboards only adopt electrostatic mechanisms that receive key input simply by placing your hands on the keyboard. But our product adopts the piezoelectric method that can control sensitivity of keys step by step.

2) Multi-Key Input

- Combined key combinations should be available. Electrostatic type keyboards provide partial combined key functions, but our product is designed to allow 3 or more key combinations inputs.

3) Response Time

- Electrostatic type keyboards sometimes incur delays due to electronic noise, but this product adopts a High-Core Keyboard Controller that works faster and without delay. 


Frequently Asked Questions

1.  Can Wekey be used for iPhones as well as iPads?

- Yes, Wekey is compatible with both the iPhone and iPad. However the touchpad and wheel are only compatible Android and Windows devices. iOS does not support these features unfortunately and only the keyboard will function.

2.  How long can I use the batteries for?

- Compared to other comparable keyboards out there, Wekey's batteries have 3 times the capacity with built-in 600mA Li-Po batteries. After fully charging the battery (1.5 hours charge time), Wekey can be used for about 3 months without recharging based on an average daily use for about 4 hours. The batteries can be recharged between 400~500 times which means you only need to charge the keyboard 10 times in one year (potentially a 40 year lifespan).

3.  How far does Wekey transmit?

- Without any obstruction (walls, furniture, etc.), Wekey can go up to 10 meters. There may be standard interference due to other electronic devices in the vicinity and decrease the transmit distance, which is standard for all wireless devices.

4.  The keyboard touch is awkward

- Wekey is light, thin, and built to be extremely portable. Unlike desktop or laptop keyboards, Wekey is built for tablet use for convenience when writing up simple text or meeting notes. Getting acclimated to the keyboard can take anywhere from 10 minutes to a day according to our test users. We ask that you give it some time to become adjusted to using Wekey's keyboard.

5.  Is it completely waterproof? Can I put it in water?

- Wekey is not completely waterproof. Wekey is protected from accidental spills like soda, water, or coffee. The keys are highly protected from liquid damage, but the micro-USB port and power switch are not.

1) Over-sensing
- Slim keyboards only adopt electrostatic mechanisms that receive key input simply by
placing your hands on the keyboard. But our product adopts the piezoelectric method that
can control sensitivity of keys step by step.




2) Multi-Key Input
- Combined key combinations should be available. Electrostatic type keyboards provide partial combined
key functions, but our product is designed to allow 3 or more key combinations inputs. 
3) Response Time
- Electrostatic type keyboards sometimes incur delays due to electronic noise, but this product adopts a High-Core Keyboard Controller that works faster and without delay. 










Frequently Asked Questions


1.  Can Wekey be used for iPhones as well as iPads?
- Yes, Wekey is compatible with both the iPhone and iPad. However
the touchpad and wheel are only compatible Android and Windows devices. iOS
does not support these features unfortunately and only the keyboard will
function.
2.  How long can I use the batteries for?
- Compared to other comparable keyboards
out there, Wekey's batteries have 3 times the capacity with built-in 600mA
Li-Po batteries. After fully charging the battery (1.5 hours charge time),
Wekey can be used for about 3 months without recharging based on an average
daily use for about 4 hours. The batteries can be recharged between 400~500
times which means you only need to charge the keyboard 10 times in one year
(potentially a 40 year lifespan).
3.  How far does Wekey transmit?
- Without any obstruction (walls,
furniture, etc.), Wekey can go up to 10 meters. There may be standard
interference due to other electronic devices in the vicinity and decrease the
transmit distance, which is standard for all wireless devices.
4.  The keyboard touch is awkward
- Wekey is light, thin, and built to be extremely portable.
Unlike desktop or laptop keyboards, Wekey is built for tablet use for
convenience when writing up simple text or meeting notes. Getting acclimated to
the keyboard can take anywhere from 10 minutes to a day according to our test
users. We ask that you give it some time to become adjusted to using Wekey's
keyboard. 
5.  Is it completely waterproof? Can I put it in water?
- Wekey is not completely waterproof. Wekey
is protected from accidental spills like soda, water, or coffee. The keys are
highly protected from liquid damage, but the micro-USB port and power switch
are not.

story:
Who are we and what do we do?

AppSwarm has plans to be a publicly traded company in the near future. Are we for profit? YES! However, here's the BIG DIFFERENCE. We are actively looking for young entrepreneurially spirited application developers all across the globe who may have a brilliant idea, or even a developed application but do not know how to monetize their dream. 

Our area of expertise and our core PASSION is empowering people from across the globe to successfully partner with and help their dreams come true. How?

Established in 2011, App Swarm™ is an application “incubation firm” dedicated to acquiring applications for all forms of devices. If we see an application that we believe has potential, we will engage the person or firm who created it and enter into either a stock purchase agreement or royalty arrangement. We have resources and expertise most small firms or young entrepreneurs and application developers usually do not have, to market applications the most effective way possible. We utilize all forms of social marketing as well as traditional marketing to get as many eyes on the application as possible. We also have agreements in place with all of the major application stores so we can fast track their dream.

I bet anyone who reads this has either thought of a great app idea or knows someone who has one developed but does not know how to effectively monetize their dream. WE WANT TO HELP YOU!

A raging storm can topple a building. Harnessing that storm can power a revolution. We believe that if properly optimized, marketed and monetized, under-performing apps can turn a real profit – and steadily performing apps can become revenue-generating machines.

Because we work directly with brand name clients and celebrities, we will have the ability to negotiate lucrative sponsorship deals for apps in the Swarm™ as well.

Who, wha, why??

We are in need of money to continue the process of going public; not cheap!
 
We are looking to raise $35,000 so we can continue the process of an IPO. These funds will also help continue empowering app developers with their dreams.

When we get to the IPO stage we have a handful of commitments from underwriters to really up the money raising process. Again, this allows us to spread further out and have a much larger, global impact on entrepreneurs or simply a kid who has developed a brilliant app in his/her parents basement. 

We know we can change lives. If we hit our money goal it will enable us to take that next HUGE step. Bottom line, this seed money is more important than the potential millions we can raise in an IPO. Why? Because if we don't raise this core amount of money, then we'll never be able to get to the next level.

If you invest in our dream we will make sure that all contributors get to be a permanent part of our dream. Huh? Yes, here's the deal. Any person compelled enough to help us, will forever be a partner of AppSwarm. You will have the privilege to download any and all future apps we develop or assist in free for LIFE!

Helping the "little guy"

We are not looking for the next giant tech company. We are looking for the "little guy" with a kick-ass dream who has no one interested because he/she does not have an entourage of Vulture Capitalists kissing ass. Or in many cases looking to screw them. We know we can be the company that empowers the smallest of developers from all corners of this planet. That's why technology is a great thing! If you live in a small city across the planet and have a brilliant idea we want to help. That's the bottom line mantra we are so passionate about!

We're small too!

If you wish you could help out but can't spare five bucks, we understand because guess what? We've been there too many times to remember. You know what would help us even more than five bucks? You taking your time and enthusiasm and simply helping us spread our message. Whether it's a shout out on Facebook, Twitter, or anything creative you can think of to help us spread the word. This kind of help is priceless!

If you read all of this then you are officially a bad-ass, or a geek! Either way, we thank you for your energy and enthusiasm!

MUCH LOVE.....TEAM APP SWARM!
